1a1(sgra skor): brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA kar Na'i gzhung 'grel gyi go don chog dpe brjod sogs tshig tu bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las glegs bam gnyis
1a2(sgra skor): pa bzhugs//
1b1(sgra skor): da ni b+hU la sogs pa byings At+ma ne'i tshig can
1b2(sgra skor): rnams la/ rnam dbye At+ma ne pad rnams sbyar ba'i cho
2a1(sgra skor): ga 'chad par bya ste/ e d+ha 'phel ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ laT sogs At+ma ne pa de rnams sbyar/ cho ga
2a2(sgra skor): rnams b+ha thob pa la'o zhes pa'i skabs dang 'dra bas/ la Ta'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e d+ha te/ e d+ha la laT shab rjes 'brel phyis nas
2a3(sgra skor): ta ta las a phreng / Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ t+ya drangs pa'o// e d+he te/ e d+ha la sha pa laT/ la A tAM t+ya las Amra phyung / Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e pras/ Ata kyi 'gro
2b1(sgra skor): bal 'os A i y+ra wa ya dag gi wa la la dbyi 'os ya phyis/ i mtshams sbyar/ a d+han+sa/ te d+ha la/ sha ba laT la dz+ha dz+ha las a phyung / dz+ha'i an+ta/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyi mtha' e/ ata kyi yon tan la 'os/ gnyis ngag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/
2b2(sgra skor): laTa'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e d+ha se/ e d+ha la/ shab laT la bAs thAs kyi se 'os thAs se/ a d+he the/ e d+ha la/ shapa laT la sA b+hA las em byung / Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e aT kyi 'gro ba la 'os A i
2b3(sgra skor): ya wa ya dog gi nga la la dbyi 'os ya phyis mi mtshams spyad/ e d+h+ya d+h+we/ e d+ha sa/ shab 'jal d+hA Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' se/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e d+he/ e d+ha ga/ sa Tal leTaT 'gro ba sogs kyis
2b4(sgra skor): ata kyi yon tan la bos gnyis dgis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/ e d+yA pa he/ e d+ha la/ sha ba laT la wa hi dang ma ting / Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ ata kyi yanya la ring po 'os/ a ring por song / a d+yA ma ha
3a1(sgra skor): e d+ha la ling / shapa/ ling gi sI yus 'os/ sI yuT sbyor ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum e d+ha la shas ling la tha ling la si yuT/ Ta gnas don u brjod don wa yA dag gi bal la 'os ya
3a2(sgra skor): phyis/ ling gi mtha' ma yin pa'i sa dbyi 'oms phyis mtshams sbyar/ e d+he ta/ e d+ha la shi pa li la A tr-i tu bsgyur sI yuT rjes 'brel phyis/ ling gi mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sa phyis mtshams sbyar+Ya/ e d+he yA hAM/ e d+he ran/ e d+he la
3a3(sgra skor): ling la dz+ha sI ya?T rjes 'brel phyis/ ling gi mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sa phyis mtshams sbyar/ dz+ha'i ran 'os dz+hi ran/ lba ya ngag gis bal la sh+tsi 'os a phyiras/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e d+he thAHe d+ha laM sha pa ling la thAs sI yuT
3a4(sgra skor): brel phyis/ ling gi mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sa phyis la yang dag gi bal la dbyi 'os sa phyis/ e d+h+we yA thAM/ e d+ha la sha pa ling la A bAM si yuT ling gi mtha'i ma yin pa sogs kyis sa phyis mtshams sbyar/ e d+he d+h+waM/ e d+ha la ling sha pa la d+h+waM
3a5(sgra skor): sI yuT ling gi mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sa phyis/ ba ya zhes pas sa phyis/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e d+h+ye ya/ e d+ha la sha ba ling la ir sI yuT rjes 'brel gyis iTa'i ata 'os iT ata sa phyis mtshams sbyar/ e d+he pa hi/ e dz+ha la sha
3a6(sgra skor): liying / la ba hi dang ma ting du bsgyur/ sI yuT rjes 'brel gyis wa ya ngag gis zhes pas yaM phyis/ ling gi mtha' la yin pa sogs kyis sa phyis mtshams sbyar/ e d+he ma hi/ e d+ha la loT sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e
3b1(sgra skor): d+hu tAM/ e d+ha la shab laT la ta Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e eta kyi Am 'os es Am/ e d+he tAM/ e d+ha la sha ba loT la A tras Ata kyi nga 'gro ba la 'os A i ya i mtshams sbyar ba ya dag gi zhes pas yA phyis/ Ta 'gro la sogs kyis mtha'
3b2(sgra skor): ai.e eta kyi am 'os slar yang Am du log/ e d+han+taM/ e d+ha la laT ladz+ha d+ha'i yan+ta 'os dz+ha an+tu Ta 'gro baM la sogs kyi mtha' e eta kyi am 'os me snyam ya chis yon ta la 'os gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la
3b3(sgra skor): a d+ha swa/ e d+ha la sha pa loT la thAs thAs kyi se 'os thAs se sa wa dag la ba am dag gos/ a rma/ e d+he thAM/ e d+ha la sha pa loT la A thAm Ata kyi dita la 'os/ A i ya ba ya ngag gi zhes pas ya phyis/ i mtshams sbyar/ Ta 'gro ba sog
3b4(sgra skor): kyis mtha' I eta kyi Am 'os e slar Am/ e d+ha d+h+waM/ e d+ha la sha pa loT la d+haM Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e sa ba dag la ba aM dag dgos/ e slar yang Am/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e d+he/ e d+ha la shapa loT la iT
3b5(sgra skor): Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis i e eta kyi ai 'os e ai ru bsgyur phyi ma'i AT ste zhes pas/ AT a ka 'dra ba la ring po e tsa bi 'phel ba byas/ e d+hA ba he/ e d+ha la shab loT la wa hi dang ma hing du bsgyur Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e eT kyi ai
3b6(sgra skor): 'os e e phyi ma'i AT ste zhes pas/ AT Ta gnas pas/ AT Ta gnas don aka 'dra ba la ring po/ e d+ha ma he/ e d+ha la lang sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ai d+ha ta/ e d+ha la lang / la ta atsa dang po rnams kyi AT 'os
4a1(sgra skor): byings la AT/ Ta gnas don/ AT las kyang ngos 'bel ba/ au d+he tAM/ e d+ha la shab lang byings la AT dang 'phel ba la A tAm pa 'gro ba la Ata k+Shis 'os A i ya wa ya dag gi zhes pas ya phyis mtshams sbyar/ ai d+han+ta/ a
4a2(sgra skor): d+ha lA shab lang byings la AT dang 'phel ba/ ladz+ha d+ha'i An+ta 'os dz+ha An+ta/ ata kyi yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum lwa/ e d+ha thA.e d+ha la sha pa/ lang la thAs byings la/ AT dang 'phel ba/
4a3(sgra skor): a d+he thAM/ e d+ha la shab lang byings la/ AT dang 'phel ba la A thAM/ nga 'gro ba la Ata kyis 'os A i ya ba ya dag gis bal la 'os/ A phyis mtshams sbyar/ a d+hA d+h+waM/ e d+ha la sha pa lang byings la Ata dang 'phel ba la d+haM du basmA/ skyes
4a4(sgra skor): bu phyi ma gsum la/ I d+h+we/ e d+ha la shapa? yang byings la Ata 'phel ba la iT ru bsgyur mtshams sbyar/ e d+hA ba hi/ e d+ha la shab lang byings la AT dang 'phel ba la wa hi dang ma hing du bsgyur ata kyi yata la ring po 'os ring po/ ai d+hA mo hi/
4a5(sgra skor): e d+ha la lung / lung la tsI 'os/ tsI byin/ tsI'i si tsa 'os si tsar bsgyu/ atsa dang po'i AT 'osa? byings la AT/ AT las kyang 'os 'phel ba dang / byingasa? phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os/ iT sbyor ba sogs byas pas/
4a6(sgra skor): skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ai d+hiSh+Ta/ la ta ru bsgyur kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa kha Tu la Sha Tu 'os ta Ta/ ai d+hi ShA tAM/ la A tA du bsgyur kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa ShaM/ ai d+hi Sha ta/ la dz+ha ru bsgyur d+ha las a phyung nas/ at+man pa da rnams
4b1(sgra skor): la ang+ku yin pa las so// dz+ha ata du 'asgyur/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ai d+hISh+TaHla thAs kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha Sha Tu lA Sha Tu 'os papha/ a d+hiSh+Ta thAM/ A thAM kA nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa ShA/ a d+hi d+h+waM/ yad+hA d+hA la'ang ngos sa
4b2(sgra skor): phyis iTa'i gdam da 'os d+ha rang gnas sam yang na D+ha/ ai d+hi d+haM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ai d+hi Shi/ la iT ru bsgyur/ ai d+hi ShA hi/ la baM hi ru bsgyur/ a ma d+hiSh+ma hi/ la ma hing du bsgyur/ e d+ha la/ liT/ rits+tsha ma yin pa'i I tsa
4b3(sgra skor): dang po las kyang lci ba ldan pa las so zhes pas/ byings mthar Am sbyar Am las sos liT yang 'jig pas/ e d+h+waM zhes pas grub/ de la kr-inya sogs sbyar dgos/ Am pra t+ya ye pat+l-i nyo nu pra yo ga s+ya/ rkyen Am bzhin kr-inya
4b4(sgra skor): rjesu sbyar ba'i 'o// Am gyi rjesu sbyor ba'i kr-i b+hU as gsum las/ e d+ha lta bu byings At+ma ne pa da can la Am sbyar ba yin kyang / b+hU dang as gnyis pa rasmai'i tshig can yin pas liT pa rasmai'i pu nga'i rkyen rnams sbyor ba kho na
4b5(sgra skor): yin la/ kr-inya gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas/ Am sbyor yul gyi byings de at+ma ne pad ca yin na snga ma dang 'dra bar kr-inya at+ma ne'i rkyen cani sbyor bar byed la/ byings de pa rasmai pa da can yin na kr-inya yang pa rasmai pa nga'i rkyen can sbyar bar bya ste/
4b6(sgra skor): e d+h+waM la b+hU dang as sbyar ba la/ e d+h+waM ba b+hU ba/ e d+hA mA sa/ kr-inya sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e d+h+waM tsa kr-i/ kr-i la/ laT/ liT la byings A b+h+yA sa med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod ri'i ata 'os ata du bsgyur/ ha rag gi zhu 'os ka tsa la ta
5a1(sgra skor): 'gyur/ liTa'i d+ha dag gi e sha i re tsa 'os/ ta e sha sha phyis a ka gi a tsa la yaH/ e trAM tsakrA te/ A tAM TA 'gro ba sags kyis mtha' e/ e d+h+waM tsAkr-i re/ kr-i la lin gyis gnyis mad ma'i a 'os a ku ha dag sa cu 'os
5a2(sgra skor): dz+ha ru bsgyur/ lI'i ta dz+ha dag gi e sha i re tsa 'os dz+ha i re tsa ru bsgyur/ tsa dbyangs don i ka gi a tsa la yaN byas pa'o// skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ e d+h+waM tsa kr-i She/ la thAs sa bsgyur thas kyi se 'os thAs se kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa/
5a3(sgra skor): dz+haMd+ha tsakrA tha/ la A thAM Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ i ka gi a tsa la yaN/ skyes bu dbus ma'i mang tshig la/ i NaHShI d+h+waM lung li TaM d+hau&n+ma ta/ i Na mtha' las ShI d+h+waM lung liT rnams kyi d+ha'i 'o// byings i Na so sor bsdu ba'i mtha'
5a4(sgra skor): las pha rol gyi smon pa'i ling gi sI d+h+waM dang lung liT rnams kyi d+ha yig nI b+hi yig tu 'gyur te/ e d+h+waM tsa kr-i d+h+we/ gai la laT byings gnyis brjod/ r-i'i ata 'o sA ri a ku ta dag gi tsu 'os ka tsa la d+hiT 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ mdo 'dis d+ha D+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsu
5a5(sgra skor): la/ e d+haM tsakle/ la iT nu bsgyur/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ a d+haM tsakr-i ba he/ la ba hi dang ma ting du 'gyur Ta 'gro ba sogs kyi mtha' e/ e d+h+waM tsakr-i ma he/ e d+ha la luT wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e d+hi
5a6(sgra skor): tA/ e d+hi tAM rau/ e d+hi ta ra/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ i d+hi tA se/ e d+ha la/ laT d+has la rdzas su bsgyur/ zlas kyi me 'om thAs se/ trA sa ya m+b+hi dag gis bya'os rnas kyis sa phyis khril dang pa'i iT/ i d+h+ye tAM sA thA/ oM A rnam du bsgyur/ Ta 'gre /
5b1(sgra skor): kyis mtha' e e/ la d+hi drA d+he d+hi Ta 'gre ba sogs kyis mtha' e d+ha la 'ang ngos tAs kyis sa phyis/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e d+hi tA hAM/ e d+ha la luT tAs la iT ru bsgyur Ta 'gro ba sags kyi i e e ta ya ha 'os sa ha ba la dang po'i iT/ e d+h+we tA swa he/ la ba hi dang ma
5b2(sgra skor): ting du 'asgyur Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ e d+hi tA sma he/ e d+ha la smon pa'i ling sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e d+hi ShISh+Ta/ e d+hi ShA yastAM/ e d+hi ShI ran/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e d+he ShISh+TaHe d+hi ShI yastAM/ e d+hi ShI d+haM/ e d+hi ShI D+ha/
5b3(sgra skor): skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ la id ru bsgyur/ iTa'i ata 'os/ ita atA/ o d+hi ShI ya/ e d+hiSh+Ti ba he/ e d+hi ShI ma hi/ e d+he la l+r-iT sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e d+hi Sh+ya te/ e d+hi Sh+ye te/ e d+hi Sh+yan+te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum
5b4(sgra skor): lo/ e d+hi Sh+ya se/ e d+hi Sh+ye the/ e d+hi Sh+ya tAM/ skyes bu phyi mra gsum la/ e d+hi Sh+ye/ e d+hi Sh+ya ba he/ A d+hi Sh+ya ma he/ e d+ha la/ l+r-ing / a tsa dang po'i AT 'os byings la AT/ aT las kyang ngos/ 'phel ba/ s+ya sbyor ba sogs byas pas/
5b5(sgra skor): skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ai d+hi Sh+ya ta/ au d+hi Sh+ye tAM/ ai d+hi Sh+yan+ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e d+hi Sh+ya thA/ ai d+hi Sh+ya thAM/ ai d+hi Sh+ya d+haM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ aM d+hi Sh+yaM/ aM d+hi Sh+ya ba hi/ ai d+hi Sh+Ta ma hi sogs te/ cho ga phal che ! thob
5b6(sgra skor): po'i skabasu bshad pa dang 'dra'o/ 6/ iT k+Sha lta ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ laT sogs at+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor ba'i cho ga thams cad bshang ma thag pa dang 'dra'o/ 6/ dang sbyin pa la'o zhes pa la laT sogs at+ma ne pa da rnams
6a1(sgra skor): sgyur bas cho ga yang liTa'i skabs ma gtogs e b+ha'i skabs dang 'dra ste/ laT l+yA/ dang d+hedA ka n+te sogs so// ling la/ da de ha/ da nga s+yA hA/ dang ran sogs sa/ laT la/ dang trA/ dad tA/ radzan+ta sogs so// lang !
6a2(sgra skor): a da da ta/ a da de tAM/ a dang n+taM/ sogs so// lung la/ a da diSh+Ta/ a da diShA tAM/ a da di Sha ta sogaso// liT la/ byings gnyis brjod pa dang wa la dang po la iT sbyor ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da da de/ da da dA twe/ dA da di ro
6a3(sgra skor): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ de da di She/ da da dA the/ dang di d+he/ da de di D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da da de/ da da di ba he/ da nga di ma hi sogs te/ 'dir sha sha/ da da/ ba dang po sogs kyi mdos/ A b+h+yA sa dbyi ba dang er bsgyur ba sogs mi bye do/
6a4(sgra skor): luT la byings phyed pa'i bal dang po la iT 'os iT sbyar bas/ da daM tA/ da di tA rau/ da di tA ra/ da di tA se/ da di tA sA the/ da di tA d+he/ da di tA he/ da di tA swa he/ da di tAsma he/ smon pa'i ling la'ang iT sbyar ba'i/ da di ShASh+Ti/ da di ShI yastAM/ da di ShI ron
6a5(sgra skor): sog so// l+r-iT l-i wa dang po'i iT dang s+ya tA sa zhes pas/ s+ya sbyin pas/ da di Sh+ya te/ da di Sh+ya te/ da de Sh+yan+te sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-iT la a da di Sh+ya ta/ a da di Sh+ye tAM/ a dA di Sh+yen+ta sogaso// SheSh+ka 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs
6a6(sgra skor): at+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar/ cho ga bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra/ 'dir sub kyi byings sogs kyi byings kyis dang po'i Sha ser mi 'gyur te/ laT la/ ShaSh+Ti ta/ ShaSh+kan+te sogs so// ling l-i/ ShaSh+Te ta/ SheSh+ka yas+t+waM/ ShaSh+Te ran sog so// loT la/ Sha[ऽ]
6b1(sgra skor): tAMtAShASh+Te tra/ ShaSh+kan+taM sogs so// lang la/ a ShaSh+mA ta/ a ShaSh+mA tAM/ a Sh+waSh+kan+da sogs so// lung la/ bal dang pa'i iT sbyar bas/ a ShaSh+miSh+Ta/ a ShAt+ti Sh+Tha tAM/ a ShaSh+ka Sha ta sog so// liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ Sha ShaSh+Te/ Sha ShASh+ka twe/ Sha
6b2(sgra skor): ShASh+NI ri/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ Sha Shak+ki ShaM/ Sha ShaSh+mA She/ Sha Sha shwe d+he/ ShA Shak+ki D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ Sha ShaSh+Te/ Sha ShASh+mi ba he/ Sh+wa Sh+waSh+Ti ma hwe/ luT la/ iT sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ShaSh+Ti tA/ ShaSh+ka tA ro/ ShaSh+Ti tA ra/
6b3(sgra skor): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ Sh+waSh+mi tA se/ ShaSh+mi tA sU the/ ShaSh+mi tA d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum lo/ ShaSh+Ti tA he/ ShaSh+Ti tA sa hwe/ ShaSh+Ti tAsmA he/ smon pa'i ling gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzaSh+mi ShISh+Ta/ ShaSh+Ti ShI yastAM/ ShASh+Ti Shi ran/ skyes bu dbus ma
6b4(sgra skor): gsum la/ ShASh+Ti ShISh+Ta/ ShaSh+Ti ShI yAstAM/ ShaSh+mi ShI d+h+waM/ ShaSh+mi ShAM D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ShaSh+mi ShI ya/ ShaSh+Ti ShI ba he/ ShaSh+mi ShI ma hi/ l+r-iT la/ s+ya dang wal dang po'i iT sbyin pas/ Sh+waSh+Ti Sh+ya te/ ShaSh+Ti Sh+ye te/ Sh+waSh+Ti Sh+yan+te sogs so// de
6b5(sgra skor): bzhin du/ l+r-iT la/ a ShaSh+mi Sh+ya ta/ e ShaSh+Ti Sh+ye tAM/ a ShaSh+Ti Sh+yan+ta/ sogs so/ !/ ri dza 'gro ba la ste gnas pa la'ang ngo zhes pa la/ laT sogs At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga snga ma dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ ar+tha te/ ar+the te/
6b6(sgra skor): ar+than+te sogaso// ling la/ ardzi ta/ ardze yA tAM/ Ardzi ran sogs so// loT la/ ardza tAM/ ardze tAM/ ardza nAM sogaso// lang la/ Ardza ta/ Ardze tAM/ Ar+than+ta sogs so// lung la/ bal dang po'i iT dang ts+li si tsa ru bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/
7a1(sgra skor): Ar+NiSh+Ta/ ardzi ShA twA/ Arbi Shat+ta sogaso// lIT la/ byingasA gnyis brjod/ r-I'i ata 'os/ r-i a dang dang po'i Ata kyi rI po de la nuT sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pasa?/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A nr-i dzA te/ A tr-i dzA te/
7a2(sgra skor): A nr-i dzI re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A nr-i dze She/ A nr-i dza the/ A nr-i dze d+haM/ A nr-i dzi D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A nau dzo/ a nr-i dzi ba hA/ I nr-i dzi ma he/ luT la/ wa la dang po'i aTi dang tAs sbyor ba sogs byas pas/ ardzi tA/
7a3(sgra skor): ardzi tA rau/ ardzi tA ra/ ar+Ni tA se sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ ardzi ShISh+Ta/ ardzi ShA yastAM/ ardzi ShI ran sogs so// l+r-iT la/ wa la dang po'i iT+ra dang s+ya tAs ngag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar bas/ ardzi Sh+ya te/ ar+dz+dzi Sh+ye tAM/ ardzi Sh+yan+ta
7a4(sgra skor): sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ Ardzi Sh+ya ta/ Ardzi Sh+ye tAM/ Ardzi Sh+yan+ta sogaso/ !/ ti dza rno ba la ste bzod pa la yang ngo zhes pa la/ gu pa ti dza kai ta rnams las san 'os/ san san yang dag la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ ha la
7a5(sgra skor): dang po lhag po 'os dza gong ma phyis/ tsu ku 'os/ dza ga/ khar la tsar 'os/ ga ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ ka Sha 'dus pa k+Sha/ ti tik+Sha/ zhes bsgrubs pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ ti tik+Sha te/ gnyis da
7a6(sgra skor): naseMs ma migs pa/ ti tik+She ti/ titi tAn+ti sogs// ling la/ ti tik+Sha te/ ti tik+She yA tAM/ ti d+hiSh+Tharan mags so// loT la/ ti tik+Sha d+hA/ ti tik+She tAM/ ti tik+Shan+te sogs so// lang laM/ a ti tik+Sha te/ a ti k+Shau tAM/ a ti/ byed pa chen pa rjes
7a7(sgra skor): rkyen sogs kyis byings mthar Am sbyar/ amra los sos/ liT 'jig/ kr-inya sogs sbyar bas/ ti tik+saM tsa laM/ tI tikl-i pa b+hU ba/ tI tik+Sha ma sa sogaso// luT la/ wa la dang po'i iT dang / ata kyi dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ ti tik+Shi tA/
7a8(sgra skor): to ti k+Shi ta ro/ ti tik+Shi tA ra/ ti tik+Shi tA se sogs so// smon pa'i ling la 'ang / ti tik+Shi ShISh+TaM/ ti ti k+Shi ShI ya staM/ tI tI k+Shi ShI ran sig so// l+r-iT la'ang / byings phyed pa'i bal dang po la iT dang / s+ya tA sa dag ces pas/ s+ya sbyar bas/ ti tiShAM
7a9(sgra skor): Sh+ya te/ tik+Shi Sh+ya ti/ taM tik+Shi Sh+yan+te sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ti tik+Shi Sh+ya tA/ a tI tik+Shi Sh+ye tAM/ e ti tik+Sh+mI Sh+yan+ta sogaso/ !/ Shany+dza yongasu 'khyud pa la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ byings kyi dang po'i Sha'i sa 'os Sha sa/
7a10(sgra skor): sany+dza stany+dza rnams kyi sha pa la 'os nu dbyi bya sogs byas pas/ laT lA/ s+yA dza te/ sa dze te/ swa dzan+ta sogs so// ling la/ sra dze ta/ sr-i dzA yA tAM/ sr-i dze ran sogs so// loT la/ swa dza tAM/ sr-i dzi tAM/ swa dzan+taM sogs dang / lang la/
7a11(sgra skor): a sri dza tI/ a sA dz+re tAM/ a swa dzAn+ta so go so// lung la iT mi 'jug/ tsI si tsa ru bsgyur/ dz+ha la las dz+ha la la dbyi ba dang / tsu'i ku sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ lung gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a sr-ik+te/ a swaMk+Sha tAM/ a sAMk+Sha
8a1(sgra skor): ta/ skyes bu dbustu mA gAsum la/ a sAk+tA/ a swak+Sh+ma tA/ a sar+b+bA/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a sauk+Shi/ a sak+ShA hi/ a s+yAk+ShA hi/ laT lA/ 'grel par lung drus ga se dz+reHsa yau gA da pau li To ba kat+ma/
8a2(sgra skor): sany+dza las brtsegs pa las kyang li Ta'i kita yang na'o// swaMny+dza dang brtsegs pa las kyang pha rol gyi liT bsgyur ba 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa rnams ni/ yang na ka 'gro ba'i ming can du ming 'dogs byed de/ dgos pa
8a3(sgra skor): ni/ ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyi kita la na dbyi ba dang yon tan sogs yang na bar bya ba'i don te/ kita kyi phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sa swa dz+nye/ sa swa dzA te/ sa swa dzI ri/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sa swa dzi
8a4(sgra skor): She/ sa swa dza the/ sa swa dzi d+hA/ sa swa dzi D+he/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sa swa dze/ sa swa dzi ba he/ sa s+thA dzi ma ho/ kita kyi brda chad ma byas pa'i phyogs las kyang na mi dbyi ba ma gtogs gzhan 'dra ste/ sa swany+tsa/ sa swany+dza te/ sa swany+dzi
8a5(sgra skor): de sogs so// luT la/ tsu'i ku 'os/ dz+ha gra/ khar la tsar 'os/ ga kAr bsgyur bas/ swaMk+tA/ s+yaMk+ta ro/ sAMk+tA rA/ swaMk+tha se/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ tsu'i ku dang / khar la tsa ra 'os/ ga ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyi
8a6(sgra skor): sI yu Ta'i sa Sha/ ka Sha 'dus pa k+Sha sogs byas pas/ saMk+thiSh+Ta/ saM k+Sha yau staM/ saMk+Shi ran/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ tsu'i ku dang / kha ra la tsa ra/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ saM k+Sh+ya te/ swa k+Sh+me tau/ saMk+Sh+yan+te sog so//
8b1(sgra skor): de bzhin du/ l+r-ing lA/ a swaMmyA ta/ a swaM k+She tAM/ a swaM k+Sh+yan+sa/ sogs so// !/ swa dza te'i sngon du nyer bsgyur ni sbyor na/ pa r-i ni bo rnams la sogs kyis Shar 'gyur te/ ni ShA dza te/ sogs so// saM bA dI nI wAT bya pA ye'u pi/ si ba la
8b2(sgra skor): sogs pa rnams kyi aT bar na yod pa l-i 'ang yang na'o// nyer bsgyur ba ri ni bi rnams las saMpa la sogs pa ste/ Shi bu thags 'thag pa/ ShA ha gus pa/ sa par 'atsun pa phred/ Sh+Tunya stong pa/ Shany+dza yongs su 'khyud pa rnams
8b3(sgra skor): dang suT A ga ma'i sa yig rnams ni/ AT A ga ma ba ra na yod kyang Sha yig tu yang na 'gyur te/ n+ya Sha dza ta/ n+ya swa dzA ta/ sogs te/ lang gi rjes so// sa ngi sany+tsoHpa ra s+ya li Ti/ sa di swany+dza dag gi pha rol gyi liT la'o// sa ngi
8b4(sgra skor): ste Sha dri rnam par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas mnyes par byed pa la'o dang / Shany+dza yongasu 'khyud pa dag la liT byin pas/ byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po a b+h+ya sa'i ming can de las pha rol gyis ni/ pa ri ni mi rnams
8b5(sgra skor): sngon ma las kyang khar 'gyur ba ma yin te/ ni Sha s+yA dzeShaM/ ne ShA sAny+dzi/ sogs so/ !/ tra pU Sha ngo tsha ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ laT sogs sbyar/ u dang ShA rjes 'brel/ rnam dbye byings thams cad pa rnams la/ sha pa dang
8b6(sgra skor): byings phyed pa rnams kyi wal dang po la U 'gro ba sogs kyi iT yang na sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas laT la/ tra pa te/ tra pe te/ tra pan+te/ sogs so// ling la/ tra pe ta/ tra paM ya tAM/ tra pe ran/ sogs so// loT la/ tra pa
9a1(sgra skor): tAM/ tra pen+taM/ tra pan+taM/ sogs so// ljang la/ u tra pa ta/ a tra be tAM/ a tra pan ta/ sogs so// lung la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a tra piSh+Ta/ a tra pi Sha tAM/ a tA pi Sha ta/ sogs so// iT ma byin pa'i phyogs
9a2(sgra skor): la/ a tra pa/ a trap+pa tAM/ a trAp+sa ta/ sogs so// liT la/ d+hI pa lA b+hU dzA tra pa las kyang zhes pa'i mdos/ A b+h+yab+h+yA swa dbyi ba dang Ir bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ tre pe/ tre pA te/ twe pi ri/ sogs so// luT la/ wa l-i dang po'i iT
9a3(sgra skor): yang na bar byas pas+yA/ tr-i pi tA/ sogs sam/ trap+tA sogs so// smon pa'i ling la'ang iT yang nu bar byas pas/ tr-i pi ShISh+Ta/ tra pi ShI ya s+t+r-i/ tra pi ShI ranAM/ sogs sam/ iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ tAprISh+Te/ trap+sI yastAM/ traprI
9a4(sgra skor): ran/ sogs so// l+r-iT la'ang iT yang na bar byas pas/ tra pi Sh+ya te/ tra pi Sh+ye twe/ tra pi Sh+yan+te/ sogs sam/ tra s+yA te/ trap+s+ya te/ tra pyAn+te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la a tra pi Sh+ya tau/ a tra pau Sh+ye tAM/ a tra pi Sh+yaMn+ta/ sigs sam/
9a5(sgra skor): a trapyA ta/ a trasmr-i tAM/ a tAp+san+ta/ sogs so// ri nga dza b+ho ra tsi/ ra b+hi dza b+ha dag gi a tsa la'o// ra d+ha 'tshe ba dang dzo b+ha lus rnam par nyams pa dag gi rkyen atsa dang po can pha rol la nu ma A ga ma 'gyur tAM/ 6/ dza b+ha la
9a6(sgra skor): laT sogs sbyar/ ma dbye byi sa thams cad pa rnams la sha pa dang phyed pa bal dang po can rnams la iT sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laT la/ dzam b+ha te/ dzam+b+he te/ dzam+b+han+ta/ sogs so// ling la/ dzaste ta/ dzam+b+he yA tA/
9b1(sgra skor): dzam+b+he ran/ sogs so// loT la/ dzam+b+ha tAM/ dzam+b+he tAM/ dzam+b+han+taM/ lang la a dzAm+b+ha ta/ A dzas+t+re tAM/ a dzam+b+han+ta/ lung la/ a dzam+b+hiSh+Ta/ a dzam+b+hi ShA tAM/ a dzam+b+hi Sha ta/ sogs so// IT la/ dza dzam+b+he/ dza dzam+b+ha te/ dzA dzam+b+hi re/ sogs so//
9b2(sgra skor): luTaM la/ dzam+b+hi tA/ dzam+b+hi tA ro/ dzam+ni tA ra/ sogs so// smon po'i ling la/ dzam+b+hi ShID+b+h+yAM/ dzam+b+hi ShI yaM staM/ dzam+b+hi ShI r-in sogs so// l-iT laM/ dzam+b+hi Sh+ya ti/ dzam+b+hi Sh+ye te/ dzam+ni Sh+yan te/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a dzam+ni Sh+ya ta/ aM dzam+b+hi Sh+ye tAM/ a dzam+b+hiSh+yan+ta
9b3(sgra skor): sogs so/ Sh+yang b+ha brtan pa'o zhes pa la laT la sogs pa rnams sbyar/ byings kyi dang po'i Sha'i sa 'os Shas/ rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can yang med do zhes pas/ ta ta ra log/ rnam dbye byings thams cad pa rnams la sha pa dang phyed pa
9b4(sgra skor): rnams la iT sbyor ba sogs byas pas/ laT la/ sto b+ha te/ sto b+he te/ sto b+han+de/ sogs so// ling le/ sto b+he ta/ sto b+haM yA tAM/ sto b+he ra na/ sogs so// loT la/ sngo b+ha tAM/ sto b+ha tAM/ sto d+han+da/ sogs so// lang la/ asto b+ha tA/ asto b+he tr-i/ aste
9b5(sgra skor): b+hAn+tu/ sogs so// lung la/ asto b+hiSh+Ta/ asto b+hi ShA tAM/ asto b+h+yan+ta/ sogs so// lung la/ asto b+hiSh+Ta/ asto b+hi ShA tAM/ asto b+hi Sha ta/ sogs so// liT la/ shar dang po sogs kyi a b+h+ye sa'i sa dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ duSh+Tu b+he/ tuSh+Tu b+hA te/ duSh+Ta
9b6(sgra skor): b+hi raM/ sogs so// luT la/ sto b+hi tA sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ sto b+hi ShISh+Ta/ sto b+hi ShA yaste/ stau b+hi ShI ran/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ sto b+hi Sh+ya te/ sto b+hi Sh+ye te/ sto b+hi Sh+yan+te/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ asto b+hi Sh+ya taM/ asto b+hi Sh+ye tAM/ astau b+hi Sh+yan+ta
10a1(sgra skor): sogs so// 6/ pa Na tha snyad la ste bstod pa la'ang ngo zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ gu pA d+hA ba sogs kyi byings la/ A ya sbyor ba dang / 'grel par At+ma ne pa da rnams la yang na bar bya'o zhes pa byung bas/ a
10a2(sgra skor): ya sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi laT la/ pa NA ya te/ pa NA ye te/ pa NA yan+te/ sogs dang / ling la/ pa NA ye tA/ pa NAM ye ya tAM/ pa NA ye rAn/ sogs so// loT la/ pa NA ya tAM/ pi NA ye tAM/ pa NA yan+taM/ sogs so// lang lA/ a pa NA ya ta/
10a3(sgra skor): a pa NA ye tr-i/ pa NA yan+ta/ sogs so// lung la/ we la dang po'i iT dang / aT kyi dbyi 'os byings mthi'i a phyis pas/ a pa NA yi Sh+Ta/ a pa NA yi She tAM/ a pe NA yiSha te/ sogs so// liM Ta la/ kAs sogs kyi mdos e ma
10a4(sgra skor): sbyor ba sogs byas pas/ pa NA yaM tsakre/ pa NA yaM ba b+hu ba/ pa NA yA mA sa/ sogs so// luT la/ pa NA yi tA/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ pa NA yi ShISh+Ta/ pa NAM yi ShI yastaM/ pa NA yi ShI ran/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ pa NA yi Sh+ya te/
10a5(sgra skor): pa NA yi Sh+ye te/ pa NA yi Sh+yan+te/ sog so// l+r-ing la/ a pa NA yi Sh+ya ta/ A pa NA yi Sh+ye tAM/ a pa NA yi Sh+yan+ta/ sogs so// a ya ma sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi laT la/ pa NA ta/ sogaso// ling la/ pa Ne ta sogs so// loT la/ pa Na tAM/ sogaso//
10a6(sgra skor): lang la/ a pa Na ta/ sogs so// lung la/ a pa NiSh+Ta/ sogs so// liT la/ pau NaM/ pe NA te/ pe Ni raM/ sogs so// luT la/ pa NI tA/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ pa NI ShI Sh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ pa Ni Sh+ya te/ sog so// l+r-ing la
10b1(sgra skor): a pa NA Sh+yA ta/ sogs so// yang 'grel pa Na rnam dAb+he at+ma ne can yin kyang skabs 'gar A ya sbyar ba'i phyogs la pa ra smai pa da rnams kyang 'jug go// zhes bshad pas/ pa NA ya tI sogs kyang 'byung ngo // ka mair+Ning / ka mi
10b2(sgra skor): las ninga'o// kA mu mdzes pa la'o zhes pa la ngo bo'i rkyen ai sbyar ba'i ka mi las pha rol tu ning 'gyur te/ nga aut+ma na pa da 'jug pa'i don dang / Na byi saM la 'phel ba'i don no// laT la/ byed pa po la shA paM yon tan sogs byas
10b3(sgra skor): pas/ kA ma ya te/ stsogs so// ling la/ kA ma ya te/ sogs so// loT la/ kA ma ya tAM/ sogs so// lcang la/ a kA ma ya ta/ sogs so// kro mu la Ni sbyar bas kA mi la lung / lung/ nI/ Ni/ shrI sogs kyis ts+li tsang du bosgyu
10b4(sgra skor): lA ta/ kA mi tsang d+ha/ nai tsat+sA ba d+hA yA tra sa/ Ni la tsang la u pa d+hA'i thung d+ha'o// Ni mahA can gyi u pa d+hA nI bsgyur ba'i cong pha rol la thung ngur 'gyur tI/ kA Sh+T-i ngur song / tsang la'o zhes pas byengs gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gis
10b5(sgra skor): 'os/ tsa kA/ tsaka mi/ tsang ti/ zhes pa byung / sa nAlpa g+hu ni tsid pa re na tra gr-I pe/ akA phyis pa ma yin pa la yang ba la tsang pha rol la sman bzhin no// byings kyi mtha' aka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge phyis pa ma len pa Ni mtha' can
10b6(sgra skor): yi ge ya ba yin pa de'i a b+h+yA sa'i bya ba rnams cang pha rol la san bzhin du bya'o// sa n+ya ta/ san la ata kyi'o// san pha rol la byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po a th+ya sa'i ming can gyi ata ni ita du 'gyur te/ skabs 'dir mdo
11a1(sgra skor): swa phyi gnyis kyis tsa ka mI/ tsang tangaN+Do la g+h+r-iHyang ba'i ring ba'o// yi ge yang ba'i sngon ma'i a b+h+yA sa'i Ningang cang pha rol la ring por 'gyur/ tsaM ring por song / tsa ka mi/ tsu tA/ Ne ra ni Ti/ iT ma yin pa la Ni'o//
11a2(sgra skor): rnam dbye byings phyed pa iT dang po can ma yin pa pha rol la Ni dbyi bar bya ste/ Na'i rjes 'brel phyis/ tsang gi rjes 'brel nga dang tsA'ang phyis/ lung lang sogs kyi byings la aT sbyar bas/ a tsI ki ma ta/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ gnyis
11a3(sgra skor): tshig dang mang tshig la/ a tsI ka me tAM/ a tsI ka man+ta/ lung gi skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a tsI ka ma thA/ a tsI ka me thA/ a ts+tshi ka mau d+haM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a tsI ka ma/ a tsI ka ma ba hi/ a tsI ka mA ma hi/ a ya la
11a4(sgra skor): sogs pa rnams byings phyed pa la yang na'o zhes pa'i mdos Ning byin pa'i phyogs la/ 'grel par/ Ni med pa la'ang tsI tsang 'o zhes bshad pas/ a tsa ka ma ta/ a tsA ka mai tAM/ a tsa ka man+ta/ sogs so// liT la/ kA sogs kyi kA mi la
11a5(sgra skor): Am sbyar/ kA mi/ Am/ liT/ A la 'os/ liT 'jigs/ a ya man+ta la pyet+siSh+Ta Shu/ Am mtha' A lu A pyA it+sA ISh+Ta rnams la a ya'o// Am mtha' dang kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen A lu/ A pya/ it+su/ iSh+Ta rnams pha
11a6(sgra skor): rol la Ni'i mtha' can ni a ya zhes par 'gyur te/ kA ma yAM tsakre/ kA ma yAM ba b+h+r-i baM/ kA ma yA mA sa/ sogs so// Ning mi byin pa'i phyogs la/ tsa ka ma/ tsa ka mA the/ tsa ka mi rI/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum laM/ tsa Sho mi She/
11b1(sgra skor): ka mA the/ tsa ka mi d+he/ tsa ka mi D+he/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum tsa ka me/ tsa ka mi ba hi/ tsa ka mi ma he/ luT la Ning sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ kA ma yi tA/ sogs dang / Ning ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ kA mi tA/ sogs so// nang sbyor ba'i
11b2(sgra skor): phyogs kyi smon pa'i ling la/ kA ma yi ShISh+Ta/ sogs dang / Nang ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ ka mi ShISh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la Ning sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ kA ma yi Sh+ya te/ sogs dang / ning ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ ka mi Sh+ya te/ sogs so// de bzhin du
11b3(sgra skor): mi sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi l+r-ing la/ A kA ma yi Sh+yA ta/ sogs dang / ning ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ aM kA mi Sh+ya ta sogs so/ 6/ oM ya 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ a ya te/ sogs so// ling la/ a ye ta/
11b4(sgra skor): gas so// loT la/ a ya tAM/ sogs so// l-ing la/ U ya ta/ sogs so// lung la/ A yiSh+Ta/ sogs so// da yA yA sa sh+tsa/ dA ya a ya/ As las kyang ngo // nga yau sbyin pa a ya 'gro ba as nye bar sdod pa rnams las kyang liT
11b5(sgra skor): pha rol ya Am sbyor bar bya ste/ A ya la/ liT Am sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a yAM tsakr-i/ a yAM ba b+hU ba/ A ya mA saM/ sogs so// luT la/ wal dang po'i iT sbyin pas/ a yi tA/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ a yi
11b6(sgra skor): ShISh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ a yi Sh+ya te/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// u pa sarga srA ya tau/ nyer bsgyur gyi a ya ti la'o// nyer bsgyur gyi ra yig ni a ya ti pha rol la la yig tu 'gyur te/ a ya te'i sngon
12a1(sgra skor): du pra bzhag/ mdo 'dis ra la a 'dra ba la ring po byas/ TA/ ya te/ de bzhin du/ pa rA ya la/ pa lA ya te/ pa ri laM rA la ig gi atsa la yaN 'os/ mtshams sbyar bas/ pa l+yA ya tAM/
12a2(sgra skor): 'grel par a ya te pha rol la'ang pra ti dang nir dang dur rnams kyi ra yig tsa ma du 'tshe bar byed/ la ru 'gyur ba ma yin no// pha tshal tu 'gro bar byed zhes bshad pas/ pra t+ya ya te/ nir ya te/ dur ya te lta bu'o// yongs 'tsha bar gyi/
12a3(sgra skor): pa ya 'gro ba dang / 'tshe ba dang / sbyin pa rnams la'o// zhes pa la/ laT la sogs pa sbyar ba'i bya ba thams cad a ya dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ da ya te/ sogs so// ma ma 'gro bar byed/ mi 'gro bar byed/ ngan par 'gro bar byed/ ling la/
12a4(sgra skor): da ye ta/ sogs so// loT la/ da ya tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ A da ya ta/ sogs so// lung la/ A da yiSh+Ta/ sogs so// liT la/ da ya a ya As las kyang ngos Am sbyar bas/ da yAM tsakre/ da yAM ba b+hU ba/
12a5(sgra skor): da yA mA sa/ sogs so// luT la/ da yi tA/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ da yi ShISh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a da yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ 6/ s+thA yi 'phel ba la'o// zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ sA ya
12a6(sgra skor): te/ sogs so// ling la/ swa ya ta/ sogs so// loT la/ swA ya tAM/ sogs so// lang laM/ a sA ya ta/ sogs so// lung sogs wal dang po'i rnams la iT yang na bar bya ste/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ tsa ya sA ya pya ya
12b1(sgra skor): mi Ta/ tsA ya s+thA ya/ prA ya rnams kyi iT yang na'o// pri mchod pa/ sU yI da oM prA yis 'phel ba rnams kyi liT ma gtogs pa'i wal dang po'i la iT yang na bar bya ste/ lung la/ iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a sA yiSh+Ta
12b2(sgra skor): a s+thA yi ShA tAM/ a s+thA yi Sha ta/ sogs so// iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ wa ya dag gi wal la dbyi 'os ya phyis pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a s+thAs ta/ as+thA sA tAM/ askr-i sata/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum
12b3(sgra skor): la/ a s+thas+thAHas+thA sA thAM/ asmA d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ as+thA si/ as+thA swa hi/ as+thA sma hi/ l-iT la/ byings gnyis brjod / thung ngu'o nyes pas thang ngur song / shar dang po la khang 'os/ sa phyis/ a b+h+ya sa'i tsa ra 'ang
12b4(sgra skor): ngos/ pha par bsgyur ba [ऽ]'a mas ca'ad byas pa'o/ sogs byas pa/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ paM s+thA ye/ pe sA ya te/ pa s+thA yi ri/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pa sa yi She/ pa s+thA yA the/ pA s+tha yi d+he/ pa skr-i yi D+h+we/ skyes
12b5(sgra skor): bu phyi ma gsum la/ pa s+thA ye/ pa s+thA yi ba he/ pa sA yI ma he/ luT la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ sA yi tA/ s+thA yi tA ro/ s+thA yi ta ra/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyags la/ wa ya dag gi ba la dbyi 'os ya phyis
12b6(sgra skor): pas/ swa tA/ sA tA rau/ sA tA ra/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ sA yi ShISh+TaM/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ ya phyis pas/ sA saSh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la iT spang ba'i phyogs
13a1(sgra skor): la/ swA yi Sh+Tha te/ sogs dang / IH med pa'i phyogs la/ wa dag gi zhes pas/ ya skyes pas/ sU s+ya / sogs so/ na bkun du khrong la aT stA byu'i phyogs l+yA/ a sA yaMSh+Ta ta/ sogs dang / in la byin pa
13a2(sgra skor): phyogs la/ ya phyis pas/ a sA s+ya ta/ sogs so/ 6/ o prA yi 'phel ba la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ prA ya te/ sogs so// ling la/ prA ye ta/ sogs so// loT la/ b+h+ra ya tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ a prA ya ta/
13a3(sgra skor): sogs so// dI pa dza na bud d+hA pA ri tA yai prA yi b+h+yo&n+ya ta ra sAM/ dI pa dza na bud d+ha pU ri tA yi b+ha yi rnams las yang na'o// dI pI 'bar ba/ dzi nI rab tu smye ba/ bud d+ha khong du chud pa/ pA rI tshim pa/ tA y+r-i rgyud/ oM b+ha yI 'phel ba rnams las/
13a4(sgra skor): lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig ta pha rol la nI ni yang na tsi Na zhes par 'gyur zhing yang na si tsar 'gyur te/ tsi No lug/ tsiN las 'jig go/ nri tsi nar bsgyur ba'i tsi Na las la bsgyur ba'i ta yig kyang dbyi bar bya ste/ prA ya la/ lung /
13a5(sgra skor): lung la ts+li dI pa sogs kyis tsI tsa Ni ru bsgyur/ Na 'phel don/ tsA/ tsiN las 'jig go'i don/ la ta mdo 'dis te phyis/ a b+ha yi/ ts+li si tsir bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ tsa ya sogs kyis iT yang na bar bya ste/ iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la
13a6(sgra skor): a pya yiSh+Ta/ a pya yi ShA tAM/ a bya yi Sha ta/ sogs dang / iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ wa ya dag gi wal la dbyi 'os ya phyis pas/ a pyA sta a b+ha sa tAM/ a b+h+ya sa ta/ sogs so// li T+ya dosh+tsa/ liT yang dag la'ang ngo // liT
13b1(sgra skor): dang yang dag pa rol la pU ya ni hrI zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ bra ya la laT/ mda'adas pa ru bsgyur/ gnyis rjong pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ pi b+hA bi thAH/ pa~M bI re/ sgras bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba byiShe/ ba prA thA/ pi byA d+ha pi byAn/
13b2(sgra skor): skyes bu phyi ma gsum le/ pi pye/ pi byi ba hU~M/ pi byaM ma he/ luT la/ iT yang na bar byas pas iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ b+hI lI tA/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ lnga ya ngag gI wal la dbyi 'os ye phyis pas/ b+hUta
13b3(sgra skor): sogs so// de bzhin du smon pa'i ling la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ prA yi ShI Sh+Ta/ sogs dang / iT ming pa'i phyogs la/ b+h+r-i sISh+TaM/ sogs so// l+r-iT la iT+Ta sbyor ba'i phyogs la/ prA yi Sh+ya te/ sogs dang / iT ma byin pa'i
13b4(sgra skor): phyogs la/ wA y+ra sogs kyis ya phyis pas/ b+hU s+ya twe/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a prA yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sama?/ a b+h+yAM s+yA ta/ sogs so/ !/ tA y+r-i rgyud dang skyong ba dag lA'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT
13b5(sgra skor): la/ tA ya te/ sogs so// ling la/ tA ye ta/ sogs so// loT la/ tA ya tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ a tA ya ta/ sogs so// lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ dI pa sogs kyi ts+li yang ni tsa Nar bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a tA yi/
13b6(sgra skor): yang na si tsar bsgyur bas/ a tA yiSh+Ta/ a tA yi ShA tAM/ a tA yi Sha te/ sogs so// liT la/ tat+ta yai/ ta twA yA te/ ta tA yi re/ ta twA yi ShAM/ sogs so// luT la/ tA yi tA/ sogs so// smyon pa'i ling la/ tA yi ShISh+Ta/ sogs
14a1(sgra skor): l+r-iT la/ tA yi Sh+ya te/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a tA yi Sh+ya ta/ a tA yi Sh+ye tAM/ a tA yi Sh+yan+ta/ sogs so// !/ sha la g.yo ba la sne kun tu sgribs pa la yang tro zhes pa la laT+ra po sa sbyar bas/ laT
14a2(sgra skor): la/ sha la te/ sogs so// ling la/ shra le ta/ sogs so// loT la/ sha la tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ a sha la ta/ sogs so// lung la/ wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ a sha liSh+Ta/ sogs so// liT l-i a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba
14a3(sgra skor): dAng er bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ she le/ shwe lA te/ she li ri/ sogs so// luT la/ sha lI ta/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ iT sbyar bas/ sha li ShISh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ sha li Sh+ya te/ sogs so//
14a4(sgra skor): l+r-ilung la/ a sha li Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ !/ She br-i 'khrud pa la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs sbyar/ byings kyi dang po'i Sha sar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laT la/ se ba te/ sogs so// ling la/ se be ta/ sogs so//
14a5(sgra skor): loT la/ se ba tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ a se ba ta/ sogs so// lung la byings phyed pa'i wal dang po'i iT 'os/ iT byi don pas/ a se bi Sh+Ta/ sogs so// liT la/ byings gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os/ e ir bsgyur
14a6(sgra skor): ba sogs byas pas/ si She be/ si She bA te/ si She bi ro/ sogs so// luT la/ si bi tA/ sogs so// smon pa'i gying la/ se pi ShISh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ se bi Sh+ya te/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a se bi Sh+ye ta sogs so/ !
14b1(sgra skor): kA shI 'bar ba la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ kA sha ste/ sogs so// ling la/ kA she te/ sogs so// loT la/ kA sha tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ a kA sha ta/ sogs so// lung la iT sbyar ba'i/ a kA shISh+Ta/
14b2(sgra skor): sogs so// 'grel par lungs drangs pa/ kA sha kA so rAm+b+ha/ kA sha kA sa dag gi Am yang na'o// kA shr-i 'bar ba dang / kA sr-i sgra ngan pa dag gi l-iT pha rol la Am yang na sbyar bar bya ste/ Am sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ kA shAM tsakre/ kA
14b3(sgra skor): ba b+hA ba/ kA shU mA sA/ sogs dang / Am ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ tsa kA she/ tsa kA shA te/ tsa kA shi re/ sogs so// luT la/ iT sbyar bas/ kA shI tA/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ kA shi ShiSh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ kA shi Sh+ya
14b4(sgra skor): te/ sogs so// l+r-ing la a kA shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ !/ kA sri sgra ngan la la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar ba'i bya ba thams cad bshang ma thag pa dang 'dra'o/ !/ i ha rtsed mo byed pa la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/
14b5(sgra skor): i ha te/ sogs so// ling la/ I hai tA/ sogs so// loT la/ i ha tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ I ha ta/ sogs so// lung la/ wa la dang po'i iT byin pasa?/ ai hiSh+Ta/ sogs so// l-iT la/ iT dang po lci ba ldan pa sogs
14b6(sgra skor): kyis Am sbyar bas/ i hAM tsa kre/ I hAM ba b+hU ba/ I hA sa mA sa/ sogs so// luT la/ iT byin pas/ A hi tA/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ I hiShISh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la'ang byings phyed pa wa la dang po'i iT 'os/ iT
15a1(sgra skor): sbyin pas oM hiSh+ya ta/ sogs so// de bzhin du l+r-ing la/ e hiSh+ya tA/ sogs so// !/ glang 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la sogs sbyar/ byed pa po la sha pa 'os shA ba rjes 'brel phyis nas ag 'dra ba lnga ring po byas pas/
15a2(sgra skor): la Ta'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ 'grob byer/ gA te/ la a tr-i Ta 'gro la sogs gyis mas e ag 'dra tsa'i li gro gA te/ gA te/ 'gro bar byed pa rnams/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ gA se/ gA the/ gA twe/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ gai/ gA pau he/ gA ma he/
15a3(sgra skor): li gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ge ha/ ge yA tAM/ ge ran skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ gI thAHgI yA thA/ 'ag pa ba bdag la d+ha e \u0f7fna pa ma ma min sa dz+ha mata byur/ ma ga kyim ma sa mag gas / gI d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma
15a4(sgra skor): gsum la/ ge ya/ ge ba hi/ ge ma hi/ lo Ta'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ la ta Ta 'acom sogs kyi le/ e gyi Am 'am e am/ gA d+h+waM/ la sa d+h+waM ag 'dus sa 'ang ra/ gA tA/ rab 'gro ba mdzod/ gA tAM/ rnams 'thob mdzod/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
15a5(sgra skor): gA s+yA/ gA thAM/ gA d+haM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum lo/ gaM/ gA wa he/ gA ma he/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da/ a gA ta/ A gA tAM/ A gA tA/ mdun pa migs kyis ma ma99/ skyes du
15a6(sgra skor): dbus ma gsum la/ a gA thA/ a gA thA/ a gA d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ oM g+he/ A gA ba hi/ a gA ma he/ lung la/ a gAsta/ a gA sA tAM/ a gA sa ta/ sogs so// liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza ge/ [।]
15b1(sgra skor): ngag tu/ dza gI r-i/ skyes bung dbus ma gsum la/ dza ga Sha/ dza ga the/ dza ga d+h+we/ jug / skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza g+he/ dzA gi ba he/ dza gi ma he/ lUT la/ gA d+hA/ ga tA rau/ gA tAr gA d+ha sa/
15b2(sgra skor): sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ ra ba te/ sogs so// loT la/ ra ba tr-I/ sogs so// lang la/ a ra ba ta/ sogs so// lud la/ ru du sogs kyi auT yang na bar byas pas/ a ra biSh+Ta/ a ra biSh+Ta traM/ a ra bi ShaT/
15b3(sgra skor): sogs sam/ a roSh+Ta/ a ro Sha tAM/ a ro ShA ta/ sogs so// liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ru ru ge/ ru ru bA te/ ru ru bI re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ru ru bi She/ ru ru ba the/ ru ru bi d+he/ ru ru bai D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma
15b4(sgra skor): gsum la/ ru ru be/ ru ru bi ba he/ ru ru bi ma he/ lu Ta la/ iT yang na bar byas pas/ ra bi tA/ sogs sam/ ro tA/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la'ang iT yang na bar byas pas/ ra bi ShISh+Ta/ sogs sam/
15b5(sgra skor): ro ShISh+Ta/ sogs so// liT la/ ra bi Sh+ya te/ sogs sam/ ro Sh+ya te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ra bi Sh+ya te/ sogs sam/ a ro Sh+ya ta sogs so/ deng skyong ba la'o zhes pa la laT sogs byin pas
16a1(sgra skor): laT la/ da ya te/ sogs so// ling la/ da ye ta/ sogs so// loT la/ da ya tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ a da ya ta/ sogs so// s+thA g+ho rits+tsha/ s+thA g+hu'i iT 'ang ngo // lung at+ma ne pa nga rnams pha rol la s+thA dang byings
16a2(sgra skor): g+hu'i ming can rnams kyi mtha' iT du 'gyur zhing iT du 'gyur ba de las pha rol gyi ts+li 'gyur ba si tsi 'ang ka 'gro ba'i ming can zhes tha snyad byed de/ yon tan sogs mi byed pa'i don no// deng la/ lung / si tsa/ sha 'gro ba ma yin pa nyi
16a3(sgra skor): ba'i yul la e tsa'i A tra 'os e A mdo 'dis A ita du bsgyur/ tra yig ta pha rol de'i dus kyi 'os tA phyis pas/ a di/ sra tra/ zhes pa la/ hra sA daM gA tA/ gzugs thung ngu las so// gzugs de byings mtha' atsa thung ngu las tsI
16a4(sgra skor): bsgyur ba'i sa tsi ni dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can pha rol la dbyi ste/ sitsa phyis pas/ a ti ta/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a di ShA tAM/ a di Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a daM thA/ a di ShA thAM/ a di d+haM/ a dza d+ha/
16a5(sgra skor): skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a di Shi/ a di Sha hi/ a diSh+ma hi/ da ya ti rdi gi li Ti/ liT la da ya ti'i di gi'o// liT pha rol la da ya ti ste/ deng skyong ba la 'os/ byings dang ni di gi zhes par 'gyur zhing gnyis brjod pa sogs kyang mi byed de/
16a6(sgra skor): skyes bu dang po gsum la/ di gyi/ ngi g+hi te/ ngi gyi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ di gyi She/ di g+ha the/ d+hi gyi d+he/ di gyi rje/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum lo/ di kyi/ ngi gyi ba te/ di kyi ma he/ luT la/ sha 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs e tsa ata du bo sgyur
16b1(sgra skor): bas/ dA tA/ dA tA rau/ dA tA ra/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ dA sI Sh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ dA s+ya te/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a dA s+ya ta/ sogs so// DIng na mkha' la 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ Da ya te/ sogs so//
16b2(sgra skor): ling la/ Da ye ta/ sogs so// loT la/ Da ya tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ a Da ya ta/ sogs so// lung la/ iT dang byings la yon tan byas pas/ a Da yiSh+Ta/ sogs so// liT la byings gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os thung ngur song / a b+h+yA sa'i tsar
16b3(sgra skor): 'ang ngos Da Tar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ Ti D+he/ Ti T+ya te/ TI D+hi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ Ti D+hi Sha/ Ti D+ha the/ Ti D+hi d+h+we/ Ti DI D+he/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ Ti D+he/ Ti ts+yai ba he/ Ti D+hi ma hwe/ luT la iT sbyar yon tan byas pas/ Ta yi tA/
16b4(sgra skor): sogs so// smon pa'i ling pa/ Da yi ShISh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ Da li Sh+ya te/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a Da yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ sh+ya/ gu pa spang pa dang smod pa la'o zhes pa la/ gu pa ti dza kita rnams las san 'os san sbyar/ san yang dag
16b5(sgra skor): la 'os/ byings gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os ga dzar bsgyur nas/ dzu gup+pa/ zhes grub pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ dzu gup+sa taM/ sogs so// ling la/ dzu gup+pe ta/ sogs so// loT la/ dz+ra gup+sa tAM/ so gas so// lang la/
16b6(sgra skor): a dz+ra gup+sa ta/ sogs so// lung la/ wal dang po'i iT dang / ata kyi dbyi'os a phyis pas/ a dzu guprISh+Ta/ sogs so// liT la/ kIs sogs kyis am sbyar bas/ dz+r-i gub+hA tsakre/ dzu gub+h+re ba b+hU baM/ dz+r-i gub+h+ra mA sa/ sogs so/
17a1(sgra skor): luT la/ iT byin ata kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ dz+ra gup+si tA/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ dzu gup+si ShiSh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ dzA gup+si Sh+ya te/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a dza guprI Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// man+ta d+hu drA nAn+to
17a2(sgra skor): dIr+b+hash+tsa b+h+yAs s+ya/ mAn ba d+ha dAn shA rnams las a b+h+yA sa'i ring po 'ang ngo // mA na mchod pa/ ba d+ha smad pa/ dA na kun nas 'gems pa/ shA na rno ba rnams las san 'gyur zhing / san yang dag la 'os/ byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po a b+h+yA sa'i
17a3(sgra skor): ming can de lang ring por 'gyur te// mA na la/ san/ byings gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os snga ma thung ngur song / san la ata kyi 'os a i/ mdo 'dis ring po mI mAn+sa zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ mI mAn+ma te/ sogs so// ling la/
17a4(sgra skor): mI mAn+de ta/ sogs dang / loT la/ mI mAn+ma tAM/ sogs dang / lang la/ a mI mAn+ma ta/ sogs so// lung la/ wal dang po'i iT dang ata kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ a mI mAn+di Sh+Ta/ sogs so// liT la/ kAs sogs kyi a ma sbyar bas/ mi
17a5(sgra skor): mAnAM tsakre/ mi mAn+d+ra ba b+hU ba/ mI mAn+ma mA sa/ sogs so// luT la/ iT dang aT kyi dbyi'o a phyis pas/ mI mAn+ti tA/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ mI mAn+di Sh+TiSh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ mI mAn+ti Sh+ya te/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a mI mAn+di Sh+ya ta/
17a6(sgra skor): sogs so// de bzhin du/ ba d+hA smad pa la san/ san yang dag la 'os/ byings gnyis brjod/ san la ata kyi 'os a i/ mdo 'dis ring po/ atsa gcig pa'i ba sha'i b+ha Sha/ dz+ha Sha/ mtha'i sa d+hA dag la 'os pa 'og ma b+ha/ khar l-i tsar
17b1(sgra skor): 'os/ d+ha ta ru bsgyur bas/ bI b+hat+ma zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ bI b+hatra te/ sogs so// ling la/ bI b+hat+se ta/ sogs so// loT la/ bI b+hAt+sa tAM/ sogs so// lung la/ wa la dang po'i iT dang ata kyi dbyi 'os/ a phyis
17b2(sgra skor): pas/ a dI b+h+r-i tISh+Ta/ sogs so// liT la/ bI That+ma tsakre/ bI b+had+hA ba b+hU ba/ bI brAd+d+ha mA saM sogs so// lAT la/ bI ShAng+gi tA/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ b+h+r-i ShAd+l-i Sh+NISh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ bI b+had+bi Sh+yA ta/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a b+hi b+hAd+hiSh+Tha ta/
17b3(sgra skor): sogs so/ !/ d+yA te 'bar ba la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ d+yau ta ta/ sogs so// ling la/ d+yo taM ti/ sogs so// loT la/ d+yo ta tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ a d+yo ta ta/ sogs so// d+yur+N+No lu ngi/ d+yA ta rnams las lung la'o//
17b4(sgra skor): la sogs pa rnams la lung gi pa ra sme pa de rnams yang na 'gyur te/ pa ra smai'i phyogs la/ pu Sha sogs d+yu ta sogs zhes pa'i mdos ts+li ang du bsgyur bas/ a d+yu tata/ a d+yu ta tAM/ a d+yu tan/ sogs so// at+ma ne pa nga'i phyogs la/
17b5(sgra skor): nr-i si tsar bsgyur/ wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ a d+yo tiSh+Tha/ a d+yo tiShA tAM/ a d+yo to Sha tA/ sogs so// d+yA ti s+thA b+h+yoHsaM pra sA ra NaM/ d+yA ti sA pi dag gi saM pra sA ra Na'o// d+yu ta 'bar baM/ nyiSh+Ta pa nyal ba dag gi liT l-i byings gnyis brjod
17b6(sgra skor): pa'i dang po a b+h+yA sa'i ming can de/ si pra sA ra Na ste slar yang dag par bsgyur bar bya ste/ di d+yu te/ di d+yu ti re/ di d+yA ti She/ sogs so// luT la/ iT sbyar bas/ d+yo ti tA/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ d+ye ti ShISh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/
18a1(sgra skor): Sh+ya te/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a d+yo ti Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// !/ br-i tu 'jug pa la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la brta te/ sogs so// ling la/ brti ta/ sogs so// loT la/ bar+ha tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ a
18a2(sgra skor): brta ta/ sogs so// lung la/ d+yu ta rnams las lung la'o zhes pas/ yang na pa rasmai pa nga rnams dang At+ma ne pa da rnams yang na bar byas pas/ pa rasmai pa de sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a br-i tata/ a br-i ta tAM/ a br-i tan/ sogs so// at+man
18a3(sgra skor): pa da'i phyogs la/ ts+li saM tsar bsgyur/ wal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ a gISh+Ta/ a brti ShA tAM/ a brti Sha ta/ sogs so// liT la/ ba br-i te/ ba br-i tA te/ bA br-i ti re/ sogs so// luT la/ brti tA/ brti tA ro/ brti tA raHsogs so// smon
18a4(sgra skor): pa'i ling la/ brti ShISh+Ta/ brti ShAM yAstAM/ brti ShI ran/ sogaso// br-id+d+haHs+ya sa no/ br-ita rnams la s+ya san dag la'o// br-ita la sogs pa ste/ pr-I tu 'jug pa/ br-i d+hu 'phel ba/ shr-i d+hA s+tha smad pa/ s+yan+na zag pa/ kr-i pA nus pa rnams te/
18a5(sgra skor): byings de rnams At+ma ne pa da can yin kyang / s+ya dang san ngag pha rol la pa rasmai pa da rnams kyang yang na 'gyur ro// na baud+d+hash+tsa tur+N+NaHbr-ita rnams las bzhi rnams las ma yin ne// br-ita sogs lnga las kr-i pI bor ba'i bzhi la
18a6(sgra skor): byings phyed pa sa yig dang po can pa ra smai pa nga rnams pha rol la iT 'gyur ba ma yin zhing skabs 'gar rkyen gzhan la yang na bar bya ste/ br-i tA la/ br-ita rnams las zhes pas/ l+r-iT pa rasmai pa nga rnams sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ bar+d+ha ti/
18b1(sgra skor): bat+s+ya tAHbar+N+Nan+ti/ sogs so// At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ brti Sh+ya te/ brti Sh+ye ta/ Sha Sh+yan+ta pags so// de bzhin du/ l-i la/ pa rasmai pa da'i phyogs la/ a bat+sat+tA/ a bar+N+Na tAM/ a bar+d+ha na/ sogs so//
18b2(sgra skor): At+ma ne pa da sbyar ba'i phyogs l-i/ a bar+t+ti Sh+ya ta/ a brti She tAM/ a brti Sh+yan+ta/ sogs so/ s+yan+te ga pa la'o zhes pa la laT sems sbyar bas/ laT la/ s+yan+da daM/ sogs so// ling la/ s+yan+t+r-i ta/ sogs so// loT la/ s+yan+da tAM/
18b3(sgra skor): sogs so// ling la/ a s+yan+da ta/ sogs so// lung la/ d+yuta sogs kyis pa ra smai pa da rnams dang sman pa pa rnams yang na bar byas pas/ pa ra smai pa nga sbyar ba'i phyogs la pu Sha sogs t+yAta sogs zhes pas/ ts+li ang du
18b4(sgra skor): bsgyur/ ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/ a s+ya data/ a s+yA da tAM/ aHsa so// ata ne pa nga'i phyogs la/ A 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a
18b5(sgra skor): s+yAn+naSh+Ta/ a s+yan+di ShA tAM/ a s+yan+di Sha tA/ sogs so// iT ma sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po ma la/ a s+yA.a sran+na tAM/ a sran+d+ha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a s+yAnAHa s+yAn+na thAM/ a s+ya d+haM/ skyes pa
18b6(sgra skor): phyi ma gsum la/ a s+yai tri/ a byai drA hi/ a s+yaid+b+ha haM/ liT sbyar ba'i skyes @ @bu dang po gsum la/ sa s+ya / sa s+ya dAti/ sa rba ngi ra/ sras
19a1(sgra skor): dbus ma gsum la/ sa s+ya daM She/ sa s+yaMt+se/ sa s+yaM dA the/ sa s+yaM d+he/ sa s+yaM di d+de/ sa s+yaM D+he/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sa s+yAM de/ sa s+yai di ba he/ sa s+yai dA he/ sa s+yai di ma he/ sa s+yai ng+ga te/ luT la/ iT yang na bar byas pas/
19a2(sgra skor): iT sbyin pa'i phyogs la/ s+yai di tA/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs rnam sa la/ la/ ma gyidz+har 'dra ba la dz+ha ra rnams kyi 'os dra phyis pas/ s+ye tA/ s+yan+na ro/ s+yan+ta raHsogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ iT sbyar ba'i
19a3(sgra skor): phyogs la/ s+yai di ShISh+Ta/ s+yai di ShI yAstAM/ s+yaM di ShI ran/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ khar la tsar 'os da tar bsgyur bas/ s+yai tISh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ br-ita rnams las s+ya san yang dag la 'os/ pa ra smai pa da rnams
19a4(sgra skor): dang At+ma ne pa da rnams yang na bar byas pas/ pA ra smai ba da'i phyogs la br-ita rnams las bozhi rnams las ma yin no// zhes pas iT mi 'gyur te/ khar la tsar 'os da tAr bsgyur bas/ s+yai t+yA ti/ s+yai t+yA taHs+yaM t+yAn+ti/ sogs so//
19a5(sgra skor): at+ma nau pa nga'i phyogs la/ uta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ s+yaM di Sh+ya te sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ s+yaM t+sa twe/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ pa ra smai pa da'i phyogs la/ a s+yaM t+yA ta/
19a6(sgra skor): a s+yai t+yA tA/ a s+ya d+h+yan/ sogs dang / at+ma ne pang sbyar ba'i phyogs la iT yang na b.raro byas pas/ o byaM di Sh+ya ta sogs sam/ yang no a s+ye d+hAd+ha/ sogs so// a nu bi paR+Ya b+hi ni b+h+yaHs+yan+da te ra prA Ni Sho/ srog chags
19b1(sgra skor): yin pa la a nu bi pa ri a b+hI ni rnams las k+Sh+yan+da tA'i 'o// srog chags ma yin pa la 'jug pa na nyer bsgyur a nu la sogs pa 'di rnams las/ s+yan+na te yi sa yig ni ShA yig tu yang na 'gyur te/ a nu Sh+yan+da twe ra thaHstsogs sam/
19b2(sgra skor): u nu s+yan+da te ra thaHsogs so// de bzhin du/ ba~M/ pA ri/ a b+hi/ nI rnams kyang sbyar bar bya'o// srog chags mi yin pa zhes pas rnam bcad kyi srog chags le 'jug pa na Shar mi 'gyur te/ ni s+yAn+ma te[।]hesti/ 6/ kr-i pA nus pa
19b3(sgra skor): saN+ya/ la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ kr-i po ro laHkr-i pU'i ra la'o// kr-i pU'i ra yig ni rkyen pha rol la la yig tu bsgyur bar bya la/ de yang mtha' gcig tu ni ma nges na sa pa \u0f7f/ pas skabs 'gar mi bsgyur ba yang
19b4(sgra skor): yod do// kr-i pU la/ laT/ sha pa/ mdo 'dis r-i l-i/ puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ kal+la te/ sogs so// ling la/ kalpe ta/ sogs so// loT la/ kalpa tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ a kAlpa ta/ sogs so// lung la/
19b5(sgra skor): d+yu ta rnams las lung la 'os/ pa rasmai pa da rnams dang at+ma ne pa da rnams yang na bar byas pas/ pa rasmai pa da'i phyogs la/ pu Sha sogs d+yuta sogs zhes pas// ts+li ang du bsgyur bas/ a kl-i pata/ a kr-i pa tAM/ a kl-i pan/
19b6(sgra skor): sogs so// at+ma naM pa nga'i phyogs la Uta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iTa'i phyogs l-i/ a kalpiSh+Ta/ a kalpi ShA tAM/ a kal+li Sha ta/ sogs dang / iT yod pa'i phyogs la/ ling si tsA bAt+ma ne
20a1(sgra skor): pa de Shu/ at+ma ne pa da rnams la ling si tsa dag go// byings hal mtha' can ika so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge u pa d+hA na yod pa las/ smon pa'i ling dang / si tsa At+ma ne pa da can dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can yod pa ste/
20a2(sgra skor): iT med pa rnams ka 'gro ba'i ming can zhes brda chad byed de yon tan dang 'phel ba sogs mi byed pa'i don no// skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a kr-ip+ta/ a kr-i prA tAM/ a kl-ip+sa ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a kl-ip+tAHa kl-ip+pa thAM/
20a3(sgra skor): a kr-i b+h+yAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a kr-ip+si/ a kr-i p+tA hau/ a krIp+sA hi/ liT sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsakr-i be/ tsakl-i pA taM/ tsak+tha #/ pi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsakr-i pi She/ tsakr-ip+si/ tsakr-i pA thaM/ tsakr-i pa
20a4(sgra skor): rgyalas dz+hal sa mis gyi/ ![ऽ]la rgyas rnams kyi tsha sha 'os pa ba/ d+h+we/ tsakl-i pi D+h+we/ tsakl-i Sh+Te/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsakl-i pe/ tsakl-i pi ba he/ tsakl-ip+tA he/ tsa kl-i pi ma he/ tsakl-ip+sa he/ lu Ti tsa kl-i paHluT la'ang kl-i pa'i'o// kl-i pa la luT dang 'ang gi sgras l+r-iT dang
20a5(sgra skor): l+r-ing rnams kyi pa rasmai pa dA rnams yang na 'gyur zhing / san gyi mtha' la yang pa rasmai pa da rnams yang na 'gyur ro// tA si tsakl-i paHtAs la'ang kl-i pa'i 'o// kl-ipa las pha rol gyi tAs dang sa yig dang po byings phyed pa pa rasmai pa da rnams
20a6(sgra skor): la'ang iT 'gyur ba ma yin te/ luT la'ang zhes pas pa rasmai pa da dang At+ma ne pa da yang na bar byas pas pa rasmai pa di'i phyogs la/ mdo 'dis iT mi 'jug/ puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ kalpA kalta rau// kalpA raHkalpA
20b1(sgra skor): s+yai/ sogs so// At+ma ne pa da'i phyogs la Ut+ma 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ kal+li tA/ kAl+lA tA ro// kal+li tA raH/ kalbi tA sa/ sngags so// iT ma byin pa'i phyogs lA/ kaSh+Tha/ kASh+Ta
20b2(sgra skor): ro/ kak+ta rAH/ kalta se/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ Atra 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ kalpi ShI Sh+Ta/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ at+ma ne pa da rnams la ling sitsa
20b3(sgra skor): ngag go/ zhes pa sa kita yin pas yon tan mi byed de/ kr-i prISh+Ta/ kr-ip+si yAstAM/ kr-Ib+hI ran/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ luT la'ang kl-i pa'i 'os/ pa rasmai pa da dang At+ma ne pa dA yang na bar byas pas/ pa rasmai pa da sbyar ba'i phyogs la/
20b4(sgra skor): tAs la'ang kl-i pa'i 'os iT mi 'jug ste/ kal+ma tI/ kal+ma taHkal+man+ti/ sogs so// At+ma ne pa nga'i phyogs la/ Uta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ kalpi Sh+ya te/ sogs dang / iT med
20b5(sgra skor): pa'i phyogs la/ kalpA te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ luT la'ang kla pa'i 'os pa rasmai pa da dang At+ma nI pa nga yang na bar byas pas/ pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ tA sa la'ang zhes pas iT mi 'jug ste/ a kal+lA ta/
20b6(sgra skor): a kalpA tAM/ a ka lpAn/ sog so// At+ma ne pa de'i phyogs la iT yang na bar byas pas/ a kalpi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a kalpA ta/ sogs so/ !/ bya tha sdug bsngal dang yang dag par g.ya ba dag la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/
21a1(sgra skor): laT la/ bya tha te/ sogs so// ling la/ bya the ta/ sogs so// loT la/ bya tha tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ a bya tha ta/ sogs so// lung la/ a byA thiSh+Ta/ a byA thi ShA tAM/ a bya thi Sha ta/ sogs so// bya tho li Ti/ bya tha'i liT la'o// liT
21a2(sgra skor): pha rol la bya tha gnyis brjod pa'i a b+h+yA sa'i saM pra swa ra Nar 'gyur te/ bi bya the/ bi bya thA te/ bi bya thi re/ bi bya thi She/ sogs so// luT+ra la/ bya thi tA/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ bya thi ShISh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ bya thi Sh+ya te/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/
21a3(sgra skor): a bya thi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ !/ nyi tA rA mgyogs pa la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ tA ra te/ sogs so// ling la/ tA re ta/ sogs so// loT la/ tra ra tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ a tA ra ta/ sogs so// lung la/ a tra riH
21a4(sgra skor): sogs so// liT la/ ta tA re/ ta tra rA taM/ ta tra ri re/ ta twa ri She/ sogs so// luT la/ tA ri tA/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ tA ri ShI Sh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ tA ri Sh+ya te/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a tra ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// de rnams kyi byed pa
21a5(sgra skor): po la shab 'jug pa'i yul b+hU la sogs pa las byings at+ma ni pang 'jug pa rnams la l+r-iT sogs rnam dbyaM At+ma ne rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams bshad zin te/ !/ da ni b+hU la sogs pa
21a6(sgra skor): gnyis ka'i tshig can rnams la laT sogs pa rasmai pa da dang / At+ma ne pang rnams gnyis ka sbyor ba dang / yang byings At+ma ne can la At+ma ne sbyor ba dang / pa rasmai pa da can la pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyor ba sogs chog ci rigs pa thun mong du
21b1(sgra skor): bshad par bya ste/ 6/ DA pa tsaSha 'tshed pa la'o zhes pa la/ rjes 'brel phyis nas laT sogs sbyar bas/ laTa'i pa rasmai pa nga rnams la/ pa tsa ti/ pa tsa taHpa tsan+ti/ sogs so// At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ pa tsA te/ pa tse te/ pa tsan+te/
21b2(sgra skor): sogs so// de bzhin du/ byed pa po la sha pa byin pas ling gi pa rasmai pa nga rnams la/ pa tse ta/ pa tse tAM/ pa tse yuHsogs so// At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ pa tse ta/ pa tse yAt+taM/ pa tse ran/ sogs so// loTa'i pa ra smai pa da rnams la/ pa tsa tu/
21b3(sgra skor): patsa an+ta/ sogs so// At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ pa tsa tAM/ pa tsi tAM/ pa tsan+taM/ sogs so// lang gi ba rasmai pa dA rnams la/ a pa tsa ta/ a pa tsa traM/ a pa tsan/ sogs so// At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ a pa tsa ta/ a pa tse tAM/ a
21b4(sgra skor): pa tsan+ta/ sogs so// lung la/ byings a niT yin pas iT mi 'jug/ bad bra dza sogs kyis u pa d+hA ring po// tsu'i ku 'os/ tsa ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur ba dang / dz+ha la dang po can rnams la/ dz+ha la las dz+hal
21b5(sgra skor): 'os si tsa dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ a pAk+Shi ta/ a pAk+taM/ a pA k+ShaHsogs so// de bzhin du/ At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ a pak+ta/ a paik+Sha tAM/ a pak+Sha ta/ sogs te/ at+ma ne rnams la u pa
21b6(sgra skor): d+hA ring po mi byed do// liT la byings gnyis brjod pa dang kita rnams la a b+h+yA saM dbyi zhing er bsgyur ba dang / wal dang po rnams la kr-i br-i sr-i sogs kyi mdos iT sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ pa pA tsa/ pe tsa tuHpe tsuHpe
22a1(sgra skor): tsi tha/ pa pak+Sha/ sogs dang / at+ma ne pa da rnams la/ be tsa/ pai tsA twe/ be tsi re/ sogs so// luT la/ tsu'i ku 'os tsa kar bsgyur bas/ pa rasmai ba nga rnams la/ pak+tA/ pak+Sha ro// pak+Sha raHpak+Sha si/ sogs so// At+ma
22a2(sgra skor): ne pa nga rnams la/ pak+tA/ pak+tA rau/ bak+tA raHpak+tA se/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling gi pa rasmai pa nga rnams la/ pa ts+yata/ pa ts+ya stAM/ pa ts+ya suHsogs so// at+ma ne pa da rnams la/ tsu'i ku dang / kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs
22a3(sgra skor): pas/ bak+ShiSh+Ta/ pak+Shi yestAM/ pak+Shi ranra/ sogs so// l+r-iT la'ang tsu'i ku dang / kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ pak+Sh+ya ti/ pak+Sha tiHpa k+Shan+ti/ sogs dang / At+ma ne rnams la/ pak+ShA te/ pak+She te/ par+dz+dzan+ti/
22a4(sgra skor): sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi pe rasmai pa da rnams la/ u pak+Sh+yata/ a pak+Sh+ya tAM/ a pak+Shen/ sogs dang / At+ma ne pa nga rnams la/ a pak+Shau ta/ a pak+She tAM/ a bkyAn+ta/ sogs so/ 6/ pa tr-i laM la yaung ste 'gro ba la'o zhes
22a5(sgra skor): pa la/ byings pa ra smai pa da can yin pas/ laT sogs pa rasmai pau da rnams sbyar bas/ laT laM/ pa ta ti/ sogs so// ling la pa te ta/ sogs so// loT la/ ba ta tu/ sogs so// lang la/ a pa tata/ sogs so// pa taHpum/ pa ta'i
22a6(sgra skor): buma'o// pata'i rmi bsgyur ba ang pha rol la pum A ga ma ster bar bya ste/ ma gnas kyi don dang u brjod don no// pata la lung / lung la nI pu Sha sogs d+yuta sogs laM 'gro ba sogs kyis ts+li ang du bsgyur/ mdo 'dis pum A
22b1(sgra skor): ga ma byin pas/ a pap+ta ta/ a pap+ta tAM/ a pap+tan/ sogs so// liT la/ kid rnams la a b+h+yA sa phyis nas er bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ pa pA ta/ pe ta tuHpe tuHpe ti tha/ sogs so// luT la wa la dang po'i iT
22b2(sgra skor): sbyar bas/ pa ti tA/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ pa t+yata/ pa t+ya stAM/ pa t+yA suHsogs dang / l+r-iT la wal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ pa ti Sh+ya ti/ pa ti Sh+ya taHpa ti ShAn+ti/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a pa ti Sh+ya ta/ a pa ti
22b3(sgra skor): Sh+ya tAM/ a pa ti Sh+yan/ sogs so// 6/ Tu ba mu skyug pa la'o zhes pa la'ing pa ra smai pa da can yin pas laT sogs pa rasmai pa nga rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ ba ma ti/ sogs so// ling la/ ba me ta/ sogs so// loT la/ ba ma tu
22b4(sgra skor): sogs so// lang la/ a ba ma ta/ sogs so// lung la wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ a ba mIta/ a ba mi Sh+TaM/ a ba mi ShuHsogs so// 'grel par lung drangs pas/ ba ma e tA b+hU sa lo pau bA/ ba ma'i a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba dang e nyid yang
22b5(sgra skor): na'o// gong du sha sha dad pa dang po zhes a b+h+yA sa mi dbyi bar bshad kyang de'i dmigs bsal laT kita pha rol la ba ma'i a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba dang ar bsgyur ba sogs yang na bar bya ste/ ba khA ma/ be ma tuH/ ba ba ma tuHbe muHba ba muHbe
22b6(sgra skor): mi tha/ ba ba mi tha/ luT la wal dang po'i iT byin pas/ ba mi tA/ sogs dang / smon pa'i ling la/ ba myA ta/ ba mya stAM/ ba myA suHsogs so// l+r-iT la wal dang po'i iT byin pas/ pa mi Sh+ya ti/ a.a sogaso/ lus de bzhin du/
23a1(sgra skor): l+r-ing la/ a ba maM Sh+yata/ sogs so/ Sh+Ta/ b+h+yA sa? g.yo ba la'o zhus pa'ang ba slu pa can yin pas laT sogs pa rasmai pad rnams sbyar/ byings thams cad bzan po la byed pa pa la shASh+Ta dang / !/ thA/ dz+ha / sog
23a2(sgra skor): kyi mdos/ sh+yan yang na bar byas pas/ laT la b+h+ra ma ti/ sogs sam/ thA mya ti/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ ling la/ b+h+ra me ta/ sogs sam/ b+h+ra mye ta/ sogs so// l-iT la/ b+h+ra ma tu/ sogs sam/ b+hU mya tu/ sogs so// lang laM/ a thA ma ta/ sogs sa
23a3(sgra skor): a b+hU myata sogs so// lung la wal dang po'i iT byin pas/ a b+hU mI ta/ a b+h+ra miSh+TaM/ a b+h+ra mi ShuHsogaso// bA dzAM b+h+ra mu hra sAM/ dzAM b+h+ra mu tras rnams kyi yang na'o// d+h+r-iSh+Ta lang tshe nyams pa/ b+h+ra mu g.yo ba/ tra sI skyo ba rnams kyi liT kita pha rol la a
23a4(sgra skor): b+hU sa dbye ba dang er bsgyur ba sogs yang na bar bya ste/ ba b+ha ma/ b+h+re ma tuHba b+h+ra ma tuHb+he muHba thA muHb+he mi tha/ ba b+h+ra mi tha/ sogs so// luT la/ wal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ b+h+ra mi tra/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ b+hA myata/ sogs so//
23a5(sgra skor): l+r-iT la lba la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ b+h+ra mi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so// aHa de bzhin du/ us l+r-ing la/ 4 a b+h+ra mi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ !/ Sha ha bzod pa la'o zhes pa byings At+ma ne can yin pas laT sogs at+ma na pa da rnams
23a6(sgra skor): sbyar/ byings kyi dang po'i Sha'i sa 'os/ Sha sar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laT la/ sa ha te/ sogs so// ling la/ sa he ta/ sogaso// loT la/ sa ha tA/ sog so// lang la/ a sa ha ta/ sogs so// lung la iT sbyin pas/ a sa hi ShA/ a
23b1(sgra skor): sa hi ShA tAM/ a sa hi Sha ta/ sogs so// liT la/ se hwe/ se hA te/ si hi re/ sogs so// luT la/ i Shu sa ha sogs kyi mangs iT yang na bar byas pas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ sa hi tA/ sa hi tA rau/ sa hi tA raHsogs dang iT med pa'i
23b2(sgra skor): phyogs la/ sa ha la/ luT tAs/ luTa'i dang po sogs kyis ta DA/ sa ha/ tA/ ha'i D+ha 'os ha D+ha/ dz+nyA Sha las d+hA min pas ta tha dag gi d+ha 'os/ ta d+ha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os d+hi D+har bsgyur bas/ sa g+hA D+hA/ zhes pa la/ sa hi ba ho ro nga war+N+Na s+ya/ sa hi
23b3(sgra skor): ba ha dag gi a yig gi ota'o// D+ha'i D+ha la dbyi 'os D+ha phyis pa las/ Sha ha bzod pa dang / ba ha thob pa dag gi a yig ni ota du bsgyur bar bya ste/ D+ha'i D+ha la zhes pas D+ha gong ma phyis/ mdo 'dis od bsgyur bas/ so D+ha/ nga bzhin du/ so b+ha
23b4(sgra skor): rau// so D+hA raHso D+ha se/ sogs so// so D+haHso D+ha'i 'o// sau ha so D+ha zhes 'gyur ba'i sngon du nyer bsgyur sa Shar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can byung yang / so D+ha zhes pas sa Sha yig tu mi 'gyur te/ bI so D+hA/ pa ri so D+ha/ sogs so// smon pa'i
23b5(sgra skor): ling la wal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ sa ti ShISh+Ta/ sa hi ShI yAstAM/ sa hi ShI ran/ sogs so// l+r-iT la'ang wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ sa hi Sh+ya te/ sa hI Sh+ye te/ sa hi Sh+yan+te/ sog so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a sa hi Sh+ya ta/ a sa hi Sh+ya tAM/ a
23b6(sgra skor): sa hi Sh+yan+ta/ sogs so/ !/ Sha d+l-i rnam par 'gyur ba dang 'gro ba dang kun nas mnyes par byed pa la'o zhes pa pa ra smai pa da can yin pas/ laT sogs pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar/ byings thams cad pa bzhi po la/ pA g+hA d+hA sogs kyi mdos sIng
24a1(sgra skor): du bsgyur bas/ laT la/ sI da ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ sI de ta/ sogaso// loT la/ sI da tu/ sogs so// lang la/ a sI da ta/ sogs so// lung la/ pu Sha sogs d+yAta sogs l-i 'gro ba zhes pas ts+li ang du bsgyur bas/ a sa data/
24a2(sgra skor): a sa da tAM/ a sa danaM/ sogaso// liT la/ sa sA da/ se da tuHse duHse di tha/ sa satwA/ sogs so// luT la/ khar la tsar 'os da ta ru bsgyur bas/ sad+d+ha/ sat+kA rau/ sad+hA raH/ sat+ta si/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling lA/ sa d+yata/ sa d+yastAM/ sa drA suHsog so// l+r-iT
24a3(sgra skor): la/ sat+sa tiHsat+su taHsat+su nI/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a sat+s+yata/ a sang+ga tAM/ a sad+h+yan/ sogs so// sha deHshi taHshau de'i sha 'gro ba'i 'o// sha dri 'jig pa la'o zhes pa byings ngo bo pa rasmai ba nga can yin kyang sha 'gro ba rnams
24a4(sgra skor): kyi at+se ne pa nga rnams 'jog ste/ laT sogs byings thams cad pa bzhi po'i At+ma ne pa daHmAs sbyar/ pA g+hA d+hA sogs kyi mangs shad shI ya zhes par bsgyur bas/ laT la/ shI ya te/ sogs so// ling li/ shI ye ta/ sog so// loT la/ shI ya tAM/
24a5(sgra skor): sogs so// lang la/ a shI ya ta/ sogs so// lung sogs byings phyed pa rnams kyi pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyor te/ lung la/ pu Sha sogs kyi ts+li eng du bsgyur bas/ a sha data/ a sha da tAM/ a sha dan/ sogaso// liT la/ sha shA da/ she
24a6(sgra skor): da tuHshe duHshe di tha/ sha shat+tha/ sogs so// luT la/ khar la tsar 'os nga ta ru bsgyur bas/ shat+tA/ shat+tA rau/ shwA raHshad+b+ha si/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ sha d+yeta/ sha d+ya yAstAM/ sha d+ya suHsogs so// l+r-iT la/ khar la tsar 'os nga ta ru bsgyur
24b1(sgra skor): nus thAs/ shad+b+haNI/ shat+s+ya taH/ shad+b+han+ti/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ wang la/ a shad+b+hata/ a shad+b+ha tA/ a shad+hAn/ sogs suH/ pa Na 'gro ba la'o zhes papar smai ba nga can yin pas laT sogs parasmai ba nga rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ pa Na tA/ sa/
24b2(sgra skor): so// ling la pha Ne ta/ sogs so// l-iT la/ pha Na tA/ sogs so// lang la/ A pha Na ta/ sog so// lung la wal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ a pA NI ta/ a phA NiSh+Ta/ a pA Ni ShAHsogs so// la NA tsa sap+tA nAM/ pha Na rnams kyi'ang bdun rnams kyi'o//
24b3(sgra skor): pha Na la sogs pa rnams kyi nang nas kyang pha Na 'gro ba/ rA dz+r-i/ b+hU dz+r-i/ Ta b+hU shr-i/ Tu b+hU shr-i rnams 'bar ba s+ya mu dang swa na sgra ste byings ya mcha gas kyis u pa d+hA 'phel te/ bdun po 'di rnams kyi l-iT ka 'gro ba'i ming can phyi rol la a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba dang
24b4(sgra skor): e ru bsgyur ba sogs yang na bar bya ste/ phaN la liT sbyar bas/ pa pA NA/ pa Na tuHpa phaN tu pheM N+yAHpa phA NA pheM NaM tha/ pa pa Ni tha/ sogs so// luT la wA la dang po'i iT byin pas/ paN+Di drA/ pa Ni tA rau pa Ni tA raHpheM Ni trA si/ so
24b5(sgra skor): so// smon pa'i ling la/ pha N+ya ta/ pha N+ya stAM/ pha N+ya suHsogaso/ ![ऽ]l+r-iT la/ e wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ pha Ni Sh+ya ti/ pha Ni Sh+ya taHpha Ni Sh+yan+ti/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a pha Ni Sh+ya ta/ a pha Ni Sh+ya tAM/ a pha
24b6(sgra skor): Ni Sh+ya na/ sogaso/ !/ rA dz+r-i 'bar ba la'o zhes pa byings gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs pa rasmai pa da rnams dang / At+ma ne gnyis ka 'jug ste/ laTa'i pa rasmai pa da la/ rA dza ti/ rA dza taHrA dzan+ti/ sogaso// At+ma ne pa da rnams la/
25a1(sgra skor): rA dza te/ rA dze te/ rA dzan+te/ sogs so// ling gi pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyar bas/ rA dze ta/ rA dze tAM/ rA dza yuHsogs so// At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ rA dze ta/ rA dze yA tAM/ rA dze ran/ sogs so// loTa'i pa ra smai pad rnams sbyar bas/ rA
25a2(sgra skor): dzatra/ rA dza tAta/ rA dza tAM/ rA dzan+tu/ sogs so// At+ma ne pa nga la/ rA dzaM tA/ rA dza tAM/ r-I dzan+te/ sogs so// lang gi pa rasmai pa nga rnams sbyar bsta/ a rA dzat+ta/ a rA dza tAM/ a rA dzan/ sogs so// At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ a rA dza ta/ a ra dze d+ha/
25a3(sgra skor): a rA dzan+ta/ sogs so// lung gi pa rasmai pa dra rnams la/ a rA dzIta/ a rA dziSh+Ta/ a rA dzi ShaHsogs so// At+ma ne pa nga rnams la/ a rA dziSh+Ta/ a rA dzi ShA tAM/ a rA dza Sha ta/ sogs so// liT la/ phaN rnams kyi'ang bdun rnams kyi 'os a
25a4(sgra skor): b+hA sa dbyi ba sogs yang na bar bya ste/ pi rasmai pa rnams la/ ra rA dza/ re dza tu de ra rA dza tu/ re dzuHra rA dzuHsogs dang At+ma nAM pa da rnams sbyar bas/ re dze/ rA rA dze/ re dzA te/ ra rA dzA te/ re dzi re/ ra rA dzi re/ sogs so// luTa'i pa rasmai pa
25a5(sgra skor): nga rnams sbyar bas/ rA dzi tA/ rA dzi tA rau/ rA dzi tA raH/ rA dzi tA si/ sogasaso// a At+ma ne pa da asa? rnams la/ rA dzi tA/ rA dzi tA rau/ rA dzi tA raH/ rA dzi tAse/ sogaso// aHsmon pa'i ling gi pa rasmai pa nga rnams la/ rA dzA ta/ rA dz+ya ste/
25a6(sgra skor): rA dzA suHsogs dang / At+ma ne pa da sbyar bas/ rA dzi ShISh+Ta/ rA dzi ShI yAstAM/ rA dzi ShI ran/ sogs so// l+r-iTa'i pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ rA dzi Sh+ya ti/ rA dzi Sh+ya taHrA dzi Sh+yan+ti/ sogs dang / At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ rA dzi Sh+ya te/ rA dzi Sh+ye te/ rA dzi Sh+yan+te/ sogs//
25b1(sgra skor): l+r-ing gi pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ a rA dzi Sh+yata/ a rA dzi bya tAM/ a rA dzi Sh+yan/ sogs dang / At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ a rA dzi Sh+ya ta/ a rA dzi Sh+ye tAM/ a rA dzi Sh+yan+ta/ sogs so/ !/ Tu b+hU shr-i 'bar ba la'o zhes pa at+ma ne pa nga can yin pas laT sogs at+ma ne
25b2(sgra skor): rnams 'jug ste/ byings thams cad pa bzhi po la/ b+hU sha/ b+hU sha/ b+h+ra mu sogs kyi mdos/ byed pa po'i don la sha pa dang sh+yan yang na bar byas pas/ laT la/ b+hU sha te/ sogs sam/ yang na/ b+hU sh+ya te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ ling la/ b+hU she ta/
25b3(sgra skor): sogs sam/ b+hU sh+ye ta/ sogs so// loT la/ b+hU sha tAM/ so gas sam/ b+hU sh+ya tAM/ sog so// lang la/ a b+hU sha ta/ sogs sam/ a b+hU sh+ya ta/ sogs so// lung la wal dang po'i iT sbyin pas/ a thA shiSh+Ta/ sogs so// liT la pheN sogs
25b4(sgra skor): kyi mngos a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba sogs yang na bar byas pas/ b+he she/ ba b+hU she/ b+h+re shA te/ ba b+hU shA te/ b+h+re shi raM/ ba b+hU shi re/ sogs so// luT la iT byin pas/ thA shi tA/ sogs so// smon po'i ling la/ b+h+ra shi ShISh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ b+hU shi Sh+ya te/
25b5(sgra skor): sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a b+hA shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ b+hU shr-i 'bar ba yang cho ga thams cad bshad ma theg pa dang 'dra'o/ 7/ sa na sgra la'o zhes pa byings pa rasmai pa da can yin pas laT sogs pa ra smai ba nga rnams sbyar bas/ laT
25b6(sgra skor): la/ swa na ti/ sogs so// ling la/ swa ne ta/ sogs so// loT la/ swa na tu/ sogs so// lang la/ a swa nata/ sogs so// lung la 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/ a swa nI ta/ a swa niSh+TAM/ a swa ni ShuHsogs sam/ a sA nI ta sogs so// liT la/ pha
26a1(sgra skor): sogs kyi a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba sogs yang na bar byas pas/ sa sA ni/ swe na tuH/ sa swa na tuHse nuH/ sa swa nuHsogs so// luT la/ wal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ swa ni tA/ sogs dang / smon pa'i ling la/ swa n+yAta/
26a2(sgra skor): sogs so// l+r-iT la/ swa ni Sh+ya ti/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a swa ni Sh+yata/ sogs so// gong du bi las kyang snga ni zas la'o zhes pas/ swa ni'i sngon du bi dang ab zas kyi don brjod pa na Sha ru 'gyur te/ bi Sha Na ti mA saM/ zas ma yin na sa Sha
26a3(sgra skor): ru mi 'gyur bas/ bi sA na ti bI NA/ sogs te/ de bzhin du/ a wa yang sbyar bar bya'o/ !/ kha nu kun nas rko ba la'o zhes pa rasmai ba da can yin pas laT sogs pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyar bas laT pa byed/ la/ kha na ti/ sogs so//
26a4(sgra skor): ling la/ ba ba lang gi \u0f7f/ ne ta/ sogs so// loT la/ kha na tu/ sogs so// lang la/ a kha nata/ sogs so// lung la/ 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/ a khA nItra/ a khA niSh+TAM/ a khA ni ShuHsogs sam/ a
26a5(sgra skor): khA nItA/ sogs so// liT la/ kita rnams la/ ga ma ha na dzan khan sogs kyi mdos u pa d+hA'i a dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ tsa khA na/ tsa khA tuH/ tsa b+h+yAMHsogs so// luT la/ wa la dang po'i
26a6(sgra skor): iT byin pas/ kha ni tA/ sogs so// ye bi b+hA ShA/ la la 'das ka'o// byings kha na rko ba/ dze na skye ba/ Sha na kun nas gus pa rnams kyi Ti rkyen ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can la yig dang po can pha rol la yang ata du 'gyur te/
26b1(sgra skor): smon pa'i ling la// khan+tad/ sngags sam/ kha yat+ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ kha naSh+Ta ti/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ wang la/ a kha nI Sh+yAta/ sogs so/ !/ nA gro mchod pa dang zho ba dag la'o zhes pa'ang ba
26b2(sgra skor): rasmai pa da can yin pas laT sogs pa rasmai pa dA rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ tsA ya tI/ sogs so// ling la/ nA yeta/ sogs so// loT la/ tsA ya tA/ sogs so// lang la/ a tsA yata/ sogs so// lung la/
26b3(sgra skor): tsA la srA ya sA ya sogs kyi lung 'dren gyis iT yang nai bar byas/ iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ wA y+ra dag gi wal la dbyi'o zhes la dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tsA yIta/ a tsA yiSh+TaM/ a tsA yai ShA
26b4(sgra skor): sogs sam/ a tsA sIta/ a tsA staM/ a tsA suHsogs so// liT la/ tsa tsA yaM/ tsa tsA yuHsogs so// luT la/ iT yang na bar byas pas/ tsA yi tA/ sogs sam/ tsA tA/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ tsA yuta/
26b5(sgra skor): sogs so// l+r-iT la iT ster ba dang la dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/ tsA yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs sam/ tsA s+ya ti/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a tsA yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a tsA s+yata/ sogs so/ !/ la Sha mdzes
26b6(sgra skor): pa la'o zhes pa yang pa ra smai pa da can yin pas laT sogs pa rasmai pa da rnams 'jug ste/ byings thams cad pa bzhi po rnams la/ b+hU sha b+hU sha b+h+ra mu sogs kyi 'dos sha pa dang / sh+yan yang na bar byas pas/ laT la/
27a1(sgra skor): la Sha ti/ sogs sam/ la Sh+ya ti/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ ling la/ la Shata/ sogs sam/ la Sh+yeta/ sogs so// loT la/ la Sha t+ya/ sogs sam/ la Sh+yA t+yA/ sogs so// lang la/ a la 'at+ya/ sogs sam/ a la Sh+yaH/
27a2(sgra skor): sogs so// lung la/ wal dang po'i iT b+hin 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/ a lA ShItA/ a lA ShiSh+Tau/ a lA Shi Shu// sogs sam/ a la ShIta/ sogs so// liT lA/ la lA Sha/ le Sha tuH/ le ShuHsogs so// luT
27a3(sgra skor): wA la dang po'i iT byin pasa?/ la Shi twA/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ la Sh+Tu ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la iT sbyar bas/ la Shi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a la Shi Sh+ya ta/ sog so// U du pa d+hA yA go haH/ go ha'i u pa
27a4(sgra skor): d+ha'i Uta'o// rkyen au tsa dang po can pha rol la go hA ste/ gu hU kun nas sgrib pa'i u pa d+hA'i u yig ni Ata ste U ring por 'gyur te/ !/ gu hU gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas/ laTa'i pa rasmai pa da la/ gU ha taM/ sogs dang / At+ma ne
27a5(sgra skor): pe da rnams la/ gU ha te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ ling gi pa rasmai rnams la/ gU he ta/ sogs dang / At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ gU he ta/ sogs so// loTa'i pa rasmai rnams la/ gU ha tu/ sogs dang / At+ma ne rnams la/ gU ha tAM/ sog so// lung la/ Ata
27a6(sgra skor): 'gro ba sogs kyi iT yang na bar byed de/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la go ha'i zhes pa'i mdos u pa d+hA ring po byed de/ iT byin pa'i phyogs kyi pa rasmai rnams la/ a gU hIta/ a gU hiSh+TAM/ a gU hi ShuHsogs dang / At+ma ne rnams la/ a
27b1(sgra skor): gru hiSh+Ta/ a gU hi ShA tAM/ a gU hi Sha ta/ sogs so// iT med pa'i phyogs la/ ika u pa d+hA shal iT med pa sogs kyis ts+li kra ru bsgyuraro/ ha'i D+ha 'os/ ha D+ha/ atsa gcig pa'i ba sha'i thaSha dz+ha Sha mtha'i sa d+ha dag la'o zhes pa'i mdongos ga
27b2(sgra skor): sa la Sha D+ha dag gi kA 'os D+ha ka/ san+na nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa khar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a g+hu k+ShaH/ a T+Ta khai trUM/ a g+hu k+Shan/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs kyi At+ma ne byA da la/ wA gA d+ha hadi ta li gA d+hA A
27b3(sgra skor): ne pa de dan+te/ du ha di ha/ li ta gu hA rnams kyi At+ma ni pa d+ma so la gnas pa la yang na 'jig go// du ha 'i dzu ba/ di ha nye bar gsog pa/ l-i hA rI myang ba/ gu d+hu kun nas sgrib pa rnams la pha rol gyi ts+li bsgyur ba'i klo ni rnam dbye At+ma nepa
27b4(sgra skor): da so la gnas pa 'am so las skyes pa'i yi ge dang po can pha rol la yang na 'jig ste/ kla mi 'jig pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ a g+hu k+Sha ta/ kra 'jig pa'i phyogs la/ ha'i D+ho 'os data D+ha/ d+ha min pa sogs
27b5(sgra skor): kyis ta d+hA/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os d+ha D+ho D+hA'i rnams gnas na[।]/ D+ha la dbyi 'os/ D+ha gong ma phyis/ D+hau r+ra phyis po la snga ma'i aN gyi ring po'o zhes pa'i mdos u ring por bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a gU D+ha/ kra s+yA tsi/
27b6(sgra skor): kwa'i atsa la'o// li ha sogs las pha rol gyi ts+li'i 'gyur ba'i kla'i mtha' rnam dbyaM At+ma ne pa da a tsa dang po can rnams pha rol la dbye ste/ skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ u g+hu k+Sha/ [ऽ।ऽ] na ga kyi gas kya ka a g+hu k+Sha ta/ yang
28a1(sgra skor): 'grel par a tsa dang po yin kyang mang tshig la kra'i mtha' 'ga' zhig dbyi bar mi 'dod do zhes bshad pas/ a g+hu k+Shan+ta/ lta bu'o// cho ga de rnams dang 'dra bar byas pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a gU D+hAHa g+hu k+Sha thAH/ a
28a2(sgra skor): g+hu k+ShA thAM/ a g+hu D+haM/ a g+hu d+haM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a g+ha k+Shi/ a g+hu k+Sha ba ti/ a g+hu k+Sha ma hi/ liTa'i pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ dzu gU ha/ dzu gU ha tuH/ dz+r-i b+h+ra N+yaH/ dzA gU hi tha/ dzu g+hu D+ha/ sogs dang / At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ dzu he/ dz+ya gU hwA te/
28a3(sgra skor): dzu pU hi re/ dzu gU hi She/ dzu gU k+ShaM/ sogs so// luT la iT yang na bar byas pas/ gU hi tA/ gU hi tA rau/ gU hi tA raH/ gU hi tA si/ sogs sam/ gU D+hA/ gU b+hA rau/ gU D+hA raH[ऽ]/ gU TA si/ sogs so// At+ma ne la yang gU hi tA/ gU hi tA rau/ gU hi tA
28a4(sgra skor): raH/ gU hi tA se/ sogs sam/ gU D+ha/ gU D+hA rau/ gU D+ha raH/ gU D+hA se/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling gi pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ gu h+yA tra/ gu h+ya stAM/ gu h+ya suHsogs dang / At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ Uta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na
28a5(sgra skor): bar byas pas/ gU hi ShISh+Ta/ gU hi ShI yastAM/ gU hiSh+Ti ran/ sogs sam/ g+hu k+ShISh+Ta/ g+hu k+ShI yAstAM/ g+hu k+Shi ran/ sogs so// l+r-iT la yeng iT yang na bar b+has pas pa rasmai pa dA rnams la/ gU hi Sh+ya ti/ gU hi Sh+ya taH/ gU hi byan+ti/ sogs
28a6(sgra skor): sam/ g+ha k+Sh+ya ti/ g+hu k+Sh+ya taH/ g+hu kyAn+ti/ sogs so// At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ gU hi Sh+ya te/ grI hi Sh+ye te/ gU hi Sh+yan+te/ sogs sam/ g+hu k+Sh+ya te/ g+hu k+She te/ g+ha kyAn+te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi pi rasmai pa da rnams la/ a g+hu ti Sh+yata
28b1(sgra skor): a gU hiSh+ya tAM/ a gU ti Sh+ya na/ sogs sam/ a g+hu k+Sh+yata/ a g+hu k+Sh+ya tAM/ a g+hu k+Sh+yanra/ sogs so// At+ma ne rnams la/ a g+hu ti Sh+ya ta/ a g+hu ti Sh+ya tA/ a g+h+rA hi Sh+yan+ta/ sogs sam/ a g+hu k+Sh+ya ta/ a g+hu k+Sh+ya tA/ a g+hu kyAn+ta/ sogs so//
28b2(sgra skor): dr-inya 'phrog pa la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs pa rosmai pa da rnams dang / At+ma ni pa da rnams gnyis ka 'jug ste/ laTa'i pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ ha ra ti/ sogs dang / At+ma nI pa de rnams la/ hau ra te/ sogs so//
