28b3(sgra skor): de bzhin du/ ling gi pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ ha re ta/ sogs dang / At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ ha re ta/ sogs so// loTa'i pa rasmai pa da rnams la/ ha ra tu/ sogs dang / At+ma ne ba da rnams la/ ha ra tAM/ sogs so// lang gi pa rasmai pa da rnams
28b4(sgra skor): la/ a ha rata/ sogs dang / At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ a ha ra ta/ sogs so// lung gi pa ra smai pa da rnams la/ sitsa la 'phel ba pa rasmai pa da rnams la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ a hAR+Shi ta/ a hAts+tsha/ a hAT+TaHskyes bu dbus ma gsum
28b5(sgra skor): la/ a hAr+d+hiH/ a hAn+tAM/ a hAr+Shu/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a hAr+YaM/ a hAr+tha/ a han+tha/ ush+tsa/ r-i las kyang ngo // byings r-i mtha' las pha rol gyi iT med pa'i ts+li bsgyur ba'i si tsa rnam dbye At+ma ne pa da pha rol can dang / smon
28b6(sgra skor): pa'i ling At+ma ne rnams kyang kaM 'gro ba'i ming can zhes brda chad byed de dgos pa ni 'phel ba dang yon tan mi byed pa'i don te/ hr-inya la lung At+ma ne rnams sbyar bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a hr-i ta/ gzugs lung du las zhes pas/ rdul dang po can rna
29a1(sgra skor): lag ka/ a hr-i b+hU tAM/ u hr-i Shata/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a hraM thA/ a hrI ShA thAM/ ar+tha d+hA/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a tr-i Shi/ a rbaM Sha hI/ a tr-iSh+ma hi/ liT la/ a b+hu sa med pa sogs kyis byings
29a2(sgra skor): gnyis brjod/ r-i ata 'os r-i a/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os/ ha dz+ha/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ dz+ha dzar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ pa rasmai pa da'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza hA ra/ dza hra ruH/ dza thuHskyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza har+YA/
29a3(sgra skor): dza ha thuHdza hra/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza hA ra/ dza ha ra/ dza ha ri ba/ dza ha ri ma/ de bzhin du/ At+ma no pa da'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzA hre/ dza hA te/ dza hri re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza ha ri She/ dza hA the/ dza ha ri d+h+we/ dza ha ri D+he/ skyes bu phyi ma
29a4(sgra skor): gsum la/ dza hre/ dza ha ri ba he/ dza ha ri ma hi/ luT la/ byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os yon tan byas pas/ pa ra smai pa da rnams la/ han+d+ha/ har+t+ta rau/ han+ta raH/ har+N+Na saM/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ At+ma ne pa dA rnams la/
29a5(sgra skor): har+t+ta/ hAr+t+ta rau/ hartA raH/ har+t+ta se/ sogs dang / smon pa'i ling gi pa ra smai pa da rnams la/ sha yaka/ ling rnams la ring 'os r-i ring du bsgyur bas/ hri yIta/ hri yA staM/ tri yA suHsogs dang / At+ma ne pa da rnams la/ r-i las kyang
29a6(sgra skor): ngos/ kiti yin pas yon tan sogs mi byed de/ hri ShISh+Ta/ hri ShI yAstAM/ hri ShI ran/ sogs so// l+r-iT dang l+r-ing la/ r-ita han dag gi s+ya la'o zhes pa'i mdos iT sbyor te/ l+r-iTa'i pa ra smai pa da la/ ha ri Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / At+ma ne pa da
29b1(sgra skor): la/ tariSh+ya te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi pa ra smai pa nga la/ a ta ra Sh+yaH/ sogs dang / At+ma ne pa dA la/ a ha ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ !/ b+h+r-inya 'gengs pa la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas/ laTa'i pa rasle pa dA la/ d+hA ra ti/
29b2(sgra skor): sogs dang / At+ma ne pa dA rnams la/ b+ha ra te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ ling gi a tang la/ thA re ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ b+ha re ta/ sogs so// loTa'i a tang lA/ b+ha ra tu/ sogs dang / tang la/ b+ha ra tAM/ sogs so// lang gi
29b3(sgra skor): a tang la/ a b+ha ra ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a b+ha ra ta/ sogs so// lung gi a tang la/ si tsa la 'phel ba zhes sogs kyi mngos 'phel ba byas pas/ a b+hAR+Shi tra/ a b+hU rAM/ a b+hU R+ShaHsogs dang / lung gi tang lahA/ r-i
29b4(sgra skor): las kyang ngos/ kIta yin pas yon tan mi byed/ gzugs thung ngu las so zhes pa'i mangs rnam dbye dz+wa la dang po rnams la sitsa dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a b+h+r-i ta/ a b+h+r-i ShI tAM/ a b+h+r-i Sha ta/ sogs so// liT
29b5(sgra skor): la kr-i sr-i b+h+r-i sogs kyi wa la dang po rnams la iT mi 'jug ste/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba b+hA ra/ ba th+yA tuH/ ba b+h+yAHskyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba b+har+Ya/ pa b+h+ra thuH/ ba b+h+ra/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba b+ha ra/ ba b+ha ra/
29b6(sgra skor): ba b+h+r-i ba/ ba b+h+r-i ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba b+h+ye/ ba b+hU taM/ ba b+hI re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba b+h+r-i She/ ba b+hU the/ ba b+h+r-i D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba b+h+yAM/ ba b+h+r-i ba he/ ba b+h+r-i ma he/ luT la 'grel par iT yang na
30a1(sgra skor): bar ba shad pas/ a tang la/ b+ha ri tA/ b+ha ri tA si/ sogs sam/ b+hArtA/ b+har+d+ha si/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ tang la/ b+hA ri tA/ b+ha rI tA se/ sogs sam/ b+h+yar+t+ta/ b+hAr+d+ha se/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling gi/ a tang la/
30a2(sgra skor): yAkA ling rnams la ring 'os r-i ring du bsgyur bas/ dzI yAta/ sogs dang / tang la/ r-i las kyang ngos kita yin pas yon tan sogs mi byed de/ b+h+r-i ShISh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT dang l+r-ing la/ r-ita han dag gi s+ya la 'os/ iT byin pas
30a3(sgra skor): l+r-iTa'i a tang la/ b+ha ri Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ b+he r-i Sh+ya te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a b+ha ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a b+ha ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// !/ dA na kun nas 'gems pa la'o zhes pa la/ mAn
30a4(sgra skor): ba d+ha dAn sogs kyi san dang san la ata kyi 'os/ a b+h+yA sa ita mAn ba d+hA dAnra sogs kyi Ita du bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dI dAn+tha zhes grub pa la/ laT sogs At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor te/ byings nyid gnyis kA'i tshig can
30a5(sgra skor): yin kyang san mtha' la tang rnams 'gyur zhes bshad de/ laT la/ dI dAn+ma te/ sogs so// ling la/ dI dIr+the ta/ sogs so// loT la/ dI dAn+ma tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ a dI dAn+ma taM/ sogs so// lung la/ wa la dang po'i iT dang ata
30a6(sgra skor): kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ a dI dAn+di Sh+Ta/ sogs so// l-iT la/ kAs sogs kyis A ma sbyar bas/ dI bAn+taM tsa kre/ dI dAn+na ba b+hU ba/ dI dAn+sa mA si/ sogs so// luT la yang iT byin pas/ dI dAn+di tA/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ dI
30b1(sgra skor): dAn+diSh+NI Sh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ dI dAn+di Sh+ya te/ sogs so// l+r-id la/ a d+hi dArI ShA ta/ sogs so/ !/ shUn rno ba la'o zhes pa la yang san sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ shrI shwAn+ma te sogs cho ga thams cad bshang ma thag pa
30b2(sgra skor): dAn gyi skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o/ !/ b+ha dza bsten pa la'o zhes pa gnyis ka'i tshig can pas laT sogs pa rasmai pa da rnams dang At+ma na pa da rnams gnyis ka 'jug ste/ laTa'i a tang la/ b+ha dza ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ !
30b3(sgra skor): dza te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ ling gi a tang la/ b+ha dze ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ b+ha dze ta/ sogs so/ leTa'i tang la/ byA dzi ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ b+hA dza tAM/ sogs so// lang gi a tang la/ a b+ha dzAta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a b+h+ya
30b4(sgra skor): dza ta/ sogs so// lung la tsu'i ku 'os/ dza ga/ khar la tsar 'os/ g+hA ka/ dz+ha la las dz+hal la 'os rnam dbye dz+ha la dang po rnams la si tsa 'jig/ dz+ha la ma yin pa rnams la/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs
30b5(sgra skor): kyis bsgrubs pas/ a ting gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a b+hAk+tsit+ta/ aM b+hUk+ShaM/ aM b+hUm+b+ha/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a r+d+hak+Sh+mIH/ a b+hUk+taM/ A b+hAk+Sh+Na/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dz+nyAk+Sha/ a b+hUk+Sha/ a thAk+Shau/ de bzhin du/
30b6(sgra skor): tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a thAk+Sha/ a thAm+mu tA/ a b+hUk+She te/ smyos bu dbus ma gsum la/ a hrI k+ShiH/ e g+ne/ nA~M/ oM thAb+h+yo/ skyes bu phyi mi gsum la/ e dzA mI/ oM d+hIHwi/ oM b+hUk+ShA hi/
31a1(sgra skor): byings gnyis brjod kita rnams la/ dwI pa la b+ha dza/ tra pa las kyang ngos/ a b+h+yA swa dbyi ba dang er bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tAng gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba b+hA dza/ b+h+ye dza tuH/ b+he dzuHskyes bu dbus ma
31a2(sgra skor): gsum la/ b+he dzi tha/ b+ha b+hak+Sha/ b+h+ye dza thuH/ b+he dza skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba b+hA dza/ ba b+ha dza/ b+he dzi ba/ b+he dzi ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ b+hi dzi/ b+he dzA te/ b+he dzi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ b+he dzi She/ b+he dzA the/ b+he dzo d+h+we/ b+he dzi D+haM/
31a3(sgra skor): skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ b+he dze/ b+he dzi ba he/ b+he dzi ma he/ luT la/ tsu'i ku 'os/ dzA ga/ khar la tsar 'os/ ga kar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ b+hak+tA/ b+hak+tA si/ sogs dang / tang la/ b+hak+tA/ b+hak+ShA se/ sogs so//

31a5(sgra skor): l+r-iT la'ang bshad ma thag pa'i cho ga dang mthun par bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ b+hak+Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ b+hak+ShA te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a b+hak+Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / tang le/ a b+hak+Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ !/ shrinya
31a6(sgra skor): bsten pa la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs pa ra smai pa da dang At+ma ne pa da gnyis ka 'a drug ste/ laTa'i a tang la/ shra ya ti/ sogs dang / tang l-i/ shra ya te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ ling gi a tang la/ shra
31b1(sgra skor): yeta/ sogs dang / tang la/ shra ye ta/ sogs so// loTa'i a tang la/ shra ya tu/ sogs dang / tang la/ shra ya tAM/ sogs so// lang gi a tang la/ a shra yata/ sogs dang / tang la/ a shra ya ta/ sogs so// lung la/ Ni shr-i dru
31b2(sgra skor): sogs kyis rI tsang du bsgyur/ tsang la 'os/ byings gnyis brjod/ dang po'i hal lhag po ngos/ ra phyis/ atsa la byings sh+nu sogs kyi i ya sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ a shri shri yata/ a shi shri ya tAM/ a shi shri yan/
31b3(sgra skor): sogs dang / tang la/ a shi shri ya ta/ a shi shri ya tAM/ a shi shri yan+ta/ sogs so// liT la 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa rnams la/ swany+dza las brtsegs pa la liTa'i kita yang na'o zhes pas lung 'dren gyi kitakyi
31b4(sgra skor): brda chad yang na bar byas pas/ kita kyi phyogs la i ya dang kita ma yin pa'i phyogs la yon tan byed de/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ shi shA ya/ shi shrA ya tuH/ shi shrI ya tuH/ shi shra yuH/ shi shri yuH/ du
31b5(sgra skor): ma gsum la/ shau shra yi tha/ shi shra ya thuH/ shi shri ya thuH/ shrI shra ya/ shi shri ya/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum lo/ shai shrI ya/ shi shra ya/ shi shra yi ba/ shi shr-i yi ba/ shi shra yi mA/ shi shri yi la/ de
31b6(sgra skor): shi shra yaM/ shi shri ye/ shi shra yA te/ ashi shri yA te/ sogs so// luT la wa la dang po'i iT byin/ byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ a tang la/ pra yi tA/ sha yi ta si/
32a1(sgra skor): shra yi tA/ shra yi tA saM/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ kauta ma yin pa sogs kyis ring po byas pas/ shrI yAta/ shrI yAstaM/ shrI yA suH/ sogs dang / tang la iT byin pas/ shra yi ShISh+Ta/ shra yai ShI
32a2(sgra skor): yA stAM/ shra yi ShI ran/ sogs so// l+r-iT la'ang iT byin nas yon tan byas pas/ a ta wa/ shra yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ shra yi Sh+ya te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a shra yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a
32a3(sgra skor): shra yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ 6/ rany+dza chos la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs pa rasmai pa da rnams dang / At+ma ne pa da gnyis ka 'jug/ n+deshwarany+dzi'i 'ang ngo // rany+dza'i na yang byed pa po'i don gyi shab pha rol la dbyi
32a4(sgra skor): ste/ na phyis pas/ laTa'i a tang la/ ra dza ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ ra dza te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ ling gi a tang la/ ra dza ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ ra dze ta/ sogs so// loTa'i a tang la/ ra dza tu/ sogs dang / tang la/ ra

32a6(sgra skor): las dz+hal la 'os/ si tsa dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ bad b+hA dza sogs kyis 'phel ba'ang bya ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a rAM k+Shita/ arak+ShAM/ a ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a rAM k+ShIH/ a rAM k+taM/ a
32b1(sgra skor): nAM k+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a rAM k+ShaM/ a rAM k+Sha/ a rAM k+ShA/ de bzhin du/ tang la/ a ra k+ta/ a raM k+Sha tA/ a rA k+Sha ta/ sogs so// l-iTa'i 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa rnams la/ swany+dza sogs kyis na dbyi ba yang na bar
32b2(sgra skor): byed de/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum laM/ ra rany+dzi/ ra rany+dza tuMH/ ra ra dza tuH/ ra rany+dzaH/ ra ra dzuHskyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ra rany+dzi tha/ ra raM k+Sha/ ra rany+dza thuH/ ra ra dza thuH/ ra rany+dza/ rA ra dza/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ra rany+dza/ ra rany+dzi ba/ rA ra
32b3(sgra skor): dzi ba/ ra rany+dzi ma/ ra ra dzi ma/ de bzhin du/ tAng gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ra rany+dze/ ra ri dze/ ra rany+dza tau/ ra ra dzA te/ ra rany+dzi re/ ra ra dzi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ra rany+dzi She/ ra ra dzi She/ ro rany+dza the/ ra ra dzA thaM/ ra rany+dzi D+h+we/ ra rany+dzi D+h+we/ ra ra dzi d+he/
32b4(sgra skor): ra ra dzi d+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ra rany+dzi/ ra ro dze/ ra rany+dzi ba he/ ra ra dzi ba he/ ra rany+dzi ma he/ ra ra dzi ma he/ luT la/ tsu'i ku dang khar la tsar byas pas/ a tang la/ raM k+tA/ raM k+ShA si/ sogs dang / ting la/ raM k+ta/ raM k+tA se/ sogs so// smon pI'i
32b5(sgra skor): ling gI a tang la/ ita ma yin pa sogs kyi nA phyis pas/ ra dzA ta/ ra dz+ha stAM/ ra dzA suH/ sogs dang / tang la/ tsu'i ku 'o dang / khar la tsar kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis/ ra k+ShiSh+Ta/ ra k+Shi yAstAM/ raM k+Shi ran/ sogs so// l+r-iT la'ang cu'i
32b6(sgra skor): ku sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ raM k+Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ raM k+Sha te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a raM k+Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a raM k+ShA ta/ sogs so/ !/ tri Sha 'bar la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig
33a1(sgra skor): can yin pas laT sogs kyi ba ra smai ba da dang / At+ma ne pa da gnyis ka 'jug ste/ laTa'i a tang la/ tre Sha ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ tre Sha te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ ling la/ twe She ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ tre She ta/ sogaso//
33a2(sgra skor): 'i a tang la/ tre Sha t+ye/ sogs dang / tang la/ treSha tAM/ sogs so// ling gi nga la/ a tA la/ sogs dang / tang la/ ta/ sogs so// lung shal u pa d+hA iT med pa la ma sa/ sIsa? ru bsgyur ka phyis/ sa la ShA D+ha dag gi ka
33a3(sgra skor): 'os/ Sha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyi sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ a tri k+Shata/ a tAM k+Sha tAM/ a trI k+Shan/ sogs dang / tang la/ a tri kA ta/ a tri k+Sha tAM/ a ti k+Sha tA/ sogs so// l-iT 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan
33a4(sgra skor): can ma yin pa rnams le/ swany+dza sogs kyi lung 'dren gyis kita du yang na bar byas/ a tang la/ ti twe ShA/ ti twe Sha tuHti tri Sha tuHti twe ShaHti tri ShaHskyes bu dbus ma gsum [ऽ।।।ऽऽ।ऽ]la/ tI twe Shi tha/ ti tI ShI tha/ ti tweSh+Ta/ ti ta Sha thuH
33a5(sgra skor): ti tri Sha thuHtI twe ShA/ ti twe Sha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ti tre ShA/ tI twe She ba/ tI tI Shi ba/ ti tre Shi ma/ ti tre Shi ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ti twe ShaM/ ti trI She/ ti twe ShA te/ tI tISh+Tha te/ ti tre Shi re/ ti tweShIre/ skyes bu dbus ma
33a6(sgra skor): gsum le/ ti tre Shi Sho/ ti tI Shi She/ ti tre ShA the/ ti tI ShA the/ ti treShI d+h+waM/ ti triSh+Ti d+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ti tre Sho/ tid+hi She/ ti te Shi ba he/ ti tri Shi ba he/ ti tre Shi ma hai/ ti tri Shi ma he/ luT la/ puka mtha' sogs kyi yon tan dang /
33b1(sgra skor): Sha Tu la Sha Ta 'os taTar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tAng la/ toSh+Ta/ troSh+Ta sau/ sogs dang / tang la/ t+yeSh+Ta/ tweSh+Ta saM/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling ga a tAng la/ tr-i Sh+ThaH/ ti b+h+ras+thA/ tr-i r+d+ha suHsogs dang / tang la/ sa la/ Shar+N+Na dA/
33b2(sgra skor): gi ka 'os/ Sha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ tI k+ShiSh+Ta/ tI kli yA stAM/ tri k+Shi ra naM/ sogs so// l+r-iT la'i nga Sha kar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ a tang la/ tre k+Sha ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ tre k+Sh+ya ti/ sogaso// /
33b3(sgra skor): de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a tre k+Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a tre k+Sha ta/ sogs so/ ny+ra/ ya dza lha mchod pa dang / 'grogs par byed pa dang sbyin pa rnams la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas/ a tang dang / tang gnyis ka

33b6(sgra skor): ma yin pa rnams la/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os Sha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a yAk+ShIta/ nga drang kyis 'phel ba/ a yA Sh+TaM/ a yA k+saHskyes bu dbus ma gsum la
34a1(sgra skor): a yAg+b+hiHa yASh+TAM/ a yASh+Ta/ skye a sAk+Sha/ a yAk+ShA/ ya yAk+ShA/ tang gi skyes bu ShA po gsum la/ a yak+Sha/ a yaT+TA tA/ a yaT+Ta ta/ skyes su baTas ma gsum la/ a yA yA kA/
34a2(sgra skor): a yaD+b+h+yAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ya k+Shi/ a yak+Sha hai/ a yam+b+ha / iT+ra b+h+ya sa s+yo b+hA ye ShAM/ liT la gnyis rnams kyi a b+h+yA sa'i 'o// liT pha rol la gnyis rnams te pa tsa la sogs pa rnams dang / gra ha la sogs pa rnams kyis ab+h+yA
34a3(sgra skor): rgya las ma ma yin phyis ma pa'i tshul rnams kyi rnga sha 'os ma phrul su 'os NaH/ sa'i saM pra sA ra Nar 'gyur te/ ya dza ba tsa sogs kyi nang tshan yin pas/ liTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang ba'i gcig tshig la/ i yA dzA/ ba tsi swa pi ya dzA dI nI ki ti/ ba tsi swa pi ya dza la
34a4(sgra skor): sogs pa rnams kyi kIt+ta la'o// pU tsa 'chad pa/ nyi Sh+wa pa nyal ba gnyis dang ya dza la sogs pa rnams kyi ka 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la a b+h+yA sa yod na gnyis ka dang a b+h+yA sa med kyang ya Na'i yi ge rnams saM pra sA ra Nar 'gyur te/ liTa'i
34a5(sgra skor): a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ I dza tuHI dzuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ i ya dzi tha/ i yaSh+Ta/ I dza thuH/ i dze/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ i yA dza/ i ya dza/ I dzi ba/ I dzi mA/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes
34a6(sgra skor): bu dang po gsum la/ I dze/ I dzA te/ I dzi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum le/ I dzi She/ I dzI the/ I dzi d+h+we/ I dzi pal phral thu ma la Ta/ D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ I dze/ I dzi ba ny+tsa/ N+Da la/ pra
34b1(sgra skor): b+hAs+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu sogs kyi a tang la/ yaSh+Ta/ yaSh+TA si/ sogs dang / tang la/ yaSh+Ta/ yaSh+Ta se/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ ba tsi swa pi ya dza la sogs pa rnams kyi kita la 'os saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur bas/ i
34b2(sgra skor): dz+yAta/ i dz+nyAstAM/ i dz+ha suH/ sogs dang / tang la/ prash+tsa b+h+ras+dza sogs kyise dzA Sha/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os/ Sha ke/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis yak+Shi Sh+Ta/ yak+Shi yAstAM/ yak+Shi ran/ sog so// l+r-iT la'ang dza Shar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pa/
34b3(sgra skor): ta la/ ya kU ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ yak+Sh+ma te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a yak+Sha ta/ sogs dang / tang le/ a yak+ShA ta/ sogs so/ !/ Tu ba pa sa bon 'debs pa la'o zhes pa la yang a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/
34b4(sgra skor): laTa'i a tang la/ ba pe ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ ba pa te/ sogs so// ling gi a tang la/ ba pe ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ ba pe ta/ sogs so// loTa'i a tang la/ ba pa tu/ sogs dang / tang la/ ba pa tAM/ sogs so// lang gi a tang la/
34b5(sgra skor): a ba pata/ sogs dang / tang la/ a ba pa ta/ sogs so// lung la dz+wal dang po can rnams la/ dz+ha la las dz+hal la 'os sitsa dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ a tang ge skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a bap+sIta/ a bab+h+yAM/ a bap+luH/ skyes bu dbus ma
34b6(sgra skor): gsum la/ a bap+siH/ a bap+taM/ a bap+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a bap+l-i/ a bar+d+ha/ a bap+tA/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a bap+ta/ a bap+sa thAM/ a bapra ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a bap+tAHa
35a1(sgra skor): bap+sA thAM/ a bab+h+yAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a pap+si/ a bap+sa hi/ a bap+sa ti/ liT la ki Sha ma yin pa rnams la/ liT la gnyis rnams kyi a b+h+yA sa'i 'os/ a b+h+yA sa saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur ba dang / kita rnams la ba tsi/ sa
35a2(sgra skor): pi/ ya dza sogs kyi mangs dz+has la sa d+ha pa 'am phyis lama' rgya ma[।]sa pa/ gnyis ka saM pra swai ra Na ra bsgyur nas/ aka 'dra ba la ring po sogs byas pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ u bA pa/ U pa tuHU puH/ skyes bu dbus ma
35a3(sgra skor): gsum la/ u pa pi tha/ u bap+tA/ U pa thuHU pa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ u bA pa/ uM ba pa/ U pi ba/ U bi ma/ de bzhin du/ tang rnams la/ U pe/ U bA te/ U pi re/ sogs so// luTa'i a tang la/ bap+ta/ bap+ta si/ sogs dang / tang
35a4(sgra skor): la/ bap+tA/ bap+tA se/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ pa tsa swa pi ya dza sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na byas pas/ u pyAta/ u byAstAM/ u prA suHsogs dang / tang la/ bap+siSh+Ta/ bap+si yA staM/ bap+sI ran/ sogs so// l+r-iT la'ang ba
35a5(sgra skor): 'dren pa ma gtogs bya ba gzhan med de/ a tang la/ bap+sA ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ bap+sa te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a bap+sA ta/ soT dang / ta.a/ i bepyA ta/ sogs so/ !/ ba ha thob par byed pa la'o zhes

41a2(sgra skor): na bar bya ste/ ang gi phyogs la/ shwa ya te raH/ shwa ya ti'i a'o// ts+li bsgyur ba'i ang pha rol la shwa ya ti'i i yig ni a yig tu 'gyur te/ i a ataM kyi yon tan ya 'os/ gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugasu song //
41a3(sgra skor): a shwata/ a shwa tAM/ a shwan/ sogs so// tsI si tsar bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ wal dang be'i iT byin pas/ a shwa yI tA/ a shwa yiSh+TAM/ a shA yi ShuH/ sogs dang / yang na d+heT shI dag gi 'dam ka 'os/ ts+li tsang du bsgyur tsang
41a4(sgra skor): la 'os/ byings gnyis brjod/ dang po'i hA la lhag po dang / atsa la/ sh+nu byings sogs kyis ub tu bsgyur bas/ a shi shI yata/ a shi shwi ya taM/ a shi shri yan/ sogs so// bi b+ha ShA shweH/ shI li gangam nga'o// liT pa
41a5(sgra skor): rol shwi'i saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du bya ste/ bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsu ma la/ shu shA ba/ shu shu ba tuH/ shu shu bud+d+ha/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ shu shu bi tha/ shu shu ba thAH
41a6(sgra skor): shu shu ba/ sres bu phyi ma gsum la/ shu shA ba~M/ shu sha ba/ shu shu bo ba/ shu shri bi ma/ mo bsgyur po'i phyogs kyi skyes bu ma ya ma thar / ma da kyi nyi ma mamayin man to dang las kyi rnamam sa/ ma hUMb
41b1(sgra skor): dang po gsum la/ shrI shwA yA/ shi shri ya tuH/ shi shri yuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ shi shwa yi tha/ shi shwi ya thu/ shi shwi ya/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ shI shwA ya/ shI shwa ya/ shi shri yi ba/ shi shri yi ma/
41b2(sgra skor): l+r-iT la wA la dang po'i iT byin pas/ sh+yA yi tA/ shA yi tA si/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ wa tsi swa pi sogs kyis saM pra sA ra NA byas/ kr-iti ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ shU yAtA/ sh+yA yAstAM/ shU yA
41b3(sgra skor): suH/ sogs so// l+r-iT la wau la dang po'i iT byin pas/ shwa yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du l+r-ing la/ a shwa yau Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// i ti pA Ni ni b+ha ka ra Na s+ya sU rbAr+N+Na dA yasa? mAd+b+h+yAMH/ zhes pa pA NaM ni b+h+r-i ka ra
41b4(sgra skor): mdo las b+ha la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so// 6// de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni b+ha kA ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin+da bris su bkad pa lags bshAng nor bu 'dren pa'i
41b5(sgra skor): shing rta zhes bya ba las/ byed pa po la sha pa 'jug pa'i yul b+hU la sogs pa rnams las/ byings gzhan don gyi tshig can par smai ba nga 'jug pa rnams la rnam dbye ba rasmai pa da rnams sbyor tshul dang / byings bdag don gyi
41b6(sgra skor): tshig can At+ma ne pa nga 'jug pa rnams la rnam dbye At+ma ne[:]pa da rnams sbyor tshul/ byings gnyis ka'i tshig can rnams li rnam dbye pa rasmai pa da rnams dang At+ma nau pa nga gnyis ka sbyor tshul sogs spyir btang
42a1(sgra skor): dmigs bas la dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re shig rdzogs so/ !// da ni a nga la sogs pa byed pa po'i don gyi shab 'jig pa'i bya ba rnams bstan par bya ste/ a di pra b+h+r-i ti b+h+yaHsha pa// a nga la sogs
42a2(sgra skor): pa rnams las shapa kyi'o// byings ad za ba la'o zhes pa la ngo bo'i rkyen i sbyar ba'i a di la sogs pa rnams la byed pa po'i don gyi shapa 'jig ste// ang la laT sogs a tang rnams sbyar/ byed pa po la shapa 'os sha
42a3(sgra skor): sbyin/ mdo 'dis shapa phyis pas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ at+ti/ aut+taH/ a dan+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ad+bi/ at+maH/ at+ma/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ang+gi/ a dAH/ ad+baH/ ling gi skyes bu dang
42a4(sgra skor): po gsum la/ a d+ya ta/ a d+ya tAM/ a d+yu// skyes bu dbus ma gsum [।।ऽऽऽऽ\u0f7f]/ la/ a d+haH/ a d+ha tAM/ a d+hA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a d+yaM/ au d+yA ba/ a d+yA ma/ loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ aut+ta/ ad+b+ha ta/
42a5(sgra skor): ad+d+haM/ a dan+ta/ skyes bu dbus sum la chog sa ma'i min pa'i 'os gnyis dag gis cig pha rol gyig N+ya / ma'i gcig tshig la/ hu dz+haSh+To ha d+hiH/ hu dz+ha la rnams las hi'i d+hi'o// hu sbyin pa dang byings mtha' dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams las
42a6(sgra skor): pha rol gyi hi ni d+hi du 'gyur te/ ad+b+hi/ ang la/ nga nab/ a ri sogs kyis shas byas/ la ma ma mas gyi nye ba 'gro ba 'ang ma yin no/ pa kyi tsu rgyur med 'as rti pra la/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshi ga la/ at+taM/ at+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A dA ni/ #
42b1(sgra skor): na @[ऽ।]23/ a dA Sh+Ta/ a dA ma/ a daHsarbe ShA/ ang las thams cad kyi'o// ang las byings thams cad tAl gcig pa/ a pra k+ta'i ming can de la a TA A gu mA AT sbyin/ skyer ba AT da drangs/ sngon gyi
42b2(sgra skor): drang srong thams cad 'dod de/ mas dmas sa / yang dang 'chas chags kyis ma phyag/ phyi ma la AT ste bita 'ang ga ngas/ lang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ Ad tu/ skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ ad+d+ha/ a ngan/ de
42b3(sgra skor): bzhin du skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a daH/ at+taM/ At+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a daM/ A dA/ At+ma/ lungs not+ta sl-i/ lungs na ngag la g+ha sl-i'o// lung dang san dgra pha rol la Ang ni g+ha sl-i zhes par bsgyur
42b4(sgra skor): bar bya ste/ l-i ni l-i 'gro ba'i don no// a g+ha sata/ a g+hA sa tAM/ A g+ha san/ sogs so// li D+ha n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ liT la yang na'o// ang ni liT pha rol la g+ha sl-ir yang na 'gyur te/ angad g+ha sl-ir bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/
42b5(sgra skor): byings gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu [ऽ] chags pa 'thob nam mas kyi ang du byur ra/ 'os/ g+ha dz+ha a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ dz+nyA dza/ kita rnams la/ gam/ ha na/ dza na/ khan g+has rnams sogs kyis u pa d+hA phyis/ khar
42b6(sgra skor): tser 'os g+ha ka shA si ba si[:]g+ha si rnams kyi'ang ngos/ sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza b+h+yA sa/ dzak+Sha tuHdzak+ShaH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza g+ha si tha/ dzek+Sha thuHdzak+kha/
43a1(sgra skor): skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza g+ha sa dzak+Shi ba/ dzak+Shi ma/ g+ha sl-ir ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A da/ A da tuH/ A duHskyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A di tha/ A da thuH/ A da/ skyes bu phyi ma
43a2(sgra skor): sum la/ A nga/ A ngi bau/ A di ma/ luT la khar la tsar 'os/ dra tu byas pas/ at+ta/ at+ta rau/ at+ta raH/ at+ta si/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ a d+hata/ a drAstAM/ a drA suH/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ khar la tsa

43a4(sgra skor): 'jug la/ a di la sogs po rnams las shapau kyi 'os shapa 'jig ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ prA ti/ prA taH/ prAn+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ prA si/ prA thaH/ prA tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum lA/ prA mi/

43a6(sgra skor): dang po gsum la/ b+hU tu/ b+hU tAta/ prA tAM/ prAn+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ prA hi/ prA tAta/ prA taM/ b+hU ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ prA na~M/ prA baM/ b+h+ra ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang bi'i gtsog tshig dang gnyis
43b1(sgra skor): tshig la/ a prAta/ a prA tAM/ lang shA ka Ta ya na s+yai ba/ lang gi shAka Ta ya na'i nges pa'o// Ata mtha' las lang bsgyur ba'i d+hi ni dzus su 'gyur te/ sngon gyi drang srong shAka TA ya na'i 'dod pa ya na nges par 'gyur bar
43b2(sgra skor): bshad de/ prA le/ lang la d+hI ru bsgyur/ shA ka TA ya na'i 'dod pa ltar dzus su bsgyur ba dang / an+ta ru bsgyur ba ya na par byas pas/ ap+suH/ ap+sa na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a prAH/ ap+sa taM/ ap+sa ta/ skyes

44a2(sgra skor): rnams la gra hi sogs kyis saM pre sA ra Na dang / bash+tse b+hAs+dza sogs kyis sha Shar bsgyur bas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ baSh+Ti/ uSh+TaH/ u shran+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bak+Shi sogs kyis nal/

44a4(sgra skor): sogs kyis saM pra sA ra NA byas pas/ brgya la tsags kyis pam cha la chags kyis sems par gyur/ u sh+tsa ta/ u shwa tAM/ u sh+yAH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ u sh+tsaH/ u sh+yA taM/ u sh+yA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ u sh+yaM/

45a1(sgra skor): dang po'i iT byin pas/ ba shi Sh+ya ti/ ba shi Sh+ya ta/ ba shi Sh+yan+ti/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ba shi Sh+yata/ a ba shri Sh+ya tAM/ a ba shi Sh+yan/ sogs so/ !/ ta na 'tshe ba dang 'gro ba dag la'o zhes pa la'ang

45a3(sgra skor): pa rnams kyi rjes su sna ldan dz+ha la ka nga 'gro ba la dbyi'o// a nu dAt+ta nye bo'i yul te/ ya mu nye bar 'gog pa/ ra mu rtse ba/ na ma rab tu 'dud pa/ gam+l-i 'gro ba/ ha na 'tshe ba/ ma nu shes pa rnams dang / ba no ti ste/ ba nu
45a4(sgra skor): 'tshe ba dang / ta no taM la sogs pa ste/ ta nu rgyas pa/ kla nu 'tshe ba/ r-i nu 'gro ba/ g+h+r-i Nu 'bar ba/ ba nu slong ba/ ma nu rtogs pa rnams kyi rjes su sna ldan gyi yi ge rnams rkyenA dz+wA la sau sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can ka dang

45b4(sgra skor): bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ tan+neHhIn+thi'i dza'o// si'i hi he pa 'gro ba'ang ma yin no zhes pas loT la si ti ru bsgyur ba'i hrI pha rol la han+ti ni dza zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ dza hi/ ha twA taM/ a sid+d+ha ba da trI shra yai/

45b6(sgra skor): ha ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ phyi ma la AT ste pita'ang ngos AT sbyin pas/ ha nA ni/ ha nA ba/ ha nA ma/ lang la/ hal gcig pa rnams/ ha la dIpa sogs kyis dbyi ba dang / kita dz+ha la dang po can rnams la/ a nu dAt+ta
46a1(sgra skor): sogs kyis na dbyi/ a tsa dang po can rnams la gam han sogs kyis u pa d+ha dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a han/ a ha tAM/ ag+nan/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a han/

46a3(sgra skor): ata kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ a ba d+hi tA/ ab d+hISh+TAM/ a ba d+hi Shu/ sogs so// liT la byings gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os hA dz+nya/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsir 'ang ngos/ dz+nyA dza/ NA la gnyis la/ !n+te'i hiny+dzi ni rnams la 'os haH/
46a4(sgra skor): u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos 'phel ba/ ki ta rnams rjes su a byis pa yin la/ dang po nas hal mtha' ma yin pas/ bang sogs kyis 'phel ba 'dir mi byed/ la gam han sogs kyis u pa d+hA phyis/ han+ti'i hi sogs kyis ha g+har bsgyur ba sogs byis pas/ dza g+hA na/ dza
46a5(sgra skor): g+hA tu dzag+d+haHskyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ a b+h+yA s+yA ts+tsha/ a b+h+yA sa las kyang ngo // a b+h+yA sa las kyang pha rol gyi han gyi ha ni g+hA ru bsgyur te/ dza g+hA ni tha/ dza g+hAn+tha/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ dza g+hA thuH/ dza g+hA/ skyes
46a6(sgra skor): bri phyi ma gsum la/ dza g+hA na/ dza g+ha na/ dza g+h+ri ba/ dza g+ni ma/ luT laM/ han+ta/ han+ta rau/ han+ta raH/ han+ta si/ sogs so// ha no ba d+ha li ngi/ ling la han gyi ba d+ha'o// smon pa'i ling pha rol la han ni ba zhes par bsgyur bar bya s+t+waM/
46b1(sgra skor): hanA la/ smon ling / mdo 'dris pa d+har bsgyur/ ata kyi dbyi 'os u phyis pas/ ba d+hAta/ ba d+h+yA staM/ bad+d+ha suH/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ r-ita han dag gi sa la 'os/ iT byin pas/ hA ni Sh+ya ti/ hA ni Sh+ya ta/ ha ni Sh+yAn+ti/ sogs dang / de
46b2(sgra skor): bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ha nI Sh+ya ta/ a hai ni Sh+yaM tAM/ a ha ni Sh+yan/ sogs so/ !/ d+ya mngon par 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la a tang 'jug cing a'i sogs kyis shapa kyang 'jig go// u to prad+hir+Ya kiha li/ 'jig pa la hal la uta
46b3(sgra skor): kyis 'phel ba'o// shab 'jig pa lta bu bar rkyen 'jig pa la rkyen ha la dang po pa 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la uta kyi 'phel bar 'gyur te/ d+yu la laT sbyar bas/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ d+yo ti/ gnyis tshig drung
46b4(sgra skor): mang tshig la/ d+yu taH/ d+yA ban+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ d+yau Shau/ d+yA thaH/ d+yA tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ d+yau mi/ d+yA baH/ d+h+ya maH/ ling la bya ba lhag po med de/ d+yu yAta/ d+yu yA tAM/ d+yu yuH/ sogs so// loT la/ ti ba ha la dang po
46b5(sgra skor): can rnams la 'phel ba dang / atsa dang po can rnams la/ a tsa laM shwA byings sogs kyis u bar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ d+yau tu/ d+yau tAta/ d+yA tAM/ d+yu tAM/ d+yu ban+d+ha/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
46b6(sgra skor): d+yAd+ya hi/ d+ya tAta/ d+yA taM/ d+ya ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ d+hu b+hU nI/ byA b+hU byA/ d+yu b+hi mau/ de bzhin du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a d+yauta/ a d+yA tAM/ a d+yA ban/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a d+yauH/ o d+yu taM/ a d+yu ta/ skyes bu phyi
47a1(sgra skor): ma gsu ma lA/ a d+yu thAM/ a d+yu ba/ a d+yu ma/ lung la/ si tsa la 'phel ba pA ra smai pa da rnams la 'os/ 'phel ba byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ u d+yau ShIta/ a d+yauSh+TaM/ a d+yau Sh+waH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
47a2(sgra skor): a d+yauSh+TiHa d+yoSh+TaM/ a d+yauSh+Ta/ skyes du chen phyi ma gsum l-i/ a d+h+ye ShaM/ a dz+yo ShA/ a d+yoSh+ma/ liT lI/ Na li gnyis dang thal ma yin pa rnams lo/ swan+de brtsegs pa dang po sogs kyi lung 'dren gyis kita yang na bar byas pas/ kiH
47a3(sgra skor): kyi phyogs la/ atsa shU byings kyi ub dang / kIta ma yin pa'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ du drA ga/ du d+ha ba tuH/ du d+ya ba tuH/ du d+h+ya buH/ du d+ya buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ du d+yo thaM/ du d+yA bi tha/ du
47a4(sgra skor): d+yu bau thuH/ du d+ya ba thuH/ du d+yA ba/ du d+ya ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dwau drA ba/ du d+ya ba/ du d+yA bi ba/ du d+ya bi ba/ du d+yA bi ma/ du d+yA bi ma/ luT la byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ d+yo tAM/ d+yo tA rau/ d+yo tA raH/
47a5(sgra skor): tra sau/ sogs so// smyon pa'i ling la kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring po byas pas/ d+yA yAt+ta/ d+yA yA stAM/ d+yA yA suHsogs so// l+r-iT la byings thams cad pa dang / byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan dang / kun nas bsgyur ba sogs
47a6(sgra skor): kyis sa Sha byas pas/ d+yo Sh+ya ti/ d+yo Sh+ya ta/ d+yo Sh+yan+ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a d+yo Sh+ya ta/ a d+yo Sh+ya tAM/ a d+yo Sh+ya na/ sogs so/ !/ yu sres pa la'o zhes pa'ang a tang rnams 'jug cing cho ga thams cad bshad ma
47b1(sgra skor): thag pa dang 'dra ste/ lan+tha'i skyes bu dang b+ho gsum la/ yau ti/ yu taH/ yU ban+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ yo She/ yu thaH/ yu tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ yau mi/ yA paH/ yu maHling la/ yA yAta/
47b2(sgra skor): yu yA tAM/ yu yuH/ sogs so// loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ yau tu/ yu tA tAM/ yu tAM/ yu ban+d+ha/ skyes bu dbus mya gsum la/ yu hau/ yu tAtAM/ yu tAM/ yu te/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ya bA ni/ ya bA ba/
47b3(sgra skor): ya bA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum lo/ a yauta/ a yu tAM/ a yu ban/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a yauH/ a yu taM/ a yu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ya baM/ a yu ba/ a yu ma/ lung
47b4(sgra skor): la bal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ a yA bIta/ a yA biSh+TaM/ a yA bi ShuH/ sogs so// liTa'i skyes bA dang po gsum la/ yu yA ba/ yu yu ba tuHyu yu baH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ yu ya bi tha/
47b5(sgra skor): yU yu ba thuH/ yu yu bA/ skyes bu phyi ma mal 'a[ऽ]gsum la/ yu yA ba/ yu ya ba/ yu yuM ba bi/ yu yu bi ma/ lAT la bal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ yo bi tA/ ya bi tA rau/ ya bi tA raH/ ya bi tA si/
47b6(sgra skor): sogs so// smon pa'i ling lo kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring po byas pas/ yU yAta/ yU ya staM/ yu yA suH/ sogs so// l+r-iT la ita byin pas/ ya bi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du ling la/ a ya bi Sh+ya ta/
48a1(sgra skor): sogs so/ !/ Nu bstod pa la'o zhes pa la a tang rnams sbyor/ cho ga yu dang 'dra ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsu ma la/ nau ti/ nu taH/ nu ban+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ nau Shi/ nu thaH/ nu thaH/
48a2(sgra skor): skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ nau mi/ nu baH/ nu maH/ ling la/ nu yAta/ nu yA tAM/ nu yuH/ sogs so// loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ no tu/ nu tAta/ nu tAM/ nu ban+d+ha/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ nu hi/ nu tAta/ nu taM/ nu
48a3(sgra skor): ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ na bA ni/ na bA ba/ nA bA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a nauta/ a nu tAM/ a nu ban/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a nauH/ a nu taM/ a nu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
48a4(sgra skor): a nu baM/ a nu ba/ a nu ma/ lung la wa la dang po'i iT dang / si tsa 'phel ba pa rasmai pa dA rnams la 'os 'phel bya byas pas/ a nA bi tA/ a nA biSh+TaM/ a nA bI ShaH/ sogs sam/ yang na/ 'grel par nu

48a6(sgra skor): ba tuH/ nu nu buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ nu na bi tha/ nu nu ba thuH/ nu nu ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ nu nA ba/ nu na ba/ nu nu bi baM/ nu nu bi ma/ luT la/ na bi tA/ sogs sam/ no ta/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la
48b1(sgra skor): ring po byas pas/ nA yAta/ nU yAstAM/ tsU yA suH/ sogs so// l+r-iT la iT yang na bar byas pas/ na bi Sh+ya tI/ sogs sam/ no Sh+yA ti/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing lA/ a na bi Sh+yata/ sogs sam/ a no Sh+yata/ sogs
48b2(sgra skor): so/ !/ k+Shu rno ba la'o zhes pa'ang yu dang 'dra ste/ a tang rnams sbyar byas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ k+Shau ti/ k+Sh+ya taH/ k+Shu ban+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ k+Sho Shi/ k+ShA thaH/ k+ta tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ k+Sho mi/

48b4(sgra skor): gsum laM/ k+Sha bA ni/ k+ShA bA ba/ k+Sha bI ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a k+Shauta/ a k+Shu tAM/ a r+dz+dza bane/ skyes bu dbus maM gsum la/ a k+ShauH/ a k+ShA taM/ a k+ShA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gau sum lo/ a k+Sho ba
48b5(sgra skor): a k+ShA ba/ au k+Sha ma/ l+r-ing la bal dang po'i iT sbyar/ 'phel ba byas pas/ a k+Shai bA ti/ ai k+ShA biSh+TaM/ a k+Sha bi ShuH/ sogs so// liT la gnyis brjod/ dang po'i ha la lhag po 'os/ Sha dang Na phyis/
48b6(sgra skor): ha nge gaM gi tsu Ne la gnyis dang thal bor te/ gzhan rnams kita yang na bar byas pas/ smye sa buM dang po gsum la/ tsu k+Sha pa/ tsu k+Sha ba tuH/ tsuk+ShA ba tuH/ tsuk+Sha puH/ tsu Nu buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum
49a1(sgra skor): la/ tsuN+Da bi tha/ tsu k+ShA ba thuH/ tsu r+dz+dza ba thuH/ tsu k+ShA ba/ tsuk+ShA ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsu k+ShA ba/ tsuk+Sha ba/ tsu k+Sha bi ba/ tsu k+Shu bi ba/ tsuk+Sha bi ma/ tsuk+Shu bi ma/ luT la iT byin pas/ k+ShA bi tA/

49a3(sgra skor): sbyar bas/ k+ShA bi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ ak+ShA bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ !/ Sh+Nu rab tu 'dzag pa la'o zhes pa'ang pa rasmai pa da can yin pas a tang rnams 'jug cing sha pa 'jig/

49b6(sgra skor): shapa 'jig/ byings kyi Na rjes 'brel pa ti la yon tan sogs byas pas/ l-iTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ e ti/ i taH/ i No yaN/ iN gyi yaMNa'o// rkyen pa ti ma yin pa
50a1(sgra skor): a tsA dang po can+da pha rol la iN nI yaN+Da so sor bsdu ba'i yi ger 'gyur te/ skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/ yan+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ eShi/ i thaH/ i tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum

50a6(sgra skor): si tsa 'jig pas/ a gAta/ a gA tAM/ a guH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a gAH/ a gA tAM/ a gA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a gA/ a gA ba/ a gI ma/ liTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig
50b1(sgra skor): tshig la/ iN lA liT a b+h+yA sa med pa sogs kyis byings gnyis brjod/ la ti pa/ ti pa NA la/ atsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba e tsa'i a ya ab sogs kyis ai A y+ra/ a b+h+yA sa'i 'dra ba ma yin pa la
50b2(sgra skor): 'os i gong ma i yang nga dang a 'gro ba rim pa bzhin drangs pas i yA ya/ dir+g+ga iNaH/ ki tI/ ka 'gro ba la iN gyi ring po'o// liT ka 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la iN gyi a b+h+yA sa ring por 'gyur te/ skyes bu dang

51a3(sgra skor): gzugs 'ang ngo // ika ces pa 'di'ang iN+Da dang 'dra bar brjod par bya ste/ i ti sogs sgrub tshul gyi bya ba thams cad 'dri la/ iNe skabs kyi mdo rnams kyang thams cad 'jug cing bsgrubs zin gyi gzugs thams
51a4(sgra skor): cad kyang iN dang 'dra bas/ laT sogs sde tshan bcu po thams cad la rigs 'gre bas/ sgrub tshul bsgrubs zin gyi gzugs sogs dper brjod logs su ma bkod do/ !/ mA mchog pa la'o zhes pa la'ang

52b6(sgra skor): shig 'jig/ mdo 'das ti pa sogs Na la sogs su bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ be de/ bi da tuH/ bi duH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bet+sa/ bi da thuH/ bi da/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ be dA/
53a1(sgra skor): bi dA/ pad+mi/ Na la la sogs par ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu drang po gsum la/ bat+ti/ bat+tiH/ bi dan+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bet+si/ bit+saH/ bit+sa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bet+si/ bid
53a2(sgra skor): bit+saH/ ling la byA ba lhag po med pas/ bi d+yAta/ bi d+hA tAM/ bi d+h+yaH/ sogs so// khaM dr-I kur+than+ti t+ya n+ya ta rA s+yAM/ bi dAM kurban+tu zhes pa yang na'o// bita lA loT pha rol la yang ni Am sbyor zhing loT yang 'jig pa dang kr-inya l+r-iTa'i
53a3(sgra skor): rkyen can rjes su sbyor ba sogs tshig phrad du byas pas/ bi dAM ka ro tu/ sogs te/ bi dA sngon mas Dukr-inya byed pa la/ loT rjes 'brel phyis la ti i u 'os/ i u ru bsgyur bas/ bi dAM kr-i tu pa ces pa la/ ta nA di b+hU
53a4(sgra skor): uH/ tan la sogs pa rnams las u'o// ta nu rgyas pa la sogs pa rnams las byings thams cad pa rnams pha rol la byed pa po'i don gyi shab kyi yul la u 'gyur te/ u sbyar byings thams cad pa dang byings phyeng
53a5(sgra skor): pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ bI d+he k+Sha ro tu grub pa'o// a ta ut+ma r+d+ha d+hA tu ke/ auta kyi uta byings thams cad pa la'o// kr-inya u'i mtha' can gyi ata ni byings thams cad pa ko nga 'gro ba'i ming can+da pha rol la uta du
53a6(sgra skor): 'gyur te/ loTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ bi dAM ku ru tAM/ bi dAM kurban+tu/ de bzhin du skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bi dAM ku ru/ rkyen u mas kyang brtsegs pa ma yin pa sogs kyis nyi phyis/ bi dAM ku ru tAta/ bi dAM ku ru
53b1(sgra skor): tAM/ bI dAM ku r+yA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bi dAM ka ra bA Ni/ bi dAM ka ra b+hU b+da/ bI dAM ka ra bA ma/ A ma ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la pa ti rnams la/ puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byed sha pa 'jig pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum
53b2(sgra skor): le/ bet+ta/ biMt+tAta/ bit+taM/ bi dan+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bid+d+hi/ bit+taM ta/ bit+taM/ bit+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ be dA ni/ be dA ba/ be dA ma/ bid la lang sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis
53b3(sgra skor): tshig la/ a bed/ aM be ta/ a bit+taM/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ tsir+d+ham ma hi d+hi Shas ha rti bsgyur/ bet+teR+YA dau dz+nyer+dz+dzasa?/ be ti las lang gi dz+hi'i dzus yang na'o// ba tI las pha rol gyi lang bsgyur ba'i dzi ni dzus su yang na 'gyur

54a3(sgra skor): as yod pa la'o zhes pa la'ang pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyor te/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ asti/ shwA so ral+li pauH/ shA as dag gi ata dbyi'o// rkyen shA dang as kyi A yig byings thams

54b1(sgra skor): skyes bu dang po gsum la/ astu/ stAta/ staM/ san+tu/ g+hA so ret+nA byA b+h+yA sa lo ba sh+tsa/ g+hu as dgu gi hI la e ste a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba 'ang ngo // byings g+ha'i ming can rnams dang As kyi loT bsgyur ba'i hrI pha rol la

58b6(sgra skor): swa pi ba/ a swa pi mo/ lung la dz+ha la dang po rnams la/ dz+ha la las dz+ha la la 'os/ si tsa dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a swap+sa ti/ ! grangs gas kyi [।]!/ a swop+taM/ a sAp+suH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum
59a1(sgra skor): la/ a sAp+siHa sAp+taM/ a sAp+tA/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a sAp+l-i/ a sAp+sa/ a sAp+tA/ sA pi la liT sbyar byings gnyis brjod nas/ Na la gnyis dang thal la gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyis a b+h+yA sa saM pra
59a2(sgra skor): sA ra Na dang / ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams la/ ba tsi swa pi sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ su ShA pa/ s+yA Sh+wa pa taH/ su ShA puHskyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ su Sha pi tha/ su ShA p+tA/ suM ShA pa thu
59a3(sgra skor): su Sh+ya ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ su ShA pa/ su ShA pa/ su Shu pI ba/ su Shu pi ma/ su bi ni rdur b+h+yoHswa pi sU ti sa mAHsu pi ni dur rnams las swa pau s+yA ti sa ma rnams kyi'o// nyer bsgyur su bi ni dur rnams las/ swa pi nyal bA sU ti staM/
59a4(sgra skor): srog tshogs rab tu skye bo/ sa ma mnyam pa rnams kyi sa yig ni Sha yig tu 'gyur te/ su Shu Sh+To pa/ bi Shu ShA paM/ ni Sh+wa ShA pa/ dur+Ya ShA pa/ sogs so// luT la/ swap+tA/ swap+ta rau/ swap+ta raHswap+tA si/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/
59a5(sgra skor): ba tsi swa pi sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na byas pas/ su byA ta/ su pyA stAM/ su b+hA suHsog so// lags pa !larnam pa!lades pa ngan par nyel/ l+r-iT la swa pyA ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a swa pyA ta/ sogs so/ 6shwa sa srog la'o zhes
59a6(sgra skor): pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/ byings thams cad pa bal dang po rnams la/ rung la sogs pa rnams sogs kyis iT byin/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ shwa si ti/ shwa si taHshwa san+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
59b1(sgra skor): shA si Shi/ shra si thaH/ shwa si tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ shA si mi/ shA si bAH/ shwA si maHling la/ shA s+yA tA/ shwa s+thA tAM/ shra s+yAH/ sogs so// loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sha si tu/ shwa si tA ta/ shA si tA/ shA saH/
59b2(sgra skor): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ shra si hi/ shwA si tA ta/ shwa si tAM/ shwa si ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ shwa sA ni/ shwa sA baM/ shwa sAM ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a shra sI ta/ a shA sa ta/ a shwa si tA/ a shwa
59b3(sgra skor): saun/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a shwa sI/ ai shwa sata/ a shwa si taM/ au shwa si ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a shwa saM/ a shwa si ba/ a shwa si ma/ lung la/ ha mra ya mtha' sogs kyis 'phel ba mi byed/ bal
59b4(sgra skor): dang po'i iT byin pas/ a shwa sI ta/ a shwa siSh+TAM/ a shwa si ShuH/ sogs so// liT sbyor ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sha shA sa/ sha shA sa tuH/ sha shwa suHskyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sha shwa si tha/ sha shwa sa
59b5(sgra skor): thuHsha shwa sa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sha shA sa/ sha shwA sa/ sha shA si ba/ shra shA si ma/ luT lo iT sbyar bas/ shwa s+yai tA/ shwe si tA si/ sogs s+ho// smon pa'i ling la/ shAM s+yAta/ shru s+yA stAM/ shA srA suHsog so// l+r-iT la/
59b6(sgra skor): shwa si Sh+ya ti/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a shwa si Sh+ya he/ sogs so// !a na srog la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug la/ cho ga snga ma dang 'dra ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a ni ti/ a naM taHa nan+ti/ skyes bu
60a1(sgra skor): dbus ma gsum la/ a ni Shi/ a ni thaHa ni thA/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ni mI/ a ni baHa ni maHling la/ a n+yA ta/ a n+ya tAM/ A n+yAHsogs so// loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ u ni tu/ a ni
60a2(sgra skor): tAta/ a ni tAM/ a nan+ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a ni hi/ a ni two tA/ oM ni haM/ a ni ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a nA nI/ a nA ba/ a nA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A nI ta/ A nata/ A ni tAM/ a nan/
60a3(sgra skor): skyes bu dbus ma gsu ma lo/ A nIHA na/ A ni taM/ A na ti/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A naM/ A nai ba/ A ni ma/ lung la iT byin pas/ A nIta/ A niSh+Tau/ A ni ShuH/ sogs so// liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A na
60a4(sgra skor): A na tuHA nuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A ni tha/ A na thuHA na/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A na/ A nI ba/ a ni ma/ luT la/ A ni tA/ a ni tA saM/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ au n+yA ta/ a n+yastaM/ a n+ya suH
60a5(sgra skor): sogs so// l+r-iT la/ a ni Sh+ya ti/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a ni Sh+yAta/ sogs so// a nau tarbA/ a ni ti'i yang na'o// nyeR+Sha bsgyur na Nar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can las pha rol gyi a nI ti'i na yigA Na yig tu yang na 'gyu te/

60b1(sgra skor): tI/ dzak+Shi taHa da b+h+yastAt+ta/ a b+h+yAsta las ata'o// byings la a b+h+yasta'i ming can dzak+Sha za ba/ dzA gr-i gnyid swadA pa/ dA ri drA ngan 'gro tsakA sr-i 'bar ba/ shA su rjes su ston pa/ dI d+hing 'bar ba/ be bing rngan pa sogs las pha rol
60b2(sgra skor): dz+nyA ni ata du 'gyu tAM/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i ming tshig la/ dzik+Sha ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzak+Shi Shi/ dzak+Shi thaH/ dzak+Shi tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzak+Shi mi/ dzak+Shi biHdzak+Shi maHling la/ dzak+Sh+ya ta/ dzak+Sh+ya tAM/ dzak+Sh+yaHsog

60b6(sgra skor): gsum la/ dzaM dzak+Shi tha/ dzaM dzak+Sha thuHdza dzak+Sha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza dzAk+Sha/ dza dzak+Sha/ dza dzak+Shi ba/ dza dzak+Shi ma/ luT la iT byin pas/ dzak+Shi tra/ dzik+Shi tA rau/ dzak+Shi tA raHdzak+Shi tA si/ sogaso// smon pa'i ling laM/ dza k+Sh+yata/ dzikyA stA/
61a1(sgra skor): dzak+Sh+ya suH/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ dzak+Shi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a dzak+Shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// n+yadza gr-i gnyid sad pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzA ga rti/ dzA
61a2(sgra skor): gr-i taHdzA gra tI/ sa bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzA giR+ShA/ dzA gr-i thaHdza gr-i tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum+ba la/ dza gArmi/ dzA gr-i baH/ dzA gr-i maH/ ling la/ dzA gr-I yAta/ dzA gr-i yA tAM/ dzA gr-i yuH/ sogs so// loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum

61a6(sgra skor): dzA gr-i gyi bi tsiN Na la nga 'gro ba rnams ma yin pa rnams la'o// dzA gr-i gyi rkyen bi dang tsaN dang Na la dang / gzhan yang nga 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin pa rkyen byings phyed pa'i ming can rnams pha rol la yon tan bya ste/ lung
61b1(sgra skor): la iT dang mdo 'dis yon tan byas pas/ a dz+nyA gA rI ta/ a dzA ga riSh+TAM/ a dzA ga ri Sha sogs// liT la/ u Sha[:]bi da/ dzA gr-i rnams las yang na 'os/ A ma sbyor ba dang mi sbyor ba yang na bar byas pas/ A ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/
61b2(sgra skor): dz+nyA ga rAM ba b+hU ba/ dzA ga rAM tsa kA ra/ dza ga rA mA sa/ sogs dang / A maM ma sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dad+ya po ga sum+b+ha la/ dza dzA gA ra/ dzu dzA gA ra tuHdzu dz+nyA ge ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum+ba lA/ dz+nyi dzA gA ri tha/ dza dzA gau ra thuHdze dzA ga ra/
61b3(sgra skor): skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza dzA gA ra/ dza dzA ga rI ba/ dza dzA ga ri ma/ luT la/ dzA go ri tA/ dzA gau ri tA rau/ dzA ga ri tA raH/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la'ang skabs 'dir/ dzA gr-i gyi bi tsin sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ dzA
61b4(sgra skor): gau R+YA ta/ dzAM gAR+YA stAM/ dzA gaR+YA suH/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ dzI ga ri Sh+ya ti/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a dzI ga ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// !da ri dI ngan 'gro la'o zhes pa la'ang a tAng rnams 'jug ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig

62a1(sgra skor): wa/ d+hI/ a d+h+yas+yA las Ata ShosA dz+nyA ata/ mdo 'dis A phyis pAs+dza/ da ri dra t+ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubapas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum+ba la/ da ri drA si/ dA ri drI thaHda ri drI thA/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/

63b6(sgra skor): ita du 'gyur te/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/ shISh+Ta/ 2 la/ 'dum ma 'dzis/ nyan nas mi sa rgya ba zem tshogs kyis // phyi sas kyi lo3/ mang tshig la/ a byAsta las ata 'os/ dz+ha ata du bsgyur bas/
64a1(sgra skor): shwA sa ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs byas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum+ba la/ shAm+ba/ shoSh+NA/ shroSh+Na/ smyos bu phye ma gsum la/ shwAs+dza/ shaSh+TaHshiSh+maT+Talong la/ shauSh+Tu tAM/ sho Sh+yaHsogs so// loTa'i skyes
64a2(sgra skor): bu dang po gsum la/ shAstu/ shiSh+Ta ta/ shiSh+TaM/ shA saM tu/ loTa'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ shA hau/ hi la shA'o// shAs ni loT bsgyur ba'i haM pha rol la shI zhes par 'gyur te/ shA su la/ loT shapa 'jig/ l+r-i
64a3(sgra skor): si pa/ si hi 'os/ si hi/ mdo 'dis shAs shA ru bsgyur/ 'di la gzhi mnyam pa las ma grub pa zhes pas sngon ma sa'i rgyu mtshan las hi yang hu dz+ha la la hi d+hi 'os hi d+hir bsgyur bas/ shA d+hi/ yang na hi tA tang du bsgyur bas/
64a4(sgra skor): shiSh+Ta ta/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ shiSh+TaM/ shiSh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ shA sa ni/ shA sA ba/ shA sA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ la tipa/ ita kyi 'ang ngos i phyis/ asti ma yin pa'i ti
64a5(sgra skor): la 'os/ sra dra/ ha la dI pa sogs kyis tu phyis/ gnas med pa sogs kyis A shAng / a shAta/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig l-i/ a shiSh+TaM/ a shA suHskyes bu dbus mu'i gcig tshig la/ si pa la byings kyi ru yang na
64a6(sgra skor): 'os sra ru dang / da yang na bar byas pas/ a shAHa shAta/ a shwad/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a shiSh+TaM/ a shiSh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ au shA saM/ a shi ShA/ a shiSh+ma/ lung la/ sarti shAsti arti rnams
64b1(sgra skor): las kyang ngas/ ts+tshi ang du bsgyur shAs kyis it+ma ang ha la dag la'as/ u pa d+hA ata du bsgyur/ shwA sa/ g+ha sa pa so sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/ a shi Shata/ a shai Sha tu/ a shai Shan/ sogs so/ l-iT la/ gnyis
64b2(sgra skor): brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ shra shA sa/ sha shA sa tuHsha shAM suHskyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sha shA si tha/ sha shA sa thuHshA shA sa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sha shA sa/ shA shA si

99b2(sgra skor): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A b+h+r-i thAH/ a b+h+raM ShA thAM/ A b+h+r-i d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a b+h+r-i Shi/ a b+h+r-i ShA hI/ a b+h+r-iSh+ma hi/ liT la/ b+h+r-i hrI b+h+yAM hu rnams kyi shru bzhin 'ang ngos/ a b+h+yA saM ita dang Ama?
99b3(sgra skor): yong na bar byas pas/ Am gyi phyogs la/ bi b+ha rI tsa kA ra/ bi b+ha rA ba b+hU ba/ bi b+ha rA mA sa/ sogs sam/ yang na byings gnyis brjod/ r-i ata 'os a b+h+yA sa'i r-i aita du bsgyur bas/ a tAMng gi skyes bu dang po
99b4(sgra skor): gsum la/ ba b+hU ra/ ba b+h+r-i tuH/ bi b+hUH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pa b+har+tha/ ba b+h+re thuH/ ba b+hU/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bA b+hA ra/ ba b+ha ra/ ba b+h+r-i ba/ bA b+h+r-i ma/ de bzh-i na du/ tang gI skyes bu dang po gsum
99b5(sgra skor): la/ ba b+h+re/ ba b+hU te/ ba b+hI ri/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba b+h+r-i She/ bA b+hA the/ ba b+h+r-i d+h+we skyes bu phyi ma gsum l-I/ ba b+h+yAM/ ba b+h+raM ba h+ye/ ba b+h+r-i ma he/ luT la/ b+h+r-i Sh+Ta sogs kyis lung 'dren gyi iT yang na bar
99b6(sgra skor): byas pas/ a tang la/ b+ha ri tA/ b+ha ri tA si/ sogs sam/ b+har+t+ta/ b+hartA si/ sog so// de bzhin du/ tang la/ b+ha ri tA/ b+ha ri tA se/ sogs sam/ b+har+t+ta/ b+har+N+Na se/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ sha
100a1(sgra skor): ya ka ling rnams la ring 'os/ ring du bsgyur bas/ b+hI yAta/ b+hI yAstAM/ b+hI yA s+ya/ sogs dang / tA lA/ r-i las kyang ngos yon tan mI byed/ b+h+r-i ShISh+Ta/ b+h+r-i ShI yAstAM/ b+h+r-i ShI rAn/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/
100a2(sgra skor): r-ita han dag las s+ya la 'os iT byin yon tan byas pas/ a tang la/ b+ha re Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ b+ha ri Sh+ya te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a b+hai re Sh+ya te/ sogs dang / tang la/ a b+ha ri
100a3(sgra skor): Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// mAng tshad la ste sgra la'ang ngo zhes pa la tang rnams sbyor te/ shapa shru gnyis brjod/ b+h+r-inya rnams kyi ita 'os/ a b+h+yA sa Ita/ g+hu ma yin pa rnams kyis hal la I 'os/ k+Shita ha la dang po
100a4(sgra skor): rnams la mtha' I/ a tsa dang po rnams la/ shwA a b+h+yastA dag gi Ata 'os A dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ laTa'i skyes pu dang po gsum la/ mi mI te/ mI mA te/ mi me te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ mi mA ShaM/
100a5(sgra skor): mi mA the/ mi mI d+he/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ mi mi/ mi mI ba he/ mi mI ma he/ ling la/ mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI yuTa'i sa phyis/ shwA sogs kyis A phyis/ mI mAM tA/ mi mI yAstaM/ mi mI ran/
100a6(sgra skor): sogs so// loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ mi mI tAM/ mi mA tAM/ mi ma tAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ mi mI ShA/ mi mA thAM/ mi mI d+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ mi me/ maM mA ba haM/ mi mAM ma he/ lang gi
100b1(sgra skor): skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a mi mI ta/ a mi mA tAM/ a mi ma ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a mi mI thuH/ a mi mA thA/ a mi mi d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a mi me/ a mi mI ba hi/ a mi mI ma hi/
100b2(sgra skor): lung la si tsa'i sra 'dren pa kho na ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ oM mAstA/ a mA s+yA tAM/ a mA sa ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum lA/ a mr-is+t+rAH/ a mA sA thAM/ a mA d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a mA si
100b3(sgra skor): a mA swa hI/ a mA sma hi/ liT la/ iT la'ang Ata kyi dbyi 'os A phyis pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ma me/ ma mA te/ ma mi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ !la [।]sa/ ma mai She/ ma mA tha/ ma
100b4(sgra skor): mi d+he/ ma mi D+he/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ma me/ ma mi ba hau/ ma mi ma he/ luT laM/ mA tA/ mA tA si/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ mA sISh+Ta/ mA sI yAstaM/ mA sI ran/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ mA s+yA te/ sogs
100b5(sgra skor): dang / l+r-ing la/ a mau s+yA ta/ sogs so// o hAng 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la'ang nyid rnams sbyor te/ shA pa shru 'os/ byings gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os/ ha dz+nyA/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos dz+ha dza/ dz+r-iny+dza rnams kyi
100b6(sgra skor): ita 'os/ a b+h+yA sa ita/ ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can hal dang po rnams la/ g+hu ma yin pas ha la la I 'os/ mtha'i I dang / a tsa dang po rnams la/ shwA a b+h+yasta sogs kyis A phyis pas/ laTa'i skyes pa
101a1(sgra skor): dang po gsum lA/ dzi hrI te/ dzaM hA te/ dz+nyI ha te/ skyes bu dbus mA gsum la/ dz+r-IM hI She/ dzAM hU the/ dze hrI d+h+we/ skyes bu phyi mya gusum la/ dzi h+ne/ dzi hI ba he/ dzi hI ma he/ ling la/ mtha' mA yin pa sogs kyis sa
101a2(sgra skor): yuTa'i sa phyis/ shU sogs kyis a phyis b+ha sa/ dzI hrI ta/ dzo hrI yA tAM/ dza~M hrI ran/ sogs so// loTa'i skyes bu dang pa gasgom lo/ dzi tI tAM/ dzid tAM/ dzaM ha tAM/ sdes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzi d+hISh+Tha/ dzi hA thAM/ dzI hrIH/
101a3(sgra skor): skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzi hai/ dzi hA bau he/ dzi hA ma haM/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a dzaM hI ta/ oM dzi hA tAM/ a dzi ha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a dzi hI thAH/ a dzi hA thA/ a dzi hI d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma
101a4(sgra skor): gsum l-i/ a dzi hi/ a dzi hI ba hi/ a dzi hI ma hi/ lung la/ si tsa'i sa 'dren pa kho na ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a hAsta/ a hA sA tAM/ a hA sa ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a hA s+thAH/ oM hA sA thA/
101a5(sgra skor): a hU d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a hwe si/ a hA swA hI/ ah+na sma hi/ liT lo/ gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os hA dz+nyA/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ dz+ha dza/ IT la'ang AH
101a6(sgra skor): kyis dbyi 'os AM phyis pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzaM hi/ dza hA ti/ dza hi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ShaM/ dza hA thaM/ dza hi d+haM/ dza hi d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza he/ dza he ba he/ dza hi ma
101b1(sgra skor): he/ smon pa'i ling la/ hU sISh+Ta/ hA sI yAstAM/ hA sI ran/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ hA s+ya te/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a hA s+ya ta/ sogs so// i ti pA Ni ni b+ha ka ra Na s+ya sU trA ta hA da yaHsa mAp+taM/ zhes pa pA Ni ni bya ka
101b2(sgra skor): raNa'i mdo las hu la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so// de rnams kyis brda spyod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris u bkod pa legs bshang nor bu
101b3(sgra skor): 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/ byed pa po'i don gyi sha pa shrur bsgyur ba dzu ho ti la sogs pa rnams la laT sogs sbyor ba'i cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// /
101b4(sgra skor): da ni di bu la sogs pa byed pa po'i don la sh+yan 'jug pa rnams kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ di bu rtse ba dang mngon par 'dod pa dang / tha snyad dang / sdug gu dang / gsal ba dang / bstod pa dang / mdzes pa
101b5(sgra skor): dang / 'gro ba rnams la'o zhes pa la laT sogs a tang rnams sbyor te/ ngi bA di b+h+yaHsh+yan/ dri ba la sogs pa rnams las sh+yana'o// byings di bu la sogs pa rnams las byings thams cad pa rnams pha
101b6(sgra skor): rol la byed pa po'i don gyi shab kyi yul la sh+yan 'gyur te na dbyangs don dang sha shauta kyi don no// dipa la sh+yan rjes 'brel phyis/ u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dI bya
102a1(sgra skor): ti trI kyA tA/ dI byAn+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dI bya si/ dI d+yA thA// di byA thA/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ di byA mi/ dI byA baH/ dI byA maH/ ling lA/ ata las ya I ya 'os yA i yAr bsgyur
102a2(sgra skor): bu yA dag gi bal la dbyi ba sogs kyis ba sgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dI pye ta/ dau bye tAM/ dI byo yuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dI byaMH/ dI bye tAM/ dI bye ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dI bye
102a3(sgra skor): yaM/ dI bye ba/ dI bye ma/ loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dI byA tu/ dI bya tAta/ dI bya tAM/ dI byan+ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum/ dI bya/ dI pya tata/ dI bya taM/ dI bya ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dI d+hA ni/ dI prA bau/ dI
102a4(sgra skor): byA ma/ lang gI skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a dwai byAta?/ a dI b+hA tAM/ e dI byAn/ skyes bu dbus mo gsum la/ a dI b+h+r-iH/ [।।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ।ऽ।।]/ a dau b+ha tAM/ a dI bya tAM/ skyes bu phyi ma ga su me la/ a dI byi/ a
102a5(sgra skor): dI byA ba/ a dI b+h+r-i ma/ lung la/ bal dang po'i iT+ra byin/ pug mthi' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ a de bIta/ a de biSh+Ta/ a de bi ShaH/ sogs so// liT la byings gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/
102a6(sgra skor): skyes bu dang po gsum la/ di de ba/ di di ba tuH/ di dau buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ di dau bi tha/ di di ba thuH/ di di ba/ skyes pu phyi ma gsum la/ di de ba/ di di pi ba/ di di bi ma/ luT la/ iT byin
102b1(sgra skor): pas/ de bi tA/ de bi tA si/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ u pa b+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ dI b+hata/ dI byA staM/ dI byA suH/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ bal dang po'i iT dang / pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan
102b2(sgra skor): byas pas/ de bi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ e de bi Sh+ya tA/ sogaso// Shi bu thags 'thag pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/ cho ga thams cad bshung mardzag pa dang 'dra bas/ laT
102b3(sgra skor): la/ sI byA ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ sI bye ta/ sogs so// loT la/ sI bya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a sI byA ta/ sogs so// lung la/ bal dang po'i iT dang / pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas//

102b6(sgra skor): bsgyur bas/ si byAta/ sau byAstAM/ si b+ha suH/ sogs so// l+r-iT la bal dang po'i iT dang / puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ se bi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a se bi Sh+ya ta/
103a1(sgra skor): sogs so// nr-i tI lus po bskyod pa la'o zhes bya la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ nr-i t+ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ n+yaM t+yeta/ sogs so// loT la/ n+yA t+ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a r+tha
103a2(sgra skor): t+yAta/ sogs so// lung la/ bal dang po'i iT dang / pug mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ a nar+t+tita/ a nartiSh+TAM/ a narti ShuH/ sogs so// liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang
103a3(sgra skor): po gsum la/ na nArta/ na nr-i ta tut+ta/ na nr-i tuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum lA/ nA nArti/ na nAM taM thAH/ na nr-i ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gi sum la/ na nar+ha/ na nr-i ti ba/ na nr-i ti ma/ luT la/ iT byin pas/ narti tA/ nir+t+r-i tA si/
103a4(sgra skor): sogs so// smon pa'o ling laM/ nr-i t+yat+tha/ ne trAstAM/ nr-i drA suH/ sogs so// sany+dzasaM tsI kr-I ta r+thi tA tshA da tr-i dA nr-i taHkr-i ta tsI to tshaM dA tr-i de nr-i ta las sau tsa ma yin pa'i sa lwa'o// kr-i tI gcod pa/ ts+tsho trI 'tshe ba/ u tshaM dir 'bar
103a5(sgra skor): ba/ u tr-i dir 'tshe ba/ nr-i tI lus bskyod pa rnams las pha rol gyi si tsa ma yin pa'i byings phyed pa sa yig dang po can la iT yang na 'gyur te/ l+r-iT la iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ narti Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / iT
103a6(sgra skor): med pa'i phyogs la/ nar+N+Na ti/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a narti Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a nar+N+Nata/ sogs so// ta sI skyo ba la'o zhes pa la a tang rnams sbyor te/ b+hA sha/ b+hU sha/ kla mu/ kra mu/ tra sI
103b1(sgra skor): sogs kyis sha pa dang sh+yan yang na bar byas pas/ laT la/ tra si ti/ sogs sama?/ tra s+ya ti/ sogs so// ling la/ ta se ta/ sogs sam/ tra s+ye ta/ sogs so// loT la/ tra sa tu/ sogs sam/ tra s+ya tu/
103b2(sgra skor): gas so// lang la/ a tra sa ta/ sogs sam/ a tra s+ya ta/ sogs so// lung la iT byin/ bad bra dza sogs kyis 'phel ba byas pas/ a tA sIta/ a tA siSh+TaM/ a tra si ShuShaH/ sogs so// liT la/ Na la gnyis
103b3(sgra skor): ma yin pa rnams la/ dzAM b+h+yAM mu tra sa rnams kyis yang na 'os/ a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba sogs yang na bar byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ta trA sa/ tA tra sa tuH/ tre sa tuH/ ta tra suH/ tri suH/ skyes bu dbus ma

103b5(sgra skor): si/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ tra s+yAta/ tA swestAM/ tra s+yA suH/ sog so// l+r-iT lau/ bal dang po'i iT+ra byin pas/ tra si Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a trA si Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// dzI ShA lang tshe nyams pa
103b6(sgra skor): la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ byings kyi r-IT kyi iT 'os rI iT/ r-i'i aN las ra pha rol los/ ra/ u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ laT la/ dzIR+Ya ti/ sogs dang /
104a1(sgra skor): ling la/ dzI R+She ta/ sogs so// loT la/ dzIr+Ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a d+hI R+Yata/ sogs so// lung la/ d+hI sta m+b+ha/ mu tsu sogs kyis sli Ang du bsgyur ba dang si tsa ra bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ ang
104a2(sgra skor): gi phyogs la/ r-i dr-i sha dag gi ang la yon tan nos yon tan byas pas/ a dza rata/ a dza ra tAM/ a dza ran/ sogs so// si tsa'i phyogs la/ iT byin/ sitsa la 'phel ba sogs kyis 'phel ba byas pas/ a dzA
104a3(sgra skor): rI ta/ a dzA riSh+TAM/ a dzA ri ShaH/ sogs so// liT la/ gnyis brjod/ r-i'i aT Na la gnyis la 'phel ba/ gzhan rnams la/ dz+r-I/ b+hA bu/ tra sa rnams kyi yang na 'os/ a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba yang na pa dang / r-its+tsha tI r-Ita rnams
104a4(sgra skor): kyi 'os yon tan byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza dza re/ dze ra tuH/ dza dza ra tuH/ dze ruH/ dza dza ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dze ri tha/ dza dza ri tha/ dze ra thuH/ dza dza ra thuH/ dze ra/ dza dza ra/ skyes bu phyi ma

104a6(sgra skor): so// smon pa'i ling la/ byings kyi r-IT kyi iT 'os/ ita du bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ dzIrbA ta/ dzIR+YA staM/ dzIR+YA suH/ sogs so// l+r-iTaM la br-i r-Ita sogs kyis iT dang iT yang na bar byas pas/ dze ri Sh+ya ti/
104b1(sgra skor): sogs sam/ dza rI Sh+ya ti/ sngogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a dza ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a dza rI Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// sho phra mor byed pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ o taHsh+ya ni/ ota kyi sh+yan
104b2(sgra skor): la'o// byings mtha'i Ata nI sh+yana? pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ sho la sh+yan/ mdo 'dis otA phyis pas/ laT la/ sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ sh+ye ta/ sogs so// laT laM/ sh+ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ A sh+yata/
104b3(sgra skor): sogs so// lung la/ shita nye ba'i yul ma yin pa lo a tsa'i Ata 'os/ ai AtA/ d+h+r-i Ta shwA tshwa sA las gang ma nga 'os sI tsa dbye ba dang / yam ram nam AtA rnams kyis saka yang na 'os/ saka dang ita
104b4(sgra skor): byin pas/ a shwA sIta/ a shA sISh+TaM/ a shA si ShAH/ sogs dang / sitsa phyis pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum+ba lA/ a shAta/ a shA tAM/ a sh+tsaH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a shAH/ a shA taM/
104b5(sgra skor): a shA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ aM shAM/ a shA ba/ a shA ma/ l-iT la/ Na la gnyis au/ iT las kyang Ata kyi dbyi 'os/ Ata N+Di dz+reH/ tshig mtha' ma yin pa chags rgyas pa la r+Nags/ dbyi ba sogs
104b6(sgra skor): kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sha shau/ sha sha tuH/ sha shuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sha shi tha/ shA shA tha/ sha sha thuH/ sha sha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sha shau/ sha shi ba/ sha shi ma/
105a1(sgra skor): luT la/ shAt+tha/ shA tA si/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ shA yAtA/ shA yAstAM/ shA yA suHsogs so// l+r-iT la/ shA s+yA ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a shA s+yata/ sogaso// cho gcod pa
105a2(sgra skor): la'o zhes pa la'ang u tang rnams 'jug cing cho ga thams cad sho dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ rgya tI/ sogs dang / ling la/ ts+yai ta/ sogs so// loT la/ chu tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a ts+yata/ sogs so// lung
105a3(sgra skor): la/ sa ka dang iTa'i phyogs la/ a tshA sIta/ a tshA siSh+TaM/ a tshA si ShuH/ sogs dang / si tsa phyis pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a tshAta/ a tshA tAM/ a tshuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la
105a4(sgra skor): a tshAH/ a tshA tAM/ au tshA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e tshA/ a tshA ba/ a nA ma/ liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsa tsho/ tsa tsha tuH/ tsa tshuH/ skyes bu dbus mA gsum la/ tsa che tha/ tsa tshA tha/ tsa tsha thuH/
105a5(sgra skor): tsa tsha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa tshaM/ tsa chi ba/ tsa tshi ma/ luT la/ tshA tA/ tshA tA saM/ sogaso// smon pa'i ling la/ tshA yAta/ tshwa yAstAM/ tshA yA suH/ sogs so// wAMT la/ tshA s+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/
105a6(sgra skor): a tshA s+yota/ sogs so// !Sho mtha'i las la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa gnyis dang 'dra bas/ laT la/ s+ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ s+ye ta/ sogaso//
105b1(sgra skor): loT la/ s+yA tA/ sogs dang / lang la/ a s+yata/ sogs// lung la/ saka dang iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ a sA sAta/ a swA saSh+Ta/ a sA saM ShuH/ sogs so// sirba phyis pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po

111a1(sgra skor): ta ma di bA/ na shi'i ata e nyid du ang la yang na'o// ts+li bsgyur ba'i ang pha rol la na shi'i ata e nyid du yang na bsgyur tI/ a ne shata/ a ne sha tAM/ a ne shan/ sogs so// liT la kit+ta rnams
111a2(sgra skor): la/ a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ na nA shau/ ne sha tuH/ ne shuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum lA/ ne shi thaM/ ne sha thuH/ ne sha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ na nA sha/ ne shi ba/ nI shi ma/

111a5(sgra skor): mas+t+ri na shaudz+dza ho li/ mas+t+ri na sha dag gi hal la nu ma 'o// Tu mas+t+ri dag pa dang na shra dag la rkyen hal dang po can ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin pa rnams pha rol le nu ma A ga ma 'gyur te/ ma gnas don
111a6(sgra skor): u brjod don no// na sha le/ luT/ brash+tsa b+hAs+dza sogs kyis sha Sha/ mdo 'dis nu ma byin/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os/ ta Tar bsgyur bas/ naMSh+Ta/ naMSh+Ta rau/ naMSh+Ta raH/ naMSh+Ta si/ sogs dang / 'grel par lung drangs pa/ na
111b1(sgra skor): sherbA/ na shi'i yang na'o// na shi'i sha yig ni dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can pha rol la yang na g+hA yig tu 'gyur te/ sha g+ha/ dz+ha Sha sogs kyis/ ta d+hA/ dz+ha la sogs kyis g+ha gar bsgyur bas/ nIg+d+ha/ nag+na si
111b2(sgra skor): sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ na sh+yA ta/ na sh+tsa staM/ na sh+yA suH/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ ra d+ha sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ na shi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / ma s+dzi na sems kyis nu A sa/ iT
111b3(sgra skor): med pa'i phyogs la/ mas+t+ri na sha dag gi ha la laM num 'os/ num A ga ma/ bras+t+ra sogs kyis sha Shar bsgyur ba dang / nau sha'i yang na 'os/ g+har bsgyur ba yang na bar byed kyang Sh+wa'i phyogs la/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi
111b4(sgra skor): ka dang / g+ho'i phyogs la/ khar la tsar 'os/ g+ha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/ cho ga mi 'dra yang grub gzugs gcig pas/ naMk+Sh+ya ti/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a na shi
111b5(sgra skor): Sh+yata/ sogs sam/ a naMk+Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// sha mu nye bar zhi ba la'o zhes pa la 'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ sha mA maSh+Ta nA dIr+g+gaHsh+ya ni/ sha ma sogs brgyad rnams kyi sh+yan la ring po'o// sha mu la
111b6(sgra skor): sogs pa brgyad de sha mu dang da mu nye bar zhi ba/ ta mu 'dod pa/ shra mu dka' thub/ b+h+ra mu mi gnas pa/ k+Sha mu Sha bzod pa/ kra mu dman pa/ ma dI dga' ba rnams kyi u pa d+hA sh+yan pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/
112a1(sgra skor): sha mra la sh+tsan/ mAd 'das rang por byas pas/ laT la/ shU myA tA/ sogs dang / ling la/ shAmyA tA/ sogs so// laT lA/ shAmyA t+tha/ sogs dang / lang la/ a shwa ma?H/ sogs so/ 2
112a2(sgra skor): bal nga po'i iT byin pas/ a shra mIH/ a sha miSh+TaM/ a sha mi ShaH/ sogs so// liT la/ kwita rnams la a b+h+yA sa dbye ba stsogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sh+yA ma/ she ma tuH/ she muH/ skyes bu dbus ma
112a3(sgra skor): gsum la she mai thaM/ she ma thu/ she maM/ skyes bu phyi maM gsum la/ sha shA ma/ sha sham+b+ha/ sha mi ga/ sha mi ma/ luTi la auT byin paso// sha maM two/ sha me tA si/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ sha mA ta/ sham+bA s+t+wa~M/
112a4(sgra skor): mrasuH/ sogs so// l+r-iT la iT byin pasaM/ shaM mi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a sha myata/ sogs so// 6krA mu dman pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/ thA shwa/ b+hU shrA thA mu/ kre mu/
112a5(sgra skor): klu mu sogs kyis shapa dang sh+yan yong nu bar byas pas/ rgyan gyi phyogs la/ shAm sogs brgyad rnams kyi sogs kyis ring po byas pas/ laT la/ kra ma tI/ sogs sam/ krA mya tI/ sogs so// ling la/ kra maH
112a6(sgra skor): sogs sam/ krA mye ta/ sogs so// loT la/ kra ma tu/ sogs sam/ krA mya ta/ sogs so// lang la/ a kra ma ta/ sogs sam/ o krA myata/ sog so// lung la iT byin pas/ akra mI ta/ a kra miSh+TaM/ a kra maM Shu
112b1(sgra skor): sogs so// liT la/ gnyis brjod pa sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ts+tshakrA ma/ tsAkra ma taH/ tsakra muH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsAkra mi tha/ tsakra ma thuH/ tsAkra ma/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
112b2(sgra skor): tsakrA ma/ tsakra ma/ tsakra mi bA/ tsakra mi ma/ luT laM/ kla mi tA/ k+Sha mi tA si/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling+ga la/ krA mAta/ klu myaM staM/ kra myA suH/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ bal dang po'i iT+ra byin/ kun nas bsgyur ba sog
112b3(sgra skor): kyis Shar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ kla mi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing li/ a kla mi Sh+yata/ sogs so// 6a su 'phen pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ a s+ya ti/
112b4(sgra skor): sogs dang / ling la/ a s+ye ta/ sogs so// loT la/ a s+ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a s+yata/ sogs so// lung la/ a s+ya te s+thA ka/ a su ti'i thuka 'o// a s+ya ti'i ts+li bsgyur bas ang pha rol la thuka a
112b5(sgra skor): gum 'gyur te/ ka gnas don u brjod don no// a s+ya ti/ bak+ti khyA ti rnams las ang ngos/ ts+li ang du bsgyur/ mdo 'dis thuka I ga ma byin pas/ As+thata/ As+tha tAM/ A s+thAn/ sogs so// liT la gnyis
112b6(sgra skor): brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A sa/ A sa tuH/ A suH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A si tha/ A saM thuH/ A sa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A sa/ A si ba/ A si ma
113a1(sgra skor): luT la iT byin pas/ a si tA/ a si tA si/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ a s+yAta/ a s+yAstAM/ a s+ya suH/ sogs so// l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ a si Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/
113a2(sgra skor): l+r-ing la/ A si Sh+yata/ sogs so// !ya su rab tu 'bad pa la'o zhes pa la'ang i tang rnams 'jug ste/ ya sau \u0f85 nu pa sargA ta/ ya sa las nyer bsgyur med pa las so// yau su rab tu 'bad pa las nyer
113a3(sgra skor): bsgyur sngon du sbyor na byed pa po'i don la sh+yan kho na 'gyur zhing sngon du nyer bsgyur med na sha pa dang sh+yan yang na bar bya ste/ laT laM/ ya sa ti/ sogs som/ ya s+ya ti/ sogs so// ling la/ ya se ta/ sogs
113a4(sgra skor): sam/ yeyi s+yai te/ sogs so// loT la/ ya sa tu/ sogs sram/ ya s+yA ta/ sogs so// lang la/ a ya sata/ sogs sama?/ a ya s+yata/ sogs so// nyer bsgyur sbyor na sh+yan kho na ste/ pra ya s+ya ti/ sogs//
113a5(sgra skor): saM ya sh+tsa/ sam yas las kyang ngo // nyer bsgyur sngon ma'i ya su las kyang sha pa dang sh+yan yang na bar bya ste/ saM ya sa ti/ sogs sam/ saM ya s+ya ti/ sogs so// lung la/ iT byin ra tu 'bad par byed/ pas/
113a6(sgra skor): a yA sIta/ a yA siSh+TaM/ a yA si ShaH/ sogs so// liT la/ kita rnams la a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs yang dag par 'bad pa kya/ pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ya yA sa/ ye sa tuH/ ye suH/
113b1(sgra skor): skyes bu dbus ma gsum l+ya/ ye s+yai thA/ yes thuH/ yis/ skyes zla phyi ma gsum la/ ya swA sa/ ya ya sa/ ya swa ba/ yA sa ma/ luT la/ iT byin pas/ ya sau tA/ ya sau tA sa/ sogs so// smon pa'o long la/ yas+t+ra/
113b2(sgra skor): yaM srA n+te/ s+yA sgra swaH/ sogs so// wAn+d+ra la/ bal r+yA ba'i oMn+d+ra byin bas+t+ra/ ya sany+tsatrI/ sogs sa// dbuzhi du/ snang la/ s+yA sa sa~Mt+yAta/ sogs / lA b+ha chags pa li'i nas pa la'ang
113b3(sgra skor): mami sbyat+te/ laT lA/ s+thA ts+tshaH/ sogs dang / li lta/ l+yAb+h+yAM/ stsog sna la/ wA b+hUH/ sogs ng+ge / lang la/ a wa~MSh+Ta/ sogs sa/ lang la in byin yin na byas pas

113b6(sgra skor): sogs kyisa~M t+ya d+ha/ dz+hal sogs kyis bya bar bsgyur bas/ oMdz+dza/ oMSh+Ta se/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ lu b+hUta/ lu b+hU s+t+waM/ lU Sh+yA suHsogs so// l+r-iT le iT byin pas/ oM b+heSh+ya ti/ sogs so// de
114a1(sgra skor): l+r-ing la/ a lo b+hi Sh+yata/ sogs so// 6nyi mi dA gsher ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ mi de rgu Na/ mi di'i yon tan no// nyi mi di'i rkyen sha 'gro ba pha rol la yon tan du bsgyur te/

114a6(sgra skor): Sha/ di ba sogs kyis sh+yan sbyor bas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sU ya te/ sU ye te/ sU yan+te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sU ya saM/ sU ye the/ sU ya d+he/ skyes bu phyi mo gsum la/ sU ye/ sU yA

115a6(sgra skor): tu 'phen pa/ dIng zad pa rnams kyi mtha' kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen l+yapa pha rol la Ata du bsgyur cing 'ang gi sgras Nal gnyis dang thal ma gtogs pa'i liT rnams dang / rkyen sha 'gro ba ma yin pa pha rol la'/
115b1(sgra skor): At+ma du bsgyur te/ lpA lung / mad 'dis Ata du bsgyur bas/ sgyus bu dang po gsum la/ a dAs+t+ra/ A dA sU tra/ A ng+ku sA ta/ skyes bu dbus mA gsum la/ a dAr+dz+dza// a drA swo Sh+Ta/ A d+yar+d+ha/ sgras bu b+h+ra ma gsum/
115b2(sgra skor): la/ a dA si a dA swa hi/ a dAsma hi/ dI ngo yu Da tsa krI ti/ dIng los a tsa kra nga? 'gro ba la yAT lau/ dIng las pha rol gyi atsau kra nga 'gro ba'i ming can la yuT A ga ma 'gyur ti/ liT la gaunyis brjod thung

115b6(sgra skor): rnams 'jug ste/ dz+nyA dza nordzA/ dz+nyA dza na dag gi dzA'o// dz+nyA khong du chud pa dang / dzan skye ba dag gi rkyen sha 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la dzA zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ dza na la/ sh+yan/ mdo 'dis dzAr bsgyur bas/
116a1(sgra skor): laTA la/ dzA ya te/ sogs dang / ling la/ dzA ye ta/ sogs so// loT la/ dzA ya tAM/ sogs dang / lang la/ a dzA ya ta/ sogs so// dza ni ba d+h+r-ish+tsa/ dza no ba d+hi dag gi 'ang ngo // dzA no skyo ba dang ba d+hi dag ga
116a2(sgra skor): bsgyur ba'i tsiN dang kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen nya 'gro ba rnams la u pa d+hA 'phel bar bsgyur ba ma yin te/ dzan la lung sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ la ta/ dIpa dza na bu d+ha sogs kyis r+thi/ tsi Nar bsgyur ba dang

117a1(sgra skor): pUr+Ya tra/ sogs so// rlung gi sgras bla dang ba'o gcig tshig la/ dI ba dzan bu d+d+ha sogs kyus so tsiN+DA san yang na par byas pas/ a pA ra/ u pu rin+ta/ wAg ma rnams la aT byin pas/

117a6(sgra skor): tsi Nar bsgyur te/ bad la/ lung / la ta/ mdo 'dis tsI tsi Nar bsgyur/ u po d+hA'i 'ang ngos/ 'phel ba/ tsiN las 'jig gos ta phyis pas/ a pA di/ lha ga ma rnams la/ dz+ha la dang po can la siH
117b1(sgra skor): phyis/ khar la tsar sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang pa'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a pad+hA tA/ a pa d+ha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a pat+tAH/ a pad+mA naM/ a bar+d+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/

117b3(sgra skor): la/ pe de/ pe di ba haM/ pe di ma hai/ luT la Sha ra la tsar 'os/ da tar bsgyur bas/ pat+tA/ pat+tA se/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la'ang pat+siSh+Ta/ pad+b+r-i yAstAM/ pang+gi ra ne/ sogs so// l-iT la/ pat+sa te/ sogs
117b4(sgra skor): dang / l+r-ing la/ a pa d+yA ta/ sogs so// !bu d+ha khong du chud pa la'o zhes pa'ang u tang rnams 'jug ste/ lATi la bu d+hA tAM/ sogs dang / ling+ga laM/ pre d+h+ye ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ bra d+h+ya tAM/ sogs dang /
117b5(sgra skor): lang la/ a bu d+h+yA ta/ sogs so// lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ dI pa dza na bu d+ha sogs kyis ts+li tsi Na dang si tsa yang na par byas/ tsi Na'i phyogs la puka sogs kyis/ yon tan byas pas/
117b6(sgra skor): a tho d+hI/ si tsa'i phyogs la dz+wa la las dz+ha la la 'os saM tsa phyis/ dz+ha Sha mtha' sogs kyis ta d+ha/ dz+ha la sogs kyis d+ha der bsgyur bas/ a bu d+ha/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a tsa gcig pa sogs
118a1(sgra skor): b+har bsgyur bas/ a b+h+yad+hA tAM/ a b+h+yad+d+hatA/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum lA/ a thAd+d+ha/ A thAd+hA Sh+TA/ u b+h+yar+dz+dza/ sgras bu phyi ma gsum la/ a b+hutri/ a b+h+yaHtI/ A Sh+TAt+maha~M/ l-iT la gnyis brjod/
118a2(sgra skor): pa sogs kyis/ bu b+h+rad+he/ bru bud+hA te/ br-i br-i dz+hi re/ skyes bu dngos ma gsum+b+ha la/ dru bud+d+hi She/ brar+b+r-i d+hU the/ b+h+r-i b+h+r-i r+t+ti d+h+we/ br-ih+mA N+Tin+te/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum l-i/ pra byA t+taM/ bu brA t+tapra bud+d+hi ma hA/ l+r-iT+Ta

177a1(sgra skor): tsUR+YA stAM/ tsuR+YA suHsogs so// l+r-iT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ tso ri Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a tse ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// !kr-ita kun nas sgrog pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/

180b6(sgra skor): med pa ste gzhan gyi bya ba zhig rang gis byed pa 'am/ gzhan zhig byed du 'jug pa rtogs par byed pa la'ang byings las pha rol tu Ni tsa 'gyur te/ kr-i la Ni tsa/ a tsa'i nyaN 'gro ba la'o zhes pas 'phel ba byas/ kA ri

182b6(sgra skor): bsgyur/ de nas Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a shru sha bta/ a rau shU sha ba tAM/ a shU sha ban/ sogs dang / saM pra sA ra Na ma byas pa'i phyogs la/ tsang la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ hal dang po sogs kyis

195a5(sgra skor): yi tA/ bAr+N+Nata/ brta yi Sh+ya ti/ a bar+Na yi Sh+yata/ sogs so// !mr-i dzUSha dag pa la'o zhes pA lA NI tsa/ mr-i dzi'i 'phel ba la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ mArdzi zhes grub pa li laT sogs
