195b1(sgra skor): la san bzhin gyi bya ba mi 'jug Ni phyis pas/ a mI mr-i dzata/ sogs sam/ a ma mAr+Na ta/ sogs so// liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ mArdza yAM tsa kro ra/ TamArdza yi tA/ m+ban sa/ mAr+N+Nata/ 9mUrdza yi Sh+ya ta/
195b2(sgra skor): a mArdza yi Sh+yata/ sogs so// nyi Sha ba nyal ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa byin/ u pa d+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ swA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ sA pa ya ti/ sA pa ye ta/ swA pa
195b3(sgra skor): yat+ta/ A sU pa yata/ sogs so// lung la/ s+yA be shrA daM/ swA bi'i ts+tshang+ga l-i'o// sA pa Ni mtha' can ni tsi bsgyur bas tsad phra rol la sa pra sA rA Na rA bsgyur te/ saM pi la tsang / Ni le tsang la u pad+hA'i thung ngu 'os thung
195b4(sgra skor): bsgyur/ mdo 'dis saM pra sA ra Na/ tsang la 'os gnyis brjod/ yang ba'i ring po kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a sU Shu paT/ sogs so// liT sogs lhag ma
195b5(sgra skor): rnA mas la rim pa bzhin/ [ऽ]sA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ sa[:]sA pa yi tA/ na sA prAta/ sA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ a sA pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// \u0f7fsho phra mor byed pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ sha 'gro ba ma
195b6(sgra skor): yin pa nye ba'i yul la e tsa'i Ata 'os e tsa Ata du bsgyur/ sha Ni zhes pa la/ shA tshA sA hA byA be paM yuka/ shA che sA hA bAM be pA rnams kyi yuka 'o// sho phreM mor byed pa/ cho gcod pa/ She mtha'i las/ hwenya
196a1(sgra skor): 'dren pa/ byenya kun nas sgrib pa/ benya thags kyi rgyu/ bU btung ba rnams kyi NI pha rol la yU ka A gA mu 'gyur te/ ka gnas don u brjod don no// shwA yi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/
196a2(sgra skor): shwA ya ya ti/ shA ya yaut+ta/ shwA ya ya tu/ ashrA ye yata/ sogs so// lung la/ gaMny+dzas brjod Ni la tsang la u pa d+hA'i 'os thung ngu re be sgyur bas/ a sha shA yata/ sogs so// liT sog
196a3(sgra skor): lhag ma rnams la/ shwA ya yAMts+tsha kA ra/ pA ya yi tA/ shA y+Yata/ shwA ya yi Sh+ya ti/ a shA ya yi Sh+yaM ta/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ cho gcod pa la'o zhes pa la/ Ni tse e
196a4(sgra skor): At+ma yuka A ga ma byin pas/ tshA yi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ 2tshA ya ya ti/ ling tshA ya yeta/ 2 tshA ya ya tu/ a tshA ya yata/ sra.a tsA tshA ya ta/ li tshA ya yAM tsa kA ra/ tshA ya yi ta/
196a5(sgra skor): smon ling tshA y+YA ta/ l+r-iwau tshA ya yi Sh+ya ti/ mr-i a tshA ya yi Sh+yata/ sogs so// !Sho mtha'i las la'o zhes pa la/ Ni tsa e tsa Ata y+yaka A ga ma byin pas/ sA yi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbar bas/ [ऽ]ya
196a6(sgra skor): ya ti/ sA ya yeta/ sA ya ya Sha/ [।] pA bAta/ [ऽ]a sa sa yata/ TasA ya yAM tsa kA ra/ sa?sA ye yi tAM/ byin sA y+YAta/ l+r-iT sA ya yau Sh+ya ti/ mra.a sA ya yi Sh+ya ta/ so
196b1(sgra skor): hrenya 'dren pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsA e tsa/ Ata/ yuka A ga ma byin pas/ hA yi zhes grub pa la phaT sogs sbyar bas/ hA ya ya ti/ hA ya ye ta/ 2 hA ya ya tu/ a hA ya yata/ lung la/ hA saM prA
196b2(sgra skor): s+yA ru NaM/ hwA'i saM pra sA ra Na'o// hwAbI Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol lA rtag tu saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur tI/ hA yi tsang Ni la tsang u pa d+hA'i thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyu ru/ mad+mo 'dis saM pra sA rA NA gAnyis brjod yang ba'i
196b3(sgra skor): ring po/ 'grel par saM prA sA ra Ne'i pha rol la yuka A ga mA dbyi'o zhes bshad pas yuka phyis/ a tsa'i ny+Nita la 'os 'phel ba/ e tsa'i a ya sausogs kyis au A ba/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni
196b4(sgra skor): phyis/ ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u pa d+ha thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ a dz+nyA hA ba tA/ sogs sama?/ a dzA ha bAta/ sogs so// liT sogs wAgA ma rnams la/ [ऽ]hA ya ya
196b5(sgra skor): tse kA ra/ !hwA ya yi tA/ rga nga hA y+Ya te/ hwA yau yi Sh+ya tI/ a hA ya yi Sh+yaM ta/ sogs so// !byenya kun nas sgrib pa la/ Ni tsa a tsa'i Ata/ yuka? A ga ma byin pas/ bya yi zhes grub pa
196b6(sgra skor): la laT sogs sbyar ba si/ laT b+hA ye ya ti/ b+hA ya ye ta/ b+hA ya ya tu/ la.a byA ya yata/ lung a ba bA yata/ li byA ya yAM tsa kA ra/ b+ha ya yi tA/ rmed ling bA y+YA ta/ l+r-iT b+ha ya yi Sh+ya ti/
197a1(sgra skor): l+r-ing a bA ya yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// !benya thags kyi rgyu la'o zhes pa la/ Ni tsa e tsa Ata yuka A ga ma byin pas/ pA yi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ bA ya yA ti/ labA
197a2(sgra skor): ya yeta/ la bA ya ya tu/ la a bA ya yata/ a ba pa yata/ bA ya yA tsa kA ra/ labA ya yi tA/ sman bA y+YA tau/ l+r-i bA ya yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing a bA ya yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ pA
197a3(sgra skor): btung ba la Ni tsa sbyar yuka A ga ma byin pas/ pA yi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ 5pU ya ya ti/ 2 pA ya ye ta/ li bA ya ya tu/ la a bA ya yata/ sogs dang / lung la/ lo paHpi pa te rits+tsha
197a4(sgra skor): b+h+yA sa s+yA/ pi bau ti'i dbyi zhing a b+h+yA sa'i Ita 'ang ngo // Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la pi ba ti'i u pa d+hA dbyi zhing a b+h+yA sa'i 'ang ita du bsgyur bar bya ste/ pa yi la tsang lung gnyis brjod/ Ni'i iT med pa la
197a5(sgra skor): 'os Ni phyis/ mdo 'dis u pa d+hA phyis a b+h+yA sa'ang ita du bsgyur bas/ A pI pya ta/ sogs so// l-iT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ pA ya yAM tsa kA ra/ laTapA ya yi tA/ pA y+YAta/ pA ya
197a6(sgra skor): yi Sh+ya taM/ a pA ya yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// !r-i 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ arti hrI tsI sogs kyis puka A ga ma/ puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ aR+Shi zhis grub pa la laT sogs
197b1(sgra skor): sbyar bas/ an+ma ya ti/ 2ar+tha yeta/ yang aR+YA ya tu/ An+ma yata/ sogs dang / lung la/ an+di la tsang tsang la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ r-i'i at+ta 'os/ de a AT dang 'phel ba byas NI'i
197b2(sgra skor): iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ AR+YAta/ sogs so// liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ ar+Ya yAM tsa kA ra/ ar+Ya yi tA/ n+da au aR+Sh+ya ta/ ar+Ya yi Sh+ya ti/ Ar+Ya yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// !hI ngo tsha
197b3(sgra skor): ba la'o zhes pa la/ Ni tsa arti hrI sogs kyis puka A ga ma byin/ puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ hre pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ 2!hr-i pa ya ti/ la hre pa yeta/ lahre pa ya tu
197b4(sgra skor): la.a hre pa yatA/ sogs dang / lung la/ gnyis brjod/ Ni la/ tsang la u pa d+hA thung ngu/ Ni'i ita med pa la 'os/ Ni phyis pas/ a dzi hI pata/ sogs so// liT sogs lcug ma rnams/ hre pa yAM tsa
197b5(sgra skor): kU rA/ lahre pa yi tA/ / rbe brAta?/ waMhre pa yi Sh+ya ti/ u hre pa yi Sh+ye tAM/ sogs so// !tswi 'gro ba Ni tsa s+tha ra/ ar+t+ti hI stsogs kyis puka A gA ma/ puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/
197b6(sgra skor): tse pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ tsA pa ya ti/ ling ts+tshe pa ye ta/ li ts+tshe pa ya tu/ 2a ts+li pa yata/ 4 a tsi nI pa ta/ yi tsI pa yAM tsa kA ra/ saT tsA pa yi tA/ smon yang ts+tshe pyAta/ liTatsA pa yi Sh+ya
198a1(sgra skor): ti/ l+r-i a ts+tshe pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// \u0f7frIng nyan pa la'o zhes pa la/ NI tsa arti hrI sogs kyis puka A ga ma/ puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ re pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs
198a2(sgra skor): sbyar bas/ lare pa ya ti/ are pa ye ta/ yA re ba ya tu/ la.a re pa yata/ a ri rI pata/ re ba yAM tsa kA ra/ lare pa ya tI/ [।]re byAta/ re paM yi Sh+ya tI/ l+r-ire pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so//
198a3(sgra skor): kru ya sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ ar+t+ti hri sogs kyis puka A ga ma byin/ ba ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os ya phyis/ puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ k+Sho pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs
198a4(sgra skor): sbyar bas/ kro pA ya ti/ kro pa yaita/ 2kro pa ya tu/ a kro pa yata/ A tsu kru pa ti/ kro pa yAM tsa kA ra/ kro pa yi tA/ !kro prAta/ kr-i pA yi Sh+ya ti/ a kro pa yi Sh+yata/

198a6(sgra skor): tu ak+ShA pa yaita/ a tsam+b+hA bta/ k+ShA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ lak+Sh+mA pa yi tA/ k+ShA pyAH/ [ऽ]k+Sh+mA pa yi ts+tsha ti/ ak+ShA pa yi Sh+yata/ sogs so// !Sh+Ta 'gro ba la sa ldog pa la NiH/
198b1(sgra skor): Ar+t+ti hrI sogs kyis puka A ga ma byin pas/ s+thA pI zhes pa grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ swA pa ya tI/ s+thA pa yeta/ sas+thA pa ya tu/ a s+thA ba yAt+ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ tiSh+Tha te rita/ tiSh+Tha ti'i
198b2(sgra skor): ita 'o// Ni dang bcas pa'i cang pha rol la tiSh+Tu ti'i u pa d+hA itA du bsgyur te/ s+thA[:]bi la tsang / mdo 'dis i ta du bsgyur/ gnyi sa brjod / shar dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/ a b+h+yA sa'o tsar 'ang ngos/ tha ta/
198b3(sgra skor): kun nas bsgyur ba la sogs kyis sa ShA/ dza Tu l-i Sha Tu 'os thaM Sh+Ta/ iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a tiSh+Ti bta/ segros dang / liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ s+thA pa yA tsa kA ra/ !s+thA ba yi tA

198b5(sgra skor): g+hA pe ya ti/ aHg+h+rA pa ye tau/ lag+hA pa ye tu/ a g+hA pa yata/ sogs dang / lung la/ dzi g+h+ra twerbA/ dzig+hA ti'i yang na'o// Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la dzi g+hA ti'i u pa d+hA ita du yang na bsgyur te/
198b6(sgra skor): a dzi g+h+ri pata/ sogs sam/ a dzag+d+ha pa ta/ sogs so// liT sogs lha ma rnams la/ g+hA ba yAM tsa kA ra/ l+r-iTag+hA pa yi tA/ bAn g+hA b+ha ta/ l+r-i g+hA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ a g+hA pe yi Sh+ya ta/ sog sa so//
199a1(sgra skor): \u0f7fpA skyong ba la'o zhes pa la/ Ni tsa 'grel par lung drangs pa/ pA te D+hau lu gA ga mo ni t+yaM/ pA ti'i Ni la luka A ga ma rtag tu'o// pA ti'i Ni pha rol la luka a ga ma rtag tu 'gyur te/ u brjod don ka
199a2(sgra skor): gnas don rnams phyis pas/ pA li zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ pA la ya ti/ pA la yetA/ TapA la ya tu/ l+r-ing a pA la yata/ 2a pa pa lata/ pA la yAM tsa kA ra/ sa[:]bA la yi tA/
199a3(sgra skor): pA lA ta/ \u0f7fpA la yi Sh+ya ti/ a pA la yi Sh+yata/ sogs so// !bA 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ bo bi dz+nyA na ne dzuka pa'i rnam par g.yo ba la dzuka'o// ba'i Ni tsa pha rol le rnam par g.yo ba la 'jug
199a4(sgra skor): pa'i don la dzuka A ga ma 'gyur te/ ka gnas don u brjod don yin pas rjes 'phel phyis pas/ bA dzi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laTabA dza ya tI/ pA dza ye ti/ bA dza yA tu/ 2a bA dza ya ta/
199a5(sgra skor): e ba bi dzata/ la bA dza yAM tsa kA ra/ bA dza yaM tA/ bya[ऽ]bA dz+nyAta/ waMbA dza yi Sh+ya tI/ a bA dza yi Sh+yaM ta/ sogs dang / rnam par g.yo ba'i don min na dzuka mi 'gyur tI/ arti d+hI stsogs kyis puk+ka byin
199a6(sgra skor): pas/ 2bA pa ya ti/ 2a ba ba bita/ sogs so// \u0f7fd+hAnya 'gul pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa 'grel par lung drangs pa/ d+hAnya prI nyo nu ka ke tsi dA/ d+hunya prInya dag gi nuka 'ga' zhig tu yang ne'o// d+hunya 'gul po dang
199b1(sgra skor): thinya tshim pa dag gi Ni tsa pha rol la nuka A ga ma skabs 'gar yang na 'gyur te/ nukA sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ d+hA na ya ta/ d+hA na yeta/ d+hu na ya tu/ a d+hA na yata/ a dud+d+hAnata/ par+d+ha na yA tsa kA ra/
199b2(sgra skor): ad+hA na yi tArl-id+hA nAta/ laM d+hA na yai Sh+yat+si.a d+h+yA na yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / nuka ma byin pa'i phyogs la 'phel ba byis pas/ d+hA zhes grub pa la laT sogs s+thi ra bas/ d+hU pa ya ti/ drA ba mai ta/ d+hU ba ya
199b3(sgra skor): tu/ ed+b+ha ba yataM/ a du d+hA ba tau/ d+hU ba yAM tsi kA rA/ sa d+hA ba yi tA/ d+hA b+hUta/ l+r-i d+hU ba yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-i a d+b+ha ba yi Sh+ya te/ sogs saM/ \u0f7fprInya tshim pa la Ni tsaM/ d+hunya prInya dag gi nuka 'ga' zhig tu yang na 'os/
199b4(sgra skor): nuk+ka sgyur ba'i phyogs la/ da pri NA ya ti/ pI Na sit+tha/ prI Na ya Nu/ a b+hI Na la ta/ a b+h+r-i NAnauprI Na yI tsa kA ra/ ShadrA prI Na yi tA/ b+hI d+h+yaH/ pr-I Na mi Sh+yAti/ sa?.a prI NASh+yaH/ sogs dang /
199b5(sgra skor): nAkA med pa'i phyogs la/ a tsa'i nya N+Da 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba byas byasa?/ prA yi zhes grub la laT sogs sbyar bas/ prA la ya ti/ a bi prA yat+ta/ sogs so// 6lIng sbyor bar byed pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ bib+hU
199b6(sgra skor): She lI ya taHyA ya ti'i 'dam ka'o// lI ya te'i mtha' Ni tsa dang l+ya ba pha rol la Atra du yang na bsgyur bar bya ste/ Ata du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ arti hI sogs kyis puka A ga ma sbyar bas/ lA bi zhes pa grub pa la laT
200a1(sgra skor): sogs sbyar bas/ lA pa ya tI/ lA pa yeta/ 2 lA ba ya tu/ a lA pa yata/ lang a la la pat+ta/ la lA pa yA tsa kA ra/ laHlA pa yi tA/ mAs yU lA prAta/ lA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ mang ma
200a2(sgra skor): lA yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// lI l+yo n+du ka lu kA pa n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ lI lI dag gi nu ka luka dag yang na'o// lI chung ngur gyur pa dang lI sbyor bar byed pa dag gi snum pa byug pa'i don la rim pa bzhin nu ka dang luka A ga ma
200a3(sgra skor): dag yang na 'gyur te/ tsA lI na ya ti/ lung a li li nAta/ sogs dang / 'grel par lung drangs pas/ pra laM b+ha nA b+hi b+ha ba pU dzAM su li yo ni t+ya mAM tA ma shi ti bA ts+yai/ 'jigs pa sngon byung mchod pa rnams la
200a4(sgra skor): lI dag gi shaM 'gro ba ma yin pa la A nyid rtag tu brjod do// lIng sbyor ba dang lI chung ngur gyur pa dag gi 'jig pa dang sngon byung ba dang mchod pa rnams kyi don dang sbyar ba na shu 'gro ba ma yin pa'i rkyen gang byung yang
200a5(sgra skor): a nyid du rtag tu brjod par bya ste/ 2 lA pa ya ti/ se a la ya pa ta/ sogs so// la yiHsaM mA na na shA lI nI ka ra Na yosh+tsa/ lI las kun nas gus pa dang gnod pa dag la yang na'o// lI Ni tsa'i mtha'
200a6(sgra skor): can las kun nas gus pa dang gnod pa 'ang deng dz+ra gnyis sa bsgrub lugs dang gzugs gnyis ka 'dra ste AhA du bsgyur nas phug byin pa'o// byed pa dang rab tu thob pa la yang laT sogs At+ma ne pa da rnams 'gyur te/ dza TA b+hi ra la pa
200b1(sgra skor): ya te/ sh+ye no brti kA mul+lA pa ya te/ kas+t+rA mul+lA pa ya te/ sogs so// !nyi thI 'jigs pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ bi b+he twer+ha tu b+hU ye/ bi b+he ti'i 'jigs pa'i rgyu la'o// 'jigs pa'i rgyu brjod pa las pa
200b2(sgra skor): 'anas la / / b+hU ti'i mtha' Ni tsa pha rol la Ata du yang nu bsgyur ro// 'grel par ljang drangs pa/ bra lo dza kAt+ta s+t+r-i tsa pA ts+tsha/ 'jigs pa'i sbyor ba las kyang
200b3(sgra skor): brjod do// 'jigs pa'i rgyur ma zad 'jigs pa sbyor ba las kyang bi b+he ti'i Ni tsa pha rol la ata du yang ne bsgyur ro// b+hI r+d+ha tu b+ha ye/ b+h+r-is+thi dgra las 'jigs pa'i rgyu la'o// b+hI dngaSh+Ti cung zad rgod pa dag las
200b4(sgra skor): 'jigs pa'i rgya brjod po la tAng rnams sbyor te/ bi b+h+ye ti'i 'jigs pa'i rgyu la 'os Ata du bsgyur/ adz+dzi hrI sogs kyis puka A ge ma byin pas/ b+hA pi zhes grub pa la/ mdo 'das laTA sogs tang rnams
200b5(sgra skor): sbyar bas/ b+hU be ye te/ b+hU pa yauta/ b+hA pA yA tAM/ a b+hU pa yata/ !I ba b+hU pa ta/ l-ib+hA ba yAM tsa kre/ b+hA ba li tr-i/ !b+hA pa yi ShISh+Ta/ l+r-iTab+hA pa yi Sh+ya te/ a b+hU pa mi
200b6(sgra skor): Sh+yota?/ sogs sam/ yang na/ b+hI yau he tu b+hA yaM Sh+ya ka/ b+hI'i 'jigs pa'i rgyu la Shu ka'o// b+hI'i Ni tsa pha rol la 'jigs pa'i rgyu la Shuka a ga me 'gyur te/ Shu kaM byin pas/ b+hI Sha ya te/ a b+hi Sha te/
201a1(sgra skor): sogs so// !Sh+mi cung zad rgod pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ ni t+yaM sma ya te/ smA ya ti'i rtag tu'o// 'jigs pa'i rgyu dang sbyor ba na/ sma ya ti'i mtha' Ni tsa pha rol la Ata du rtag tu 'gyur te/ I
201a2(sgra skor): ata/ arti hrI sogs kyis pu kaM A ga ma byin pas/ smA pi zhes grub pa la/ b+hI saM dig las 'jigs pa'i rgyal 'os laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ 2Tasmra pa ya twe/ s+thA pa ye ta/ smA pa ya tAM/
201a3(sgra skor): a smA ba ya tA/ a sISh+mA pa tA/ l+r-i smA pA yAM ts+yai kre/ laTasmA pa yi tA/ na \u0f7fsmA pa yi ShISh+Ta/ sma pa yi Sh+ya ti/ a smA pa yi Sh+ya tau/ sogs so// n+yas+thA yI 'phel ba la'o zhes pa li Ni tsa spyir
201a4(sgra skor): swa yoHba \u0f7fs+phA yI'i ba'o// sA yau zhes pa'i mthe'i ya yig ni Ni tsa pha rol la pA yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/ mdo 'das par bsgyur bas/ s+pho bri zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ s+phA ba yA ti/ s+thA ba
201a5(sgra skor): yeta/ la s+thA ba ya tu/ a sA bA yata/ A si s+tha bta/ swA ba yAM tsa kA rA/ s+t+r-i[:]s+yA baM yau tA/ [ऽ]s+yA brAta/ swA ba yI Sh+ya ti/ a s+thA be yi Sh+yatA/ sogs so// !sha p+l-i 'jig pa la'o//
201a6(sgra skor): zhes pa la NaM tsi/ sha de ra ga to ta/ sha di'i 'gro ba ma yin pa la ta'o// sha di'i mthe'i da yig ni ba lang lta bu 'gro ba yin pa brjo pa'i don la Ni tsa pha rol la ta yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/ shA ti zhes
201b1(sgra skor): grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ sh+tsA ta yA ti/ shwA ta yeta/ la sha ta ya tu/ a shA ta ya tA/ sa a shrI sha tata/ la shA ta yAM tsa kA ra/ la shwA ta yi tA/ s+thAshA t+yAta/ shA ta yi Sh+ya ti/
201b2(sgra skor): a shA ta yi Sh+yat+ta/ sogs so// 'gro ba yin+da na da tar mi 'gyur bas/ a shwa d+ha ya ti/ a shI sha data/ sogs so// tshig rmugs dang sbyar ba'i dper brjid ni/ phu lI ni shA ta ya ti/ gA/ shang
201b3(sgra skor): ya ti go pA la kA/ daM ru ha s+ye ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ ru haH/ poTan+ya ta ra s+ya/ ru ha'i pa yang nA'o// ru he zhes pa'i mtha'i ha yig ni Ni tsa pha rol la pa yig tu yang naM[।]@/ bsgyur te/
201b4(sgra skor): kyang 9/ prI zhe grub pa tA laT sogs sbyar bas/ ro ba la taM/ ro pa yeta/ ro pa ya ta?/ a ro pa yat+ta/ a rU ru pata/ ro pa yA tsA kA ra/ bA yI tA/ ro
201b5(sgra skor): ro ba yAMSh+Ta ti/ a ro pa yiSh+TaMta/ stsogs sam/ ltung na par ma bsgyur bas/ ro hwA s+ya ti/ a rU ru haH/ sogs so/ krI r+dz+dzasaM brdi ba la'o zhes pa lA Ni tsi sbyar/ kwing \u0f7f/
201b6(sgra skor): dzi rnams kyi Ni la'o// krInya rdzas brje ba/ ing klog pa/ dzi rgyal ba rnams kyi mtha' Ni tsa pha rol la Ata ngu bsgyur te/ arti hI sogs kyis puka byin pas/ kA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar ba/
202a1(sgra skor): laT krA pa yA ti/ lakrA pa yeta/ TakA pa ya tu/ la.A pa kra ya ta/ lu a tsi krA pata/ krA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ sa krA pa yi tA/ bAn krA pyA ta/ l+r-i krA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-i.a kA pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogaso//
202a2(sgra skor): a d+hi sngon ma'i ing klog pa la Ni tsa/ krI ing sogs kyis mtha' Ata/ arti hI sogs kyis puka A ga ma/ ika gi atsa la ya Nar bsgyur bas/ a d+h+yA pi zhes pa la laT sogs sgyusbyar bas/ a d+h+yA pa ya ti/
202a3(sgra skor): a d+hU pa yetA/ a d+hU pa ya ta?/ a d+hU pa yata/ sogs dang / lung la/ No tsa saM sh+tsa ngo/ Ni la'ang sanA tsang dag la'o// NI tsa dang bcas pa'i son dzang cing dag pha rol la'ang ing gi gang du yang ni bsgyur
202a4(sgra skor): gang du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a d+hA dzI ga pa ta/ sogs dang / ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a d+hi sngon ma'i A pi la tsang / A i ru log/ de gnyis brjod a tsa dang po sogs kyis AT/ AT las kyi nga ngos
202a5(sgra skor): 'phel baM/ e tsa'i aya sogs kyis ai A ya/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a d+h+ya yi pa ta/ sogs so// liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ a d+h+yA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ laHa d+hU pa yitA/
202a6(sgra skor): na.a d+h+yA prAta/ l+r-isa? a d+h+yA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ a d+hU pa yi Sh+yata/ sogs so// dzaM rgyal ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ krI ing dzaM sogs kyi mtha' Ata arti hI sogs kyis pu ka mtha' a ga ma byin pas/ dzA paM
202b1(sgra skor): zhe sa grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ dzA pi ya ti/ dzA pa yeta/ dzA pa ya tu/ a dzA pa yata/ a dzI dzA ba tA/ l-i dzA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ !dzA pa yi tA/ ! dzA b+hAt+tha/ n+dza dzA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ a dzA pA
202b2(sgra skor): yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// Shi d+ha yang dag par mnyes pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ sai t+yA te ra pA ra lo ki ke/ si d+h+yA ti'i 'jig rten pha rol nyid ma yin pa la'o// si d+hA ti'i ai yig 'jig rten pha rol gyi don
202b3(sgra skor): nyid ma yin pa la Ni pha rol la Ata du bsgyur bar bya ste/ sa d+ha zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ 2 sA d+ha ya ti/ li sA d+ha ye ta/ lo sA d+ha ya tu/ la.A sA d+hA yata/ la.a sI sA d+ha ta/ sA d+ha yAM tsa kA ra/ sA
202b4(sgra skor): d+ha yi tA/ [।]sA t+yA tA/ l+r-i/ sA d+ha yai Sh+yaM ti/ a sA d+ha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ yang na se d+ha ya ti/ sa.a sAM si d+hat+ta/ sogs so// de dag tshig grogs dang bcas pa'i dper brjod naM/ rI dza sA d+ha ya ti/
202b5(sgra skor): gu ruHse d+hA ya ti/ tsinya sogs pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsA sbyar/ tsi s+phu ror+N+No/ tsi sU ra dag gi Ni la'o// tsinya dang s+phA ra dag gi Ni tsa pha rol la Ata du yang na bsgyur te/ Ata du bsgyur ba'i phyogs [।।ऽ]/
202b6(sgra skor): tha ma mnyes par 'dod/ la/ arti hI sogs kyis puka A ga ma byin pas/ tsi pi zhes thub pa la laT sogs sbyar ba sa/ la tsA pa ya ti/ liT tsA pa ye ta/ tsA pa ya tu/ au tsA pa ya ti/ 2a tsI tsa pata/
203a1(sgra skor): sa tsA pa yU tsa kA ra/ atsA ba li t+yA/ atsA prAtA/ ShiHtsA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ a tsA pa yi Sh+yata/ sogs sam/ yang na a tsa'i ny+Nita la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ tsA ya ya tI/ a tsI tsa yata/
203a2(sgra skor): sogs so// s+phur 'phro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ tsi s+phA ra ga gi Ni la 'os/ ata du bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ Ata du bsgyur ba'i phyogs lo/ s+thu ri zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/
203a3(sgra skor): ra ya ti/ s+phA ra ye ta/ sa s+phA ra ya tu/ a s+phA ra yi ta/ a pu s+phA rAta/ la srA ra yAM tsa kA ra/ s+phA ra yi tA/ ! skA r+YA tA/ l+r-is+phA re yi Sh+ya tI/ si.A skA ra yi Sh+yata/ sogs sam/ Ata du ma bsgyur ba'i
203a4(sgra skor): phyogs la/ s+pho ra ya tI/ a puM stA rata/ sogs so// benya thags kyi rgyu la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ pra dza ni bI ya teH/ bI yau ti'i rab du skye ba li'o// bI ya ti'i rab tu skye ba'i don la 'jug pa na Ni tsa pha rol la
203a5(sgra skor): ata du bas+thar te/ pu byin pas/ bA pau zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ dA pa sa bA pa yaM/ bA pa la tu/ a bA ba ya ti/ a b+hi ba pata/ bA bi sAM tsa kA ra/ b+hI pa yipAd+baH
203a6(sgra skor): bI rI yi Sh+ya ti/ a bA ba yi Sh+yata/ sogs sam/ yang ni shita ma yin pa nye ba'i yul la e tsa'i Ata 'os i tsa Ata/ shA naM sogs kyis yuka A ga ma byin/ ba yi zhes pa la liT sogs sbyar
203b1(sgra skor): pras/ pA la ya ti/ a bI ba yata/ sogs so// Sh+Tunya bstod pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ a tsa'i ny+Nita la 'os 'phel ba byas/ sta bi zhes grub pa la lan sogs sbyar bsdu/ s+thA bA yata/ swA hA
203b2(sgra skor): yeH/ smA ba ya t+yA/ a snA byA yata/ at+sar+b+hu bs+t+waM ba yA tsa kA rA At+mat+ka sA pa yau d+ha/ ma srA b+h+r-ita/ s+yA byA siSh+yA ti/ ho.a s+t+raM byA yiSh+TuH/ sogs so// b+hU yod pa la'o zhes pa laM r+t+tiH/ 'phel ba byas
203b3(sgra skor): pas/ b+hU bi sa grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ b+hA ba ya tI/ b+hA ba yAMt+ma/ b+hA ba yat+ta/ e b+hA ba yata/ sogs dang / lung la/ oHpra yauHdz+nyA pA raM/ A pyA yaN dza a pha rol la'o// s+yAN la byings
203b4(sgra skor): gnyis brjod pa'i a b+h+yA sa'i u yig ni puM sne pa ste dang yaN so sor ba sdu ba'i yi ge rnams dang dza yig dang u yig rnams gang rung zhig pha rol ni yod na ai yig tu bsgyur te/ skabs 'dir aka ma
203b5(sgra skor): phyis pa la yeng ba la maung pha rolA la san bzhin nos/ san dang 'dra ba'i bya ba 'jug pas/ u ir bsgyur/ yang ba'i ring po 'os de ring por bsgyur/ Ni phyis pas/ a bI thA btaM/ sogs dang / la yig lhag ma rnams
203b6(sgra skor): lo/ 2 b+hA ba yAM tsa kA ra/ lab+hA ba yi tA/ [ऽ]thA bAta/ b+ha ba yai Sh+ya ta/ a thA ba li Sh+yata/ sogs so// lu sre ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsau sbyar 'phel ba byas/ yA bi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas
204a1(sgra skor): laTayA ba ya ti/ ling yA ba ye ta/ 2ya bA ya ta?/ 2a yA ba yata/ lung la/ a ka ma phyis pa sogs kyis san bzhin gyi bya ba 'jug pas/ u e dang / de ring por bsgyur bas/ a yI ya ba tA/ sogs
204a2(sgra skor): dang / liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ ya[:]yA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ laT yA pa yi tA/ srin na li yA byA ta/ l+r-iT yA ba yi Sh+ya ta/ l+r-ing a yA ba yi Sh+ya ta/ gas so// de bzhin du/ dzi 'gro ba la'o zhes pa lai Ni tsa sbyar bas/ dzA bi zhes grub pa
204a3(sgra skor): la laT sogs sbyar bas/ TadzA ba ya ti/ dzI ba ye ta/ l+r-idzA pa ya tu/ a dzA ba ya ta/ lung a dzI dza bta/ l+r-iTadzA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ dzA pa yi tA/ sa[ऽ]dzA byA ta/ dzA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ a dzA ba yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so//
204a4(sgra skor): su 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsA sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ s+yA bi zhes pa la la Ta sogs sbyar bas/ swa ba ya/ ska ba ye ta/ srA ba ya tu/ u srA ba yata/ sogs dang / lung la/ s+thA ba ti shr-i two ti dra ba ti pra ba
204a5(sgra skor): tip+pa pra ti bya ba tI nAM pA/ sra ba tI/ shr-i No ti drA ba ti pra ba ti p+la ba ti/ bya ba ti rnams kyi yang na'o// su 'gro ba shru nyan pa/ dru 'gro ba su dang p+lung dang byung rnams 'gro ba rnams kyi swan dang Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la a b+h+yA
204a6(sgra skor): sa i ra yang na bsgyur te/ a si sra bta/ sogs sam/ a su sra bta/ sogaso// la yig lhag ma rnams la/ sA ba yA tsa kA ra/ sasrA ba yi tA/ rkyen swa bA ta/ srA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-i.a srA ba yi Sh+ya ta/ sogaso// dau
204b1(sgra skor): bzhin du/ shru thos pa la Ni tsa s+yAr+yA bAs+dza/ b+hU bi zhes pa la laT sogs sgyur bas/ b+hA ba ya ti/ shrA ba yAMH/ 2shrA ba yat+ta/ a shrA bA yata/ sogs dang / lung la/ Ir yang na bsgyur bas/ A shI shra dat+ta/

204b3(sgra skor): drA bi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ drA bI ya ti/ drA ba yita/ drA ba ya tA/ a drA ba yata/ lung laM/ ir yang ne bsgyur bas/ au ngi dra ba tA/ sogs sam/ a du drA bta/ sogs so// liT sogs lhag
204b4(sgra skor): mA rnams la/ dra ba tsa kAr/ drA be yi tA/ [ऽ]d+h+we byAta/ drA ba yi ts+tsha ti/ a d+he ba yi Sh+yaH/ sogs so// pu 'gro ba la Ni tsa sbyar/ prA bi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ prA ba yi tA/ prA p+tA
204b5(sgra skor): yet+ti/ prA ba ya tA/ A prA bA yat+ta/ sogs dang / lung le/ ir yung na bsgyur byas/ A prI pra bat+tA/ sogs sam/ a pu pyA bta/ sogs so// liT sogs lhag ma rnams lA/ prA ba yAM tsa kA ra/ prA be yi

205a1(sgra skor): 2a prA ba yata/ sogs dang / lung la/ ir yang na bsgyur bas/ a pi prA bta/ sogs sam/ a pu p+la bta/ sogs so// liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ yi prA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ prA ba yi tA/ mra
205a2(sgra skor): byAta/ l+r-i prA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ A prA yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// byung 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ byA bi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ byA ba ya ti/ 5b+ha ba ya ta/ se byA be ya tu/

205a4(sgra skor): ba yi Sh+ya ti/ a b+hu pra yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// gu hU kun nas sgrib pa la'o// sa pa la Ni tsi sbyar/ go ha'i u pa d+hA'i At+ma 'os ring por bsgyur bas/ gu hi zhes grub pa la laT laM sogs pa rnams
205a5(sgra skor): sbyar bas/ laT gU ha ya ti/ li gu ha ye ta/ laT gU ha ya tu/ la a gU ha yata/ lung a dzu gu hA da/ TagU ha yang tsa kA ra/ laT gA ha yi ta/ blon pa'i au gA h+ya ta/ l+r-iTagU ha yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing a gU ha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogaso//
205a6(sgra skor): du Sha nyon mongs po la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ do Sho Nau/ dai Sha'i Ni la'o// du Sha'i u pa d+hA'i u ni Ni pha rol la U ru 'gyur te/ dA She zhes pa la laT sogs sbyor bas/ dU Sha yaM ti/ dU Sha ye ti dwai Sha ya tu/ la a
205b1(sgra skor): d+hud+hA Sha yata/ a du dU Shata/ dU ShA yAM tsa ka ra/ d+hA Sha yi tA/ !d+hA Sh+yA ta/ l+r-in+da d+hu Sha yi Sh+ya ti/ aHa dA Sha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / bA tsit+ta bi ra gai/ sems nyon mongs pa la yang na'o// dU Sha'i u pa d+hA'i u yig ni sems
205b2(sgra skor): nyon mongs pa la 'jug pa na Ni pha rol la Ur yang na 'gyur te/ Ur bsgyur ba'i tshig bstan zin la/ mi bsgyur ba'i phyogs la puka mtha' stsogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ do Sha ya ti/ a a d+hA du Shata/ sogs so//
205b3(sgra skor): g+hA Ta byed pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ mi tAM hra swaHma 'gro ba rnams kyi thung ngu'o// g+ha Ta la sogs pa ma 'gro ba'i ming can rnams kyi u pa d+hA Ni tsa pha rol la thung ngur bsgyur te/ g+ha Ta ya ti/ g+ha Ta ye ta/ !g+ha Ta ya tu/ a sta
205b4(sgra skor): Ta yatA/ 2a dzI g+ha Tata/ l-i[:]g+ho Ta yAM tsa kA ra/ laHg+ha Ta yi tA/ ![ऽ] g+ha D+ha ta/ g+ha Ta yi Sh+ya ti/ wa.a g+ha Ta yi Sh+yata/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ bya tha sU l-i dang 'jigs pas g.yo ba dag la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar u
205b5(sgra skor): pa d+ha'i 'os 'phel ba byas pa slar thung ngur bsgyur bas/ byA thi le laT sogs sbyar bas/ 5 bya tha ya ti/ bya tha yeta/ bya tha ya tu/ a bya tha yata/ 2a bI bya thata/ la bya tha yAM tsa kA ra/ labya tha yi tha/ bya
205b6(sgra skor): b+hUta/ l+r-ibya tha yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-i a b+h+ra tha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// dza ni skye ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ dza ni dz+r-I Sha k+Sha sa rany+tso man+tash+tsa/ dza nI dz+r-I ShA kA sa rany+dza'i 'dam mtha' 'o// dza ni skye ba/ dz+nye Shu lang tshe nyams pa/ kA sa
206a1(sgra skor): s+thA/ rany+dza chos rnams kyi'ang No tsa pha rol la mtha' can du ming 'dogs byed du/ dgos pa ni mu 'gro ba rnams kyi thung d+ha 'os u pat+tA thang ngur bsgyur ba'i don te/ rAdza na ya ti/ dz+nyA na yet+ta/ dzA nA ya ta?/ a
206a2(sgra skor): na yata/ a dzI dza nata/ dza na yAM tsa kA ra/ !dza na yi tA/ mA[।]dza n+yA ta/ dza na yau Sh+ya ti/ a dza ni Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// !dz+r-i Sha lang tshe nyams pa la Ni tsa/ a tsaM'i ny+Nita la 'os 'phel bo/ dz+nyA ni dzI Sha kA sa
206a3(sgra skor): rany+dza'i 'ang ma mtha' 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ dza ri zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ ladza ra ya ti/ adza ra ye ta/ la dza ra ya tu/ la.a dza ra yata/ sa.a dzI dza rata/ dza ra yAM tsa kA ra/ dza ra yi tA/ b+hin ma dza rA ta/ laTadza
206a4(sgra skor): ra yai Sh+ya ti/ a dza ra yi Sh+yata/ sogs so// krA sa sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ k+Sha si zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ k+Sha sa ya tI/ [ऽ]kA sa yeta/ sak+Sha sa ya tu/ a k+Sha sa yata/ !a nI kA saM te/ lak+Sha
206a5(sgra skor): sa yAM tsa kA ra/ laTak+ShA sa yi ta/ rkyen ling g+ha s+yAta/ l+r-iT k+Shi sa yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing a k+Sha sa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// rany+dza chos la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ rany+dzi la laT sogs sbyar pas/ la rany+dza ya ti/ la rany+dzA ye ta/ rany+dzA ya tu/ la.a
206a6(sgra skor): rany+dza yata/ la a rI rany+dza ta/ li rany+dza yAM tsa kA ra/ laHrany+dza yi tA/ sman ya rany+dza ta/ a rany+dza yi Sh+ya ti/ a rany+dzi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// 'grel par lung dras pa/ rany+tsaur+No mr-i ga ra sa Ne ne lo paHrany+dza'i Ni la ri dgas kyi mdog
206b1(sgra skor): lan dbyi'o// rany+dza'i NI pha rol la ri dgas kyi mdog la 'jug pa na nA dbyi ste/ ra dza ya ti/ a rA ri dzata/ sogs so// dz+ha khong du chud pA la Ni tsa sbyar/ dz+nyA pa ya ti/ a dzI dz+nyA pata/ sogs dang / mA ra NA two ShAN
206b2(sgra skor): nAMnI shwA ma ne Shu dzA/ 'chi ba dang dga' ba dang rno bar byed pa rnams la dz+nyA'o// 'chi ba la sogs pa don 'di rnams la 'jug pa na dz+nyA me 'gro ba'i ming can te/ dgos pa ni thung ngur bsgyur ba'i don te/ dz+nyA la Ni tsa ar+d+ha hrI sos
206b3(sgra skor): kyis puka A ga ma byin/ mdo 'dis u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur bas/ dz+nyA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar/ ladz+nyA pA ya ti/ l-idz+nya pa yeta/ la dzA pa ya tu/ a dz+ha pa yata/ a a dz+r-I dz+nya pata/ 2dz+nyA pa yU
206b4(sgra skor): tsa kA ra/ dz+nyA pa yi tAM/ byon pa'i[ऽ]dz+ha pyA ta/ laMTadz+nya pa yi Sh+ya ti/ 3au.a dz+nya pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// don de rnams 'jug pa'i tshig grogs dang sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/ saM dz+nya pa ya ti sha trun/ ma sa kun tu 'chi ba 'a/ bi dz+nyA
206b5(sgra skor): pa ya te rA dzA naM/ rgyal ba rnams dgyes par 'dod/ dz+nyA pa ya ti shas+t+raM lta bu'o// mtshan ma rab tu rno bar byed par 'dang/ dzA la 'bar pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ dz+wa la hA la h+ma la na mo&nu pa sarbA ta bA glA sna pa nA mash+tsa/ nyer bsgyur med pa las/ dzA
206b6(sgra skor): la/ hA la/ h+ma la/ nam dang glA sna ba na/ ba ma'i 'ang ngo // nyer bsgyur sngon du med pa la/ dza la 'bar ba/ hra la dang h+ma lo g.yo ba/ Na ma sgra rnams dang / gla lus rnam par nyams pa/ sna gautsang ba/ ba na slong ba/
207a1(sgra skor): Tu ba ma skyug pa rnams kyang ma 'gro ba'i ming can te/ dgos pa ni thung ngur bsgyur ba'i don te/ dz+wa la ya ti/ dzA la ye ta/ ladzA la ya tu/ la.a dzA la yata/ a dzI dzA lata/ 5dzA lA yA tsa kA
207a2(sgra skor): rA/ Tadz+wa la yi tA/ smon tsa dzA lA ta/ l+r-iT dzA la yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing a dz+wa la yi Sh+ya te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ hwa la g.yo ba la Ni tsa sbyar/ thung ngur bsgyur/ hA l-i zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laTahra la ya ti/ a
207a3(sgra skor): dzI hra lata/ sogs so// h+ma la g.yo ba la Ni tsa sbyar thung ngur bsgyur/ h+ma liM zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ 5h+ma la ya ti/ lu a dzI hwA lata/ sogs so// Na ma s+tha la Ne tsa thung ngur bsgyur/ 2na ma ya tI/
207a4(sgra skor): a nI na mAta/ sogs so// glA lus rnam par nyams pa la/ Ni tsa sbyar/ puka A ga ma byi na/ thung ngur bsgyur bas/ !gla pa ya ti/ l+r-ing a dzI gla pa tA/ sogs so// taMSh+Ta gtsang ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa
207a5(sgra skor): arti hrI sogs kyis puka a ga ma thung ngur bsgyur/ sna pi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laTasna pa ya ti/ au sISh+Ta pa ta/ sogs so// ba na slong ba la Ni tsa thung ngur bsgyur/ ba ni zhes pa la laT sogs
207a6(sgra skor): sbyar bas/ ba na ya ti/ a a bI ba nata/ sogs so// Tu pa ma skyug pa la Ni tsa thung ngur bsgyur bas/ ba mi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ ba ma ya ti/ au.a bI pa mata/ sogs so//
207b1(sgra skor): nyer bsgyur yod na thung ngur mi bsgyur te/ pra dzI la ya ti/ prA dzI dzA lata/ sogs so// ka mu mdzes pa la'o// zhes pa la Ni tsA/ na ka mya mi tsa maHkama? a ma tsam gyi ma yin no// ka mu mdzes pa/ a mi
207b2(sgra skor): nad/ tsom za ba rnams ma mtha' can ma yin te/ dgos pa ni thung ngur mo bsgyur ba'i don te/ u pa d+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas/ kA mi zhes pa la mdo 'dis thung ngur mi bsgyur/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ kA ma ya ti/
207b3(sgra skor): yAkA ma ye ta/ ya kA mA ya tu/ a kA ma yata/ lu ra.a nI kA maM ta/ la kA ma yAM tsa kA ra/ saHkAM ma yi tA/ rlan pang kA mA tau/ kI ma yi Sh+ya ti/ thib a kA ma yi Sh+ya ti/ sog so// a maMHda la'o zhes pa la Ni
207b4(sgra skor): 'phel ba byas/ A mi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ I ma ya tI/ A ma yeH/ la.a ma ya tA/ A ma yata/ lung la/ me Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod pas/ A mi mata/ sogs dang / liT sogs lhag ma
207b5(sgra skor): rnams lo/ A ma yAM tsa kA ra/ sa?.A ma yi tA/ sman ming A myAta/ aM A ma yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing a ma yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so// tsa ma za ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas/ tsA mi zhes pa la laT sogs
207b6(sgra skor): sbyar bas/ tsA ma ye ti/ tsA me ye ta/ tsA ma ye tu/ oM tsa ma yata/ a tsa tsa mata/ tsA ma yAM tsa kA ra/ satsA ma yi ta/ r+tha satsA myAta/ zang tsA ma yi Sh+ya ta Sha a tsA ma yi Sh+yaH
208a1(sgra skor): sogs so// dzaM/ sha mu nye bar zhi ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ 'phel ba byas pas/ laT shA ma yA tiHling/ a shI sha ma ta/ sogs so// sha mo 'ang R+sha ne mita/ shra mu'i mi mthong ba la ma 'gro ba'o// sha mu mi mthong ba'i don la 'jug
208a2(sgra skor): pa na ma 'gro ba'i ming can te dgos pa ni thung ngur bsgyur ba'i don te/ mdo 'di sau thung ngur bsgyur/ sha mi zhes grub pa la la Ta sogs sbyar bas/ yaHsha ma ya ti/ ling / sha ma ye ta/ loT sha ma ya tu/ lang a sha ma ya tu/ lung / a shi sha
208a3(sgra skor): mataHles sha ma yAM tsaM kA ra/ luT/ sha ma yi tAM/ smon li sha myA ta/ l+r-iTasha ma ya b+hi/ srang a sha ma yi Sh+yata/ sogs so// ya mu nye bar zhi ba la Ni tse 'phel ba byas pas/ laTayA ma ya ti/ la yA ma ye ta/ loHA ma ya tu/ lang a yA
208a4(sgra skor): ma yata/ lung a yi yA ma ta/ lin+na yA ma yAM tsa kA ra/ lusa? yA mA yi tA/ sbyod 'i yA myad/ sr-iHyA ma yi Sh+ya ti/ li/ a yA ma yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / ya mo pa ri pe Sha te/ ya mu'i yongs su 'jug pa ma yin pa la'o// ya mu'i yongs su 'jug pa ma yin/
208a5(sgra skor): pa la 'gro ba'i ming can du bya ste/ dgos pa ni thung ngur bsgyur ba'i don no// laT ya ba yA ti/ lu ya yI ya mata/ sogs so// s+kha dir rko ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ u pa d+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas/ s+thA di zhes pa la laT sogs
208a6(sgra skor): sbyar bas/ lasa?s+thA da ya ti/ dze s+thA ra ye ta/ !s+thA da ya tu/ Ta a s+tha da yata/ la a dwe sma dang/ lasa?m+b+ha da yAM tsa kA ra was+thA da yi tA/ blod cing s+kha d+yAta/ l+r-iHs+thA dau yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing e s+thA da Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / s+tha dir ba pa ri b+h+yAM saMs+thA
208b1(sgra skor): ngi'i a ba dang pa ri dag las kyang ngo // u ba dang pa ri ngag las pha rol gyi sgra de'i 'ang 'gro ba'i ming can te/ thung ngur bsgyur bas/ a ba s+kha da ya ti/ pa ri sma da ya ti/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ so pa sarba s+tha dweHpa Na sh+tsa mit+se tsI dA/ nyer bsgyur
208b2(sgra skor): dang bcas pa'i sgra de dang pa Na dag gis 'gro ba 'ga' shig tu yang nA'o// nyer bsgyur gang rung zhig sngon na yo da pa'i sgra dir dang pha Na gnyis ni skabs 'ga' zhig tu ma 'gro ba'i ming can du yang na bar bya ste/ pra s+tha da~M ya ti/ pra b+hA ra
208b3(sgra skor): ti/ sogs so// pa Na s+thA la'o zhes pa la Ni 'phel ba byas/ pA Ni zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ la/ pA Na ya ti/ ling phA Na ye/ lo/ yA Na ya ta?/ 2a pA Na yata/ lung a bI pa Nad/ le pa Na yAM tse kA ra/ l+ra/ phA Na yi tA/
208b4(sgra skor): n+yA n+tu/ b+h+ya Na pA~M \u0f7fk+She A pra Na li bA / sogs dang / Ter bsgyur sngon du byung na nyir bskur dang bcas pa'i myu dngu la ngan pogs kyi 'ang badren gyis mid du yang na bar byas pas/ pra pa Na ya ti/ sog sa sas/
208b5(sgra skor): yA ti/ sogs s+ho// iNi 'gro ba la 'o zhe pA la niH/ rtog ma bo d+ha ne/ khong du ri pa ma smin pa la ni wA ga mI'o// khod du chud pa'i don ma yin pa la Ni tsaM rol lA i/ nI ga mi skyes par bsgyu bar b+ha ste/ i badz+ro don yin pa
208b6(sgra skor): phyis pa Ni tsi'i i la dras pas/ ga mi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ wa~M ga ma ya ti/ sreg ma yed/ ga ma ye ts+tsha.a ga ma ya tA/ A r+the ga mAt+ma / gre sa y-i/
209a1(sgra skor): rgyu/ ga ma / ma gas t+ya/ nga bdud pa do la 'dag pa dag myi 'gyun/ marlo mams 'phel bu byas pas/ ya yi nus grub pa la laT sogs sbyar/ A ya pa da/
209a2(sgra skor): sogs dang / lung la A yi/ tsang byings gnyis brjod/ a tse dang po sogs kyis AT/ aT las kyang ngos 'phel ba/ e tse'i a ya sogs kyiso A ya Ni la tsang la sogs kyis u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur Ni'i iT med pa
209a3(sgra skor): la 'os Ni phyis pasa?/ A ya yata/ sogs so// h+yan 'tshe ba la Ni tsa sbyar/ ha na sto&tsaN+Ta lo/ tsiN dang NAl dag ma yin pa la han gyi ta'o// tsiN dang Na la ma yin pa'i nya Na 'gro ba'i rkyen pha rol la ha ni gyi mtha' ta yig tu
209a4(sgra skor): 'gyur te/ han+ti'i ha'i nyan 'gro ba la'ang ngos/ ha g+ha mdo 'dis nata 'phel ba byas/ g+hA ti zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ lAHg+hA tA ya ti/ ling g+hA da ye ta/ loHg+hA ta ya tu/ lang+ra sa g+hA ta ya ta/ lung/ A d+hI g+hA tatra
209a5(sgra skor): g+ha t+yA yAM naM k+Sha ra/ wa g+hA ta yi tA/ tha~M a g+hA t+ya tA/ l+r-iHg+hA ta yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ida?/ a g+hA ta ye Sh+yad/ sogs so// aun+d+ha phrag dog gi don la'o zhes pa nI tsa sbyar/ in+d+hi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ 5/ ir+d+ha ya ti/
209a6(sgra skor): yed/ lo/ ir+Nu ya tu/ lang/ er+Nu yata/ sogs dang / lung la/ Ir+t+ti la/ tsang Sha Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/ a tsaM dang po sogs kyis ADa 'phel ba byas/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni Ni phyis pas/ erI Sh+yata/
209b1(sgra skor): sogs sam/ yang n+ya/ Ir+yA tesmr-i tI la s+yA drA/ in+d+ra tI'i gsum pa'i gnyis so// ir+thA ti'i Ni dang bcas pa'i cing pha rol la hal brtags pa'i gsum pa de nyid yang na gnyis brjod de/ brtsegs pa'i gsum pa sa nyid gnyis brjod pas/
209b2(sgra skor): ed+d+hi ya/ sogs so// sa m-i ga lpag sa rnams pa.iH yU tsak+Sha pA sa/ n+na si d+ha/ rgod de In+ma/ In+na liHdwe/ kr-iH/ en+d+ra yi byad// sogs so// e te bA Ne ni b+hA kar NA s+yA sA t+kada~M/ dzan+ta/ sa maSh+TA/ rnas pa
209b3(sgra skor): b+hu kar Ni'i mdol sa Ni tsa mtha can rnams rdzogs so// de rnams kyis 'di spong pa'i chen po na ci tha kar Na gzung 'grel gyi nod ni tshig dper brjod sogs zir bris
209b4(sgra skor): bkod pa legs bshang nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las Ni tsa'i mthar can rnams kyi chog rags pa rnams re shig rdzogs so// gnyis pa byings byings su bsgrub pa'i rkyen san gyi 'jug yul rnams bshad par bya ste/ d+hA two/ karma
209b5(sgra skor): pa man d+ha~M kA dIm+b+ha ya~M hA/ byings las las dang dod pa byed pa pos nyas pa lAs ya no'o// byings las pha rol tu bya ba'i las dang 'dod pa'i don byed pa po mnyam pa ste/ byed pa po dang bcas pa rtogs par byed pa'i don la par
209b6(sgra skor): yangan 'byung / a pog/ phan sbyar/ lungs na ngag la sna sle 'os g+ha sler bsgyu sa byos/ san yang dgo la 'os byings gnyis brjo / ku ha dag gi nu 'os/ g+hadz+dza a b+ha sa'i cir bang 'os/ dz+ha dza ma
210a1(sgra skor): i ta bos/ ir bsgyur// bAr lA nAr 'os sa tar bsgyur bas/ dzi b+hat+sa nAs grub pa la la/ sogs sbyar/ byed pa po la sha pa/ rdzus 'brel phyis nas/ a ta lA yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs
210a2(sgra skor): su bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ dzI g+had+b+ha ti/ e dzaM g+har+theta/ grAt+sa tu/ a dzaM g+hat+pat+sa/ sogs dang / lung la/ itat+ta byin/ ata kyi dbyi 'os oM phyis bAs/ a dzI g+had+d+hi/ a dzaM g+had+b+haSh+TaM/ a dzI b+had+d+hiHsogs so/
210a3(sgra skor): la k+Shas sogs kyis am / sbyar/ a kyi dbyi sa oM phyis bAs/ dzI g+had+g+ha tsa kAr/ dzi b+hadz+nyA ba d+hU pa/ dzo g+hAd+hamA sA/ sogs so// luT i khyin A phyis pas/ dzaM g+ham+l-i/ dzaM g+had+d+hi tA saM/ sogs so//
210a4(sgra skor): smon pa'i lid la/ dzi g+hat+sata/ dzi g+hat+s+ya stAM/ dzi g+hat+ma suHsogs so// l+r-iT la/ i Ti byin a phyis pasadzi g+hit+sa Sh+ye tAM/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-inga? lA/ a dzi g+hat+si Sh+yatA/ sogs so// ding zad pa la'o zhes
210a5(sgra skor): pi las na b+hAr gnyis brjod thung bsgyur bste/ dI dISh+Ta zhes pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ di dI Sha te/ r-i dA Sheta/ di dI ShAH/ a di dI Shatra/ au daM dI liH/ di dIShAM tsa kre/ wadi
210a6(sgra skor): dISh+Ti tA/ ngi pI ngiShAH/ si ri dI 'i ts+yai ta/ l+r-ing ma de de'i rgya// bogs dang / 'brel par lung drangs pa/ dI / sa tsU tI ke tsi drA/ ding gi san la a nyid 'gal zhig tu yang na'o// ding gi san pha rol la a nyid du bsgyur ba skabs 'gar ya
210b1(sgra skor): na bar bya ste/ Ata du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a b+h+yA sa thung ngar bstA rA/ san la ita 'os it+ta du bsgyur bas/ di dwe zhes pA la laHsogs sbyar bas/ ngi dA sa te/ di dA se ta/ di dA sa tA/ A di dA sa ta/
210b2(sgra skor): did+yA siSh+Tangi dA swaMH/ didA si di dI siShIH/ a ring sa t+yai/ a di dA si Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// d+yu ta 'bar ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ san yang dag la 'os gnyis brjod/ d+yung dang
210b3(sgra skor): sA paM dag gi swaM pra sA ra Na 'os/ a b+h+yA ma saM pra sA rA Na ra bsgyur/ bal dang po'i ita byin pas/ di d+yAta ita san zhes pa la/ ra lo d+ha pa d+had+b+ha la de si shwA/ u aM u pa d+hA tA la pa po dang ra la las+dza sa na'ang ngo // byings ha la dang po can i
210b4(sgra skor): yig dang u lig gang rung zhig u pa d+hA na yod pa dang byings ra yIg dang la yig mtha' can las pha rol gyi san iT dang bcas pa'ang kwa 'gro ba'i ming can du yang na bya ste/ kita kyi phyogs la yon tan mi byed/ kIta ma yin pa'i phyogs la puka
210b5(sgra skor): mtha' tshogs kyis yon tan byas pa / den tu'osam/ nga/ zhes pa grub pa la laT stsog pa d+hA rnams sgyur bas/ dwe d+ha r+b+hu / / ded+ha ti cog
210b6(sgra skor): a di d+yu ti Sha ta/ a da d+yo Sha ta/ a daM d+yu tiShiSh+Ta/ a di d+yo ti ShiH/ di d+yu ti ShAM tsa kre/ di d+yo tiSh+Tha tse kre/ di b+hI ti'i tA/ sa di d+hu ti Shi tA/ di d+yA ti Shi ShAny+dza/ dz+nyAn pa di d+yi tiShi ny+dzany+tsa/ di d+h+ya ti'i Sh+ya te/ di d+yu tiShi Sh+ya te/
211a1(sgra skor): a d+yu t+ta sh+tsa a d+ya d+h+ya taShaShi n+yata/ sogs so// ur+g+ha chag pa larnanas pa la san sbyar/ 'grel par u r+g+ha'i rgyu in dang bcas pa gnyis brjod zhes byung bas/ tshig gnyis brjod/ a b+h+yA sma'i ce
211a2(sgra skor): bsgyur bas/ u tsits+tshe zhes grub pa pA laT sogs sgyur bsku/ su rA um+b+hi Sh+Tha/ mu tsi r+thaM dzar+tha/ oM tsih+Na / u tsiny+dza Shi tsakA ra/
211a3(sgra skor): smod ling u tsits+tshe Sh+yaMta/ l+r-i.u tsits+tshe Sh+ya ti/ au tsats+tsha Sh+wa Sh+yata/ sogs so// ing glog pa la NaM dang san sbyar/ Ni la'ang san tsang dag la 'os/ yang na i gang du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu
211a4(sgra skor): 'os/ gA dzAM thung ngu 'o thung ngur bsgyur/ san la ita 'os/ de ita bal drang po'i iT byings thams cad pA sogs kyis yon tan/ arti hI sogs kyis puk+ka A ga ma byin/ e tsa'i a ya/ u d+hA sngon du gzhag
211a5(sgra skor): bas+dza/ A d+hi dzi gAM pa yi Sha zhes grubA pA la laT sogs sbyar/ A d+hi r+t+r-i gA pa yi Shau ti/ a d+hi dzAM gA pa yA Sheta/ a d+hI dz+nyAM g+hA pa yAM ShA tA/ l+r-ing a d+hi dzi gA pa yau Shata/ A d+h+ya dz+nyi pA pa yi ShAMta/ A
211a6(sgra skor): d+hu dzi gA pa yi ShaM tse kA ra/ lu.a d+hi dzi gA pa yi Shi ta/ smon pa'i li a d+hi dzi gA pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sraM[:]o d+hi dzi gA pa yi Shi Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing oM d+hI dza gI pa yi Shi Sh+yo ta/ sog sa dang / gang du ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ kri ing rnge
211b1(sgra skor): rnams kyi tshi la bos/ Ang bsgyur/ arti hrI sogs kyis puka A gA ma byan/ san yang dag la 'os pa DI dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/ balnga dang pa'i oM ta byin/ byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan e ne'i a ya sogs dang a d+hi sngon du
211b2(sgra skor): bzhag pas/ a d+h+yA ba pa yi'i/ zhes grub pa la laT sogos sbyar bus/ a d+h+ya pi pa yi ShA ti/ l+r-i.a d+h+yA pi pA yi ny+dzita/ sogs so// Tu o shI 'gro bA dang 'phel ba dag la'o zhes pa la NI dang sam Ni la 'a
211b3(sgra skor): swan tsang dag la 'os saM prA sA ra Na ra yang na bsgyur te/ ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ shi shwa ya yi ShA ti/ ny+dzab+h+r-i a shi shwa yA yi ShIta/ sogs dang / bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ shu shA ba yi Sha ti/ la.a shu sha bA yi
211b4(sgra skor): ShItra/ sogs dang / yAng Nitsa med pa byings nyi ts+li la san sbyar naH/ auT byin yon tan byas pasa?/ shi shA yai Sha tI/ lu a shi shwa ya ShIta/ sogs so// henya 'aglan pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsaM sran sbyar/ shi ta ma yin
211b5(sgra skor): pa nye ba'i yul sogs kyis e tse A tau/ hra'i saM pra sA ra Na 'os/ saM pra sl-i ra NAr bsgyu rau/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dzu hU pA yi Sha zhes grub pa lpa lAT sogs sbyar bus+yA/ la dzu hA bA yI Sha ti/ li dzu hA ba yi
211b6(sgra skor): Sheta/ pa dz+ra hA ba yi Sha tu/ la a dzu tra ba yai Shata/ lang a dzu dwe ba yi Shita/ \u0f7fdza hA ba l-i Sha tsi kA saur/ 2dzu ha ba yi She tA/ ShA dz+re hA pa li Sh+yata/ tredzu hA ba yau Sh+ya te/ a dz+r-i ha ba yi Shi Sh+yata/ sogs so// de au ni srog la'o zhes paM le san/
212a1(sgra skor): lA dang po'i iT byin/ srana? yang dag 'os/ na iT dang bcas pa gnyis brjod pas/ a nI ni Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar/ a ni ni Sha ti/ ling a nI ni She ta/ loHa ni ni la tu/ A ni ni Shata/ lung a naM
212a2(sgra skor): ni ny+dzita/ a ni ni ShAM tsaM kA ra/ a ni ni Shi ta/ gyon a ni niShi ThA tA/ l+r-i a nAM ni ShiHtA/ l+r-i a ni ni SheSh+ya ta/ sogs so// u b+h+r-i sA b+hA sa s+ya/ sa la a b+h+yA sa'i gnyis dag gi'o// a ni ti'i san pha rol la nyer
212a3(sgra skor): ra na Nar bsgyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung na a b+ha sa dang u pa d+hA'i na yig gnyis ka Na yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/ sA Ni Ni Sha ti/ sogs so// !bri ku 'jug pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ ha lan+ma ts+tshe ha la mtha'
212a4(sgra skor): sa kyibyung sna mtha' ha la so saur bAs+t+ra byaM yin+da pa u pa d+he na ika s+yo sor bsdu bA'i yi ga yong po de'i pha rol gyi san in+d+ra med pa ni ka 'gro ba'i mi can te/ 'dir a tang rnams la/ br-ita rnams lngas so so iH
212a5(sgra skor): 'jug/ gnyis brjod/ r-I'i aT/ de san lwa Iti 'os It+ta du bsgyu re/ mad+mo 'dis ki ti yi nA pa swa yon tAr sngogs mi byed/ bi brAt+ma zhes grub pa lA laT s+yo gas a teng rnams sbyar bas/ bi brIt+saM ti/ liHbi br-it+saH/
212a6(sgra skor): bi brih+ma tu/ a be br-ih+mad+ha/ a bi br-id+d+hota/ waM b+hi hrIdz+dzaka ra/ sabi br-it+sata/ klo sa bi ng+gahU~M kyai kyi br-i da/ oM thai br-id+yASh+ya ti/ sogs so// tang rnams la bol dang po'i in byin yon tan rgyas/ 'i byi
212b1(sgra skor): zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ bi brti Sha te/ la bi brti SheH/ bi brtiShA tAM/ sAHa thaM bar+t+tiSha tA/ a bi brti ShiH/ a bi bar+t+tiShAM tsakre/ bi brtiShi tA/ A sa? bi bat+tiSh+TiH/ byaM bi bAn+thi'i Sh+yate/ a bi ba tiSh+ThAH
212b2(sgra skor): sogs so// nr-id+hi lus bskyed pa la'o zhes pa la stan sbyar/ kr-ita r+the/ n+do d+hI/ n+yaita sogs kyis in+d+ra yang na par byas/ in med pa'i phyogs la/ san+ta kI/ ta yin pas yon tan sogs mi byed / e'i phyogs la yon tan
212b3(sgra skor): gnyis brjo phyogs kyis bslabasdu bas/ nAn+na / ni me 9/ mAM \u0f7f/ sa naits+tsha/ A nI naMr+m+mAr+dz+dzaH/ a nIHSh+Ta/ a nim Sh+Thi/
212b4(sgra skor): nor+ha ShAM tsa kA ra/ nenr-id+hit+ta/ ni nirbA tA/ nAn+dats+tsha/ sa ni marbiny+dzAH/ nInr-id+hi Sh+ya ti/ nin d+hiShiSh+Tha tAM/ a nan+d+raN+DiH/ u ni ni \u0f7f daSh+Tat+ta/ sogs so// d+hirgya 'i bar byed pa dang sgro lnga bar byed pa la 'o gas pa
212b5(sgra skor): san sbyar/ iT sa nI bA/ san la iT yang na'o// br-ing br-iny+ra dag dang byings r-Ita mtha' rnams las pha rol gyi sanA la iT yang nra 'gyur ro// aM ko dz+ha la/ ika las dz+hal la'o// byings ika so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge'i
212b6(sgra skor): mtha' can las pha rol gyi san dz+hal dang po can te iT med pa med pa de ni ka 'gro ba'i ming can du bya ste/ iT med pa'i phyogs la mdo 'dis san ki ta yin pas yon tan dang 'phel ba mi byed/ byings kyi rAr-Ita kyi ita 'os r-I ita du bsgyur
213a1(sgra skor): gnyis brjod ri'i aN la pha rol los ra byin/ u bA d+ha'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ ti tr-iR+Sha zhes grub pa ya laT sogs sbyar bas/ tit+sirA ti/ tai tIr+Yata/ ti tIR+YA tu/ a ti tIrAta/ a tI tAR+Sho ti/
213a2(sgra skor): tIn+do tsa kA ra/ ti tir+thi tA/ wa pa ti t+tir+yAta/ l+r-i ti tIR+Sha Sh+ya ti/ a tI d+hIr+m+ma / sogs dang / iTa'i phyogs la br-i r-I/ dag las yang na 'os iT drang IH yang na bar byas gnyis brjod/ r-i'i ata dang san la iT/ byings thams cad
213a3(sgra skor): pa sogs kyi yon tan byas pas/ lati ta ri Sha te/ lu.a ti ta ri ShIta/ tI ta ri ShI tsa kA ra/ sogs sauma?/ ti ta rI Sha ti/ lang a ti ta rI ShAti/ liT ti ta rI ShaM tsi kI ra/ sogs so// br-ing kun nas gus pa la'o zhes pa
213a4(sgra skor): la san sbyar/ adz+dza na ga mAM sa ni/ an+ne ha na gam rnams kyi stan la'o// byings a tsa'i mtha' can rnams kyi mtha' dang han gam dag gi u pa d+ha rnams san pha rol la ring por bsgyur te/ pr-i br-ir bsgyur/ sanA la iT yang
213a5(sgra skor): na 'os iT yang na bar byas/ iT med pa'i phyogs la san kita yin pas/ oSh+Ti'i dang po la yin pa'i uta 'os/ r-IH/ uta du bsgyur/ r-i'i AN la ra pha rol lo sa ra sbyar/ gnyis brjod / u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring
213a6(sgra skor): bor bsgyur bas/ br-i rA zhes grub pa la la tse sogs sbyar bas/ bu b+haR+Ya te/ bu b+hAts+tshiH/ rba b+hun tu/ a gu drAr+thad+ha/ a gu brAn+thiH/ bu bAn+ti tsi ka rau/ pra dU rni tA/ bu bA n+yA ti/ si bud+yAR+Sha

213b2(sgra skor): Sha ti/ a bi ba ri Sha ti/ sr-ibi ba rI ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs sam/ laHbi ba rI Sha ti/ !a bi ba rI Sh+Thi tau/ Tabi ba rI Sh+TaM tse kA ra/ sogs so// D+ha kr-iny+ra byed pa la'o zhes pa la swan sbyar/ a tsi ha na gam rnams kyi san la

214a2(sgra skor): dzi'i san liT dag la 'os dza gA r-i bsgyur/ gnyis brjod pas/ au dzI gi Sha ti/ ling dzi gau Sha ta/ dzi gi ShA tu/ a dzi gi Sha ta/ a dzi gi Shi ta/ li dzaM gi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sa?dzI gi Shi tA/ smon
214a3(sgra skor): gI Sh+yat+ta/ l+r-idzi gi Shi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-i A dz+r-i gi ShI Sh+yata/ sogs so// !tsI nya stsogs pa la'o zhes pas san sbyar/ tsi'i 'dam ka 'os tsaM kar bsgyur bA dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka tsAn du byas pasA/ tsa ki Sha ti/ sa.a tsi kI ShIta/

214a6(sgra skor): bing dzaM g+h+rin+mu tsau Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing a dzaM g+han+di Sh+yata/ sogs so// iN 'tsho gro ba la'o zhes ma ma/ pa la san sbyar/ si ne tse/ san la'ang ngo // a Na'i san pha rol la'ang rtogs pa 'dzin la 'jug pa ma yin na ga mi zhes par
214b1(sgra skor): sgyur bar byaste/ i brjod dom// ga ma ru bstAR+Sha/ A tsa ha na gam rnams kyi sanA lA 'os u pa d+hA ring por bsgyur iT byin pas/ sA dzaM gA mI Shat+ya/ dzaM gA mi Shata/ dzAM gA mI Sha tu/ A dzaM gA mI Shata/ a dzaM grA mi Shita/ dzaM gA mi hAM tsa kA ra/
214b2(sgra skor): gr-I mr-iSh+To tA/ dzi gA miSh+ThA ta/ dzaM g+h+ra miSh+Ta tAM/ l+r-i A dzi gA mi'i b+h+yaH/ sogs dang / bau rtogs b+hi don+da yin+da na ga m+b+hiR+Sha bsgyur/ 'grel pAr a tse gcig pa drang po la san nyid gnyis brjod do zhes byung bas/ sa gnyis brjod/ sana?

219a2(sgra skor): iT med pa'i phyogs la/ a tsa ha na sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ Ur+d+ha nU Sh+ya ti/ sa.aur+d+ha nA Sh+Thita/ Ur+d+ha nASh+TaM kA ra/ sogs so// b+hUnya 'dzin pa la sman/ Api mtha' sogs kyis IT yang na bar
219a3(sgra skor): byas/ iTa'i phyogs la yon byas pas/ bi b+ha ri Sha auti/ lung a bi b+ha r-i ShI ta/ liT bi b+ha ri ShAM tsi kA ra/ sogs dang / iT mang pa'i phyogs la/ oSh+Ta'i sngon ma ma yin pas uta 'os/ r-i utra/ r-i'i aN lararA pha
219a4(sgra skor): rol gnyis brjod/ a b+h+yA sany+dzi tsar 'ang ngos/ b+ha br-i u pa d+ha'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ bu b+hAR+Sha ti/ ShA a bya b+hAR+Shita/ lid+de bu b+hAR+YaM tsau kA ra/ sogs so// dz+ha khongs su chud pa la Ni tsa/ arti hI sogs kyis
219a5(sgra skor): puka Ag ma byin pasa?/ dz+nyA pi la san sbyar/ Ipa mtha' stsogs kyis iTayang na bA ru byas/ iTa'i phyogaso laM/ yA dzI dz+nye pa yi Sh+ya ti/ a dza~M dz+nyA pa yi ShI te/ dzi dz+nyA pa yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / iT
219a6(sgra skor): med pa'i phyogs la Ni tse iT med pa la 'os No tsa phyis/ A pa dz+nyA pi r-i d+ha rnams kyi Ita 'os a tsa Ita dang A b+h+yA sa phyis pas/ dz+nyAp+sa ti/ ra a dz+nyAM prA ti/ be dzI p+pa tsi kA ra/ sog so// Sha Na sbyin pa le san/ I pa mtha' sog
219b1(sgra skor): kyis IT yang na bAr byas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ si sa ni Sha ti/ nga a si sa ni ShIta/ laHsi sa ni ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so// iT med pa'i phyogs la/ dzan kha nA san rnams kyi san dz+ha la dag la 'os/ mtha' Ata du bsgyur/ lasi sA sa tAM/ [।]
219b2(sgra skor): sI sA sIta/ si[:]si s+t+r-i sAM tsa kA ra/ sogs s+ho// ta nu rgyas pa la'o zhes pa la sran sbyar/ 'grel pa rA lung drangs pa/ ta ni pra ti da ri d+yau b+hUHsa nI TA/ ta naM pa ti nga ri dra rnams las sran la iT yang na'o// ta nu rgyas pA/ pa tI ltung ba/
219b3(sgra skor): daM r-i d+ha dran 'gro rnams las pha rol gyi san la iT yang na 'gyur te/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ dA ti ta bISha ti/ lung a ti ta ni ShIt+ta/ ti ta nithAM tsaM kA ra/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ ta no tra r+thi b+ha ShA/ ta no to'i 'ang ma kai'o//
219b4(sgra skor): ta no ta'i u pa d+hA iT med pa'i san pha rol la ring por bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can te/ ti tAn+ma ti/ sa a ti tAn+di ta/ ti tAnAM tsa kA ra/ sogs sam/ ti tan+ma ti/ a ti tan+thi ta/ ti tan+taM tsa kA rA/ sogs so// 'grel par/ ta
219b5(sgra skor): na tu las the tshom la 'jug pa la'ang snyana? 'gyur ro// zhe sa bshad de/ bsgrub tshul dang gzugs snga ma rnams dang 'dra'o// !mr-ing sr-i ga gtod pa la'i zhes pa la san sbyar/ a tsa he na gam sogs kyis ring por bsgyur/ oSh+Ti'i sngon
219b6(sgra skor): ma ma yin pa'i uta 'os/ raM uta ra'i aN la pha rol/ gnyis brjod/ uM pa d+ha'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ 2 mu mUr+N+Na ti/ sa? a mu mAR+Shita/ li mu mA R+ShI tsa kA ra/ sogs so// pa tAM ltung ba la'o zhes pa la san
220a1(sgra skor): sbyar/ ta nu pa ting ri dra sogs kyi lung 'dren gyi iT yang na bar byas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ lapaM pa ti ShA tau/ A bi pa ti Sh+Thi ta/ ye pi pi ta ShAM tsa kA rA/ sogs dang / iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ sa ni mI mA g+ha ra b+ha la
220a2(sgra skor): b+ha sha ka pa ta pA dA ma tse i sha/ san la mI mA[:]g+hu[:]ra b+ha la g+ha sha kA pa taM pa da rnams kyi a tsa'i i shra'o// iT med pa'i san pha rol la mAng gus pa/ mInya 'tshed pa g+hu'i ming can rnams dang / ra b+ha rtsom pa/ Du la d+haSh+Ta
220a3(sgra skor): thob pa/ sha kli nus pA/ pa t+l-i lhung ba/ ba d+ye 'gro ba rnams kyi arbe i shwar 'gyur zhing a b+h+yA sa'ang dbyi ste/ arbe i swar bsgyur/ brtsegs pa'i dang po sa ka sogs kyis sa phyis/ a b+h+yA sa'ang phyis pas/ lapat+si ti/
220a4(sgra skor): a pit+sata/ pit+saM tsa kA'aM/ sogs so// da ri dra ngan 'gro la'o zhes pa la san sbyar// ta nr-i pA ti/ da rI dra sogs pi kyi lung 'dren gyi iT yanga? na bAr byas/ ITa'i phyogs la/ iT lau'ang Ata kyi dbyi'os
220a5(sgra skor): A phyis pas/ ding r-i drI Sha ti/ a di da ri dr-i Sh+Tita/ daMd r-I dISh+Ti tsa kAr/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ di dA ri dra sa taM/ wu a ngi da ri sa d+yA di ngi ra drA sa tsa kA ra/ sogs so// mr-i nyaM'i mang ba la
220a6(sgra skor): sa nau/ san la mI mA sogs kyis atsa is dang a b+h+yA sa phyis/ sa'i byings phyed pa la 'os/ sa tar bsgyur bas/ mat+sa ti/ sa.a mats+li ta/ mat+saM NaM kA ra/ sogs so// !mAng gus pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ san la mI
220b1(sgra skor): mA sogs kyis a tsi is su bsgyur/ a b+h+yA sa phyis/ sa'i byings phyed pa la'os/ swa tar bsgyur bas/ mit+ma zhes grud pa la laT+ra sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ A mit+sa te/ A mit+siSh+Ta/ we mat+k+r-i tsa kre/ sogs so// d+hu Du dAnya sbyin pA la
220b2(sgra skor): zhes pa la san sbyar/ san la mI mA g+h+rA[:]sogs kyis au b+hU sr-i phyis nas atsI is su TI bsgyur/ sa'i byings phyed pa la 'os sa tar bsgyur ba s+ya/ ladit+sa ta/ lung a di tIta/ lidId+h+waM tsa[:]kA ra/ sogs so// !Du d+haunya 'dzin pa
220b3(sgra skor): la'o zhes pa la sana? sbyar sngon ma bzhon bsgrubs pas/ 5 d+hit+k+r-i ti/ lung a d+hit+sita/ li d+hit+saM/ au tse kA ra/ sogs so// !ra b+ha rtsom pa la'o zhes pa la sa na sgrar/ sran la ma mA sogs kyis a tsa is su bsgyur zhing
220b4(sgra skor): a b+h+yA sa phyis/ brtsegs pa'i dang po sa ka sogs kyis sa phyis/ khar la tsar 'os b+ha par bsgyur/ rip+sa zhes grub pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bswa/ rip+sa te/ !a rip+siSh+Ta/ hA ri pr-I tsa kre/ sogs so// !de bzhi na du/ !
220b5(sgra skor): la b+h+r-i'i thob pa la san sbyar/ lIp+sa te/ a liprISh+Talaulip+l-i tsa kre/ sogs so// shra k+Shau nus pA lI'o zhes bya la sana? sbyar/ san la mI mI sogs kyis a tsaM is dang a b+h+yA sa phyis/ brtsegs pa'i dang po saka sogs kyi
220b6(sgra skor): sa phyis/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis san gyi sa Shar bsgyur bas/ lashi k+Sha ti/ a shi k+Shata/ e shi k+ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so// !ba da 'gro ba la'o zhes pa san sbyar/ san la mI mA[:]sogs kyis a tsaM is dang a b+hA sa phyis/ brtseT
221a1(sgra skor): ba'i dang po sa ka sogs kyis sa phyis/ khar la tser 'os dra tar bsgyur/ pit+sa zhes grub pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ laTapit+sa te/ l+r-ing a pit+siSh+Ta/ liT pit+saM sAM tse kre/ sogs so// A p+l-i khyab pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ Apa
221a2(sgra skor): dz+nyA pi r-i d+ha rnams kyi/ Ita 'os/ arbe Ita dang au b+h+yA sa phyis pas/ Ip+sa ti/ !Ip+sa ti/ liTa.Ip+l-i tsa kA ra/ sogs so// !rA d+ha yang dag par grub pa la'o zhes pa la sana? sbyar/ 'grel bar lungs drangs pa/ ra d+ho hid+ba yAM sa nI sA n+yo/ ra d+ha
221a3(sgra skor): 'tshe ba la san i sar brjod do// rA d+ha 'tshe ba'i don la 'a dzug pa na san pha rol la a tsa is ra bsgyur zhing a b+h+yA sa dbyi ste/ atsa I sar bsgyur a b+h+yAM sa? phyis/ brtsegs pa'i dang po sogs kyisas byi/ khaR+Sha la cer 'os d+hA tar bsgyur bas/ pra ti
221a4(sgra skor): r-it+sa ti/ la sogs so// 'tshe ba'i don min na is su mi 'gyur bas/ gnyis brjod pa sogs sau kyis bsgrub sa paus/ lang A ri rAt+ma ti/ A ri r-It+sita/ liT A ri rAtAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so// !mu tsA grol ba la'o zhes pa la san mos[।।ऽ।ऽ]
221a5(sgra skor): sbyar/ mu tso&karma s+ya gu No bA/ mu tse'i las ma yin pa'i yon tan+da la yang na'o// mu tsa'i las kyi don la sbyar ba ma yin pa 'dod pa kun grub par 'dod kho na'i don la 'jug pa na iT med pa'i san pha rol la u pa d+hA yon tan du yang na
221a6(sgra skor): bsgyur zhing bsgyur ba ni a b+h+ya sa yang dbyi ste/ yon tan a b+h+yA sa phyis/ tsu'i ku 'os ce kar bsgyur bas/ mo kla ti/ \u0f7f a mo k+Shi ti/ la mo k+Shi tsakA ra/ sogs dang / las kyi don yin na yon tan mi byed pas/ mu mu kA ti/ a mu mu kIta/
221b1(sgra skor): mu mu kr-I tsa kA ra/ sog so// s+phur 'phro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsi sbyar/ tsanya sku dag gi Ni la yang na 'os Ata du bsgyur bas/ s+phA ri zhes pa la san gnyis brjod/ shar dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/ a b+h+yA sa'i cir 'ang ngos pha pa aT
221b2(sgra skor): byin pas/ pu s+phu ra yi ShA ti/ 2Ta A pu s+pha ra yi ShIta/ lipu s+phA ra yiSh+TaM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / yang Uta du ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/ lapu s+pho ra yi ShA ti/ lang au pu s+pho ra yi bIta/ pu s+pho ra yi ShAM tsa kA ra/
221b3(sgra skor): sogs dang / kyA sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ k+Sha bi zhes pa la san dang iT gnyis brjod/ ha la dang po lhag po dang / ku ha dag gi tsu 'os ka tser bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ tsu k+ShA ba yi Sha ti/ laHa ts+ya
221b4(sgra skor): k+ShA ba yaM Sh+Thi ta/ tsu k+Sha pa yaM ShAM tsa kA rA/ sogs so// p+tA dag pa la Ni tsi 'phel ba byas pas/ pA bi zhes pa la san dang iT gnyis brjod/ u'i pu yaN dzi a pha ro la la 'os u I bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/
221b5(sgra skor): pi pA bA yi Sha tI/ bad+da a pi pyA ba yi ShAMtA/ lipi pA ba yi ShAM tsi kA ra/ sogs so// b+ha yod pa la Ni tsa 'phral da byas pas/ b+ha bi zhes pa la san dAng iT sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ u'i pu yaN dzi pha rol la 'os u ir bsgyur
221b6(sgra skor): bsaHlaHbi b+ha ba yi ShA ti/ 2\u0f7fbi b+hA ba yaM ShIta/ bi b+ha ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so// yu bsre ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas pas/ yA bi zhes pa la san dang iT/ gnyis brjod/ u'i pu yan sogs kyis u
222a1(sgra skor): puka mtha' sogs kyis yon+ma tan byas pas/ sa ru ro mI Sha tAM/ ar+yA ra tsiSh+TaH/ ru ra man+da tsa kA ra/ sogs sama?/ ru ru me NI/ sogs so// !de bzhin du/ li kha ra mo 'dri ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar in byin/ san
222a2(sgra skor): ki ta du yang na bar byas pas/ li lo kho Sha ti/ la.a li le khi ShA ta/ lili la khaM ShAM tse kA ra/ sogs sam/ latali li khi Sha ti/ laHa li li bi ShIta/ li lI li khi ShAM tse kA ra/ sogs so// !ru dwir mchi mA 'jog pa la'o// zhes
222a3(sgra skor): pa la san dang iT/ rung bi da mu Sha sogs kyis san iT dang bcas pa kita yin pas yon tan mi byed/ ru ru di Sha tI/ sA[:]a ru ru dI ShIta/ ru ru dwiSh+TaM tsa kA ra/ sogs so// !de bzhin du/ bi da shes pa lA/ bi
222a4(sgra skor): bi di Sha ti/ saHa bi bi di ShIta/ bi bi dI ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so// !mu Sha rku ba l+ya'o// zhes po la san sbyar+ya/ iT byinra/ kita yIn pas yon tan mi byed/ mu mu Shi Sha ti/ 2a mu mu Shi ShIta/ mu mu Shi ShAM tsa ka ra/
222a5(sgra skor): sogs so// b+hunya bstod pa la'o// zhes pa la san sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ stau ti N+yoHa b+h+yA sa s+ya/ stau ti dang Ni ngag gi a b+h+yA sa'i 'o// sto ti dang byings Ni tsa mtha' can gyis yig ni a b+h+yAs iN so sor bsdu ba'i pha rol la Sha
222a6(sgra skor): yig tu 'gyur te/ mdo 'dis sa Shar bsgyur// dza Tu la cu 'os/ ta Ta a tse haM na gam sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ tuSh+Ta Sha ti/ \u0f7fa t+yoSh+mAShIta/ pe tuSh+Ta ShAM tse kA ra/ sogs so// nyiSha pa nyel ba la'o// zhes
222b1(sgra skor): ir bsgyur bas/ yi yA bA yi Sha ti/ hAH a yi yA bA yi Sh+Thi tA/ yI yA ba yISh+TaM tse kA ra/ stsogs so// de bzhin du/ ru sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni ts+ya'i mtha' can la san dang iT sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ u'i pu
222b2(sgra skor): yaN sogs kyis u i ra bsgyur bas/ lari rA ba yi ShA ti/ a rI r+yA bI ya ShIta/ i ri rA ba yISh+Ti tse kA rA/ sogs so// de dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ lAny+ra gcod pa la/ lali lA ba yi Shi taM/ a li lA ba yaM ShIta/ t+pal
222b3(sgra skor): lA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so// dzu 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ la dzi dzA ba yi Sha ti/ nga a dzi dzA ba yi ShIta/ e dzaM d+hA ba yi ShAM tse kA ra/ sogs so// !Nu bstod pa la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ nA bi zhes pa la san dang iT
222b4(sgra skor): sbyar/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ nu nA ba yi Sha ti/ lung a nu nA ba yi Sh+Thita/ laM[:]nu nA ba ya ShAM tsaM kA ra/ sogs so// !sru 'gro ba la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ sr-i bi zhes pa la san dang iT sbyar/ gnyis
222b5(sgra skor): brjod/ sra ba ti/ shr-i No ti/ dra ba ti/ drA bau tI/ pra ba ti/ p+la ba ti/ byA ba ti rnams kyi yang na 'os/ a b+h+yA sa ir bsgyur bas/ sa srA ba yi Sha ti/ langaH i sau srA ba yi Sh+Thi ti/ ShIsi sra ba yuM ShAM tse kA rA/ sogs so//
222b6(sgra skor): 'bar ba la'o// zhes pa la san sbyar eT byin/ u pe u ba d+hA ha l-i dang po dang ra la las sana'ang ngos/ san iT dang bcas pa kita du yang na par byas pas/ kita kyi phyogs la yon tan med/ kita ma yin pa'i phyogs
223a1(sgra skor): ba la Ni tsa u pa d+hA'i 'os 'phelu pra byas/ swA bi zhes pa lu san sbyar/ iT byin/ gnyis brjod/ d+yu ti sA pri drag gri saM pra sA ra NA 'os/ a b+h+yA sa saM prA sa ra Na ra bsgyur/ stau ti dang Ni dgra gi a
223a2(sgra skor): b+hU sa'i 'os sa Sha du bsgyur bas/ suSh+Ta pa yi sh+tsi tau/ aM su Sh+pA pra yi ShItA/ su ShA pA yi tsi tsaM kA rA/ sogs so// ny+Ni'i dmi gsal ba'i sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni tse sbyar/ puka mtha' sogs kyis yon
223a3(sgra skor): tan byas/ swe tri bau zhes pa lA san dang iT/ saHsI di swa di sa hA nI tse/ sI di sAM ngi sa ha rnams kyi sa'ang ngo // sI dri mi gsal ba'i sgra/ swa di ro myang ba/ sa hA bzod pA rnams kyi sa yig nI sa b+hA sa AN+Da
223a4(sgra skor): so sor bsdu ba dang Ni te'i mtha' yin kyang Shar mi bsgyur ba sa yig tu gnas te/ gnyis brjod/ ha la dang po lhag po 'os/ ba phyis/ mdo 'dis sa Sha mi bsgyur bas/ lasi swe dA yi Sha ti/ a si swe da yI Shita/
223a5(sgra skor): liTasi swe nga yi ShaM tsA kA ra/ sogs so// swa dra ro mya rAng ba la/ Nin+di u pa d+ha'i 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ swA di zhes pa la san iT byi nau/ gnyis brjod pa phyis/ san la ita 'os ita du bsgyur/ mdo 'dis Shar mi
223a6(sgra skor): bsgyur bas/ la si sA da yi Sha ti/ la a si sA da yi ShI ta/ lisi sA da yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so// !sa ha bzod pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas/ sa hiM zhes pa la san sbyar/ iT byin/ gnyis brjod/ san la
223b1(sgra skor): ita 'os ita du bsgyur/ mdo 'dis sa Shar mi bsgyur bas/ la si sA ha si Sha ti/ saHa si sA ha yiShItA/ sa sA ha yiShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so// 'grel par rang don la byin pa'i san gyi mtha' labang dgos pa yod na san sbyor ro//
223b2(sgra skor): zhes bshad pas/ gu pA skyed pa la gu ba ti dza ki ta rnams la san bos/ sanA gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dzu gup+pa zhes pa la/ byings las las dang bdod pa byed pas ngo mnyam pa las yang na 'os/ slar-I yang san
223b3(sgra skor): byin/ gnyis brjod zan yin pas slar mi brjod/ bal dang bo iT a g+hi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ dzu gup+sI Sha zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ dzA gup+si Sha ti/ li dzu grop+si Shata/ dzu gup+si'i tu/ a dz+ra gup+si ShA ta/
223b4(sgra skor): a dzu gup+si ShIta/ dzu gup+sI ShAM tsak+ShA ra/ l+r-idzu gup+si Shi tA/ dzu gupI Sh+yAta/ dzaM gup+sa Shi Sh+ya ti/ a dzu gran+thi Sh+yata/ sogs so// i ti pA Ni ni byAka ra Na s+ya sA tAsh+tsaHsa mAp+tA/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byAH/
223b5(sgra skor): Na'i mdo las san mtha' can rnams rdzogs so// / de rnams kyis brda sbring pu'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren
223b6(sgra skor): pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las san gyi mtha' can rnams kyi cho ga rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// / gsum pa byings byings su bsgrub pa'i rkyen yang gi 'jug yul rnams bshad par bya ste/
224a1(sgra skor): to ra k+Sha tso ha lA deHkri ya sa ma b+hi hA re yang / byings a tsaM gcig pa ha la dang po las bya ba yang dag par sdud pa la yang ngo // rAtsaM 'bar ba dang shutsa mya ngan gnyis ma yin pa'i byings a tsi gcig pa ha la dang po n+dan las bya ba yang
224a2(sgra skor): dag par sdud pa ste shin tu ba dang yang yang gi don la yang pha rol tu 'gyur te/ nga yig ni san yang dag lo 'os byings gnyis brjod pa'i don no// 'grel par lung drangs pa/ sU tsi sU tri mAM N+ya TaN+ya sh+tsA No ti b+h+yo yang / sU tsi sU tI mU tri
224a3(sgra skor): aT ti[:]An+ti[:]a shwa ur+No ti rnams las yang ngo // sU tsa phra ma/ sU tA rab tu grol ba/ mU tra rab tu 'jog pa/ aT 'gro ba/ r-i 'gro ba/ a sha zlas/ Ur+N+Nanya 'gebs pa rnams las shin tu ba dang yang yang gi don la yang 'gyur
224a4(sgra skor): ro/ ni t+yaM kau Ti l+ye ga NAM/ 'gro ba la 'khyog po kho na la'o// 'gro ba'i don gyi byings las shin tu baM dang yang yang gi don ma yin pa'i 'khyog por 'gro ba kho na'i don la 'jug pa na yang pha rol tu 'gyur ro// lu pa sa da tsa ra dza pa dza b+ha da
224a5(sgra skor): ha da sha gr-I b+h+r-i bA ba gaurnA yAM/ lu ba sA dau tsa ra dze pa dza b+ha da ha da shau/ g+h+r-i rnams las smad pa nyid la'o// lu p+l-i gcod pa/ Sha dwe rnam par 'gro ba/ tsa ra 'gro ba/ dza pa yid/ dzaM b+ha lus rnam pa R+sha nyams pa/ da
224a6(sgra skor): ha thal bar byed pa/ de sha mche ba/ gr-I gsal bar byed pa rnams las smad pa nyid la 'jug pa la yang 'gyur te bya ba yang dag par bsdu ba tsam la ni ma yin no// // sU tse phra ma byed pa la'o zhes pa la yang /
224b1(sgra skor): san yang dag la po gnas byung / thung du thos thang drung bsgyur byug tsa swAH/ yang shes pa la/ dun myang ts+tsha// spyang 'jig pa dag la son+da tan no// s+yAng gA rgyan 'jig pa pa ma 'jig pa dag pha rol la'ang sa rdza ts+tshin /
224b2(sgra skor): du bas+thAn+ta te/ mdo 'ongs yon tan byas pas/ sau sku n+ya zhes grub pa la/ laT sogs ta rnams sbyor te/ byed pa po la shab aHlas yon+da tan la 'os gnyis dag gi gcig sngon ma'i gzugs su bsgyur bas/ ts+tsha
224b3(sgra skor): la kyi myos byed pa ma sbyi kyi// ma 'a ga phyis bya
224b4(sgra skor): nga la dang po la iT 'os eT byin pas/ a so sU tsiSh+Ta/ a swo sU tsaM ShA tAM/ a so sU tsi Sha ta/ sogs so// liT la/ kAs sogs kyi Am sbyar/ yA'i hI la la d+hAShos ya? phyis pas/ so sU tsI tsa kre/ so sU nr-i ba b+hU ba/
224b5(sgra skor): so swA tsa mA sa/ sogs so// la yig phyi ma rnams laM bal dang po'i iT byin/ ya'i hA l-i las sos/ ya phyis pas/ so sau tsiH/ s+yo sA tsiSh+Tin/ sa smr-i tsiSh+ya te/ oM so sU tsau N+yaH/ sogs so//
224b6(sgra skor): mU tra rab tu 'jig pa la yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ thung ngu bos thung ngur bsgyur/ yang 'jig pa dag la yon tan nos yon tan byas paM saM/ ma mo t+ya ti/ mo mA dz+yo ta~M/ mo sU t+yA tAM/ a mo mr-i t+yA ta/ sogs dang / lung la ba
225a1(sgra skor): dAb+h+yo byin/ m+b+ha'i ha la las sos/ d+has byas pas/ u ma ma byiH/ sogs dang / li b+ha Amra sbyar/ ya hal las sos pa phyis pas/ ma mA trA tsa pra/ sogs s+ho/ lcug ma rnams pa med byin ma b+h+ya

232a2(sgra skor): da ni yang rkyen 'jig pa'i cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ ya ngo&tsA tsaM/ yang gau a tsa la yang ngo // yang gi rkyen ni rkyen a tse dang po can pha rol dang gzhan yang mang po la 'dzag go/ zhes pa ni spyir btang ba'o// rkyen phyis kyang rkyen gyi

243a5(sgra skor): a tsarka rIHa tsarka.a tsar+b+r-i taM/ a tsar+b+r-i ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a tsarka raM/ a tsa tr-i baM/ a tsa tr-i ma/ lhag ma rnams la/ !a a tsar+thita/ ling tsa hr-i tsa kA ra/ wasatsar+b+r-i ta/ rmon sa tsarbe yatra/ wesa? tsar+thi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-i a tsar+b+r-i Sh+ya ta/ soT
243a6(sgra skor): so// ri ki dang rI ka gnyis kyang glo bur ba'i khyad por ma gtogs laT sogs dang phrad pa'i cho ge 'dra ste/ yi byin yig gi aN la yaH/ tsA Sh+Ta tsog go ma la la// tsa raM ka ri ti/ gse kyi la khri 'i na gyur/ tsa raM karti/ sogs sam/ tsa rI
243b1(sgra skor): kar-I tAM/ tsa rI kar+t+ti/ sogs so// oM tI pa NI ni byA ka ra NA s+yA m+b+ha t+yA ta yang lu gan+d+haHsa mAp+tAHzhes pa pA Ni NI bA kA ra Na'i mdo las yang 'jig pa'i mtha' rnams rtogs so// / de rnams kyi brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen pa
243b2(sgra skor): pa NI nr-i byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin ces su bkod pa legs bshad nAr bro 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/ yang 'jig pa'i mtha' can gyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs gsal dang bcas pa
243b3(sgra skor): rags po rnams re zhig rdzogs so// / gsum pa ming byings su bsgrub pa'i kye rje'i 'jug yul dang cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ su ba At+ma nakyats+tsha/ su pa~M las bdag nyid la rgya // byings mi
243b4(sgra skor): du bsgrubs zin sub 'jug pa'i yul la bdag nyid 'dod pa'i don la ming de nyid skur byingasu bsgrub pa'i rkyen kyi ci yang na 'gyur te/ tsA yig dbyung so 'gog pa'i don dang / ka yig kya ce la'ang ngos don no// kyo tsho la'ang ngo //
243b5(sgra skor): rkyen k+Shutsa pha rol la rtags mthi' A yig naM It+ma du bsgyur te/ pu tra zhes pa'i rtogs la/ kyatsa sbyar rjes 'brel phyis/ mdo 'dis i ta du bsgyur bas/ pu trI ya zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyor te/ byed pa po la sh+ya pa/ ata
243b6(sgra skor): las yon tan la 'os gnyis ngag gi gcig pha rol gyi sa/ bzugasu bsgyur bas/ laSha pu trI ya tI/ 'a ba byed/ si pu tr-I ye ta/ so pu tI ya tu/ sa a pu tA ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la i To byin/ ata kyi dbyi 'os a phyis
244a1(sgra skor): bAstu/ a prA tI yIH/ sogs so// liT l+yA Am+b+ha sbyar A phyis pas/ prA t+nI yAM nAk+ShA ra/ prA trI yAM ba d+hU ba/ b+hU tI yAM mA sa/ sgyos s+ho// wAr+N+Na la in+da byin su phyis pas+thA/ pra d+hI yi d+hA/ prA trI yi tA si/

244a3(sgra skor): s+yo/ go zhes pa rtags la kya tsa spyir/ ya'i rkyen la ba'i mthe'i tsan nos aM bi ra bsgyur bas/ ga byA zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ gA byaM ti/ ga brIt+ta/ ying ag+ha prA tsi k+Sha ra/ sar+dz+dza ga b+hi tA/ ga

244b1(sgra skor): bas/ a d+ha ti/ A ma d+hiH/ sa a ma dAt+te/ She ma d+h+waMH kA rA/ sogs so// s+yASh+ma ces pa la r+g+ha tsa sbyar bas/ yuSh+mA d+ha ta/ a yuSh+ma d+h+r-i ta/ a yA d+hI ta/ yu Sh+Ta d+hAHkA ra/ yuSh+mA dA tsa kA ra/ sogs so//

245a3(sgra skor): sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ Ta kA bI a ti/ lung a ka bI yitra/ rlo/ ka bI yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so// sa mI d+ha zhes pa'i rtags la kyA tsaM sbyar bas/ laT+TA sa mI d+h+yA tI/ sogs dang / kya s+yA bi b+hUSh+Ta/ kye'i 'dum ku'o/
245a4(sgra skor): rtags ha la mtha' can las pha rol gyi kya tsa dang / kyang dang / kyaSha rnams ni byings phyed pa pha rol la yang na dbye stAM/ a sa maM d+h+yai tI/ !a sa mi d+hi tA/ saM mi sbyin na / d+h+waM tsa kA r+ra/ sa mai dz+hi tsa kA ra/ sog so//

245b1(sgra skor): skom pa/ 'dod pa rnams brjod pa la k+Shu tsa'i mtha' can tshig phrad du byA ste/ a sha nA ya ti/ u da n+ya ti/ d+ha na ya ti/ sogs so// lcogs pa sogs kyis don ma yin na kya tsa la'ang ngos Ita du bsgyur bas/ a shra nI ya taM/ u dA kI ya
245b2(sgra skor): d+hA nI dpa tI/ sogs so// a shwa kl-i ra br-i Sha ba la pa NA mArma pr-i tau kya tsi/ a shwa k+Shi ra brA Sha la ba Na rnams kyi kya tsa la bdag nyid dga' ba la'o// a shwa la so gra s+yA pa rtags da rnams la kyaN pha ro la la khyab par sod/ mu 'dong bar byed/
245b3(sgra skor): ni 'dod par byed/ bdag nyid dga' ba'i dron la 'jug pa na suka a ga ma 'gyur te/ ka ge nas don u brjod don no// a shwa s+ya ti ba Da ba/ k+Shi ru s+ya ti bA la/ br-iSh+Ta s+ya ti gauHla ba Na s+ya t+yuSh+TaHsogs so// 'grel par rtags a tse'i

245b5(sgra skor): da d+hi s+ya taM/ da d+h+yA s+ya ti/ sogs sam/ yang na A ga ma ma byin kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ da d+hi ya ti/ sogs so// bzhi pa kA mya tse'i 'jug yul bshad pa ni/ kA myats+tsha/ ka mya tsa'ang ngo // rtags
245b6(sgra skor): tsa da / las bdog nyid 'dod pa'i don la kya cang ma zad kA myaH yang 'gyur te/ tsa dbyungs don no// pra tra zhes pa'i ne 'di/ rtags la kA myaH sbyar bas/ s+yA p+sA tra kA mya ti/ l-iH pu tra kA mya ti/ 2 br-i tra kA mya Nu/ [।]
246a1(sgra skor): pu tra kA myata/ a pu tra kA myAta/ pra tra kA myA NaM kA ra/ waT+ra pA tra kA mr-i tA/ mra Sh+TapA tra kA mya tra/ a pra tra kam+mA Sh+ya tA/ sa pu Na kAm+b+hi Sh+yatA/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ ya shas zhes pa'i rtags la

248a6(sgra skor): ta pas kyang gi mtha' canA la a tang rnams 'jug par bshad// bA b+h+yoSh+ma b+h+yAM mu dra ma ne/ bAl+lA ASh+ma dag las steng du 'phyur ba la'o// bASh+pa At+ma dag las/ stang du 'phyar ma kyi skyugs palda rtse/ da zum 'gro/ ba'i don la kyang
248b1(sgra skor): 'gyur te/ bAh+lA ya te/ uSh+mA ya te/ sogs so// pe nAts+tsha/ phe na las kyang ngo // pe na lus kyang steng du 'phyang ba'i don la kyang 'gyur te/ pe na ya te/ sogs so// 'grel par lud drangs pa/ d+hA ma dA/ d+hu ma las yang na'o// d+hu ma
248b2(sgra skor): las steng rtsu rgya byed/ drod 'byung bar byed/ du 'gyur ba'i don laM kyang 'gyur zhing yang na laT sogs aM tang rnams sbyor te/ d+hu ma ya te/ d+hu smra ba'i byung bar byed/ mA yA ti/ sogaso// shab+hu be ra ka la hA b+h+r-i kar+N+Ne ma d+h+r-i b+h+yaHka ra Ne/ D+h+we
248b3(sgra skor): bai ra ka la ha A b+hU kAt+ta ma d+h+ya rnams las byed pa la'o// shab+da la sogs pa 'di rnams las byed la'i don la kyang 'gyur rgyu bar byed/ du 'byung ba skyed/ Ne/ shab+d+ha ya te/ be rA ya te/ ka le hA ya tau/ a b+hA ya te/ kar+N+Na ya
248b4(sgra skor): ma d+h+ya ya te/ sogs s+ho// su da~M na du dz+nyA na nI hA re b+h+yany+tsa/ su rin du rdin nI hur rnams las kyang ngo // su di na la sogs pa bdi rnams las kyang byed pa'i don la kyang 'gyur sa byed do// kyi/ zug pagyid / kye+e /
248b5(sgra skor): te/ tsA dI nA sa te/ du dzi na sde te/ nr-i d+ha nA ya te/ sogs so// s+yA kha da~M b+h+yaHkan+d+he be dan+ta mA~M/ sra kha la sogs pa rnams las rig par byed pa sa'o// sku kha la sogs pa rnams las rig par byed pa 'am/
248b6(sgra skor): myong bar byed pa 'am/ nyi ma ched po byed/ yul bar myod// theg sa bye/ thob par byed pa'i don la kyang 'gyur te/ su khA ya te/ bde ba myong bar byed/ duHkhA ya te/ sdug bsngal myong bar byed/ sogs te/ su kha la sogs pa rnams ni/ su la/ 8!/
249a1(sgra skor): duH/ ga tri bA/ kr-in+na/ a grA/ a li kA/ dz+nyAn nam ma ban pa/ kr-i pa NA/ nang 'ang sa sna dang nyan mongs pa la kri/ a ru Na/ g+ha ru Na/ so D+ha/ pra dI pa/ ma dra/ sogs so// na mo ba rish+tsa tA kya ts+tsha/ nams ba ri bas tsi tra
249a2(sgra skor): la kya tsa'o// na mas/ sdug bsngal/ khrag gi mchod sbyin/ dag sa/ mchog/ ba ri bas gnyis la gus par byed pa dang / tsi trang las ngo mtshar bar byed dmar s+ya/ sI rdzi/ dang mo/ mar ma 'am rab gas la/ theb byangs/ ba'i don la kya tsa 'gyur te/ tsi trang gi nga yig tang
249a3(sgra skor): rnams sbyor ba'i don no// na ma s+ya ti de bAna?/ lga rnams pa phyag byed/ ba ri s+ya ti gu rA na/ byas rnams la ma chog ni tsi tI ya te tAM/ khyod pa ngo mtshar bar byed/ sogs so// puts+tsha du dA sa ne/ puts+tsha las uta las 'phyan pa la'o// nyer bsgyur uta sngon ma'i prats+tsha
249a4(sgra skor): la 'phen par byed pa'i don la kyang 'gyur te/ ut+sAts+tsha ya te/ sogaso// paR+YA da sha ne tsa/ pa ri uta las kyang khyab pa la'o// nyer bsgyur ba ri dang uta sngon ma'i puts+tsha las khya ba par byed pa'i don
249a5(sgra skor): la kyang 'gyur tAM/ pa ri pA ts+tsha ya te/ uR+ShA ya te/ sogs so// 'grel ni mas par byed/ par lung drangs pa/ b+hAr+b+yAt+sa ma ts+tshi ya ne/ b+hAr+N+Na las gsog par byed pa la'o// sa mA s+yA ma'i b+haN+Da las gasdig par byed pa'i don la
249a6(sgra skor): kyang 'gyur te/ saM b+hAr+b+ha la seM su rgyas pa gyi/ rje ma rgyas par byed/ ya te/ snod du gcig par byed/ sogs so// tsaM ba rA da rdza ne pa ri d+ha ni bi/ tsa ba ra las bor ba bsdus pa la yong na'o// sam sngon ma'i tsi ba ra las gzhan gyis bor ba slar spyad par
249b1(sgra skor): byed pa'i don lnga kyang yang nA 'gyur te/ tsI ba rA ya te drAk+te/ mur+N+Na maM shra sh+tsAk+tA la pa Na pra tA bas+t+ya ha la kr-I ta tAs+thA b+h+yAn+da/ murtA/ mA tha/ shrak+ShA/ la ka Na/ pra ta/ bas+t+ra/ ha la/ kr-i ta/ d+hu s+tha rnams las Ni tsi'o// mUr+N+Na lA sogs pa 'di rnam
249b2(sgra skor): sus byed pa'i don la Nici 'gyur te/ tra b+hiSh+Ta nga byAd+yA ti pa da~M ka s+yA/ song gi Ni la In bzhin no// ming // / ni lAN+Ti tsi sgyur ba na ming gi tsau dbyi ba sogs de dzin
249b3(sgra skor): gyi rkyeni a dzin dang 'dra bar sgrub ste/ aiSh+TAn gyi skabs kyi cho ga thams cad 'jug ste/ muN+Da la Ni \u0f7f/ mdo 'di u phyis pas/ muN+Di zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ muN+Da ya ti/ muN+Da ye ta/ n+damr-i N+Da ya tu/ [ऽ]
249b4(sgra skor): mUN+DA yata/ sogs so// / NI shrI d+ha sogs kyis ts+li tsang du bsgyur/ nga la 'os su gnyis brjod/ Ni'i iT meng pa lnga 'os NI phyis bAs/ a mu mur+d+ha tau/ a mu mUr+d+hat+tAM/ a mU mur+tha/ sogs so// liT la kas sogs

251a2(sgra skor): ya ti suH a ta tra tsA ta/ liHt+tA tsa yAM tse kA ra/ luT tA tsa yi tA/ smon ming tra ts+yata/ saMg so// bar+Na la/ laT bar+N+Na ya tI/ wa a bar+Na ta/ liHbar+Na yaM ts+yai kA ra/ waT bar+Na bi tA/ skyon baN+yait+ta/ sog so// tserma la/ TAtsarme ya ti/ lung a tsa tsar+m+mata/

251b1(sgra skor): pas+t+ra/ g+ha la Ni tsa sbyar/ sa g+ha tA ya ti/ lu a dza g+hA tata/ wi g+ha ta yAM tsa kA ra/ swaT g+haM ta yI tA/ smon ci s+dza g+hA t+yAta/ sogs te tshig grogs drang sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/ g+hA ta yA ti sha trAma?/ de bzhin du ban+d+ha la Ni tsi sgyur bas/ ShA /

253b6(sgra skor): bya ra lung drangs pa/ da byug pa non skyong ba do/ kan+d+ha re s+t+rai ti ya s+yai pa/ kar+b+hu la sogs pa rnams kyi gsum pa nyid do// kaN+Ta la sogs pa yani dang pa bzhin spyod par 'dod/ gi mtha'i can la'ang san 'gyur zhing de rnams kyi

254a2(sgra skor): gi mtha' la'ang san 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ kA mi la san sbyar iT byin gnyis brjod pas/ tsi kA mu yi Sho ti/ sog so// i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU tAn+ta ma d+hAtA baHsa mAp+taHzhes pa pA Ni ni byaM kA ra Na'i mdo
254a3(sgra skor): lus ming gi byings rnams rdzogs so// / de rnams kyis brda spyod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA NI ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go dron cho ga dpe rjod sogs zin brisuM bkod pa legs bshed nor bu 'dre/
