260b3(sgra skor): las so// mi shes pa shes zer ba lta bu brdzun rtogs par byed pa la d+h+r-i las tang rnams 'gyur te/ sha ta mu pa d+he ni te/ sogs so// a kar+m+ma kAn+ne/ las med pa las kyang ngo // las med pa lis kyang dz+nyA las treng rna mra
260b4(sgra skor): 'gyur te/ san+ni Sho dzA nI te/ paM pra ti b+hU ma nA d+h+yA na/ saM pra t+yaM dgu la sa dran pa ma yin pa la'o// bam ma na po sam dang pra ti dag las pha rol gyi dz+nyA las dran pa ma yin pa la 'jug pa na tang rnams gyur te/ sa
260b5(sgra skor): dz+nyA nAM taM/ pra tIdz+nyA n+yai te/ gso so// b+hA sa no pa saM b+hASh+Ta dz+nyA na yat+na bi ma t+yu pa maM tra NeSh+Ta bA dA/ bad las gsal ba dang nye bar 'dun pa dang shes pa dang 'bad pa dang blo gros tha dad pa dang nye bar bsngags pa
260b6(sgra skor): kun tu shes/ ma tsho shes/ rnams la'o// bang las gsal ba sogs de na 'di rnams rtogs par byed pa la tang rnams 'gyur te/ bstan pa cos rab tu gsal bar smras/ shAs+t+ra pra ba taM/ la / las byed pa sa rjes sgrag/ karma
261a1(sgra skor): ka d+hA n+yA ba ra te/ skye bar 'du pA NAM nIrbi da twe/ kauny+ra smin k+She tre ba dA te/ ge h+ye bi ba da te/ blo thos pa dang pa/ bi ba da te shri Sh+yaHsogs sa so// byAk+ta pu tso sa muts+tsha rA Ne/ gsal bar lhan cig brjod pa la'o// bad
261a2(sgra skor): las tshig gsal bar lha ni cig tu brjod pa la pa Ni ba klog par byed/ shes pa/ gang zhing du smyan/ yang ba/ kyis du ba dang bsgrab/ thob sa la rnam par smras/ khor bsngags/ tang rnams 'gyu r-i te/ saM pra bA da te gra myaHsogs so// a no ra karma kAta/ a nu las
261a3(sgra skor): las med pa las so// a nu las pha rol gyi bAd las bya ba'i las med pa la tang rnams 'gyur te/ a nu ba da te ka tha ka lap+sa s+ya/ sogs s+ho/ thong du klon nas rab tus+tha/ bA b+hi Sh+Ta bi pr-i lA be/ bi prA brjod pa la gdam nga'o// bi pra
261a4(sgra skor): brjod pa ste/ bi dang pra gnyis sbrul gyi pha rol gyi pad lasau tang dang e tang 'dam ka can du bya ste/ gtam gyi tshogs rjes su tha dad par byed/ ba pa ba da te myaM hUn+thaHsogs sama?/ bi pre ba da ti mo hUr+t+taHsogs so// a bAd+mAHa ba
261a5(sgra skor): las gr-i las so// a ba las pha rol gyi gr-i las tang rnams 'gyur te/ a ba gau rA tAM/ banas gsal ba byed/ phung kyis rnam pa \u0f7f/ sogs so// sa ma pra ti dz+nyA ne/ lung ma erbaH/ sam las dam btsa' bu la'o//
261a6(sgra skor): sam las pha rol gyi gI las dam bca' la 'jug pa na tang rnams 'gyur te/ sha taM saM gi ra te/ brgyabs pa dang las pa byed/ sogs so// u dash+tsa raHsa ka rmak+Sha ti/ Atra las tsa ra las las drang bcas pa las so/
261b1(sgra skor): uta las pha rol gyi tsar las tang rnams 'gyur te/ ge ha mu ts+tsa ra te/ sa mas+t+r-i tI yA yuk+Sh+yata/ sam las gsum pa sbyo ba lu'o// sam las pha rol gyi tsar lngas rnam dbye gsum pa'i mtha' can dang sbyor ba la trang rnams 'gyur
261b2(sgra skor): te/ a shwe na saM tsa ru te/ sogs so// 9 rgyas stod/ d+hA NA s+yas rtsau ts+tsha t+yanr-i Te/ dUr+b+ha las gal teb zhi ba'i don la'o// sam las pha rol gyi dA Ni la sro gal te gsum pa'i mdza de'ang bzhi pa'i don la'i
261b3(sgra skor): pa na tang rnams 'gyur te/ rnas yang ngag par 'gro bar byed/ dra swa saM pra yAn+d+haM ta puSh+pa mA laM// sogs so// u pa d+ya mU/ su ka ra Ne/ u pa las lam las rang gi bya ba la'o// u pa las pha rol gyi yam las rang gi bya ba ste/
261b4(sgra skor): bag ma lena? pa la 'jug pa na tang rnams 'gyur te/ bran mos mi tog gi phreng ba sbyin par byed/ kA n+ya mu pa yats+tsha ta/ sogs so// bi b+ha Sho pa ya ma ne/ u pa yam las 'dam ka'o// u pa sngon ma'i yam las tang dang btsos pa'i sa
261b5(sgra skor): ka 'gro ba'i ming can du yang na bya ste/ kita kyi phyogs la rjes su sna ldan mtha'i sogs kyis ma phyis/ 'u mo nye bar sbyin par byed/ dz+ha la dang po rnams la gzugs thung ngu sogs kyis si ce'ang 'jig/ kita ma yin pa'i phyogs la sta 'dren
261b6(sgra skor): pa kho na ste/ u pA ya taM/ A pA ya sA tAM/ u pa ya si te/ sogs sam/ u pa yaM ta/ u pA yuM sa tAM/ u pa yi sata/ sogs so// ga kyad kyi pags bral/ rA maHsa tI mu pA ya ta/ dz+nye sham+l-i
262a1(sgra skor): tre bak+ku tre+e rnams kyi sun 'asas// rdus gas pa 'di rnams su ma tha rnam sa rnamapa na/ rjes ma/ zla ma smras dun na/
262a2(sgra skor): mi/ sogs so// a n+yor+N+NaHe nu las dz+nyA las so// a nu sngon ma'i d+h+we san mtha' can las kyang tang rnams 'gyur te/ chos shes par 'dod/ bla ma rnams la nyan par 'dod/ orti'i sprin min pa'i/ grogs dran par 'dod/
262a3(sgra skor): spyi yul lta bar 'dod/ a nudz+nye dz+nyA sa te pa tAM/ sogs so// 'di le tsan+na pa ra a nu snga mAs dzA san mtha' can la tang rnams mi 'jug par bshang 'dug cing / 'dir 'jug par bshad nas rgya 'grel du dper brjod
262a4(sgra skor): kyang gnang bsA cung zad bu rjes su shes par 'dod/ myi mthun no// pra t+ya nga b+h+yAM shru baHpre ti iHnga dag las shru las so// p+sa ti dang ang dag lang pha rol gyi shru san mtha' can las tang rnams 'gyur ba ma yin de/
262a5(sgra skor): pra ti shu shru Sh+ya ti/ Ash+tsa brA ShASha ti/ sogs so// ya thAM pa the/ rje ltar bklags pa la'o// bya ba'i don la tang rnams ji ltar bklags pa bzhin 'gyur te/ brta te/ 'jug par byed/ bar+N+Na te/ 'phel bar byed/
262a6(sgra skor): so sor nyan par 'dod/ sogs so// b+hA ba s+ya yau// kun nas gan par 'dod dngos po dang bya ba dag las so// dngos po dang de'i bya ba las kyi don la tang rnams 'gyur te/ b+ha bA te/ thob par byed/ pa tsa te/ ching ba byed/
262b1(sgra skor): ku ru Ne kaH/ sogs so// pro pA b+h+raM yA dze ra adz+nyA pA pre Sh+Ta/ pra u pa dgu las yu dzaM las mchod sbyin gyi snod ma yin pa la'o// pra dang u pa dag las pha rol gyi yu dzaM las mchod sbyin gyi snod ma yin pa la dang
262b2(sgra skor): rnams 'gyur te/ byed/ pra yaM k+taM/ u pra yuMk+te/ sogs so// sa maHk+Sh+mA pAHsam las k+Shu la'o// sam las pha rol gyi k+ShA las tang rnams 'gyur te/ se k+Sh+ya taM shas+t+raM/ sogs so// b+hU dzai
262b3(sgra skor): ba ne/ b+hu dza lAsa? skyong ba yin pa la'o// rab tu sbyor bar byed/ nye bar spyor bar byed/ b+hu dzA las skyong ba mayin pA tAng rnams 'gyur te/ o da naM b+h+r-i k+She/ tse sog so// skyong ba yin na A tang rA mas mtshan ma kun tu no pa byed/ spyir
262b4(sgra skor): bas/ b+hu nak+ti pri thi rI dzA/ sogs so// NaHpha lA pa truHkarta re/ Ni las 'bras bu ldan pa'i byed pa po la'o// Ni tse'i mtha' can zas za bar byed/ las 'bras bu ldan pa'i byed pa po la tang rnams 'gyur te/ kA rau ya te/
262b5(sgra skor): sa smong bar byed rgyal lo/ hA ra ya te/ sogs so// pA pre bi b+hA Shi tata/ bklags pa rnam par bshad pa las so// bklags pa rnam par bshad pa las 'bras bu ldan pa'i byed pa pau la tang rnams 'gyur te/ byed du 'jug/
262b6(sgra skor): pa tsa te/ ched pa skyed/ 'i brog tu 'aH/ ku ru te// sogs so// gr-i d+hi bi ts+yaiHpra laM b+ha ne/ gr-i d+hi bany+dzi ngag las rab tu thob pa la'o// gr-i d+hi dang bany+tsi dag Ni mtha' can las rab tu thob pa la 'dzag pa na dang rnams
263a1(sgra skor): 'gyur te/ ban+d+ha gu d+hA ya t+ye/ mA Na ba ka b+hUts+tsha la te/ sogs so// mtho la dra g+hunaT+Tab+h+yA se/ ma rnam pa'i tshig las grin las yang yang la'o// mi phywa'i sgra lngas nye ba'i kr-in ci mtha' can las ya
263a2(sgra skor): yang la 'jug pa na tad rnams 'gyur te/ ts+li rgyas kyi su skyes/ pa d+h+waM mi th+ya kA ru ya te/ sogs so// a ba dA daHa pa las bad las so// a ba la sa pha rol gyi pa nga las 'bras bu ldan pa'i byeng ba po
263a3(sgra skor): la tang rnams 'gyur/ te/ a pa pA da te/ sogs so// sa mu dAng b+h+yo ya mo 'gran+ti/ gin ma log pa byed b+hU ng+kuH/ sam uta Ang rnams las yam las gzhung ma yin pa la'o// / sa ma uta ang rnams las pha rol gyi lam las

263a6(sgra skor): pa dwe na pra ti ya ma n+we/ nye ba'i tshig rtogs pa la gdam nga'o// nye ba'i tshig rtogs pa'i 'bras bu ldan pa'i byed pa po la tang dang a tang rnams 'dam ka can du bya ste/ swa ya dz+nyA ya dzA taM/ rang nyid mchod sbyin sbyin par byed/ sA ya dzA ya
263b1(sgra skor): dza ti/ sogs so// i ti pA Ni ni prA ka ru Na s+ya sU tA ng+ga trA pa sarba yog+maHsa mA p+tAHzhes pa pU Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las byings dang nyeraru bsgyur sbyor ba rnams rdzogs so// / de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos

263b6(sgra skor): med du 'gyur ba sogs nyer bsgyur stobs tshe ba'i dbang gos mtha' yas so// sArba d+ha tu ke ya ka/ byings thams cad pa rnams las ya ka'o// byings las dang bcas pa rnams la las kyi don dang / byings las med pa rnams
264a1(sgra skor): la drangos po'i don du rnam dbye byings thams cad pa rnams pha rol la rkyen yaka 'gyur te kra yon tan 'gog pa'i don no// ny+dza b+hU la yaka sbyar bas/ b+hU ya zhes pa la waT/ ling / loT/ lang rnams kyi At+ma
264a2(sgra skor): ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig nas sbyar bas/ b+hA ya te/ b+hU ya te/ b+hU ya tAM/ oM b+hU ya ta sogs te/ a nu b+hA ya te A nan+da s+yai tre Na tra yAM/ a nu b+hU ya te A nan+t+ra sh+tse te na ma yA/ nyer bsgyur sngon du byung na

264a6(sgra skor): han gra ha dr-i[:]shAM tsa NA dA TA/ dngos po dang las dag las nye ba'i yul dang han gra ha dr-i sha rnams kyis s+ya/ si tsa/ sI yuT/ tA si rnams laM tsiN bzhin iT yang na'o// dngos po dang las kyi don la nye ba'i yul te byings
264b1(sgra skor): A tsa ma thA' tsan+da iT 'jug pa rnams dang graha la tsaM Na bzhin iT la 'phel ba dang yang nA bar byed la/ byings a tse mtha' can iT mi 'jug pa rnams dang hAn dang dri shra dag la IT yang na bar 'gyur zhing iT sbyin pa'i

265b1(sgra skor): kr-inya la yaka sbyar/ shA ya ka ling rnams la rIng zlos ri ring du bsgyur/ kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ kIR+Sha zhes pa la byings thams cad pa rnams sbyar bsdu/ k+ShIn+da te/ kIR+She tA/ Sh+T+rIn+dad+hA

266a1(sgra skor): bas+dza/ nan+ta te/ nan+ne tA/ nan+tA tAM/ a nan+tA ta/ sogaso// lung lA/ a nan+ti/ a nAn+ti ShA tAM/ a nan+ti Sha ta/ sog so// liT+Ta la/ na nan+te/ nA nan+na te/ sog so// lhag ma rnams la/ luT nan+t+ri tA/ smin ling nan+ti ShISh+Ta/ l+r-i naun+ti/

266a4(sgra skor): gnyis rnams kyi so sogs kyis U b+h+yA sa s+yai pra smA ra Nar bsgyur/ bai tsi swa si sogs kyis phyi ma yau saM pra sA ra Na byas pas/ I dze/ i dz+nyA te/ so ga s+ho// lu TaM lA/ prash+tsa b+has+dza sogs kyis dzA Sha/ ShaM Tu la Sha Tu stsog+sa

266a6(sgra skor): yash+tsa / a ya k+Sh+ya ti/ sogaso/ shIng la yaka/ ka 'gro ba la a yang ngos a yang du bsgyur bas/ auT sha \u0f7f sma te/ smai ta/ sha y+Ya tAM/ a sha y+Ya ta/ sogaso// lung gi gcig
266b1(sgra skor): tshig lA/ ts+tsho tsiN+DAr bsgyur bas/ a shwA yi/ gnyis tshig sogs la/ iT byin/ tsiN bzhin yang na bar byas pas/ a shA yi ShA dAM/ sogs sum/ a sha yI Sha ta/ stsog so// liT la/ shri sh+tse/ shi b+hU te/ sog so// 2
266b2(sgra skor): iT b+hin tsi Na bzhin yang nu bar byas pas/ shA yi tA/ sogs sama?/ shu yi tA/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ lhag mA rnams laM/ shA yi bISh+Ta/ rgyan sha yi shISh+Ta/ shA yi Sh+ya te/ l+r-iHsha yi Sh+ya te/ a shwa yi Sh+ya
266b3(sgra skor): ta/ srang a sha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogaso// rbata nu la yag sbyar/ ta no tAR+Ya ki/ ta n+do ti'i yaka la'o// yA ka pha rol la ta no ti'i mtha' Uta du yang na bsgyur te/ tA ya te/ 2Tata n+ya te/ tA ye tA/ ling ta n+ye ta/ tA ya tAM/ lo bAt+tha
266b4(sgra skor): n+ya tAM/ a tA ya ta/ lang+ga a ta n+ya te/ sog so// l+r-ing la/ a tA ni/ a ta ni ShA tAM/ sog so// liT la/ a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba sogs kyis/ te ne/ te nA te/ sogs so// lhag ma rnams la/ lutA nri tA/ snro med da ni
266b5(sgra skor): ShISh+TaM/ l+r-iHtI ni Sh+ya taM/ sr-ing a ta ni Sh+ya ta/ sogas+yo// \u0f7fdz+nyA na la ya ka/ ya la 'dim ka 'os/ mtha' At+ma du bi sgyu ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dama? ka tsun du byas pasa?/ dza ya te/ ladza n+yA te/ d+ha ye tA/ liTadze n+ye tA/ dz+nyA ya
266b6(sgra skor): tAM/ lo dza n+ya tAM/ a dzA ya tra/ lang a dza n+ya ta/ sogs so// lung la 'phel ba mi byed pas/ a dza ni/ a dza ni ShetAM/ a dza ni au Sha ta/ sogaso// l-iT la gnyis brjod/ gam ha na dzan sogs kyis u pa d+hA phyis/ sta'i sha
267a1(sgra skor): tsu 'os na nyar bsgyur bas/ dza dz+nye/ dza dz+nyA te/ dze dz+r-I re/ sog so// lhag mya rnams la iT byin pas/ l+ra dza ni tA/ smon ming dza ni ShISh+Ta/ br-iT dza nI Sh+ya te/ l+r-i A dz+re nI Sh+yA ta/ snog so// !ta pa la yaka sbyar
267a2(sgra skor): bas/ laT ta bya taM/ ling ta pye gI ta/ loT Na pya tAM/ yang a ta bya ta/ sogaso// ta po nyi nu ta pre tse/ tau pa'i a nu tA pa'i 'a // ta pa dang a nu sngon ma'i ta pa'i 'ang pha rol gyi tsI ni tsa Na ra mi bsgyur te/ dz+ha la las
267a3(sgra skor): dz+ha la la 'os saM tsi dbyi ba stsogs kyis bsgrub ba sau/ a nu tap+ta/ a nu tAp+sa tAM/ a nu tap+sa ta/ sogaso// liT la/ ti pe/ te pA te/ sogaso// lhag ma rnams la/ waTA tAp+ta/ smon ling tap+si Sh+Ta/ l+r-iTat+yAp+sA te/
267a4(sgra skor): l+r-iT a tap+s+ya ta/ sog so// Du dAnya la yaka/ g+hu mAs+thA sogs kyis Ita du bsgyur bas/ rI ya te/ dwI ye ta/ dI ya tAM/ a dI ya tA/ stsog so// a to yuka tsiN kr-I teny+dza/ tsiN kr-ita dag la Ata les yuka 'o// ts+li bsgyur
267a5(sgra skor): ba'i tsiN dang kr-ita sogs kyisa? rkyen nywan 'gro ba phra ril le byings Ata mtha' n+dan lus pha rol tu yukle a ga ma 'gyur te/ ka gan+das don u brjod don no// lung gi gcig tshig lA/ madro 'dis yug A ga ma byin
267a6(sgra skor): pas/ a dA ya/ gnyis tshig sogs la iT yang no bar byas/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la cin bzhin yuka byin pas/ a dA yi ShA tAM/ a dA yi Sha ta/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ s+the g+hu dag gi
267b1(sgra skor): Itra 'ang ngos i tra du bsgyu bas/ a dI ShA tAM/ a di ShA ta/ sogs so// liT la/ da de/ da dA de/ da di re/ sog so// lhag ma rnams la/ iT yang na bAr byas pas/ dA yi tA/ ! da tA/ dA si bInya/ smon ling dA
267b2(sgra skor): smaiSh+Ta/ d+hA yi Sh+ya tI/ l+r-i rA s+ya t+te/ a d+hA ya Sh+yaH/ A d+hA s+yA Na/ sogs so// hr-in+d+ra 'tshe ba la'o zhes pA la yag+sa sbyar bas/ laTaha n+yA te/ ling han+ye to/ hA n+yA taM/ a ha n+yai ta/ sogs so// han+d+ha
267b3(sgra skor): hwa'i ny+tse Na 'gro ba lwa'os/ ha g+ha/ ts+li tsINar bsgyur bAs/ lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshwag la/ a g+hA ni/ gnyis tshig sogs la iT yang na bAr byas/ iTa'i phyogaTAtsiN bzhin gyi cho ga byas pas/ a g+ha/

267b5(sgra skor): lA/ g+hA nI tA/ hAn+tha/ glA ni ShISh+Ta/ ston cing h+yaM siSh+TaM/ g+hA ni Sh+ya twe/ l+r-i'i h+ya ni Sh+ya te/ a g+hA nI Sh+ya ta/ l+r-i dA sa hA ni Sh+ya ta/ sog s+ho// gra ha lA ya ka sbyar/ gra hi dz+nyA so gas kyis NAMsaM pra sA ru Nar bsgyur bas/ [ऽ]
267b6(sgra skor): te/ ling gr-i h+ye ta/ lo gr-i h+yaM tAM/ lang a gr-i h+ya ta/ sogs so// lung gi gcig tshig la/ a gra hi/ gnyis tshig sogs la iT byin tsiN bzhin yang na bar byas pas/ a gra hi ShA tAM/ sogs sam/ a gra
268a1(sgra skor): ti ShA tAM/ sogs so// liT la/ dzaM gr-i he/ dza gr-i hI ta/ dza gri ha re/ sogaso// lhag mA rnams la/ gra hi tA/ luT gra hi tA/ gra hiSh+NISh+Ta/ smon hrI gra hiShISh+Ta/ grA hi Sh+ya te/ br-i gra hi Sh+ya te/

270b1(sgra skor): a tsaM mtha' can la pha rol gyi tsi ni byed pa po dang bcas pa'i las lA sbyar ba nA lung krI ta pha rol la tsi Na rA yang na 'gyu rA te/ a kA ri 'am/ yang na gzugs thung dru sogs kyis sitsI byis pas/ a kr-i ta/ nar+Ya d+haH/ r+ra d+ha

271a1(sgra skor): la'ang y+raka tsiN dag ma yin no// kr-i dang / gr-I dang / shrinya dang byings rgyan gyi don+da can rnams dang / byings san mtha' can rnams las kyang yaka dang tsiN dag 'gyur ba ma yin te/ kI ra Ne/ gI ra te/
271a2(sgra skor): shra ya twe/ te sa te/ tsI kIR+Sha t+te/ sogs so// byings las mud pa dang / los dang bcas pa'i dbye ba 'gre lnga por tshigs bcad byung ba nA~M/ ji skad du/ ladz+dza sad+g+ha skr-i ti dzi ga rA NA br-id+d+hi kA ya b+hA ya dz+nyA bi ta mA ra/
271a3(sgra skor): sha ya na kr-i tsa byed/ TA ra tsi dI b+han+da r+N+Na tu ga tsa tra ma karma ka mA huHde bod ska du bsgyur na/ ngo tsha yod pa gnas pa mel tshe dang // 'phel ba zad pa 'jig pa 'tshe ba dang // ny+dza l-i dang rtsed mo 'dod dang 'bar ba'i dron// byings kyi

271a6(sgra skor): brda sprong pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni b+h+r-i ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi gau din cho ga dper ze rjod sogs zin brisuM bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las dngos po dang las kyi don gyi rkyen dang
271b1(sgra skor): cho ga sogs rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// / da nI laT la sogs pa rnams kyi 'jug yul thun mong du bshadra pa rnams bstan par bya ste/ a b+hi dz+nyA pa tsi ne l+r-iT/ dngos su shes pa'i brjod pa la l+r-iTa'o//
271b2(sgra skor): dngos su shes pa dran pa'i brjod pa de ring ma yin pa byung ba'i sgra sbyor ba la l+r-iT 'gyur te/ sma ra si kr-iSh+Na mthu rA yAM pat+sa maHna ya di/ ya ta la ma yin+ti nau// dngos su shes pa dran pa'i brjod par gyur pa'i de ring ba yin pa
271b3(sgra skor): byung ba'i don la ya ta kyi sgra sbyor ba la l+r-iT 'gyur ba ma yin rje/ bas la phre ma'i byangs phyed pa la [।]et+s+ya/ ngan nam nag po bcom brlag rnams su sdang / a b+hi dA nA si kr-iSh+Na ya dA na&b+h+yAM dz+nyA hi/ bi b+hi ShA sA kAM kAM/ de 'dod pa la yang na'o/
271b4(sgra skor): bya ba'i bar de 'dod pa lnga dran pa brjod pa sbyor ba la ya ta yod med gang yin kyang l+r-iT la yang na 'gyur te/ l+r-iT sma ra si de pa dat+ta ba ne pat+sa maHd+hu dza la lang / dngos por shes sam nag po gang nagasu tshos pa/ ling sma ra si da ba dat+ta pa na ya
271b5(sgra skor): bau sA ma/ pa'o&kI liT/ lkog tu gyur pa la Ti'o// lka ga tu gyur pa bsgrub pa'i yul la de ring ma ya ni pa byung ba dron nas lhas byi rigs su snga ba/ brjod pa la lIT 'gyur te/ ra mo rA d+hi tse kA ra/ dran nam lngas byin nags su snang ba
271b6(sgra skor): 'grel par lungs drangs pa/ ut+sa pu ru She bai tsit+tA pa ro&k+Sha/ sems nyams pa las/ pa no&k+Sha'i skyes bu dang po'o// lkog tu gyur pa'i byung ba brjod pa'i sems nyams pa'i ngag byid ces rgyal srid byas so// don la liTa'i skyes bu
272a1(sgra skor): dang po 'gyur te/ sup+to&haM ki la bi la lA pA/ 'grel pA ra smad pa rtogs par byed pA la'ang liT 'gyu ro zhes byung bas/ nA haM ka ling+ga dza gA mo/ ha sha shwa toR+shi d+hA/ ha sha shwad dag las ling 'ong ngo //
272a2(sgra skor): dang sha shwata kyi sgra sbyor ba las/ nga nyam sa la ros zlag// ling gi yul la lang 'gyur zhing liDi yang 'gyur to/ hA ka rota/ yi ha tsa ka rA/ bdag cong ldan la / sha~M shwa nga ka roH/ shAts+tsha k+Sha
272a3(sgra skor): pra sh+tse tsa san+na kA l-I/ yang dag par dri bA la 'ang sdod pa'i dus la'o// yang dag par dri ba'i don la'ang gnas pa'am sdod pa'i dus rtogs ngo mtshar bar byas/ pa ru byed pa la lang 'gyur zhing liTa'ang rting pa byas/ 'gyurate
272a4(sgra skor): la A gats+tsha ta kA/ li dza gA ma kaM/ l+r-iT smai/ sgra laM liTa'o// smra'i sgra sbyor ba la l+r-iTA'i yul la lUT 'gyur te/ ya dze tisma yu d+hiSh+Ti ra/ a pa ro&k+She tsa/ lkog tu gyu ra pa ma yin pa la'ang ngo // lkog tu gyur pa'i
272a5(sgra skor): don brjod pa maM/ cil khro bar byed/ yin pa la'ang sma'i sgra sbyor ba la laT 'gyur te/ bra bI ti sma brah+ma/ na nau pr-iSh+Ta pra ti ba tsa ne/ gsu na gyi kya na nu la dri ba so sor brjod pa la'o// nA nu sbyor ba la dri bA so sor ba rjod pa'i
272a6(sgra skor): don la 'jug pa la lan 'gyur te/ na nu ka ro ti ba b+hairgya ga gi / li sa kya/ na nA rbi b+ha Sha/ na nu dag las yang ni'o// mi zad pa na deng nu dag dang sbyor ba las byung ba'i don la laT ya
272b1(sgra skor): nan 'gyur te/ a haM na ka ro mi/ 7A haM nA kaR+YaM/ a haM nu ka ro mi/ lung a haM nA kArmi/ pu ri lud+da smai/ sma ma yin pa lA pur la lung 'ang ngo // sma'i sgra yod pa ma yin pa'i pur sbyor ba las byung ba brjod pa la
272b2(sgra skor): laT 'gyur zhi lung yang 'gyur te/ nga ba gis sa bya/ d+ha saun+d+hi ha pu rA tshi tAMHtshig gis sa pa / u bAt+sa rI hwa pu'itshe/ smA sbyor ba yin na lung mi 'gyu ra te/ ya dzo ti smA pU rA/ ya but+sA rA ni pra ta yoR+YAT/ yA ba ta pu na
272b3(sgra skor): dngadag las nges tshig la laTa'o// yA bta drang pu rA dag dang sbyor ba la nga sA/ sngon 'dir slob ma bsdad/ pa'i tshig gi don la 'byung ba brjod pa la laT 'gyur te/ ya bA d+h+waMk+to/ pu rA b+h+r-ik+ti/ sngon mchog sbyi ne byas bi b+haSh+NA ka d+hA kaN+yoHkr-i tA
272b4(sgra skor): karti dag las yang na'o// kA d+da da kani sgra sbyor ba la 'byung 'gyur gyi don la laT yang na 'gyur te/ ka d+hA b+h+r-ik+te/ l+r-ikA dA b+hok+Sh+yata/ kan b+h+yAMny+tsaM b+h+yo k+Sh+ya te/ ki ma br-it+te l+r-ip+sa y+YA/ krI ma
272b5(sgra skor): 'jug pa las 'dod pa lnga'o// ki 'jug pa ste ki ma nyid dang ki ma rkyen mtha' n+dan rnams dang sbyor ba las 'dod Sh+Ta/ pa rtogs par tshil ma par byed/ byed pa'i 'byung 'gyu ra la laT 'gyur te/ kam bi pr-i dz+ha
272b6(sgra skor): dz+nyA yoM s+t+wa~M/ ka ta ra bi praM b+ho dza ya si/ sogs sam/ 9b+ho dz+yo Sh+ya te be br-i kim/ oM / lib+h+ra mA na sid+d+hi tsa/ 'dod pa can 'grub pa la'ang ngo // gang 'dong pa'i don de 'grub pa'i 'byung 'gyur brjod pa la'ang laT
273a1(sgra skor): 'gyur te/ yoHn+d+ha da d+hA tI/ pro&n+na dA s+ya ti/ lo Dar+tha lak+Sha Ne tsa/ loTa'i don gyi mtshan nyid la'o// ljoTa'i don can gyi 'byung 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid brjod pa la'ang laT 'gyur te/ s+ya kr-iSh+NAHb+h+r-i k+te/
273a2(sgra skor): lo kr-iSh+Na b+h+yAM k+t+wA/ brta ma nA sA mi pye bAr+Na mA na bi dA/ keng sa sbyid par 'gyur/ du ltar ba nye ba la dA ltar ba bzhin yang na'o// da ltar ba nye ba'i yul de 'das nas yun ring po song ba ma yin pa dang ma 'ongs pa yun ring po ma yin
273a3(sgra skor): bo be bags pa'i 'das ma 'ongs gnyis ka la daM ltar bya bzhin du laT sogs da ltar ba'i rkyen rnams yang na 'gyur te/ la ka d+ha gAts+tsha ti/ ling yA d+ha gats+tsha ti/ yang na/ ka d+ha gats+tsha tA/ ya d+ha ga ma Sh+ya ti/ A shaM sA yA/

273b6(sgra skor): Sh+ya ti/ kim ki la s+yAn+ma Shu l+r-iT/ ki me ki la yod pa'i don rnamos la l+r-iTa'o// kim ki la'i sgra dang yod pa'i don rnams la dus gsum ka la l+r-iT 'gyur te/ kaM ka la tAM shu drAn+taM b+ho k+Sh+ya se/ bid+yag khyod dmas rigs pa 'thur/
274a1(sgra skor): astaM shU d+h+r-i ga mi k+Sh+ya sI/ b+ha ba ti sh+tsu d+he ga mi k+Sh+ya si/ bi d+yA te shU d+h+r-i ga mi k+Sh+ya ti/ dzA tu ya do rling / dzA tu yang dag las ling d+ho// dzA tu dang yang dag sbyor ba las smad pa la dus gsum ka la ling 'gyur te/
274a2(sgra skor): dz+nyAdz+ha tu ta tA b+ha ban+ma shU dr-i yA dza yita/ yong bar ma mi rigs mo mo 'gro ba 'gyur/ yaut+ta tra tri shU dAM yAM dza yaMta/ ya d+ha ya d+yoR+Yo gA tse/ ya dA ya dri ga gi sbyor ba la 'ang ngo // yA dA dang yi dwi sgra sbyor ba la'ang smod pa rtogs par byed
274a3(sgra skor): pa la ling 'gyur te/ nam zhig ngor khyod dam a rigs la mchod sbyiran byed/ ya dA tAM shru dr-i yA dzA yeta/ gang dang khyod dmangs rigs la mchod sbyin byed/ ya di tAM shru dr-i yA dza ye ta/ yats+tsha ya tra yoHyats+tsha ya tra dag gi'o// yats+tsha dang ya tra dag gi sbyor ba l-i 'ang

277b5(sgra skor): nyer bsgyur na Nar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can gyi pha rol gyi byings ni tsa'i ma tha' can las pha rol gyi kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen a tsa las pha rol gyi na yig nI Nar bsgyur ba dang mi ri ra bya/ bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du byA ste/
277b6(sgra skor): yA nAM mtha' can la a nAM yi ra sbyar bas/ pra yA pa NA yaM/ ma tsha par 'ad pa byas/ pra ya pa nI yaM/ ha la shwe dzu pa d+ha ta/ ha la las kyang i tsi u pa d+hA las so// byings so ha la dang po itsi u pa d+ha can la pha rol gyi kr-iH
278a1(sgra skor): sngogs kyi rkyen Atsa las pha rol gyi na yig ni nyer bsgyur rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung na NAr+ya yang nA basmA rA te/ ku pa khro ba la a nI yar ku pa mtha' sogs kyis yon tanA byas/ mang+ge 'di sA Na rA yang
278a2(sgra skor): na bsgyur bas/ pra ko pa NI yaM/ pra ko pa nI ye/ i dz+nye deHsa nu maHiHdang po las num dang btsos pa'i 'o// byings i tsa dang po sogs la num dang btsos pa yin kyang atsa las pha rol gyi kr-ita kyi na yig ni nyer

280b2(sgra skor): 'gyur ba mA yin te/ gardza sgra'i don lo'o zhes pa la N+yata/ mdo 'dis dza gar mi 'gyur/ gar+N+NaM/ sogs so// res/ a dzi drA dz+yaMsh+tsa/ a dzi pra dzi dag gi 'ang ngo // A dzu 'phen pa/ pra dze 'gro ba dag dnga'ang smras pa dza 'gro

282b1(sgra skor): b+hu bau b+hA ge/ b+hU las dngos po la'o// su pa las pha rol gyi b+hU yod pa la dngos po brjod pa la kyapa 'gyur te/ brah+ma b+hA yaM ga ta/ supa las pha rol min na yata sbyar bas/ b+ha byaM/ ha nustu tsa/ han las ta'ang ngo // nyer

283a1(sgra skor): las kyab snang na 'gyur te/ Ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/ sh+yA s+ye/ dud+d+ha/ gud+h+yaM/ yang+ka na yat+ta stAr bAs/ sh+yAs+t+wa~M/ do d+ha/ go h+yaM// sgrung pa N+ya d+ya dz+nyAn+tu sa dz+nyA ya/ ang

283a4(sgra skor): r-Itr-I la N+ya ta sbyar bas/ saM kag+b+h+yAM/ di hab+h+yAM/ pA No sr-i dzi tAM/ pA Ni la sr-i l+la N+yata pA Ni sngon ma'i sr-i dzi rnam par bcad pa las N+yatA 'gyur te/ tsa dzaM sogs kyis gar bsgyur/ puka mtha' sogs kyis yon ga/ tAn
283a5(sgra skor): byis paste/ nga dunags rnas kyi myong ba/ prA r+N+NaM sar+m+ma rAts+tsha/ sa ma b+ha b+hUn+man+taM/ saM a ba ston ma las kyang ngo // nyer bsgyur saM a ba sngon ma'i sr-i dza~M las+ya kyang t+yAta 'gyur te/ sa ma ba sAr+g+haM/ i ts+tsha/
283a6(sgra skor): nau/ kha na'i I ba // kha nu 'joms pa la kyab 'gyur zhing no l+r-i tshwa rlung lag pas bsgri thoms/ bsgyur te/ kha na le kya pa/ na ir+ya bsgyur/ a las yo na tan byas pas/ khe yaM/ rnamasas b+h+r-i ho&saM dz+nyA yAM Nigs pa b+hainya las ming
283b1(sgra skor): mA yin pA lan+do// b+h+r-inya'adzin pa la gang drug gi ming ma yin pa la k+sha 'gyur te/ thung du stsogs kyis rtag byin+ta b+ha sa/ Sh+TA r+b+ha/ s+yAd yin na d+hA/ myur 'phel ba byas pas/ b+hAr+thaM/ sar+b+ba ho bA/ sa dz+nyAHlas ya na/
283b2(sgra skor): saM sngon ma'i b+hinya las kyab yang na 'gyur zhing yang na N+yata 'gyur te/ saM b+h+r-i t+yaH/ saM b+hAR+YAH/ sr-i dze rbaM bA wA/ sr-i dza'i 'd-i ma ka'o// 6 sr-i dza rnam par bcad pa la kya ba / chum N+ya ta 'das kI can du byA ste/
283b3(sgra skor): sr-i dz+yaHsur+dz+dza/ rA dza sU ya sUr+Ya mr-i Sho d+ya ru ts+yai ku pA kr-iSh+Na pA ts+ya [ऽ])ga ba'i gami lag sa/ byA thA/ rA dza sU ya sur+Ya mr-i Sho d+ha ru ts+yai ku pya kr-iSh+Ta pa ts+yai a byA th+ya rnamaso// rA dza snron mA rIShu deng pa/ sr-i 'gro ba/ mr-i ShA sngon ma'i bar
283b4(sgra skor): brjod pa/ TI ma la ba rba pa tsa 'bar bya/ ku pa khro bya/ kr-iSh+NA sngon+da ma'i pa tsa 'tshed pa/ nanya sngon mo'i byi tha sdug bsngal ba rnams las kyang sbyar bas/ nU dzi smr-i ya/ s+yAR+YA/ mr-i ShaM d+yaM/ ru ts+yai/ ku bya/ kr-iny+dzi pa ts+ya/ a d+ya
283b5(sgra skor): rnams rims pa bzhin/ rgyal po khrus byed do// nyi ma/ mi bden byar byed do// bsal bar byed do// khro ba re byed do// blangs nas ba tse bar bya'o// rgyal po chun byed// mi yod par byed// gsal la gyid do// srob bya'o/ gas gyi'o// nad med pa bya'o//

284a2(sgra skor): phrad do// bi pU ya bi nI ya dzi t+ya muny+dza kalka ha li Shu/ bi pU ya bi nAM ya d+hi dzi t+ye rnams muny+dzi stig+sa sa mthong rnams la'o// bi snga ma'i pad+mA dag pa dang tInya thob pa/ dzaM rgyal bA rnams la kyi sgra ra bas/ bi pU ya

288b5(sgra skor): rkyen ti la sogs pa 'di rnams la iT 'gyur ba ma yin no// b+hU yod pa la mdo sngon mas k+ti tsa byaMnAM/ tsaM dbyangs don ka yon tan 'gog pa'i don mdo 'dis iT 'gyur ba ma yin te/ b+hu tiH/ de bzhin du/ ShUny+tsa srog

307a6(sgra skor): bar sdong pa las pha rol gyi laT bsgyur ba'i na tsa'i a ni Ita du bsgyur te/ e si naHbr-i d+hAR+Shasha turba suH/ baM daM las shwa twAM yai ba su rab tu btung bar bya/ dz+wa la ta mtha' can la larje na dang ka seM sgyur 'o// 'o// bi da shes pa las
307b1(sgra skor): pha rol gyi laT bsgyur ba'i sha tr-i ni yang na ba su zhes par bsgyur te/ bi dan/ bi d+ha na/ tr-i sa tA/ dwe ngag sAta'o// sha tr-i dang shwA na tsA dag las sata ces ming+ra 'dogs byed do// l-I TaHsa drA/ l+r-iTa'i sata yang na'o//
307b2(sgra skor): l+r-iT 'ang sata ste sha tr-i dad+ya shA na tsa dag tu mang po la yang na bsgyur te/ shes pa dang ma rig par byed/ kr-inya la l+r-iT/ s+ya ta ngag sngogs kyis s+ya byin/ ba la dang po'i iT mau do 'dis l+r-iT sata du bi sgyur bas/ ka ri Sh+yan/ ka rai
307b3(sgra skor): Sh+yA mI na/ sogs so// prAd+ba dzi/ shA nan+da/ pUng ya dza dgu la shA nan po'o// pUng dag pa dang yadza lha mchod pa dag lasau pha rol gyi laT naM shA naun zhes par bsgyur te/ na rjes ma dbyangs don/ pA ba man+taH/ ya dza mA naH/ [।]
307b4(sgra skor): tits+tshi l+ya bA yo ba tsa na shak+ti ShI shA na tsaM/ de'i ngang tshul dang na tshod brjod pa dang stobs rnams la shrA na tsA'o// de'i ngang tshul dang na tshed brjod pa dang stobs rnams d+hogs par byed pa l-i lAT sA na tsA ra dag pa byed/ mtshad par bye/ bsgyur
307b5(sgra skor): nI ha nr-i t+ya mA naHkA tAM he dzal+lamA naH/ ka tI hai kar+N+NaM g+ha naH/ ing d+hAR+YoHsha t+yA kri tshwa Ni/ ing d+hi rAg las dgra dang dka' ba dgra lA'o// aung klog pa dang d+h+r-inya 'dzinA pa dag las rim pa bzhin dgra dang dka' ba dag rtog

313b1(sgra skor): be shaHsmar+Ya/ byA d+hi mat+sa ba le Sh+ya tsa/ prA d+hi dang / sar+b+ba dang / ba la rnams la 'ang ngo // byA d+hi dang mat+ma dang / bA la rnams brjod pa dang gzhan yang nyer bsgyur sngon ma can mang po la g+hanya 'gyur te/ byA d+hi bi she ShaH/ bi sA raH/
313b2(sgra skor): byad/ rig / mad+h+yaH/ sI rAr+N+Nab lAM/ pre sA ruH/ su sA ra/ sogs so// au kaMSh+TashaM/ uka gi kA sha la'o// nyer bsgyur i kaso sor bsdu ba'i mtha' tsana? ni kAM sha g+hA nya'i rkyen can pha rAng ba kyang pa'i rnam kyiste rol
313b3(sgra skor): la ring por bsgyur bar nya/ ste lo ste/ ho !/ / legs k+ko byA ste/ nI ka shan+ta/ A nu kA nad+d+ha/ sogs so// ika mtha' min nA ma 'gyur ta/ pra kA shaH/ e ratsA/ I las atsa'o// byings i yig mtha' can las
313b4(sgra skor): dngos po l+yA g+haShA 'gyur ba mA yin gyi a tsa nyid do// dza yauH/ tse yaHr-I dorA pa/ seM kaM b+h+r-i ta dang u las a pa'o// byings r-I ta mtha' can dang / rangags pa/ u yig gi mtha' can rnams las apa 'gyur te/ ke raH
313b5(sgra skor): ge DaH/ yaM dzaH/ pe bAH/ ing b+hU/ ing las kyang ngo // rgyas gsog pa/ anga? klog pa las kyang g+hAnya 'gyur te/ u pA d+h+yA yaH/ u pa d+h+ya yI/ pra thu ne bi re shad+d+ha/ rgyas pA la baM las sgra ma yin pa'o// 2ga

319b2(sgra skor): me'i don la khyud don no// pra kr-i t+yA/ nanye yod na/ a kr-It+sA/ sog so// bA l+ya pau/ lAM pa lA yang na'o// stAR+Sha bshang pa'i rnaM suM sne ldan dbyi ba rnams kyi bsgyur ba'i lhab pha rol la yang na bar bya ste/
319b3(sgra skor): gA t+ya/ AM ga myA/ pra Na t+ya/ pr-i nA // stsogs so// na l+ya bi/ l+ya pa la ma yino// krA bsgyur ba'i lhub pha rol g+hu mA s+yA sogs air bsgyu ba ma yin te/ bi drA ya/ prA d+hA ya/ prA stA ya/
319b4(sgra skor): sogaso// ngas das/ rtA so+o/ mIng la krA l+ya pra/ mi nA ti sogs kyis a tau du bsgyur bas/ ni mA ya/ sngog so// l+ya pi la g+h+ri b+hUR+Wa te/ l+ya ba la sa yang ba sngon ma la so// ma cang/ saM b+hiH/ ra gan
319b5(sgra skor): yang ba sngon ma can gyi Ni tsa'i mtha' ni l+yab phra rol la a yAr 'gyur te/ bi ga Ni tsisl-iH/ pra Na ma yAMSh+Ta/ das par/ bi b+hU bA yauH/ o yau yang na'o// a p+l-i Ni tsA'i mtha' can ni l+ya pa pha rol la a ya ra yang na
319b6(sgra skor): 'gyur ti/ pA pa y+Ya/ raha du byab/ prA pya/ Ni iT med pa la phyis pa'o// rnam par 'tshogs 'dang / rab tu 'dudu 'di/ 'grel pa ra kA l+ya pa pha rol la ring por yang na 'gyu ro zhes bshad pas/ pra k+Shi ya/ mdu bang / pra k+Shi t+ya/
320a1(sgra skor): ma ya te rI dA n+yA tA ra sAM/ ma ya ti'i It+ta yang na'o// ma ya? ti ste meng batshe da'i A ni l+yA pa phu rol l+ya Ita du bsgyur te/ a ba m+b+hi Sh+ya/ A ba mA ya/ l+ya pi tse/ l+yA pa? 'ang ngo // be ny+dza'i l+ya pA pha rol la
320a2(sgra skor): suM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur ba ma yin te/ pra b+hU ya/ bi b+haSh+mA pa r-I/ pa ri las yang na'o// pa ri lbos pha rol gyi bye nya'i l+ya paM baM pha rol la si pra sA ra Na ra yang na 'gyur te/ pa 'i byA yi/ pa rI byA ya/ A
320a3(sgra skor): b+h+r-im+b+hi nIm+l-i l+yA/ ya tsid yang l+yA NA mul 'ong ngo // sa byed pa po gcig gis byA bstA ma la yang yang gri khyAng+ga pAr+ya la 'dzug po nA kA 'gyur zhing Na mu la 'ang 'gyur te/ b+h+rak+Sha b+hu kA brI dzA tAM/ b+h+yo dza b+hI dz+dza
320a4(sgra skor): gso// kAr+m+ma N+yA k+to shaMkr-Iny+tsaMHkha mAny+tsa/ wA lA sau kr-inya la b+h+yo ba la khaM munya'i// las las pha rol gyi kr-iny+dza las spyo ba rtogs par byed pa la kha mun 'gyur te/ kyi/ khaM mumr-i gyi don da
320a5(sgra skor): nya 'phel ba'i don no// tsau raM kAr+ra/ spyod pa ma yin na k+Sha sbyar byas/ sU t+yA krA tA stau ti/ s+yA du mi Na mu la/ zhim prA la Na mu lu'o// zhim pa'i don can g+h+r-i tshig las phu rol gyi kr-inya Na mul 'gyur te/ sne
320a6(sgra skor): kA ra b+hu/ yang ma ste sbyar ba/ rkyen seMs swa rje gr-itrU~M d+hu rmA a n+ya thai ba~M ka tha mod+ho b+ha ny+dza/ a n+ya bA~M/ oM ga~M/ ka thaM/ oMt+ma rnams las kyang ngo // an+ya thA ka
320b1(sgra skor): idz+dza rnams dang gzhan yang mang po'i pha rol gyi kr-inya la N+ya mul 'gyur te/ a n+ya h+nA kA raM b+huk+ShA/ e baM kA r+yaM b+huk+ta/ ka thaM kA raM b+huk+te/ id+d+haM puk+te/ sogaso// dzI bA dI deH/ d+hi ba las bi dri laso// dzi ba las pha rol gyi bi dir
320b2(sgra skor): thob po la Na mul 'gyur te/ dzI ba be daHb+huk+te/ ni mu la yoHkaSha rnam la gzhan kyi po byas na 'a na ni mu la sa la dag la ka Sha las so// nI mU la dang sa la dag las pha rol gyi
320b3(sgra skor): ka Sha lAs Na mul 'gyur te/ wa/ ni mA li kU ShaM/ swa la kA ShaM/ shuk+ka tsur+N+Na n+yA k+She Shu pi ShaH/ shuSh+ka tsur+Na rAk+Sha rnams la pI Sha lhas so// shuSh+kak+ka tsur+N+Na r+yA k+Sha rnams lus pha rol gyi pi khA lA Na yul 'gyur te/
320b4(sgra skor): shuSh+mA pre ShaM/ tsur+N+Na pe ShAM/ r+YA k+ShA te/ naM/ [।ऽ] skye/ sa m+bA l+yA kr-i ti dz+nyI bi khA hA na kr-inya gr-ih+NaH/ s+yA mu la U kr-i tA dz+nyAM ba rnams la ha na kr-inyaM gr-i ha las so// sA mA la A kr-i ti dz+nyA ba rnams lasa? pa
320b5(sgra skor): rol gyi/ rim pa bzhin ha na kr-inya grah+Na rnams laM sr-i Na mu la 'gyur te/ sam+b+ha la g+hA taM/ u kr-i te kA raM/ d+hI bA g+h+ra haM/ hAsta ka ra yoHbar+t+ti b+h+r-i hA b+h+yAM/ hasta ka ra dag la baN+Di gra
320b6(sgra skor): dag la so// hasta dang ka ra ngag las la rol gyi brti dang gr-i ha las Na mu li 'gyur te/ hasta g+hA d+hi / ga / ban sa byed kya/ bran pa ni oM ka ra g+ha haM/ chag pa ma/ has+t+ra brti/ \u0f7f/ ka ra bar+d+ha/
321a1(sgra skor): pu ShaH/ swa la pu Sha la s+yA s+ho// swa las pha rol gyi pu Sha lAs Na mul 'gyur te/ sra bo ShaM/ u pa ma ne kAr+m+ma Ni tsa/ nye bar 'jal ba la las la'o// nye bar 'jal ba las byed pa dang las las kyang na
321a2(sgra skor): mul 'gyur te/ rat+nA naM d+hA yaM/ u pa dr-i sha s+t+r-i tI yaM/ gsum pa la u pa daM sha las so// gagasum pa'i mtha' nye dwa'i tshig las pha rol gyi u pa daM sha las Na mul 'gyur te/ mU le ke no pa daM sha b+h+r-ik+ta/
321a3(sgra skor): u pa dA na pa rI prA yAM/ a sa su ngan pa ma zhin nges par 'dzis/ byung / bungs la yongs su myur ba la'o// byung khungs te lnga pa'i mtha' nye ba'i tshig la ches mya rA ba'i don rtogs par byed pa'i bya ba'i btson gyis nye bar
321a4(sgra skor): denA la Na mu la'i gyur te/ sha yA yAH/ la la[ऽ] ud+b+ha yaM/ dI tAM yaM tse/ gnyis pa la 'ang ngo // gnyis pa'i mtha' can nye ba'i tshig las kyang myur po rtogs par byed pa la bya ba'i don la Na mU la 'gyur te/
321a5(sgra skor): yaSh+Ti grA hAM yu d+h+yAn+te/ uta snga ma'i sgra la Na A ru ka a ga ma// u la staM b+hu sogs ts+li sa byaMs a byA ya ya thA b+hi pr-i ya khyA ne kr-inyaHk+t+wA Na mu l-i/ gang mi zad pa la mngon pA ra dga' ba brjod pa la kr-inya las k+ta dang Na mul+la dIg gro/ gang mi zad pa
321a6(sgra skor): gas shing brgya zhi par byed/ nye ba'i tshig las mngon par dga' ba brjod pa'o don rtogs par byed pa'i bya ba la k+ShA dang Na mul 'gyur te/ uts+tshe kr-i t+ya pr-i yAM brA ti/ dag med ma na byas/ uts+tshi kr-i tA pri ye prA te/ uts+tsha k+Sha
321b1(sgra skor): raM pr-i yaM bru te/ sog s+ho// i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+yA s+yA tAt+k+r-i twA dA ya sa mAp+paH/ zhes pa prA NI nI byA ka ra NA'i mdo las kr-ita la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so// / de rnams kyis brda sprod pA'i bstan bac+doMs chen
321b2(sgra skor): ts+tsha m+bu/ po pa Ni ni drA kA ra Ne ga nga na 'di ni tshig rabardung sogs pan bris bu bkod pa legs kyi shad na na pa'i shing rte na sa bya ba las kAt+ta maM stsogs pu byed las ming du bsgrub sna'i chog
321b3(sgra skor): spyir btang dmyigs bsal dang bAtsas prA rnams re zhig rdzogaso// / 'gril pA'i mjug tu sbyar byang dang shis pa brjod pa'i tshig su bcad pa byung bi nau/ pra kr-i yA kau mu dI sr-i yaM nA ma tsan+na pra kA shi tA/ a
321b4(sgra skor): sa twa tsa sta mo ba d+hut+pats+tsha ko ra pri yA tsi ri/ bod skad du/ rab byed shin tu gsal ba de 'di yang // dge 'byid zla bas rab tu gsal bur byas// bden med brjod pa mtha' ma 'chung byed de// dpyod ldan dam pa
321b5(sgra skor): rta ga tu dga' bar byed// tsas so// gnyis pa shis pa brjod pa ni// A tsar+Ya pyA tu b+hA ga ban shr-i b+h+yAM pau tu bi nA ya kAH// nIn+thig+h+raM s+yaits+tsha sArba tA prA Ni nA ya pre sA d+yA taH// bod skad duH/ slob dau po na srung bar mdzod
321b6(sgra skor): cig bcom ldan 'das/ slob ma srung ba mdzod cig rnam par 'dren/ thams cad du'ang gi gis yod ma yin pa// drang srong pa NaM ni yi bo ke'i drin las// mang+ga laM li kha kA nAM tse pA tha kA nAM tsi mang+ga laM/ mang+ga laM sarba b+hA
322a1(sgra skor): tA nau b+hU maM b+hA pra ti mang+ga lAM// 'dri ba rnams kyang bkra shis shing // klog pa rnams kyang bkra shis pa// srog chags thams cad bAkra shrIs shing // sA dang sa bdug bkra shis shog/ ces pa'o// de ltar/
322a2(sgra skor): brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chi nu po brgyad kyi nang tshan de rnams kyi nang nus kyang go don tshig sngogs phul du phyin pa mdor na sgra'i gtsug lag thams cad kyi phyi mo lta blar gyur pa'o skol gyi ston pa mnyam mAd shAkya'i rgyal/
322a3(sgra skor): pos 'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud sngogasu lung bstan pa'i bram+ba ze chen po pA ti ni la 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis drangasu stsal ba/ pA Ni nI byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi ge don cho ga dper brjod sogs rig zig tu bkod pa
322a4(sgra skor): legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba 'di ni/ rang cag grangs ri'i khrod pa rnams kyi mtshungasnga pa med pa'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen drim pa 'phags pa phyag na pad+mo nyid gsum ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i skur bzhengs
322a5(sgra skor): pa don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te/ rgyal dpyong thams cad mkhyen pa chen po dgra dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho 'jigs med go cha thub bstan lang tsho'i sde tshangs sras bzhed pa'i rdo rjes mnyam pa med pa'i thugs rje'i gzer gyi
322a6(sgra skor): bskyangs shing / paN+Di ta mchid la gsar dngul zho grangs brgya phrag du ma sogs ci 'dod kyi yo byad mtho' dag 'bad med du bstsal to/ bka' 'phangs la'ang khyod kyis gzhung bo du bsgyur ba dang / 'grel pa'i go don dpar brjod zin
322b1(sgra skor): bris bu 'debs pa sogs gyis shig ces bka' gnad pa thob par brten/ dam pa gang de'i gzhal du med pa'i bkany+dza drin las brda sprod pa'i ring lugs la cung zad tsam sbyangs pa bka' 'bangs kyi tha chung gceng bstod 'dar bya
322b2(sgra skor): sa'i chur se'i rigs lngas skyes pa dag dbang phran tshogs lhun grub tham/ ming gzhan tshe dbang rab brtan rdo rjer bod pa'i rmongs brtul snyoms las pas/ 'phags yu lA ku ru k+She tAr bram ze gtsang ma'i rigs 'khrungs pa gnas/
322b3(sgra skor): lnga rig pa'i ma hA paN+Di ta bai lA b+hu dra dang / paN+Di ta go gu l+r-i nA tha mI shra mched kyi drung du gzhung gi sgra sgrub dang go don dpe rA brjod sogs leTA par nyan te gzhung bod du bsgyur/ slob dpon chen po DA ma tsan+das mdzad pa'i 'grel pa pra kra/
322b4(sgra skor): ye ste rab tu bya ba ni sa pa gzhir bzhag kun bshud sogs cho ga rtogs dka' ba rnams la slob dpon mkhas pa'i gsung rgyun gyis zur brgyan te cung zud rgya snga par byas/ rtogs sla ba rnams nyung ngur byas te/ ma mkha'
322b5(sgra skor): rgya mtsha la 'das lo drug cu skor bcu dang nyag sum cu/ rtsa sbubs kyi mtshan gu zhig par btab yad/ rtsa gcig bsre ba rnam 'phyang zhes pa sa po khyi lo rang lo nyer ltar slob pa chu stod zla ba'i yar chos dge bar 'go brtsams/ kun ljin zhes pa lcags
322b6(sgra skor): bya nag pa zla ba'i dmar phyogs kyi rgyal ba gsum pa pa sha'i sgrub sbyor gyi dus dge bar chos grwa chen po dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi rang shag rgyud steng spyi bor sbyar ba 'dis kyang bstan pa dang sems can yongs la phan par gyur cig
323a1(sgra skor): ces pa 'di la bdag nyid blo gros kyi na tshod shin tu gzhon pas 'gyur ma dag pa dang / dper brjod go don sogs la 'gal 'khrul snang na bla ma mchog dang mkhas pa'i tshogs kyis bzod par mdzod la tshul bzhin 'chos
323a2(sgra skor): par mdzad du gsol/ dge 'dis dpal stug gsang ba kun 'dus rin chen gser gyi sa gzhi 'dzin// mtha' yas gdul bya skabs gsum yongs kyi gnyen gcig dpal ldan ngag gi dbang // blo gros bzang po'i nyi zlas rab
323a3(sgra skor): 'khyud rgya chen shes bya'i mkha' la khyab// mtsho ltar zab yangs mkhyen pa'i dpal mnga' ji srid bar du brtan pa dang // bgro yas skya rgu'i lags byas kyis bsku na lugs zung khrims kyi gdugs dkar po// phul byung khyon yangs
323a4(sgra skor): 'dred dgu'i dpal stor yid bzhin nor bu'i tog gis spras// nam yong 'gog med mkha' la rab bteg phan dang bde ba'i grib bsil gang // bstan dang 'gro ba'i mi mthun gdung sel mchog tu lhag par mdzes gyur tsog/ tshul
323a5(sgra skor): 'dir lo ga rtog rdul gyis nyer bsgribs nas// gzhung don dga' ma'i bzhin ras mi gsal nA/ mkhas mchog dam pa'i spyan sngar mi 'chab pa s+ya// dpyad gsum dag pas byi dor mdzadadu gsol// gang gi rig tshul gang+gA'i
323a6(sgra skor): yab gcig las// nyer 'ongs legs tshogs rab dngos de la 'gro yis// yid can rmongs pa'i dri ma kun bkrus nas/ kun mkhyen rin chen rgya mtshor 'jug par shog/ kyo d+ham smras tsha gtam/
324a1(sgra skor): 'phrul gyi me long dgu skor zhes bya ba rtsa 'grel bzhugs so//
324b1(sgra skor): kun mkhyen nyid la phyag 'tshalo// rnal 'byor lta ba'i spyi 'brel brdeg/ log rtog byang chub yul snang ba'i// chos kun sems gcig mi gcig/ lhun gyis grub pa gang la bgyi// de nyid snang ba yod
324b2(sgra skor): dam med// ye nus sangs rgyas yin na ma yin// khams gru ma sems tsan ji ltar 'khrul// 'khrul po nyid nA dan tsi lag ste// rnal 'byor lta ba'i ngo bo gang // de dag dgos pa the tshom gang // de rnams khyad par ji ltar che//
324b3(sgra skor): 'phrul gyi me long dgu skor bzhin// gsal byed 'phrul tshig dgu yis bston/ sgyu ma rnam gnyis dpyod yul ni// sems kyi chos nyid dang du gcig/ de'i de nyid ji lta ba// mkha' dang gzha' snang ji bzhin du// log rtog sems
324b4(sgra skor): rgyud tha dad kyang // rigs rgyud med phyir bye ba dka'// sems nyid nor bu rin po che// ji ltar dmigs shing bsams par snang // 'gro la sems rgyud gnyis 'chang // de ni dngos med kun gyi gzhi/ log rtog min ma'i yul snang
324b5(sgra skor): kun/ sems phyir mtha la du rtsod pa med// gang la yod med med pa ltar// rtog pa'i smra bsams yul lngas 'das// de ni de phyir rgyal 'i gro zhes// ri su bcad pa med pa la// gtsang dang mi gtsang dngos gcig bzhi ni//
324b6(sgra skor): phyogasu bltas ni nor ba'i blo/ ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i sems// me long g.yang dang mkha' sprin bzhin/ rig dang ma rig gnyis med pas// phyogs gcig rkyen gyi dus su 'khru la/ 'jig rten brtan g.yo la
325a1(sgra skor): sogs pa// snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med// rang byung phyi nang med snang phyir// dA dus rang bzhin nyams pa med// 'jug pa'i rnam shes de lA pa// sa rang thun mong spyan yin no// rang byung ye shes chog
325a2(sgra skor): kun bdug/ shes rab can gyi mchog yin no// rdo rje yid ni dbang mchog phyir// lta ba med phyir rang spyi tshos// dbyer meng phyogs lha'i 'od bral bas// ma nor rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs// gsuMm gnyis gcig gi the tshom yang /
325a3(sgra skor): dang po dngos dang gsal ba dang // snga ma sangs rgyas sems can dang // so so sems rgyu do tha dad dzI pa// gtso ga na bdun la sgra rtog skye// de bzhin sems rgyud brgyad la za// tha dad zhe na bdun gyis 'gal// de bras dgag dang /
325a4(sgra skor): sgrub med pa'i// gcig dang du ma med pa'o// gsum pa'i snga ma rtog skyon dgu/ byi ma med pa'i the tshom dag/ skyon gyi dngos po bcu gnyis shing // mi mkhas mkhas pa'i bsam pa ni// mi mkhas shin tu mi mkhas
325a5(sgra skor): pa// shin tu mi mkhas mthar lta ba// mi mkhas yod med brtso bye da cing // dgag cing bsgrub pa gang byed pa// de do da la chags srung skye// mkhas dang shin tu mkhas pa ni// mkhas pa phal la dgag sgrub can// sgrub pa'i don
325a6(sgra skor): la brten par byed// byas pa'i bzung 'dzin dbang gyur pa'i// ma nor lo ma dang bral ba yin// shin tu mkhas pa thams cad la// sems phyi ra dgag sgrub pa med// de la rang rig rang snang phyir// dgag sgrub bral la yid mi rtom//
325b1(sgra skor): de phyir so so dgag bsgrub ca na// sgrub pa'i phyogs la zhen pa'i phyir// de de med pa g+ha la mthong // de bas ni brtags mthong yi// de skas gdang ni ltu ba// khya par grangs dang ngar ba med// cha yod drug lnga mi 'azung ba nom/ rgyan
325b2(sgra skor): lta gnyisu ga la 'gyur// gnyis po de ltar de nyid la// grub pa'i mtha' snyad ji ltar mtshon// ma grub grub na ngas tshig meng // de ma grub na de bzhin no// de bas srid dang mi srid kun/ lhun grub phyogasu grub pa med/ bin pa snga ma skyon
325b3(sgra skor): drug gnyis// de bzhin phyi ma rjes su 'thun// gnyis med zhe na dus gsum lung // 'byung zhes bya ba'adra gnyis med dang // sman nyid phan 'dogs bdag gnas ltar// ngo bos tha dad 'gyur pa maud// phye Ta wa logs pa'i tha dad medo//
325b4(sgra skor): pa 'khrul gzhi yod med pa'i// skyen ni gsum pa ji bzhin grangs// mig yor gsum la drangos maud 'dra'i// chos yod bzhin pas rang sems la// de dngos med kyang rgyu rkyen drug/ rang bzhin lhun grub dpog bsam bzhin// so sor snang ste
325b5(sgra skor): dus gsum du// rgyun du 'khrul la lhun grub pa// 'gra lo 'brengad 'jug med snang bzhin// gzhi yod med dang dbyer med mtshungs// drug pa de ltar de bden na// de la skyon du byaM bA bi dun// tha ma sA tsa du 'chang 'grol dbyer med la// gnyis mthong
325b6(sgra skor): 'khrul par blta ba 'khrul// de bas slang dang dor ba med// bde sdug gni su ris ma blta// bdun pa 'di rog can yin no// de la skyon bcu 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes 'di// mi lnga'i bdag po kun gyi sems// rang spyi ji
326a1(sgra skor): snyed ji lta ba// rang yul med par nges gsal ba// na mkha'i sprin mthong 'od bzhin du// rab rib gang dag shes rab snang // brgyad pa nges mthong sgrib pa'i grangs// brgyad pa bsnyad pa yan lag bcas// phyag brgya bzhi yi bzhir gyur pa//
326a2(sgra skor): par ngos zin bya bar bsnyad// ma rig pa nyid ye shes gsalnga// the tshomi nyid kyang nges pa'i spyan// log rtog nyid kyang ma nor lim// de la mi mthun shes dang bral// dgu pa 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// theg pa'i lte ba gralo bkod sa// skas ga dang
326a3(sgra skor): bur bstan pa dag/ kun kyang bdag dang bral ba'i phyir// 'jig rten shes 'phags ci smos te// de dag nyid ni dgag dang sgrub// rim pa yod med khyad par dang // ltos pas phye ba'i khad par ni// bdag spong bdag med sgrub pa dang // gzug spong phyi
326a4(sgra skor): stong sgrub pa dang // don 'gog sems tsam sgrub pa dang // mtha' spong mtha' bral sgrub pa dang // dri spong dag pa sgrub pa dang // mtshan 'gog mtshan med sgrub pa dang // blang dor 'gog med sgrub pa dang // rtsol spong rtsol bral sgrub pa dang // de dag kun kyang
326a5(sgra skor): yod med phyir// dgag sgrub rang gis mi byed pa'o// rim par phye ba'i khyad par ston// mthong ba dag dang ma dag pa'i// rim pas don gcig khyad par snang // mthong ba dgu pa kun mthong 'di// sna tshe Ta theg pa'i lta ba dang // ji snye bsngo pa'i bya ba rnaMs// spyad
326a6(sgra skor): par bya ba ma yin yang // mi 'dres yongasuM rdzoT par gsal// kun shes bzhin 'dra rab rib dri ma nyid// bstan pa'i me long mthong gos rang dag sar// 'gyur bla ma 'od de tsA ched bgyi pI// dog rtsas bdag dang mahA y+ra grol ba bsngo// 'phrul gyi me long dreg skor rdzog ste// /
327a1(sgra skor): 'grel pa bzhugs so//
327b1(sgra skor): rnal 'byor rig pa'i me tog 'phrul gyi me long la dbu zhabs su bsdus pa'i don bzhi sgra// phyag 'tshal mchod pa'i lung dang // dam bcar sdom pa'i lung dang // gzhung lcags rtsu ba'i lung dang // bsngo
327b2(sgra skor): tshogs kyi lung dang bzhi'o// kun mokhyen nyid la phyag 'tshal nas// shes pa gang gis gang lta ru phyag btsal ba'o// rnal 'byor lta ba'i spyi 'grel brdeg/ ces pa/ lte ba'i rim pa spyi'i shan dbye ba'i phyir 'grelnga pa ste/ thetshom
327b3(sgra skor): gtar dka' gnang du brdeg pAr dmo bca' ba'o// lung bsdu ba bstan pA la gnyis te/ dris pa'i lung dang lan no// dri sr-i po no dgu ste/ log rtog byang chub yul snang ba'i// chos kun semasu gcig mi gcig/ ces pa/
327b4(sgra skor): 'khor ba dang mya ngan 'das pa'i spyod yul byang chub sem su gci gam gcig dris pa dang po'o// lhun gyis sgrub pa gang la bgyi dris pa gnyi sde pa'o// de nyid snang ba yod dam med// ces pa/ lhun grub snang stong gang yin dris pa
327b5(sgra skor): gsum pa'o// ye nas sang sa rgya so yin nam min/ zhes pa/ chos kun gzhi yis ngas rgyas pa yin nam/ me rgyas pa yin dris pa bzhi pa'o// khams gsum sems can ji ltar 'khrul/ ces pa lnga pa'o//
327b6(sgra skor): 'khrul pa nyid don ci lags/ shes pa/ 'khrul pa'i grub mtha' dris pa drug pa'o// rnal 'byor lta ba'i ngo bo gang / zhes pa bdun pa'o// de dag dgos pa'i the tsom gang / zhes pa/ skyon dris pa brgyad pa'o// de rna
328a1(sgra skor): khyad par dzA ltar che// bdun po zlog pa gzhan las gang sprugs dus pA dgra pa'o// 'phrul gyi ma long dgu sbyor bzhin// nus pa/ mtshon pa'i dgus mtshan du bsgrub pa'o// gsal byung 'phrul tshig dgu las ston// zhes pa/
328a2(sgra skor): don dris pa lan zung dgu yi tshig gsal bar ston pa'o// lan dang po bstan pa'i phyir/ sgyu ma rnam gnyis spyod yul ni// sems kyi chos nyid dang du gcig/ ceswa pA/ log rtog sgyu ma'i sems can dang // ye shes sgyu ma'i sangs
328a3(sgra skor): rgyus kyi dpyod yul 'khrul lAm mu 'khrul gnyis/ sems kyi de kho na nyid chos kyi da byings kyi ye shesu gcig par lan gdab po// de'i dpe ni/ de'i de nyid ji lta bu'o// mkha' dang gzha' snang ji bzhin dudu/ zhes pa
328a4(sgra skor): gzha' tshon snang ba dang rang bzhin stong pa dbyer med pa bzhin/ gtan tshigs ni/ log rtog sems rgyud tha dad kyang / rigs rgyud med phyir dbye ba dka'/ zhes pa/ log rtog gi rgyud so sor rtog pa dang / 'du shes tha dad /
328a5(sgra skor): byAs+ya/ r-I ba dang / b+hadu byed daM m+b+ha ba dang / rgyu la pA'i thugs gsal ba rtags kyis tha dad pa la rnaMs mi mthun pa ni rgyal ba dang 'gro la rigs rgyud rtag par rnyedu ba myed pa'i daphyir/ gcig ces dgas chos gnyi
328a6(sgra skor): kyi phyir brjod kyis ngo bo gcig dang tha dad las grol ba'i ngang du dbyer med pa la de skad brjod pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ sems nyid nor bu rin po che/ zhes pa'o/ lhun grub kyi dpe'o// ji ltar dmigs shing bsams par snang / zhes
328b1(sgra skor): pa/ lhun gyi grub pa dang ma grub pa'i chos thams cad sems so sor snang ba'o// 'gro la sems rgyud gnyis mi 'chang / zhes pa/ sems kun gyi sems kyi chos nyid kyi gzhi 'am dngos po zhes pa skad gcig ma ni bsam pa/
328b2(sgra skor): 'am blo zhes rtog pa dang mi rtog pa'i sems rgyud gnyis pa 'gro ba gcig le med de/ skabs kyis mi brjod pa'o// de ni dngos med kun gyi gzhi/ zhes pa/ sems can gyi sems gcig pa de ni dngos po brtag dka' ste/ dgos
328b3(sgra skor): 'drod bskong ba'i nor bu lta bu la/ cig lnga cig ma grub pa dang / lhun grub kyi ngo bo la ni phyogs gcig pa'i lcen grub tu khas blangs pa'o// lan gsum pa ni/ log rtog mun pa'i yul snang kun/ zhes pa/ 'gro ba so so'i ma rig
328b4(sgra skor): pa'i snang ba tha dad pa bsdu'o// sems phyir mthal la brtsod pa med/ ces pa/ snang ba yod med kun bad gi nying chen po'i gtan tshigs kyis dbyer med pa la yod med sgro bskur du brtsod pa byibyas pa'i blo/ dpe ni/ gang la yod med
328b5(sgra skor): med pa ltar/ ces pa/ dngos po gang lo phan pa 'ba' zhig yod zhe 'am/ gnod pa'i mthu 'ba' zhig yod ces phyir na mi btub ste/ brtags na mi dmigs par/ bsam ni phan gnod so sor snang yang dbyer med pa ltar/ rtog pa'i
328b6(sgra skor): smra bas ma yul las 'das/ shes pa/ 'khrul pa'i snang ba yod med dbyer med pa ni thun mong chen po'i sgra bas ma las 'das pa ste/ don dam dngos po 'am gzhi la med/ kun rdzo rje ma bsam pa la yod ces sme ba dag mi mkhas
329a1(sgra skor): pa'i shes pa ste/ 'di skad du/ sems 'di yod do ma do zhes/ byis pa rnams ni brtsod par byed/ zhes pa la sogs pas gasngal lo// lan gzhi bu ni/ de ni de phyir rgyal 'gro zhus/ risu bcad pa med pa
329a2(sgra skor): la/ sems srung stong dbyer med pa'i lhun grub do ni/ tshig snga ma gtan tshig su gyur pas ye sangs rgyas pas rgyal ba zhe 'am/ 'gro ba 'khor ba yin zhes gsungs pa'i tshig gnyis kar sems 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das
329a3(sgra skor): pa dbyer med la mI bI sa mA mi brjod do// gcing dang mi gtsang dngos gcig bzhin/ zhes pa/ gnyi su med pa'i dpe ste/ lu la'i gtsang ba la la la'i mi gtsang bar snang bas gtsang mi gtsang dngos po gcig ste/ ga la nges pa bzhin
329a4(sgra skor): de kho na ji snyed pa'i ji bzhin pa sems kyi chos nyid sangs rgyas sems can dbye ba med pa la/ phyogasasu bltas na no rA pa'i blo/ zhes pa/ gzhi 'khrul 'khor med pa'o// rnam dag phyogs gcig tu bltas te/ gzhi med pa la bsam
329a5(sgra skor): blosna blo bur du blta ba dag ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dag dang / tha snyad lnga skur pa 'debs po'i lta ba ste/ gnyis med dang la gsal ba 'dus par brjod pa nyid kyis mkha'i lta ba khas blangs pa'o// 'dir gnyi su yod med
329a6(sgra skor): nyid kyang dbyer med pas thun mongs ma yin pa'i gnyi su med pa ste/ 'di skad/ gnyis med gnyi su med min zhing // zhes pa/ dgos byed gnyis kyi phyir brjod pa tsa mo// lan lnga pa ni/ ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i sems//
329b1(sgra skor): shes pa log rtog tha dad pa'i sems bsam yas pa'o// me long g.ya' dang mkha' sprin bzhin/ zhes pa/ ma rig pa dang sems ye shes gnyi su med pa'i dpe'o// rig dang ma rig gnyis med pas/
329b2(sgra skor): shes pa/ lhan cig byas pa'i ma rig pa med pa min pa'i phyir/ ye shes dang ma rig pa dbyer med kyang / phyogs gcig rkyen gyis dus gsum 'khrul/ zhes pa/ phyogs gcig nas ltos pas 'khor ba'i/ de'i rgyu ma rig pas
329b3(sgra skor): rkyen las dang nyon mongs pas dus gsum thog mtha' med par rgyun chagasu 'khrul pa ni/ thag sbrel tho mo seb rtas mtshon nas gzhi med pa las 'byung bar smra ba lta bu ma yin te/ sgro bkur dang bral ba'i ngang las 'a khrul pa'o//
329b4(sgra skor): lan drug pa/ 'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa/ snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med/ ces pa/ brtan g.yo blo brtags kyi rang bzhin bsam po la yo de la gzhi lnga med par smra ba ni rang bzhin la bkur ba ste/ 'dir 'khrul
329b5(sgra skor): pA snang bango ba'i dus nyid na mkha' sprin ltar rnam pa'i mchig dang ldan pa'i stong pa chen po la rang bzhin yod mad dbyer med la dgos tshad kyis brjod pa'o// rang byung phyi nang med sna nga phyir/ zhes pa/ bdag nyid chen po'i gtan
329b6(sgra skor): tshigs kyis kyang chu nyid rlabs lta bur 'gro 'di med par snang ba'o// de dus rang bzhin nyams pa med/ zhes pa/ 'khrul pa de snang ba'i dus na rang bzhin stong pas ji bzhin nyid las ma nyams rang bzhin thun mongs ma yin
330a1(sgra skor): pa'i 'khrul pa ste/ 'di skad du/ 'khor ba nyid na bde gnas so// shes pa dang / rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med// des gsungs// lan bdun pa ni/ 'jug pa'i rnam shes da lta ba/ shes
330a2(sgra skor): rab thun mongs spyan yin na/ zhes pa/ lta ba'i ngo bo 'og ma dag yid kyi rnam par shes pa de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'du byed kyi shes rab dang mtshungs par thun mong gi lta ba lam du rig pa'i shes pa la lta ba
330a3(sgra skor): zhes brjod do// 'dir rang byung ye shes tshogs kun bdag/ shes rab spyan gyi mchog yino// zhes pa/ tshogs brgyad rigos brgyud gzugs mtshan gnas kyis tha dad myed par 'od gsal ba'o// rkyen dang rgyu med par ma
330a4(sgra skor): 'gags par ye rang gsapa bur rang byung ye shes te/ bltas pa med par de kho na nyid gsal ba lbu ba'i phul lo// lta ba'i ngo bo des ji ltar mthong snyam pa la/ rdo rje yid ni dbang mchog phyir/ zhes paM/ yid ste
330a5(sgra skor): shes rdo rje ni shes rab kyi dbang po mchog ste gtan tshigs so// lta ba myed pa rang spyi'i chos/ dbyar med phyogs lha'i 'dod bral b+ha/ zhes pa/ yul du lte ba med de rang rig phyi nang med phyir ro// rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi
330a6(sgra skor): cho su snang ba yang shes pa dang rnam pa tsam du dbyer med pas/ nang phyogs nas phyi ru bltas pa 'am/ phyi nas nang du blta ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas de kho na nyid yul med par rig pa rang gsal ba'i gdeng
330b1(sgra skor): brnyed pas thams cad mkhyen pa la/ zhes pas/ zhe 'dod du myed pas/ ma nor rang gi mAtshan nyid rtogs// zhes gsungs so// de la g.yo thob brtan mthar phyin pa'i lam du gyur pa'o// lan brgyad pa ni/ gsum gnyis
330b2(sgra skor): gcig gi the tshom spangs/ zhes pa/ dris lan bdun pa'i the tshom dris pa rjesu bsam pa'i phyir/ dang po dngos dang gsal ba/ zhes pa/ tshig lngas gtar dka' gnyis kyi gags bsal ba la/ snga ma sangs rgyas spen
330b3(sgra skor): dag/ so so sems rgyud tha dad pa// gcig na bdun la snga rtog skye// zhes pa/ spyir sangs rgyas dang sems can rnams phyogs gcig pa'i gcig pa yin na/ bka' lung la mi snang ba dang / dron dang 'galte ba dang / gtan tshi
330b4(sgra skor): kyis mi rgyas pa dang / rigs pas mi 'thad pa dang / tshe sngo brtags gzhi dadong 'gal po bdun po kun la 'byung mod kyang / skabs gnyis kyis gsang sngags ni/ spyi dang 'thun par rigs pas mi 'thad pa'i skyon brjod
330b5(sgra skor): do// sangs rgyas kyi thugs dang sems can gyi sems phyogs gcig pa'i ldog pa dang bcas pa yin zhe na/ rgyal ba bzhin du 'gro bas kyang thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ba dang / rtog pa med par 'gyur ba dang / nyon
330b6(sgra skor): mongs pa'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / lam gyi chos la rag las mi dgos pa dang / rgyal ba yang 'gro ba bzhin thams cad mi mkhyen pa dang / rtog pa can du 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa sdug bsngal myong
331a1(sgra skor): ba dang / skyon bdun 'byung ngo // 'gro ba drug gi sems can+da tha dad gcig na yang / de bzhin sems rgyud brgyad la za/ zhes pa/ chos tha ma'i skyon 'byung ste/ 'gro ba drug po kun sems rang byung gi ye
331a2(sgra skor): shes su gcig na yang / 'gro ba gcig sangs rgyas na kun sangs rgyas par rigs pa dang / gcig ba ltung na kun ba ltung bar rigs pa dang / gcig shes pa chen kun cha// gcig shes pa chung na kun chung // gcig 'du
331a3(sgra skor): shes rgya chen kun che// gcig 'du shes chung na kun chung // gcig rnon kun no// gcig brtul na kun brtu la// gcig dog na kun dog/ gcig yang na kun yangs// gcig tshor ba gsal na kun gsal//
331a4(sgra skor): gcig mI gus la na kun mi gsal// gcig dran pa gsal nu kun gasngal/ gcig mi gsal nu kun mi gsol/ brgyud po de ltar the tshom za bA/ tha dad zhe na bdun gyis 'galnga// ces pa/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs dang
331a5(sgra skor): 'gro ba'i sems tha dad na yang / sangs rgyas sems can gnyis rang bzhin tha dad du 'gyur/ ngo bo tha dad du 'gyur ba sna 'brel pa med pas don byar mi btub/ 'gro ba sangs rgyur mi btub/ nyon mongs pa sbyang zhing sgrib pa byang
331a6(sgra skor): du mi btub/ rgyas pa bstan pa la dgos pa med/ so sor rtag pa'i mthar 'gyur ba dang bdun no// sems can kun gyi rang gi ye shes tha dad na yang / rang byung gi ye shes so so na yod pa'i phyir/ gcig gis gcig
331b1(sgra skor): rig na gzhan 'byung du 'gyur ba dang / desna tshig med/ gcig gi gcig mA rig na/ ye shes su mi 'gyur ro// yul med par rig na dam bca' nyams/ shes pa'i rnam pa ye shes gzhan du snang ngo zhe na/ bdag gzhan gyi phyogs
331b2(sgra skor): nas rnam pa cha gnyis yod pas bzung 'dzin du 'gyur ro// ye shes la rigs brgyad la sogs pa tha dad pa bdun 'ong bas du ma'i mthar 'gyu ro// de gsal ba ni/ bas dgag dang sgrub med pa'i// gcig dang du mar bral
331b3(sgra skor): ba'o// zhes pa/ sangs rgyas dang sems can ga cig dang du ma'i mtha' ma bkag sa bral ba sgrub du med pa ni rig pa rang byung gi ye shes nyid gcig dang du ma dang bral ba dang ma bral ba kun yin pas/ bral ma bral dbyer med pa
331b4(sgra skor): la shugs snang lnga dgag sgrub ltar snang yang / zhes 'dod lnga lhag pa'i dgag bsgrub med pa sna skyon de dag mi 'byung ngo // gsum pa 'khrul snang gzhi la yod mang ston pa'i phyir/ gsum pa'i snga ma rnyog skyon dgu/ zhes pa/
331b5(sgra skor): 'khrul snang gzhi la yod na gzhi 'khor ba rang rgyud rtag pa'i skyon gyis sgrub pa mi 'byung / 'tshong bu dpes sangs mi rgyu/ rgyal ba dang 'gro ba rigs rgyud shA 'byung / bstan pa gsungs pa la dgos tshad med/ mya ngan
331b6(sgra skor): 'das pa'i snang ba 'gag/ 'khor ba mthar 'gyur/ 'grel pa med pas don byar mi tug gzhi'i chos dri ma can du 'gyur ba'o// phyi ma med pa'i tha na mongag/ skyon gyi dngos po bcu gnyis gzhi'o// zhes
332a1(sgra skor): pa/ gzhi la 'khrul pa med pa yin na'ang / lhan gcig skyes pa'i ma rig pa med pa'i skyon dang / rang bzhin chad pa'i skyon dang / mya dran las 'das pa mthar 'gyur/ 'khrul snang 'gag/ gzhi
332a2(sgra skor): med pa la 'khor pa snang na/ 'khor gA la thog ma 'byung / rgyud dag pa yang 'khor/ sgrib pa sbyang mi dgos/ bskrun pa la dgos ched med/ ye nas gzhi la med pa la snang na/ mu stegs chad pa'i snang bar 'gyur/
332a3(sgra skor): snga na med pa'i skyon dang / gcig la gcig med pa'i sbyin dang / ye nus med pa dang bcu gnyis 'byung ngo // gzhi ni 'khrul snang yod med gnyis su med pa'i don dang 'galnga/ bka' lung las mi snang ba/ gta ni chags
332a4(sgra skor): kyi ma rgyas pa/ de ltar rigs pas mi blud pa'o// zhor la shes pa'i khyad par bsnyen pa ni/ mi mkhas mkhas pa'i bsam pa ni/ zhes pa/ dbye na/ mi mkhas shin tu mi mkhas pa/ zhes pa/ mi mkhas pa'i bsam
332a5(sgra skor): pa la gnyis te/ gang zhe na/ shin+da tu mi mkhas mthar lta ba'o// zhes pa/ mu stegs pa dang skye bo dag go/ mi mkhas yod med brtsod byed cing // dgag dang bsgrub pa glang byed pa// de de de la chagasna sdang skye// zhes
332a6(sgra skor): pa/ ltos pa'i mi mkhas pa dag ni// tshad ma tshul yod la brtsod/ sems tshim pa rnam pa yod med la brtsod/ dbu ma snang ba yod med la rtsod pa byed cing / rigs pa ma yin pa'i shes pa'i yulo ched du
332b1(sgra skor): 'gegs/ rigs pa'i shes pa'i yul sgrub par byed pa de ni/ sgrub pa'i don la blo chags/ dgag bya la zhe sdang bskyed pas/ blang dor med pa'i don ma mthong ba'i phyir mi mkhas pa'o// 'o na mkhas pa gang zhe na/ mkhas dang
332b2(sgra skor): shin tu mkhas pa ni/ zhes pa mkhas pa'i bsam pa dbye ba nye bar bstan pa'o// mkhas pa phal pa dag gre bsgrub can/ sgrub pa'i don la brten par byed/ ces pa/ theg pa chen po dbu dang sems tsam pa'o// de yang
332b3(sgra skor): gsang sngags la ltos na 'khrul pa'i phyir/ byas pa'i bzung 'dzin dbang gyur pa'i// ma nor lam dang bral ba yin/ zhes pa'o// ched du dgag sgrub byed pa'i nges pa 'jog pa'i rtog pa skyes pas/ gsung sngags kyi lta ba dang /
332b4(sgra skor): bral ba'i// gsang sngags ni/ shinI tu mkhas pa thams cad la// sems phyar dgag dang sgrub med/ zhes pa/ gsang sngags pa ni shin tu mkhas pa'i bsam pa ste/ bdag nyid chen po'i gtan tshigs kyis dgag
332b5(sgra skor): sgrub ched du mi byed pa yang rtogs byed kyi thabs dam pa ste/ zhor la dgag sgrub can gyi lta ba 'gegs pa dang / dgag sgrub med pa'i don bsgrub pa yod mod kyang / dgag sgrub med pa'i phyogs gcig pur khas mi len
332b6(sgra skor): don no de dang rang rig rang snod phyir/ dgag sgrub med pa'i yid mi rten nos pa/ dgag sgrub yod med kyi chos thams cing rang rig pa yin pas/ dgag sgrub med pa'i don ched du mi dmi gos pa yul du mi byed do//
333a1(sgra skor): dgag sgrub gtan la 'bebs pa'i dus dang // mnyam bya la bzhag pa'i dus gnyis ka n+te ru byed pa 'khrul pa'i phyir/ de phyir so so dgag bsgrub tsam/ bsgrub pa'i phyogs la zhen pa'i phyir/ de de med du
333a2(sgra skor): ga la mthong // de bas rang gi brtags mthong yin/ zhes gsungs so// lan dgu pa zhar la bstan pa'i phyir/ de de skas gang ngo ji lta bu/ khyad par grangs dang dor ba med/ zhes pa/ rgyu'i theg pa de dang / 'bras bu de
333a3(sgra skor): skas gdang ltar khyad par yod pa'i grangs mi 'dor bas/ bdun po'i skyon rgyu'i thag pa la grangs ji ltar brjod po ltar 'byung gi/ 'bras bu'i theg pa la skyon mi 'byung bar smos pa'o// da gos ched ni/ cha yod dug la mi
333a4(sgra skor): rngub bzhin/ log lta gnyis su gu la 'gyur/ zhes pa/ des de bzhin du rang bzhin log pa dang / ltos pa'i log pa lhur gseng sngags mi 'gro ba'o// gnyis pa the tshom gasngal ba'i phyir/ gnyis pa de ltar
333a5(sgra skor): nyid la/ zhes pa/ grangs kyi gnyis pa de ltar lhun grub dris pa/ grub pa'i tha snyad de ltar mtshon/ zhes pa/ lhun gyis grub pa phyogs gcig pa 'am/ phyogs med pa gang yin dris pa'o// ma grub grub na
333a6(sgra skor): nges tshig med/ tsas pa/ phyogs med na grub pa'i ngang la rta la glang ma grub pa la sogs pa yang grub pas/ grub po gcig pu'i ngos tshig med par 'gyuraro// de ma grub na de bzhin no// zhes pa/ ma grub par
333b1(sgra skor): grags pa'i chos lhun gyi snga ma grub na'ang / ma grub pa'i chos ma rdzogs pas nges tshig med do// gzhan yang ma grub pa phyogs gcig par 'gyur bas yod mthar lta ba dang / bden pa mthong ba yang 'khor ba dang / zhen pas/
333b2(sgra skor): 'tshang rgya ba dang / dge sdig 'bras bu bsnol mar 'gyur ba yang grub dgos pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro// de gsal ba'i tha bas ni/ de bas srid dang mi srid kun// lhun grub phyogs su grub pa med// zhes pa lhun grub kyi gtan tshigs
333b3(sgra skor): kyis dge bas mtho ris su srid pa la stsogasu ba dang / dge bas ngan song du mi srod pa kun yod med grub ma grub dbyer med pa dgos ched kyis lhun grub du brji kyi sau/ don grub grub por brjod pa med pas/ lhag pa'i lhun
333b4(sgra skor): grub la skyon de dag mi 'byung / bzhi pa'i snga ma skyon drug gnyis/ shes pa/ yaM sangs rgyas pa phyogs gcig pa cig rin chen gling dang / nyi mas mtshon pa sgra ji bzhin du brtags na/ mya ngan lus 'das pa mtha
333b5(sgra skor): 'gyur/ sangs rgyas rigs rgyud can du 'gyur/ sgrib pa sbyang mi dgos/ rgyal bas don byur med/ sgrub pa'i gang zag med pas lam mi dgos/ bstan pa gsungs pa la dos ched med/ 'khor ba'i snang ba 'gag/
333b6(sgra skor): gal te na rgyud pa yang 'khor/ 'khor ba la thog ma 'byung / gzhi la 'khor ba med la blo la yod na blo dang gzhi tha dad pa'i skyon 'ong // tha mi dad na blo la yod pa bzhin du gzhi la yang yod par 'gyur/ de nyid dang gzhan
334a1(sgra skor): du brjod du med pa yin zhe na/ de nyid ma yin pas gzhi la med kyang / gzhan du brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis gzhi la yod par 'gyur/ sgrub sngags gnyis pa des ye nas sangs rgyas par
334a2(sgra skor): phyogs kyang men no// de bzhin phyi ma rjesu 'thun/ zhes pa/ gzhi sangs rgyas ma yin par 'khor ba yin zhe na/ skyon grangs phyi ma 'ang snga ma'i rjes 'thun to// gzhi 'khor ba'i mthar 'gyur/ gzhi dri ma can du 'gyur/
334a3(sgra skor): 'gro ba rang rgyud par 'gyur/ de ni byed pa po med par 'gyur/ mya ngan las byangs pa 'gag/ gral te mya ngan las 'angs pa la thog ma 'byung / 'khor ba mtha' ma 'byung sgra/ mtha' stong par 'gyuraro// sa mi 'byong ba 'gyur/ 'khor ba rta
334a4(sgra skor): skyon dang 'brel ze med pas don byar med pa dang / bstan pa gsungs pa la dgos tshad med/ gzhi la 'khor ba yod na/ zhen blo dang khyad mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang bcu gnyis so// gnyis me zhe na dus gosum la/ zhes pa
334a5(sgra skor): yaM sangs rgyas pa yin men gnyis ka ma yin na dang / phung po gsum pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'gal ba 'dus pa 'byung ngo zhe na/ de gsal ba ni gnyis mad+ma dang / zhes pa/ rang rig pa ni sangs rgyu sna dang son
334a6(sgra skor): dbyer med na'ang / 'di skad du/ bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i// ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos/ shes gsungs pa'i don la/ dpe/ sman nyid sman gnod bdag nas ltar/ ces pa/ sman cig kyang
