342a2(sgra skor): pa med pas mi 'gyur// gang ma skyes pa'ang // skye ba med par 'grub mi 'gyur// zhen spring gnyen po mi btub cing // de nyid rang rgyud can gyur pa smos// gang la phan gnod med 'gyur ro// de ltar rtog cing the tshom za// khas blangs
342a3(sgra skor): med sgra phyogs la zhe na// de bas bla med theg pa po// don dam du ni dbyer med te// kun rdzob tsam du thams cad lta// ngag dang ma dag gnyis kar 'dzam/ thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni// don dam du ni kor bdun no// kun rdzob du'i mnya
342a4(sgra skor): rdzogs so// rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag/ kun rdzob du'ang dbyi ri meng te// lta ba mtho dman de tse mA mo// de nyid 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid la// don dam ngo bo nyid kyi rgyu// lhag pa'i bden par mtshan brjod do// cir yang snang ba'i ye shes
342a5(sgra skor): nyid// mtshan mar mo 'gags cir yang snang // ngo bi ma nges don mdzad dang // rtag pa gnyis las ring ba dang // rnal 'byor dam pa'i yulA 'thun dang // snang la skye 'gag med pa'i phyir// lhag pa'i kun rdzob zhes su grags
342a6(sgra skor): thams cad kun gyi rang bzhin pas// ye shes snang ba'ang rgyu rkyen med// skye 'jig med do lnga 'bras bu// dbyings dang ye shes rdzogs mi dmigs// phyogs med ro skong 'phrin las ni// kun nas mtshams pas don mdzad de// /
342b1(sgra skor): ched du byas pa'i rtag pa'ang bral// rang bzhin mtshan nyid ngo bo dang // yon tan 'phrin las rtags pas dben// chos drug ldan phyir lhag par bsgrugs// de bzhin rang bzhin 'bras bu dang // ye shes gsum phyir don dam pa'ang //
342b2(sgra skor): shes de nr-i nang nas mchog gyur pa sdu// don gyi ming du 'grub pa yin// de 'ang ma skyes dbyings kyi don// gzhi yis nges lnga khyed gyur pa// log rtog spyod yul las sogs pa// kun gyi rang bzhin phyogs po ko la meng// ngo bo bdun
342b3(sgra skor): rdzogs dmigs pa med// mi tshan nyid kun grol kun bdag la// phyogs stong chad par yod pa med// kun byin ldan pa'i bai rlabs snang la// dngos po gnyis kyi ngo bo'i rgyur// gyur pas tswi yang mi 'gog ste// rgya mtsho'i chu dang /
342b4(sgra skor): brlabs bzhin no// yid bzhin nor ltar ro bskong ba'o// yon tan kun rdzogs phyir snang ba'o// thun mong dam pa'i yul min te// phyogs gcig mtha' bral ma yin te/ dpa dang gtan tshigs thun mongs pas// gtan la 'bengs/
342b5(sgra skor): pa ma yin te// bdun sogs ngo bor gnas pa'i phyir// lhag pa'ang grangs mthun nyid du brjod// rnal sogs spyod yul ma yin no// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni/ pho mo ma yin ma ning min// mtshan med ma yin rigs rgyud
342b6(sgra skor): med/ kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin// gnas su ma yin gang yang med// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu// phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad la// rang byung chen pos kun tu khyab// rang byung
343a1(sgra skor): de nyid dngos med pas// chos dang gang zag bdag med pa// kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin no// ma skyes bzhi la dgrod pa'i lam// gang spangs gang thob de'i 'bras bu// dngos po ji bzhin mi mthong bas// 'bras bu btags
343a2(sgra skor): pa'i sangs rgyas tsam// de ltar nges 'byung bye brag gi/ rgyud nas nges pa'i gsang po 'ang // dang po rgyu 'bras dbye byed pas// 'bras bu lam du byed zha'ang // phyogs ci ga dag pa'i chos nyid la// lta zhing da las lha drug sogs// dmig
343a3(sgra skor): pa gsum dang yan lag gis// bsgom byed 'bras bu/ bzung 'dzin can// lha skyod ya cha'i zhen pa yis// bdag nyid chen po nang mi ma tha~Mng // dag pa'i sems zhi rtsol ba'i lam// rdo rje gsum gyi sa 'dzin pa// rma long 'dri
343a4(sgra skor): mkhyen dang mtshungs te// rnal 'byor chen po'i thug sa rje'i yul// gnyi gra pA yi bya ba dang // rnal 'byor rjes su lha spyod 'byung // gnyis po ya cha sngon bzhin te// de nyid bzhi yi zhen pa can// de bang phyi rol pa la gnas// rnal 'byor ting
343a5(sgra skor): 'dzin zhan pa tsAn// dam par rang rigr-i 'od gsal ba// dbyingasde nyid rnam dgra ye shes la// kun rdzob byin brlabs dkyil 'khir dag/ ye shes snang smra nga la dmigs// de phyir lta dgongs phyi rol 'gyur// de rtogs khas khyen gcong sgrar
343a6(sgra skor): len// chu yi ral gri byis pa bzhin// spyod par maM phod 'dzin pa can// de nyid sgo nas phyi rol spyod// shin tu nang don ma gtogs pas// phyi rol chi yis bcings pa yin/ 'odadi gsal bzhi los mtshan mar g.yo// snang stong ris slo ba laM
343b1(sgra skor): lha yis// thob pa dam pa'ang sti bya'i gnas// phyi rol gnyis sogs 'bras bu'i phyir// 'ching bu rin chen ji lta bar// lam 'bras ma 'brel 'khrul par zad// gtso mchog bshad par khas blangs pa// rgyas par gdams kyi gdeng du bgyi sa//
343b2(sgra skor): rnal 'byor chen po lta ba'i don// yod las bcol na sgros btags te// med las bcol na bkur btab 'gyur// yod med gnyis las rtsal byas ni// de ni lung du ma stan 'gyur// de la gzhan yang 'bre la med pas// nAm yang brnyed par mi
343b3(sgra skor): 'gyur to// mtha' la rtsod kun de lta bas// gsum bral phyogs gcig mtha' bral ba// rang blo 'khrul pa snang ba yin// de bas mthar thug ltos yod pa// kun kyang mtha' yis bral ba'ang mtha'// yin phyir nges pa'i blo mi bzhag/ gnyis
343b4(sgra skor): med smras bsam bral ba ltos// tshi ga dang sgra 'thun tha dad po// lta spyod log par drangs thab su// gsung phyir rdo rje theg chen po// sgra cig drin gyis khyad par rtogs// dang po cho sna kun gnas brubs nyid// dang por mtshan cing dngos bzlog dang
343b5(sgra skor): gnyis par yang dag bden bral don// mtshon phyi lu skyes de bzhin nyidado// stong pa nyid dang snang ba med// gnyis su med dang mnyam pa nyid// ci 'ang min dang smras bsams 'das// mi gnas mi dmigs mi rtog dang // mtha' bral rnam par dag pa
343b6(sgra skor): dang // mtshan med smon pa med pa dang // chos nyid chos kyi dbyings nyid dang // spros bral 'gro bong med pa dang // snang dang 'gag med thob pa med// grol dang thar dang thob pa dang // kun rdzob don dam bden pa dang / ma chags pa dang rang bzhin
344a1(sgra skor): dang / dngos med zhen med rigs pa dang // byadag med gzhan med spyod yul med// lta ba rig pa ye shes sogs// mtshon pa'i sgra grags chos rnams kyi// rang rang don rnams tha dad pa/ khyad par ma 'dres gsal bya'i
344a2(sgra skor): phyir// rig pas mdo tsam phyogs brjod pa// dang po rgyun gyis log rtog chos// bkrag bsngal phyogs cig ma skyes dang // dri mar ma skyes mtshan mer min// ched du byas pa ma skyes rnams// skyes spong ma skyes 'dod pa yis// srin bu bal
344a3(sgra skor): bzhin bcings par zad// ji snyed tha dad chos rnams kun// gnyis med bla dor med pa yis// lhag pa ma skyes don mchog ni// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// dbyings phyogs ma skyes de bzhin nyid// rig pa nyid dang yod ye shes 'dod// /
344a4(sgra skor): blang dor med pa'i de bzhin nyid// gnyis med ma byas ma bcos pa// smra bsams 'das pa'i gtso mchog go/ de bzhin stong nyid zhon pa'ang // phyogs stong ga sal stong la sogs las// rnam pa'i mchog ldan stong chen po// yod pa nyid
344a5(sgra skor): na stong pa nyid// yod dang med dbus smra bsams 'dis// dro bo rang bzhin mtshan nyid dang // byin brlabs la sogs khyad par 'phags// snang ba med ces brjod pa yang // ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// snang la med lta bus pa med// phyogs
344a6(sgra skor): cig snang med phyogs rig med// brdzun pa gsal ba snang med dang // snang ba dri ma med pa dang // mtshan snang med pa la sogs pa// ched byis snang rtags kun par zad// sna tshogs snang ba dang bcas pa'i// snang ba med pa'i mchog 'di ni// snang
344b1(sgra skor): ba yod med dbyer med pas// 'di ltar snang zhes bsam du med// gnyis su med par bstan pa yang // phyogs stong gnyis med yul sems med// phyogs gcig bral ba'i gnyis med pa// de kun gnyis pa'i gtso mchog go// don dang 'dod
344b2(sgra skor): pa yod phyir// rgyu 'bras gnyi su med pa yang // bya ba rnal 'byor don dam par// gnyis med drang du lan po'ang // res 'jog ltos pa'i phyogs gcig pa'o// gnyis par grags pa'i chos sngo cog/ ldan bzhin gnyis su med pa yis//
344b3(sgra skor): lhun grub bla nga ra med pa dang // gzugs brtson nor bus mtshon pa'o// tshe phyir mnyam nyid gsungs pa dang // 'dra ba'i mnyam pa mi mnyam chos// mi mnyam bral ba'i phyogs mnyam ni// mnyam pa'i mtha' la gnas pas logs/
344b4(sgra skor): sang tshan mnyam pa chen po ni// myi mnyam chos kun bdag nyid la// mnyam mi mnyam cha shas med// mnyam pa kun gyi yang rtsa yin// gzhan sel don du gnyer ba'i phyir// ci 'ang min par bka' stsal brlang // rigs pas ma yin
344b5(sgra skor): shes pa lnga// yin par snang la skyon lta bar// mtha' sel phyogs cig ma yin pa dang // dmigs pa ma yin kun kyang mtha'// blang dor med sogs mi grosum ldan/ ci'ang min zhes brjod pa'ang // ci'ang yin pa'i dngos gzhi
344b6(sgra skor): can// yin men dbyer med che sha so bral// phyogasu thugs po 'di la med// rma bya'i mdongs rtsi kha dog 'dra// dgos ched sngon bzhin sgra bsam 'das// bden pa phyogs cig de bzhin pa// 'khur bar chu blugs bzhin 'dod pa/
345a1(sgra skor): phyogs chas smra bsam yul las 'das// rtog ge'i yul du nga smra'o// mI gsum ldan pa'i ros mchog ni// sla bsam+ba kun dngos smra bsam dka'// blo dran yul du ma gyur pas// na mkha' 'di zhes dka' dang
345a2(sgra skor): 'dra// log rtog phyogs rigs rnal 'byor dang // phyogs gsal mi gnas rten pa can// phyi pa'ang 'dzin pa'i gzhi can// gnas pa'i gtso bor bdag gi brjod// blang med dor med mi gnas pa// bsgom bya sems phyir brtan
345a3(sgra skor): bral ba// gnas dang mi gnas spong len mo// ci la'ang yid rten mi 'cha' bas// mi gnas nyid la gnas mi byed// rten dang rten can med pa ni// mi gnas chen po mchog yin+da te// nam mkha' lta bur rten dang bro lnga// gang gi mi
345a4(sgra skor): dmigs shes brjod pa'ang // log dang 'jig rten ting 'dzin dang // 'gog gnyis phyogs cig la gnas dang // dbu ma pa ngag mi dmigs gsum// 'dod las gsel ba'i dmig snga pA can// phyogs gcig rten med
345a5(sgra skor): dmigs pa'o// dmigs pa kun bdag mi dmigs la// mtshon chen can du de brjod kyang // mi dmigs 'dod pa'i chags pa med// dmigs spo zhe sdang phrad dog med// gnyi su med par mi dmigs la// mkha' la 'di zhes dmagra
345a6(sgra skor): bral 'dra'o// rnam par mi rtog brjod pa'ang // 'jig rten zhen pa'i rnam mi rtog/ log par sgom pa mi rtog dang // byis pa dgag sgrub mi rtog gnyis// phyogs 'dzin gsal ba mi rtog pa// rnam dag gsal ba mi rtog rnams// bzhi la
345b1(sgra skor): rtog pa med smra zhing // mi rtog mi mthun bgegs lta bas// dgag sgrub blang dor byed pa de// nges mchog bzhi yi rtog pa can// thabs chen rnam par mi rtog pa// rtogs tshogs ming tsam ye shes phyir// rtog pa nyid nas ma skyes bya//
345b2(sgra skor): skyes brda'i 'du shes dbye ba med// dgug dang sgrub med mi rtog pa// mi rtog nyid du 'ang rtog med pas// me long nag la rtog med bzhin// grol rtogs bya phyir mtha' bral ba// mtha' zhes thub byor grags pa rnams// log
345b3(sgra skor): pa'i mtha' gnyis bro lnga gzugs med// skye 'gag cha shas bral ba dang // rang rig mtha' brgyad bzhi gnyis bral// mtha' la skyon du rtog byed cing // mtha' bral yon tan len byed pa// ltos pas thub pa yod pa'i phyir//
345b4(sgra skor): mtha' bral nyid kyang mahA'i gtso// kun rdzob shes yul byed pas 'khrul// yang dag mtha' bral shes bya ba'ang // mtha' brgyad la sogs grags pa rnams// rang rig ye shes snang po'i phyir// spros pa thugs rje'i dus nyid na//
345b5(sgra skor): ming tsam+ba dwer rang med pa'i phyir// mtha' dang bral ba gnyis su med// sman zhes bya ba'i ga bur dus// glang ba'i dug dang gnyis med ltar// bral rjes brjod pa de kho na// thug pa'i mtha' dang dbyer med la// gdwa du'ang thug pa
345b6(sgra skor): med pa'i phyir// mtha' bral bla mar bshad pa yin// rnal 'byor dag pa sbyang bya dag/ mthong sgom lam gyi spong bya zhing // sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor rim dag/ ngag 'dod dri med chags pas bo cings// thug pa'i rnam ngag zhen
346a1(sgra skor): pa can// rang rang kun tu brdugs pas non// 'og masna smad pa'i dri ma rnams// dri ma nyid na rnam dag cing // blang dor gnyis su med pa la// drag dang ma dag ris med pas// theg pa kun gyi yang rtse ste// 'dam
346a2(sgra skor): skyes pad+ma ji bzhin no// mtshan ma med pa'i rim pa yang // grags pa'i mtshan med 'dod pa yis// skrod dang spel bas phyogs cig pa// 'du shesna yul la skyon lta zhing // de myed pa la mchog zhol byed// 'dod dang zhen pa'i bzung
346a3(sgra skor): 'dzin can// phyi yi bya ba rnal 'byor kyang // de phyogs mthun mtshan phyir na brdzun// mchog gi mtshan ma med ces pa// 'du shes kun bdag rang rig phyir// yul med de la 'dzin pa med// de nas phyogs kyi mtshan 'dzin bral//
346a4(sgra skor): de bzhin smon pa med po yang // blo chung ltos pa'i smon byed dang // bsal dang lon dang smon med gsum// 'dod pas zhen pa smon pa yin// smon pa kun rdzogs rang rig nyid// lam dang 'bras bu dngos bzhi'i phyir// 'phrul dga'i longs
346a5(sgra skor): spyod tshul bzhin du// gzhan du re smon skye ba med// chos nyid dbyings shes rjod pa'ang // spyod yul 'di dag med stong zhing // gsal bral stong pa'i chos dbyings dang // rang rig dag pa'i chos nyid dang // mtshan nyid med pa'i byings sogs
346a6(sgra skor): pos// zhen yul chos can mtha' las ril// stong nyid mu mtha' med sogs smra// rang rig rtags mthong dbyings shes bya// gsang sngags chen po'i chos nyid dbyings// chos can ma gol dmigs pa'ang med// byed med byas
346b1(sgra skor): med bslang pa'ang med// 'di dang 'di zhes ris med pa// chos nyid dam pa de kho na'o// kun 'byung mu med brda' khyab med// gang yang ma spangs bkrol pa med// phyogs chad med de blos reg med// de phyir gsang ba'i dbyings zhes bya//
346b2(sgra skor): rnam grangs chos de na mkha' dang // mthu yod phyir nA nyer sbyar ba'o// spros bral shes par bya ba'ang // log rtog zhon spros pa rnams// skyon shes sel ba'i phyogs cig pa/ phyogs cig spros pa'i mtha' thub bcings// rang rig
346b3(sgra skor): ye shes spros pa'ang // spong len byed na spros pa'i mtha'o// thig le kun nas bzlum pa ltar// spros pa lhun 'grub spros bral ni// ji snyed spros pa sems nyid phyir// rgyud 'dzin med pa'i byang chub sems// ming lnga ldan pa'i
346b4(sgra skor): ye shes ni// de nyid chos dbyings rang byung ste// mi gnas shes pa lhun 'grub pa// de kho de bzhin nyid dam pa'o// yul dang ngo bos spros med phyir// sgros bral kun gyi blar 'gyur yin// 'gro dang 'ong ba med pa'ang // zhen
346b5(sgra skor): log 'gro 'ong dam par med// thun mong snga phyogs gcig 'ong med// dag dang 'od gsal 'gro bong med// 'gro 'ang phyogs la smod byed cing // 'gro 'ong med phyogs rjes 'brangs pa// shes bya shes byad ya cha ba// dam pa'i lam
346b6(sgra skor): du gang la 'gyur// 'gro 'ong kun dang gnyis med pa'i// 'gro 'ong med pa chen po la// 'gro 'ong nyid na med pa'i phyir// 'ong dang mi 'ong yod med med// rgya mtshor 'brel ba'i 'bab chu bzhin// yod med mtha' yi pa med//
347a1(sgra skor): rtag pa 'khrul snang log snang dang // phra rab stong 'khrul rnam snang dang // sgyu snang lhar snang rim pa dag/ yod snang la sogs 'dus snang dang // bdag rig rang bzhin rkyen bslangs pa sna// lhar snang 'dod pas 'khrul
347a2(sgra skor): mthong yin// snang mad snang ba kun bdag nyid// rang rAg ye shes cho 'phrul ni// rgya mtsho chu dang brlabs bzhin du// byang chub sems nyid kun tu shar// 'gag pa med pa'i bye brag ni// med na mi 'byung 'gag med dang // blo bur cis
347a3(sgra skor): smang mi 'gog dang // 'bras bu rdo rje'i 'gag med gnyis// 'gag spong de dang 'bral 'dod na// 'gag med mtha' la zhen par zad// gnyis med 'gag pa med pa ni// rang byung ye shes rang snang phyir// 'gag pa nyid na bgag
347a4(sgra skor): med pas// na mkha' lta bur skye 'jig med// 'dod pa zhen pa thob pa dang // spangs thob sbyangs thob 'grod pa dang // bdag yin las rung thob pa dag/ 'dod pas spangs thob phyir na rdzu na// thob po medadu pa'i thob pa ni// mtshan
347a5(sgra skor): ldan long ba mig phyed bzhin// thabs la rten pa'i shes rab nyid// 'bras bus shar bar zad// gre ni tsam nyid la spang thob med// chung ngu byed pa'i thob ma du gnyis// lan cong chags pa yod pa'i phyir// thog med zhan
347a6(sgra skor): ba lcags sgrog cin// bdag nyid chen po thob med ni// 'bras bu kun bdag rang rig la// gnyis phyir thob bya'i chos med te// dbul mo gtor dang gyang nor bzhin// byed pos bgrol dang skag grol dang // sbyangs pa grol ba phyogs
347b1(sgra skor): gcig pa// thun mongs min pa'i lhas grol ba// 'ching grol gnyis su ltas pas bsgyings// bdag nyid chen por dbyer med pa// sus kyang ma bcing sa bcings med te// bcings par bya ba med gnyis grol// mkha' la 'dud med ji thA
347b2(sgra skor): pra'o// ma rig nyon mongs las sdug bsngalnga// chu bo bzhi las thar pa'ang // shin tu ring drung rgyud pa dang // bkag spongs gsalnga pas thar pa dang // zil gnon sbyor bas thar 'dod pa// 'dod pa'i rgya mtshor chud pa'i phyir// rtsol ba'i
347b3(sgra skor): chu rgyun phyogs cha khyer// mchog rang ring ba'i log lha can// chu bo bzhi nyid lam 'bras phyir ro// thabs dang shes rab las nyid kyi// chu bo nyid la rol spyod pos// brgal ba med par rnam par thar// chu la nye chen 'phyo ba 'am/
347b4(sgra skor): sprin sngags ldan po'i dug nad 'dra'o// log pa'i kun rdzob rnam gnyis dang // 'khrul pa gzhan dbang kun rdzob rnams// rig pa bzhis bcu sna bden lta ba 'ang / yon tan brlabs 'byung lha yi 'khor// tshul mthu no rigs pas
347b5(sgra skor): 'bras bur lta// lhag pa kun rdzob don dam gnyis// bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya// thun mongs don dem bye brag kyang // bshad pa cha yis shes par bya// rgya mtsho dang bar gza' skar bzhin// bden gnyis snang stong
347b6(sgra skor): dbyer med pa// phyogs lha'i mthar thug med pa ni// de ka rang bzhin rgyud nyid do// zhen pa'i yul la ma tshogs pa'ang // tshi ma dang snying po bar chad sogs// chags med 'khrul dang log pa dang // bkag spangs phyogs
348a1(sgra skor): cig chags pa dang // bzlog dang btang snyoms chags med dang // bzhi po chags med chags pas bcings// chags med blang dor med pa ni// chags pa nyid na chags med pas// thubs dang shes rab
348a2(sgra skor): ga dang ldan pas// pad+ma la ni bzhin no// kun rtags rang bzhin chos rnams ni// rgyud spangs phyogs cig rang bzhin med// phyogs gcig mtha' yi rang bzhin dang // chos nyid mtshan nyid la sogs pa// rang bzhin yod 'dor med
348a3(sgra skor): bsgrub phyir// spong leni mthar gyur rang bzhin ce na// nam mkha' dang ba'i dus nyid dang // 'adz+ra' sprin tshogs kyi rang bzhin lha// brtags pa'i rang bzhin thams cad pa// de nyid snang phyir gnyis med pa'o// de bzhin dngos po
348a4(sgra skor): med pau dang // zhen pa med cing grags pa rnam sA// yAM med snga la gcig med gcig la gcig/ med dang zhig med 'dod lta bu// bzhi la gnyis pa med 'dod pa// mi srid bzhi yi dpes mtshon par// 'dod pa
348a5(sgra skor): snang ris mi mthun par// lta ba sngon bzhin rgyu rim bzhin// de nyid 'bras lha'i rim pa gnyis// drug po 'das pa'i mthar zhen cing // phyogs cig gzhi lnga gang lta bu// sna tshogs snang ba'i bzhi mi rung //
348a6(sgra skor): de bas mar ma gsal dus na// mun pa ma song sgrol med de// gsal nyid gnyisu med par lta// dngos zhen ma rig ye shes pa// spangs dang mi gnas 'gal ba med// yid bzhin nor bu'i yon tan ltar// dngos gnyis lhun grub cir yang
348b1(sgra skor): snang // chos kun gzhi zhes de phyir bya'o// rdzun la sogs pa'i rig pa ni// rgyu yi gzhi 'dod bden lta ba// phyogs cig yin gyi nges 'jog/ 'byung ba'i gzhi rtsar the tshom med// thams cad ye nas dbyer med la// rig dang ma rigs
348b2(sgra skor): b+h+r-ing dor med// gnyis med ston pa'o lung ldan ngag/ rigs pas 'tsham pa go/ 'byed pa// dpa' bo'i lag tshe ji bzhin du// rnam grangs kun kyang rtogs pa'i thabs// rig pa med kyang thabs kyis mchog/ yin min chos la rtsod mi byed/
348b3(sgra skor): chos dang gang zag bdag med pa// dngos lta'i bdag med nyan thos pas// phyogs tsom stong pa'i chos bdag med// rgyun snang don 'gog bdag med dang // gsal ba phyogs cig bdag med dang // rigs snang bdag med ye shes snang //
348b4(sgra skor): gsum gnyis spong ldan byed pa'i phyir// bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gtso bo yin// phyogs bcu rang byung ye shes la// rang byurni nga 'di 'dra'i dngos med pas// chos dang gang thog yod ma yin// la lar nyi ma'ang mun rkyen ltar// bdag med ye shes
348b5(sgra skor): bdag kun ldan// gnyis med bdag med bdag nyid che// med mthar thug po 'di la med// gzhan med spyod yul med pa yang// phra bas gzhan pa'i yo bo med// zab pas rtags pa'i dpyod byed med// gzhon pa stong pas med pa dang //
348b6(sgra skor): 'khrul pas med dang rdzun pas ci// rig phyir med dang ye shes phyir// gzhan med pa'ang de bzhi no// de bral 'dod phyir lcags kyi dkris// sngon bzhin thams cad ye shes la// ngo bo cag phyir tshe shes med// gcig mtha' med pa kun tu
349a1(sgra skor): shar// gnyis su med pas phung gsum med// de la sgra bsam med pa'i phyir// bzung 'dzin lcags kyis sngams pa med// lha rlig gnyis kyi sngon brjod pa// 'dod pa tha dad yul mthong ba'o// shes rab spyan
349a2(sgra skor): gyi ngo bo ste// khyad par bshad pa nyid du zad// mthong ba'i lam du cig smra ba'ang // bshes gnyen rkyen phrad sngags mthong gi/ de med reng gi mngon shes kyis// mthong na bcu pa 'ang thob par rigs// lta ba'i sgrib pas phye ba'i phyir//
349a3(sgra skor): las dang 'bras bu'i khyad par che'o// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ye shes la// bcu drug gnyisu 'dod pa dang // bzhi dang gnyisu gnas 'gyur 'dod// rig pa bzhi dang lngar 'dod pa// rang rang rtags pa'i don mthong phyir// mun pa'i rab mchog

349b1(sgra skor): nyams bo nyid drug pa// tha ma theg mchog ban kun dang // zhig med pa nas chud pa dang // rkyen gyi rnyi rmad la sogs pa// med bzhin ston bzhin pa sungs pa yang // na du rgyas pa'i ga snang ba// sam nu brgyad sogs mtha' rna

349b3(sgra skor): phyir mi spong rkun bu yang // so so phyogs kyi ma rig pas// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ngo bo lnga// thams cad drag ces bya ba yang // dngos po bsal dag ma yin te// nung spyod nyid na rnam par dag/ de phyir lhag pa zhes su brjod// rang bzhin

349b5(sgra skor): 'gro med par ci yang 'khrul// nam mkha'i cho 'phrul mtsho rlabs bzhin// snang ba'i dus ni snang med te// dbyer med pa lnga rim mi phyed// de phyir cig ces mtsho na thabs brjod// de kho 'dre ba'i mchog yi no// tha dad spo nga ba'i cig/
349b6(sgra skor): 'dod pa// gcig gi mtha' la zhan pa nor// dag pa'i 'og tu gcig pa las/ ma dag blo bur snang 'dod pa// sa bon med pa'i 'bras 'dod pa// sab rta tho mi thag sbrul ltar// smig rgyu chu zla ltar med pas// snang zhes rigs pas bsgrub

350a2(sgra skor): med// yod pa sun 'byin chos 'di la// med par sgru ba byis pa'i blo// med par sun 'byin chos dgu la// yid lta yin zhes smra ba'ang log/ dbus 'dzin sun 'byin chos dag la// cig tu lte dgur byed pa 'dra 'khru la// mtha' bral 'dzin
350a3(sgra skor): pu srun 'byin pa// dri mas bgos 'dra nor ba'i migo/ kun gyi 'byung gnas byed pa'o// de yis ma byas gang yang me pa// kha dog dbyibs rigs kun dngos dang // kha dog dbyibs rigs grong yang min// shin tu rtag dka' stsas
350a4(sgra skor): mi rig/ rig med dang las thams cad snang // byang chub sems zhes brjod pa ni// skad cig kun dngos rgyud med phyir// gang nas ma rung gror mi 'gro/ rtog med rang rig kho na'o// shes byar gyur pa'i cho so cog/ rig pa li nA sa rang gsal
350a5(sgra skor): phyir/ rang rig shes bya dmigs skye med// drangos yul tsam yang 'dod ma yin// byang chub sems kyi blo ga lI nI// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// kha dog gnas dbyibs ris yod min// yon tan mchog gi snying po ni// rtog ge'i
350a6(sgra skor): spyod yul de ma yin// mnyam pa po'i don nyid ji lta bu// mnyam nyid rang bzhin gang yang min// gnyis phyir min zhes brjod pa las// phyogs cig min pa smra brjod 'das// zhes pa bzlog phyir rkyen bshad ma rtogs pa// chos
350b1(sgra skor): kyi dngal tshig med brjod med pa'ang // spangs bsal med phyogs log gsum blta ba ste// rang bzhin ngo bo mtshan nyid mchog/ las grol pa ni/ 'og mas spangs pa'i log rtog grangs// mtha' yas+ya mi spyong rang rig phyir// ldan pa'i
350b2(sgra skor): chos rnams blung du med// blang dor myed pa'i don mchog ni// zhen bral mtha' 'das 'ching khrol sogs// blang bya kun gyi mchog yin te// de nyid bdag yin zla med pa// nyam su blang ba'i thabs mchog yini// sras kyang ma bcings
350b3(sgra skor): bcings mad te// bcings par bya ba yod ma yin// bcings med rnam par gro lnga med pa'i// ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos// yid bzhin nor bu'i yon tan+da ltar// bden gsum don kyang de ltar snang // dron du bden dang mi bden zhes// gnyis

358a1(sgra skor): phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon las bzhugs
358b1(sgra skor): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+ha dra tsAr+yA pA Ni d+hA nA rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po// 'phags pa 'dzum dpal gzhan nur gyur pa phyag 'tshal lo// dzA snyed su ngag phyogs
358b2(sgra skor): bcu'i 'jig rten na// dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng ge kun// bdag gis ma lus de dag thams cad la// lus drang dgra yid dang bas phyag bgyi'o// bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam stobs dag gis// rgyal po thams
358b3(sgra skor): cad yid kyi mngon sum du// zhing gi rdul snyed lus rab tud pa yis// rgyal ba kun la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo// rdul cig steng na rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams// spangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa dag
358b4(sgra skor): de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus pa// thams cad rgyal ba dag gis gang bar mos// de dag bsdogs pa mi zad rgya mtsho rnams// dbyings kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra kun gyis// rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan rab brjod/
358b5(sgra skor): cing // bde bar gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis bstod// me tog dam pa phrang ba dam pa dang // sil snyan rnams dang byug pa gdug sde mchog dang // mor me mchog dang bdug pa dam pa yis// rgyal ba de dag la
358b6(sgra skor): ni mchod par bgyi// na bza' dam pa rnams dang dri mchog dang // phye ma'i phur ma ri rab mnyam pa dang // bkod pas khyad par 'phags pa'i mchog kun gyis// rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi// mchod pa
359a1(sgra skor): gang rnams bla meng+ga rgya che ba/ de dag rgyal ba thams cad lnga yang mos// bzang po spyod la dad pa'i stobs dag gis// rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis
359a2(sgra skor): na// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang // sdig pa bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa// de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun dang sangs rgyas sras// rang rgyal rnams
359a3(sgra skor): dang slob dang mi slob dang // 'gro ba kun gyi bsod na mes gang la yang // de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag yi rang // gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sgron ma dag/ byang chub rim par sa rgyas ma chags brnyes// mgon po
359a4(sgra skor): de dag bdag gis thams cad la// 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar bskul// mya ngan 'da' ston gang bzhed de dag lnga// 'gro ba kun la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir// bskal po zhing gi rdul snyed bzhugs par yang // bdag gis thal
359a5(sgra skor): mo rab sbyar gsol bar bgyi// phyag 'tshal ba drang mchod cing bsha gos po dang // rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba yi// dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa// thams cad bdag gis byang chub phyir bsngo'o// 'das
359a6(sgra skor): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs mchod par gyur// gang yang ma byon de dag rab myur bar// bsam rdzogs byang chub rim par sangs rgyas spyon// phyogaso bcu gang gA'i
359b1(sgra skor): zhing rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rgya cher yongs su dag par gyur// byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang // sangs rgyas sras kyi rab tu grang bar shog/ phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rtag tu nang
359b2(sgra skor): med bde bar gyur// 'gro ba kun gyi chos kyi don rnams ni// mthun par gyur cig re ba'i nga 'grub par shog/ byang chub spyod pa dag ni bdag spyod cing // 'gro ba kun tu skye ba dran par gyur// tshe rabs kun tu 'chi 'pho skye ba na// rtag
359b3(sgra skor): tu bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar shog/ rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su slob gyur te// bzang po spyod pa yongs su rdzog byed cing // tshul khrims spyod pa dri med yongs dag paro// rtag tu mi nyams skyon meng spyod par shog/ lha yi sra
359b4(sgra skor): dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad// grul bum ngag dang mi yi skad rnams dang / 'gro ba kun gyi sgra rnams ji tsam pa'o// thams cad skrad bdag gis chos bstan to// des shing pha rol phyin la rab brtson te// byang chub sems ni
359b5(sgra skor): nam yang brjed ma gyur// sdig pa gang rnams sgrib par gyur pa dag/ de dag ma lus yongs su byung bar shog/ las dang nyin mongs bdud kyi las rnams las// grol shing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams su yang// ji ltar pad
359b6(sgra skor): chus mi chags pa bzhin// nyi zla na mkhar thogs pa med ltar spyad// zhing gi khyon dang phyogs rnams ji tsam par// ngan song sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed// bde ba dag la 'gro ba kun dgod cing // 'gro ba thams cad dag las
360a1(sgra skor): phan par spyad// byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing // sems can rnams kyi spyod dang mthun par 'jug/ bzang po spyod pa dag ni rab ston cing // ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyod par 'gyur// bdag
360a2(sgra skor): gi spyod dang mthun par gang sbyong pa// de dag dang ni rtag tu 'grogs por shog/ lusu dang ngag rnams dang ni sems kyis kyang // spyod pa dag dang smon lam gcig tu spyad// bdag la phan par 'dod po'i grogs po dag/ bzang
360a3(sgra skor): pospyod pa rab tu ston pa rnams// de dag dang yang rtag tu phrad par shog/ de dag bdag gis num yang yid mi dbyung // sangs rgyas spos kyis bskor ba'i mgon po rnams// mngon sum rtag tu bdag gi rgyal ba blta// ma 'ong
360a4(sgra skor): bskal pa kun tu mi skye bar// de dag la yang mchod pa rgyu cher bgyi// rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing // byang chub spyod pa kun tu snang bar byed// bzang po spyod pa rnam par sbyang ba yang // ma 'ongs bskal pa kun
360a5(sgra skor): tu spyad par bgyi// srid pa thams cad du ni 'khor ba ni// bsod nams ye shes dag ni mi zad rnyed// thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin rnam thar dang // yon tan kun gyi mi zing mdzod du gyur// rdul gcig steng na rdul
360a6(sgra skor): snyi de zhing rnams te// zhing der bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa la// byang chub spyad pa spyod cing blta bar bgyi// de dag ma lus thams cad phyogasu yang // skra tsam
360b1(sgra skor): khyon la dus gsum ched snyed kyi// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang // bskal pa brgya mtshor spyod cing rab tu 'jug/ gsung gcig yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra skad kyis// rgyal ba kun dbyangs yan lag rnam dag pa// 'gro
360b2(sgra skor): byo kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin dbyangs// sangs rgya skye gsungs rtag tu 'jug par bgyi// dus gsum gash+lo gas pa rgyal ba thams cad dag/ 'khor lo'i tshul rnams rab tu bskor ba yi// de dag gi yang gsung dbyangs mi zang la//
360b3(sgra skor): blo yi stobs kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug/ mo 'ongs bskal pa thams cad 'jug par yang // skad cig gcig gis bdag kyang 'jug par bgyi// gang yang bskal pa dus gsum tshad de dgra/ skad cig cha shos kyis ni zhugs
360b4(sgra skor): par spyad// dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng gre gang // de dag skad cig gcig la bdag gis blta// rtag tu de dag gi ni spyod yul la// sgyu mar gyur pa'i rnam thar stobs kyis 'jug/ de drag dus gsum dag gi zhing bkod
360b5(sgra skor): pa// de dag rdul gcig stang du mngon par bsgrub// de ltar ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du// rgyal ba dag gri zhing rnams bkod la 'jug/ gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma rnams// de dag rim par 'tshang rgya 'khor lo
360b6(sgra skor): bskor// mya ngan 'das pa rab tu zhi mtha' ston// mgon po kun gyi drung du bdag mchi'o// kun tu myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang // kun nas sgo yi theg pa'i stobs ngag dang // kun du yon tan spyod pa'i stobs
361a1(sgra skor): rnams dang // kun du khyab pa byams pa dag gi stobs// kun nas dge ba'i bsod nams stobs rnams dang // chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes stobs// shes rab stobs dang ting 'dzin stobs
361a2(sgra skor): ngag gis// byang chub stobs rnams yang drag sgrub por byed// las kyi stobs rnams yongs su dag byed cing // nyon mongs stobs rnams kun tu 'joms pa byed// bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med rang byed cing // bzang
361a3(sgra skor): po spyod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs par bgyi// zhing rnamaso rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing // sems can rgya mtshe dag ni rnam par dgrol// chosna rnams rgya mtsho rab tu mthong byed cing // yis rgya mtsho rab tu rtoDa bar byed// spyod pa rgya mtsho rA raM dag byed cing
361a4(sgra skor): smon lom rgya mtsho rab tu rdzob par byed// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu mchod byed ci// bskal pa rgya mtsho ro mi skyo spyad par bgyi// gang yang dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba yi// byang chub spyod po'i smon lam byed brag rnams// bzang po spyod
361a5(sgra skor): pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas// de kun ma lus bdag gis rdzogs par bgyi// rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thu bo pa// gang gi ming ni kun tu bzang zhes bya// mkhas pa de dang mtshungs pa spyod pa'i phyir// da
361a6(sgra skor): ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo// lus dang ngag dang yin kyang rnam dag cing // spyod pa rnam dag zhing rnams yongs dag dang / bsngo ba bzang po mkhas po ci 'dra bar// de 'drar bdag kyang de dang mtshungs par shog
361b1(sgra skor): kun nas dag pa bzang po spyad pa'i phyir// 'jam dpal gyi ni smon lam spyad par bgyi// ma 'ongs bskal pa kun du mi skyo bar// de yi bya ba ma lus rdzogs par bgyi// spyod pa dag ni tshad yod ma gyur cig/ yon tan rnams
361b2(sgra skor): kyang chad bzung med par sho ga/ spyod pa tshad med pa la gnas nas kyang // de dag 'phrul pa thams cad 'tshal ba bgyi// na mkhi'i mthar thug gyur pa ji tsam par// sems can ma lus mtha' yang de bzhin te// ji tsam
361b3(sgra skor): las dang nyon mongs mthar gyur pa/ bdag gi smon la mtha' yang de tsam mo// gang yang phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mtha' yas pa// rin chen brgyan te rgyal ba rnams la phul// lha dang mi yi bde ba mchog rnams kyang // zhing gi/
361b4(sgra skor): rdul snyed bskal par phul ba bas// gang gis sde ba'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/ byang chub mchog gi rje su rab mos shing // lan cig tsam yang dad pa bskyed pa ni// bsod nalas dam pa'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro// gang gis bza
361b5(sgra skor): spyod sman 'di btab pas// des ni dran song thams cad spangs par 'gyur// des ni grogs po ngan pa spangs pa yin// snang ba mtha' yas de yang de myur mthong // de dag rnyed pa rab rnyed bde bar 'tshe// rmi tshe 'dir yang de dag
361b6(sgra skor): legs par 'ong // kun du bzang po de yang ci 'dra bar// de dag ring por mi thogs de bzhin 'gyur// mtshams med lnga po dag gi sdig pa rnams// gang gis mi shes dbang gis byis pa dag/ de yis bzang po spyod pa 'di
362a1(sgra skor): brjod na// myur du ma lus yongasu byung bar 'gyur// ye shes drang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang // rigs dang kha dog rnams dang ldan par 'gyur// bdud dang mu steT mang pos de mi thub// 'jig rten gsum
362a2(sgra skor): po kun na'ang mchod par 'gyur// byang chub shing dbang dru dr-i dwe myur 'gro/ song nas sems can phan phyir der 'dug ste// byang chub sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab tu bskor// bdud rnams sde dang bcas par thams cad 'dul//
362a3(sgra skor): gang yang bzang po smod pa'i smon lam 'di// 'chad pa dang ni ston tam klog pa yis// de yi rnam par smin pa sangs rgyas mkhyen// byang chub mchog la som nyi ma byed cig/ 'jam dpal ji ltar mkhyen cing dpa' ba dang //
362a4(sgra skor): kun tu bzang po nga yang de bzhin te// de dag gi nI rjesu bdag slob cing // dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo// dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad kyis// bsngo ba gang la mchog tu bsngags pa des// bdag
362a5(sgra skor): gros dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kun kyang // bzang po spyod phyir rab tu bsngo bar bgyi// bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur pa na// sgrib pa thams cad dag ni phyir bsal te// mngon sum snang ba mtha' yas nga mthing nas// bde bcan gyi
362a6(sgra skor): zhing der rab tu 'gro/ der song nas ni smon lamo 'di dag kyang // thams cad ma lus mngon sum 'gyur bar shog/ de dag ma lus bdag gis yongs su bslang // 'jig rten ji srid sems can phan par bgyi// rgyal ba'i
362b1(sgra skor): dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der// pad+ma dam pa shin tu mdzes las skye// snang ba mtha' yas rgyal ba'i mngon sum du// lung bsan pra yang bdag gas der thob shog+sa/ der ni bdag gis lung bstan rab thob nas// sprul
362b2(sgra skor): pra mang po bye ba phrag brgya yis// blo yi stobs kyi phyags bcu rnams yang // sems can rnams la phan pa mang po bgyi// bzang pa spyod pa'i smon lam btab pa yis// dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa/ dus
362b3(sgra skor): ni 'gro ba'i smon lam dag pa rnams// skad cig go cig gis thams cad 'byor par shog/ bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam bsngos pa yi so// bstod nams dam pa mtha' yas gang tho ba ngas// 'gro ba sdug bsngal chu bor bying
362b4(sgra skor): ba rnams// 'di dpag meng pa'i gnas rab thob par shog+sa/ skyon lam rgyal po 'di dgu mchog gi gtso// mtha'i yas 'gro ba kun la phan byed cing // kun tu bzang pos brgyan pa'i gzhung grub cing // ngan song rgyudan
362b5(sgra skor): ma lus stongs par shog/ 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i skyon lam gyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / tshigs zhug// sangs rgyas kun la phyaga'atshol lo//
362b6(sgra skor): drang song lha mig ldan pa yi// byang chub sems da pa' rnams dang yang // nyan thos rnam la phyag 'tshal lo// ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog bgyid cing // mtho ris lam ni rab sngon la// rga shi med par 'dren bgyid pa/
363a1(sgra skor): byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// sems kyi dbang du gyur pas na// bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas su// bdag gis de dag bshags par bgyi// bdag las rnam pa
363a2(sgra skor): gsum gang gis// bo song+ga nams tshogs ni skyes pa ste// bdag gis kun mkhyen sa bon te// bdag ni byang chub mi zad shog/ phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su// sangs rgyas mchod pa gang byung ba// thams cad mkhyen pa yi rang ba
363a3(sgra skor): de la bdag ni yi rang ngo // sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// bsod nams kun la yi rang ngo // sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo// badrag ni ye shes mchog thob shog/ phyogs bcu dag gi phyogs rnams na/
363a4(sgra skor): sa bcu dag lnga gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog/ 'tshang rgya bgyid par bskul ma 'dra bso// byang chubo dam par sangs rgyas shing // snga dang bcas pa'i bdud btul nas// srog chags kun la sman slad
363a5(sgra skor): du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor gyur cig/ chos rnga chen po sgra yis ni// sdug bsngal sems can thar bgyid sho go/ bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// chos ston mdzad cing bzhugs gyur cig/ 'dod pa'i 'dam ru bying
363a6(sgra skor): gyur cing // sred pa'i srad bus dam bcings pa// 'ching ba kun gyi bcings bdag le// rkang gnyis mchog gis gzigasu gsol// sems kyi dri mar bgyis pa la// sangs rgyas rnams ni smod mi mdzad// sems can
363b1(sgra skor): rnams la byams thugs ldan// srid pa'i mtsho las sgrolnga bA shog/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs dang // gang dag 'das dang mu byon pa// dri dag rjes su bdag slob cing // byang chub spyang pa spyod gyur cig/ pha rol phyin
363b2(sgra skor): drug rdzogs bgyis nas// 'gro drug sems can thar bgyid shog/ mngon shes drug po mngon bgyis nas// bla med byang chub rag gyur cig/ mra skyes pa dang mi 'byung drang // rang bzhi nA ma mchi so gnas ma mchis// rnam
363b3(sgra skor): rig ma mchis dngos ma mchis// stong pa'i chos ni rtogs par shog/ sangs rgyas drang srong chen po ltar// sems can ma mchis srog ma mchis// gang zag ma mchis gso ma mchis// bdag ma mchis pa'i chos rtogs
363b4(sgra skor): shog/ bdag 'dzin bdag gir 'dzin pa yi// dngos po kun la mi gnas par// sems can kun lA badra skad du// ser sna ma mchis sbyin gtong shog/ dngos po dngos po ma mchis pas// bdag gi longs spyod ldan grub shog/
363b5(sgra skor): dngos po thams cad rnam 'jig pas// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ khrims kyi tshul khrim skyon med cig/ tshul khrims rnam par dag dang ldan// rlom sems med pa'i tshul khrims kyis// tshul khri mas pha rol phyin
363b6(sgra skor): rdzogs shog/ sa 'am yang na chu 'am me// rlung gi khams ltar mi gnas shig/ bzod pa' mo khro ba ma mchis par// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/
364a1(sgra skor): brtun sgro le lo myu man+tis shing // stobs dang ldan pa'i lus sems kyis// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rdzogs shog+sa/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin drung // dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting dzin dang // rdo rje lnga bu'i
364a2(sgra skor): 'dzin gyis// bsam gtan pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang // dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang yang // rigagasum mngon sum bgyis pa yis// shes rab pha rol pin rdzogs shi k+She/ sangs
364a3(sgra skor): rgyas kun gyi bsngags pa dang // 'od dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang // byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyis// bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig/ de ltar spyad pa spyod byed cing // byams pa grags dang ldan pa yis// pha rol
364a4(sgra skor): phyin drug rdzogs byas nA// sa bcu po la rab tu gran s+ya// 'phags pa byams pa'i smon lham rdzogs so// / 2gser 'od dam pa mdo sde dbang po'i smon lam bzhug so// dkon mchoge gsum la phyag
364a5(sgra skor): 'tshal lo// gasror 'od dam pa'i rnga chen sgra yis ni// stong gsum bau jig rten 'jig rten gsum 'di na// nga nA song sdug bsngal gshin rje'i sdug bsngal dang // dbul ba'i sdug bsngal sdug bsngal zhi bar shog/ rnga bo cha
364a6(sgra skor): yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// 'jig rten rmongs pa thams cad zhi gyur cig/ ji ltar thub dbang 'jigs med 'jigs zhi ltar// sems can 'jigs med 'jigs dang bral bar sheg/ ji ltar 'khor bar kun mkhyen
364b1(sgra skor): thub dbang po// 'phags pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pa ltar// skye dgu ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag gi/ yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgya mtshor gyur// rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i sgra

364b4(sgra skor): rgyas phyag 'tshwa lo zhes tshig thos shog/ sems can kun gyi tshe rabs brgya dag dang // tshe rabs stong phrag bye bar skye dran shog/ thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cing // de dag gi ni rgya chen gsung thos shog/ rnga bo tshe yi
364b5(sgra skor): sgra skadad+mo 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas rnams dang rtag tu 'grogs rnyed gyur// sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong bar sho ga/ bya ba dge ba rnams ni spyod gyur cig/ mI dang lha dang srog chags thams cad kyi// de dag bsam drang smon la
364b6(sgra skor): gang yin pa// rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// de dag rnams kyi dkun rdzogs gyur cing // sems can gang dag sems dmyal mi bzad skyes// lus la me lce kuni du rab tu 'bar// skyabs med mya ngan bcas shing yongs
365a1(sgra skor): 'khyam pa// me rnams ma lus rab tu zhi bar shog/ sems dmyal yi dwags mi yi 'jig rten na// sems can sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po grang // rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// de dag rnams
365a2(sgra skor): kyi sdug bsngal kun zhi shog/ rten med dpung gnyen med pa dang // skyabs med par ni gyur pa dge/ de rnams la ni skyob pa dang // dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur cing // sangs rgyas rkang gnyis dam pa drag/ thugs
365a3(sgra skor): rtse thu gas rje ldan pa'i thugs// gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten no// bzhugasna pa bde ga la dgongs su gsol// bdag gi sngon chad sdig pa'i las// shrIn tu mi bzang gang bgyis pa/ stobs bcu'i spyan sngar
365a4(sgra skor): bdag mchis te// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// pha ma dag tu mi 'dzin dang // sangs rgyasna rnamasu mi 'dzin dang // dge ba dag tu mi 'dzin pas// sdig pa bdag gis gang bgyis da // phyug blo'i rgyags
365a5(sgra skor): pas dregs pa dang // rigs dang longs spyod rgyags pa dang // gzhon pa'i rgyags pa sna drags pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // nyaMs samra nyes par smras pa dang // nyes pa bgyis pa'i las rnams
365a6(sgra skor): dang / nyes pa'i dmigasu ma bltas pos// bdag gi sdig pa gang bgyi dang // byis pa'i blo yi 'jug pa dang // mi shes mun pa'i sems dang ni// sdig pa'i gro gas po'i dbang gyur dang // nyon mongs rnam
365b1(sgra skor): par 'khrug sems dang // rtsed mo dag zla ba'i dbang nyid dang // mya ngan dang ni nad dbang drung // nor gyis mi cho ga nyes pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gad gyi dang // 'phags m+b+hin+da skye bo 'dre ba dang // phrag dog ser sna'i sgyu dang ni// glal
365b2(sgra skor): dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yi// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // phongs pa byung ba'i dus kyi tshe// 'dod pa rnams dang 'jig rgyu dang // phyug po ma yin gyur pa yi// bdag gi sdig pa gang bgyis dang / g.yo ba'isems kyi da
365b3(sgra skor): nyi dung // 'dod drang khro ba'i dbang nyid dang // bekres drang skom gyis nyen pa yis// bdag gi sdig pa gang bgyis dang // bza' ba dag dang btung ba dang // bud med rgyu dang gos kyi phyir// nyon mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyi// bdagu go/
365b4(sgra skor): sdig pa gang bgyis dang // lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdig/ nyes par spyad pa rnam gsum bsags// 'di 'dra'i tshul gyis gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bad tshig 'chagaso// sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang /
365b5(sgra skor): bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chagaso// gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang bgyis
365b6(sgra skor): pa/ de dag thams cad bdag 'chagaso// dam chos smra ba rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags bgyis pa dang // chos la'ang gus par mi bgyis pa/ de dag thams cad bdag 'chagaso// bdag gi rtag tu mi shes pas//
366a1(sgra skor): dam pa'i chos ni spangs pa dang // phra ma rnams la mu gus gang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// blun pa dang ni byis pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal dregs pas bsgribs bgyis
366a2(sgra skor): pra// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// bdag ni phyogs bcu 'jig rten du// stobs bcu rnams la mchod par shog/ bdag ni phyogs bcur sems can rnams dang // sdug bsngal kun las 'don gyur cig/
366a3(sgra skor): sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun// sa bcu dag la 'god par shog/ sa bcu drug la gnas nas kyang // thams cad de bzhin gshegs gyur cig/ ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las// de kun thar bgyid nus srid kyi//
366a4(sgra skor): sems can re re'i phyir ya ni// bskal pa bye bar spyod par shog/ gse 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba// las rnams thams cad byang byed pa// zlab mo dag ni ston pa 'di// sems can de dag ston gyur nag/ gang gis bas
366a5(sgra skor): pa stong rnams// sdig pa shin tu mi bzad bgyis// lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis// de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur// gang gi las kyi sgrib pa rnams// myur du yang dag zad 'gyur ba// gser 'od dmu pa dge
366a6(sgra skor): ba yi// bshags pa 'di dag bshags nas ni// rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po// se bcu la ni gnas par shog/ sangs rgyas yon tan snang gyur cig/ srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar sheg/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang
366b1(sgra skor): sa du/ sa rgyas na sa sa s+ho// d+hA rgyu shog/ ldan / na rgyas spyod // rgyunam da sgyu na
366b2(sgra skor): bas bcu dam par 'gyur ba tshogak+Sha/ dgongs pa'i thugs kyi sangs rgyas rnams// bdag la rnam par gzigs klas s+ho// thugs rje ldan pa hU~M thugs kyi sI na// rmongs par ra zhes la// bdag gi sacwa
366b3(sgra skor): rgyan sasgra/ sbyin chang rtsig pa gang m+b+his ste// de phyir dag no m+b+ha sa // sa mya gas par ga/ na pa'i lapo mi 'jig / yid nA rtag tung ldan
366b4(sgra skor): bdas ni ga byung drug sa rnas/ rgyas thams pa thugs d+he wAm+ba/ ShAga~M b+h+rU~M kun gyi 'dag sa la ngas// rnaMs b+har ma cwa brgyang gso pa// 'jigs pa dge las shAn+d+ha gis nyen gyi

366b6(sgra skor): ga kyi gang // de dag thams cad bdag 'a mags so// rnam par bgyid po mas rnams ma/ sman dkyi gyi // bdag gi ma
367a1(sgra skor): nI rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// lus kyis dgyis dang ngag gi las// yid kyi rnam par bsam pa dang /
367a2(sgra skor): las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dgra/ de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// mi dag las bcu spangs nasu// dge ba bcu po bsten bgyis nas// sa bcu la ni bdag gnas bgyi// stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar shog/ bdag/
367a3(sgra skor): gis sdig pa'i las gang dag/ mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas su// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'dzam bu gling 'dir gang dag dang // 'jig rten khams 'di gzhan dag tu
367a4(sgra skor): gang rnams dge ba'i las bgyid pa// de drag kun lnga yi rang ngo // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrub pa// bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des// byang chub mchog la reg par shog/ srid 'gro
367a5(sgra skor): nyam ngar byis pa'i blo yis ni// shin+na tu myi bzang sdig pa gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu mi mnyam spyan sngar mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun ste sor bshags par bgyi// skye ba nyam nga srid pa nyam nga dang // 'jig rten nyam
367a6(sgra skor): nga g.yo sems nyam nga dang // lus kyi spyod pa nyam nga sna tshogs kyi// bdag gis sdig pa gang bsogs de 'chags// byis pa blun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang // sdig po'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam nga dang / srid pa nyam
367b1(sgra skor): nga'adod chags nyam nga dang // zhe sdang gti mug mun pa nyam du dang // dal bu'i nyam nga dus kyi nyam nga dang // bsod nams sgrub pa nyam pa gang bgyis pa// rgyal ba mi mnyam mngon sum mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so spor
367b2(sgra skor): bshags par bgyi// sangs rgyas gser mdogu ri snang rI rab 'dra// yon tan rgya mtsho 'dra la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal ba de dag rnams la skyabasu mchi// rgyal ba de dgra kun la mgos phyag 'tshal// gser mdog gser ni
367b3(sgra skor): dri ma med par gser gyi 'od/ dri med rnam dgra bai DUr+ye yi yan lag spyan// sangs rgyas nyi ma dpal gzi drag 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas// thugs rje'i 'od zer bdag gis mun pa mun nog gsal// yan lag rab tu dri
367b4(sgra skor): med rab bzung rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas nyi ma yan lag dri myed go sder 'dras khyob// nyon mongs mes gdungs yun can 'bar ba'i me 'dra la// thub pa'i zla ba'i 'od zer dra bras tshim par mdzad// mtshan mchog
367b5(sgra skor): sum cu gnyis kyi dbang po yan lag mdzeso// dpe byad bzang po dag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes// dpal gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs 'od zer dra ba yis// 'jig rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du
367b6(sgra skor): bzhugs// dri med rgya chen kha dog sna tshogs bai DUr+ya// skya rengs dmar dang dngul dang shel bzhin yan lag dmar// 'od zer dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs legs brgyan pas// thub chen khyod ni nyi ma bzhin du de yis
368a1(sgra skor): mdzes// mya ngan 'khrugs pa 'chi chu brgal ba'i dbab rlabs can// 'khor ba'i rlung chen phongs pa'i chu bor lhung ba las// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog tu rtsub cing shugs drag pa// bder gshegs nyi ma'i 'od
368a2(sgra skor): zer mang po rnams kyisku skems// yan lag gser gyi mdog tu rnam par snang // ye shes 'byung ga nas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog/ rab mdzes mtshan gyis yan lag rnam spras pa// sangs rgyas gser sku 'bar la
368a3(sgra skor): phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu ni dpag med dang // ji ltar sa la sa rdul mtha' yas dang // ji ltar ri rab sngo mtha' mtshungs med dang // ji ltar na mkha'i tha ma mtha' yas pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon ta na mtha' y+ra
368a4(sgra skor): to// sems can kun gyis shes par mi nuso// bskal pa du mar gzhal cing bsams kyang ni// yon tan tha ma shes par mi nuso// chu ni skra yi rtse mo'i tshad tsam dang // rdor bcas ri ra bcas rgya mtsho ru bcas pa ni// bskal
368a5(sgra skor): par bgrangs na shes par nus kyang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan pha mthas shes mI nus// yon tan kha dog snyan dang glags pa dang // dge ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i ske lus dang // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa//

368b1(sgra skor): sdug bsngal mang gzir thar byed shog/ stobs bcas sde bcas bdud lus rgyal gyur cig/ chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor bar shog/ bskal pa bsam mi khyab bzhugs gyur cig/ bdud rtsi chu yi sems can tsho mu byed
368b2(sgra skor): sh+lo ga/ ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba rdzogs pa ltar// pha rol phyin drug bla med rdzogs par shog/ nyon mongs 'joms shing sdug bsngal sel gyur cig/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi byed shog/ tshe rabs brgya dang tshe rabs pyo
368b3(sgra skor): stong / bdag gi rtag tu tshe rabs dran par sho ga/ thub bI'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig/ de dag rnams kyi gsung rgya tsho thos shog/ bdag ni dge ba'i las ni 'di dag gis// ga tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par shog
368b4(sgra skor): sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong gyur cig/ dge ba'i byung gnas dge rnams spyod par shog/ zhing rnams kun ni srog chags thams cad kyang // 'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun zhi 'gyur// sems can dbang po ma
368b5(sgra skor): tshangs yan lag rnams// de kun de re dbang po tshang bar shig/ gang drag nad bta ba nyam chung lus nyims dang // phyogs bcu dag nu skyabs med gyur pa rnams// de kun myur du nad las thar gyur cig/ nad med
368b6(sgra skor): stobs dang dbang po rnyed par shog/ gang dag rgyal po chom rkun spre'u sdig gsang thug dang // sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brgya yis po ngas gyur pa// sems can nyam thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kun/
369a1(sgra skor): 'jog tshogs mi bzad brgya po de las thar gyur cig/ gang dag brdegs shing bcings pas bcings gzir ba// phongs pa sna tshogs dag na gnas gyur cing // nyon mongs stong phrag du mas
369a2(sgra skor): dkrugs nas kyang // 'jigs pa mi bzang mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed// de dag thams cad bcings lasna grol gyur cig/ brdeg pa dag ni brtseg las thar bar shog/ gsang pa rnams kyang srog dang ldan gyur cig/

369a6(sgra skor): bsod nams dag/ bsam ma thag tu de dag grub gyur cig/ rdzu rnga cang te'u pi wang sgra snyan dang // chu mig mtshe'u rdzing bu lteng ka dag/ gser gyi pad+ma ut+pa la pad+ma can// zas skom gos no ra mu tig nor bu dbyi ga/
369b1(sgra skor): rgyan sor rin tshon sna tshogs bai DUr+ya// dri drag ba sams ma thag tu grub gyur cig/ 'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgyu ma byung // sems can gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthong ma gyur// de dag thams cad kha dog rgya chen dang // phan
369b2(sgra skor): tshun du ni 'od byed 'gyur bar sho ga/ mi yi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang yod// de dag bsams mi thag tu grub gyur cig/ 'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma byu nga // sems can gcag kyang ma 'phreng mthang ma gyur
369b3(sgra skor): de dag thams cad kha dag rgya chen dang / phan tshun du na 'ang byed 'gyur bar shog/ ma ya 'dzag rten phun sum chags gling yod// de dag bsam par de dag skye bar 'gyur// bsam pa thams cad bsams ma theg tu yang //

369b6(sgra skor): bya dma'i ba thams cad spyong gyur cig/ mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog/ ngal po'i rgyal po dam pa thob gyur cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa thob par shog/ rtag tu mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar shog/ no/
370a1(sgra skor): dang 'bru yis mdzod rnams 'byor gyur cig/ snyanu dang grags dang gzugs dang kha dog gis// bskal pa du mar legs pur brgyan par shog/ bud med thams cad rtag tu phor gyur te/ dpa' zhing brtul phod

370a3(sgra skor): bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig/ chos bstan pa yang de dag tho tshos par shog/ bdag gis sdig pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa ni// srid pa nya mngar sngon chad gang bsgrubs pa// sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bras thob/

371b6(sgra skor): pa rnams kyis brjod pa'i sangs rgyas skyabs song la// lngas rtsen lag na rdo rje nor sbyin dpal can nor bu bzang sras la sogs pa// de dag thams cad lhan cig rtag tu khyod kyi khyim du chos bzhin srung bar shog
372a1(sgra skor): lngas rtsen dang ni 'phrog ma bu sdug 'khor bcas nor bu bzang sras dpung dang bcus rnams dang // gnod sbyin dbang po lag na rdo rje rung gi sde tshan bcas dang rang gi sder bcas dang // gzhan yang gnod sbyin dbang

372b1(sgra skor): gsum brjod// sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yab rnam kun btung de skyabs mchis nas// mchod 'os rnams la phyag 'tshalo// sdig pa las ni ldog bgyid cing // bstod nams thams cad

372b3(sgra skor): gsol// da ltar bgyis pa'i bsod nams dang // bdag gis bgyis dang ma bgyis gang // des ni sems can thams cad kyang // bla med byang chub sems ldan shog/ sems can thams cad dri mang dbang // yongs
372b4(sgra skor): rdzogs mi khom kun 'das shing // spyod pa rang dbang yod pa dang // 'tsho ba bzang dang ldan par shog/ lus can dag ni thams cad kyang // lagra na rin chen nyid ldan bzhin// yo byad thams cad mtha' yas pa// 'khor ba srid
372b5(sgra skor): mi zad sh+log/ bud med thams cad dus kun du// skyes mchog nyid du 'gyur bar shog/ lus can thams cad rig pa dang // rkang par ldan pa nyid du shog// lus can kha dog ldan pa dang // gzugs bzang

373a3(sgra skor): pa kun las grol ba dang / sems can kun mo tshig byams pa dang // sems can kun yid re ba yi// dge slo ba thams cad rdzogs bgyid cing // rtag tu lus can thams cad kyi// sdug bsngal sel bar bgyid par shog/ 'jig
373a4(sgra skor): rten kun na skye bo gang // su dgra 'jigs pas skyo ba de// bdag gi ming tsam thos pas kyang // shin tu 'jigs pa med par shog/ bdag ni mthong dang dran pa dang // ming tsam thos pas skye bo kun// rab dang 'khrug med rnal mA

373a6(sgra skor): pa byed pa 'dod gyur po// de dag thams cad gnod med par// rtog tu cig car zlog gyur cig/ sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // sman dang dgon pa'i shing bzhin du// rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi// rang dgor dgag med skyed par/

373b5(sgra skor): gyi bar du ni// sman+da dang sman pa nyid ngag dang // d+h+r-i yi nang g.yog byed par shog/ zas dang skom gyi char phab ste// bkres dang skom gyi gnod pa bsale// myu ge'i bskal pa bar ma'i tshe// bdag dang zas dang skom du gyur//

374a1(sgra skor): la dmigs nas gang dag gi/ khro ba'am dad pa'i sems byung na// de nyid rtag tu de dag gi/ don kun 'grub pa'i rgyur gyur cig/ gang dag bdag la kha ze rA ram// gzhan glang gnod pa byed pa'am// de bzhin
374a2(sgra skor): phyar ka gtong yang rung // thams cad byang chub skal ldan gyur// bdag ni ma gon med rnams kyi mgron// lam zhugs rnams kyi ded dpon dang // rgal 'dod rnams kyi glu dang ni// gzings dang zam pa nyid du gyur// gling don

374a6(sgra skor): 'gro ba kun// byang chub spyod la 'jug par shog/ phyogs rnams kun na lus dang sems// sdug bsngal nad pa ji snyed pa// de dag ngag gi bsod nams kyi// bde dga' rgya mtsho thob par shog/ de dag sangs rgyas bde thob kyi//

379b4(sgra skor): gshogs mang po'i snyan dag byed// skye zhing skye ba dang ldan pa ra// gang du sangs rgyas ltar byed pa'o// rigs der bdag mi skye ba dang // skye ba dang ni skye ba ru// chos lnga po ni mI spong zhing // bsod nams
379b5(sgra skor): ye shes stobs dung ni// brtson 'gru sa byang chub sems lnga po// ji ltar thams cad mkhyen po yi// zhab sna thob pa yi thabs de bzhin// de ltar bdag gi thabs kyis ni// thub pu'i dbang po'i zhabs thob shog/
379b6(sgra skor): btsun pa zla ba'i smon lam zhes bya ba rdzogaso// / rab tu bsngags po'i gnas chen po nye ba'i 'thung gcod dpal bal po yum bu'i grong khyer du/ bal po'i paN+Di ta dze ta kar+N+Na'i zhal snga nas/
381a1(sgra skor): kyai lo tsA pra shAkya'i dge slong nyi mu rgyul mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phub pa'o// / rgyu gar skad/ Ar+yA nA gArdzu na pra Ni d+hA na nA ma/ bod skad/
381a2(sgra skor): 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi smon lam zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog ga sum la phyag 'tsha lo// 'khor bar 'khor tshe skye gnas thams cad du// chos la bzod pa ma thob bar du ni/ ngan srong gsum du nam yang mi
381a3(sgra skor): skye gling // ma ris mi skyi lu su skye bor shog/ mtho ris mi yi lusu skyes nas kyang // sdig spyod rgyal por ma skye blon po dang // dmag dpon nal che spyod par bdag ma skye// kha byed til rdung cheng tshong rkun
381a4(sgra skor): po dang / bran dang bran mo lu su po dag ma skye// dge slong gnas la dbang byed bdag po dang / gnas brtan laso byed pa dang nang khrims pa// dge sko so gtsang sbyor ba dang dam bzhig pa// gang zag lnga byed
381a5(sgra skor): rnamasu bdag ma skye// mtha' 'khob kla klo skye bo'i yul rnams dang // glen lcogs 'on long phrag dog can rnams dang // mu stegs log rtog bran ze'i rigs rnams dang // rigs dran pa shan+da pa'i rigasu bdag ma
381a6(sgra skor): skye/ byang chubo ma thob par du rtag pa bdag/ dam chis spyod pa'i lus su skye bar shog/ dam chos spyod pa'i lusu skyes nas kyang // mi dge gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur shing // tshe la nad kyis bar gcod med pad
381b1(sgra skor): skyes ma thag tu chos dang phrad par shog/ skyes ma thag tu chos dang phyed nas kyang // mnyan bsams bsgoms pas rig pa'i rgyud sbyangs te// ting 'dzin rtsa gcig sems la dbang thob ste// rnam shes drug po yul la g.yes

382a5(sgra skor): kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzog so// / bdag ni sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyis// rnyed dka'i sangs rgyas nyid thob nas// rabs med srid pa'i rgya mtsho las// sems can+da ma lus sgrol bar shog/

382b1(sgra skor): sbyar lus bsod nams tshad med gang // de yis 'gro kun+da rgyu lnga ba yo// lam la legs par 'jug par shog/ bdag gi bsod nams 'di yis ni// na mkha' kun khyab skye bo rnams// ngan 'gro kun las nges grol zhing //
382b2(sgra skor): mi khom thams cad rnam par sbyangs// skye bar lha dang ma yi ni// skye ba yongasu thob par shog/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyis skrag pa// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro zhing // dam chos nyan sems don sgom dang /

387b6(sgra skor): spyod yul rnams la brten nas 'dul bar shog/ bdag ni 'jig rten ma lus pa dag gis// bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dag la nye du dang / byems la mdza' bshes ma bzhin sgrub pa dang // pha bzhin phan pa'i gang ma

388a2(sgra skor): pa brgya phrag brten pa'i mi dag la// bum pa bzang dang nad pa'i sman dag ni// yi dgas sogs la rgyun mi 'chad par yang // bdud rtsi'i chu ba kyi rdzing bu bzang por shog+sa/ bdag ni grang ba'i dmyal bar dro ba dang // tshwa
388a3(sgra skor): par rdzo cher bcas pa'i char 'babs shing // gzhan yang shin tu smad pa'i ngan 'go dag/ gnod pa ma lus zhi bar bgyid par shog/ 'gro bas bdag ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang // phongs pa mngon sum gyur la gnyen

388b1(sgra skor): tan zla zer dri med ltar// 'jig rten mA lus pa la pad+mar gyur cig/ dbugs ci phyung ba rnams kyang pha rol lnga// badre ba dpag med skyed par bgyid par shog/ shin tu phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa// mthar phyin pa yi
388b2(sgra skor): sangs rgyas nyid thob nas// dam pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kho nA la// 'gro ba ma lus pa yang sbyar bar bgyi// dri'i tshe na su yi se mo sa la yang // nyesu byas phran tshogs tsam yang mi 'byung la// skye bo gzhan la rgyun tu

396a1(sgra skor): sems can+da gzhan la glanod pa'i lngas bgyis pas/ 'kho ba dang ngan song gi rgyur gyur cing / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgrib par gyur pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci bgyis so// 'tshal thams
396a2(sgra skor): nAd mi 'chab mI sbed par mnong zhing 'gyod pa'i sems kyis ma lus par mtho/ zhing bshags so// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas
396a3(sgra skor): kyis bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur pa/ rnam par dkar ba pi phyogs thams cad la/ shin tu rdza su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi rang ngo // de ba bzhin gshegs pa gang dag dam pa'i chos btsun byar mdza
396a4(sgra skor): pa'i slad/ nang du yang dag 'jog la bzhag nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo mi skor zhing // bskul po'i sa gzhes pa de dag la yang / chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis/ bden pa bzhi'i tshul du bskor nas
396a5(sgra skor): dam pa'i chos bdud rtsi'i char dbab pas/ bskul zhing gso lo// pade bar gshegs pa gang drug gdul bya rnams kyi don mdzad nas/ 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag cing / 'byor pa thams cad rgud par bstan
396a6(sgra skor): te/ 'jig rten mi rtag par bstan pa'i sla / rdo rje lta bu'i sku gshegs nas/ thabs kyis mya ngan 'di' ba'i tshul ston par bzhad pa de dag la yang / thugs rje chen po'i gzugs kyis/ khor
396b1(sgra skor): mA stongs kyi bar du mya ngan lhas mi 'da' zhing / 'jig rten na yun ring por bzhugs na/ lha dang mI'i ston pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen du bzhugs par gsol ba 'debs so// de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag/
396b2(sgra skor): gis sems can ma lus pa'i don du bla na med pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang du bde dang gnas thams cad/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu gsol te/ bla na med pa'i byang chung ngu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// de ltar phyug
396b3(sgra skor): banas byang chub du chom bskyed byin gyi dan pa'i rtsal dang / srung ma thugs dam can mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sordzogs pa 'khor mtha' yas pa dang bcas pa/ sangs
396b4(sgra skor): rgyas mthong ba chos thos pa/ bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs pa/ lha'i ngag bsnyen chen po de dag la chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod rgya chen po gtams shing phul ba dang / 'gro ba ris drug khams gsum gyis
396b5(sgra skor): bsdus pa/ lam+b+ha rgyud lhur 'khor zhing / 'gro ba ris drug tu skye gnas rnam pa bzhi lus skyes pa/ ji tsam sems can gyi ris ni mchis pa/ sems can bsdu bar bsdus pa thams cad la yang bsdu ba rnam pa
396b6(sgra skor): bzhi sa bsdus pa'i mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma rgya chen po khyab par bsngos pa dang / tshe ra bas rgyud pa nas lan chags par gyur pa'i bgegs rnams la yang / gnas dang / dus dang / longs spyod ji ltar
397a1(sgra skor): 'dod pa'i mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma chen po bsngos shing stsa lnga pa/ de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / gzhan yang ba dag cag gi snga slad dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis so// 'tshal gyi mthu dang / khyad par
397a2(sgra skor): du yang yum shes rlab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyu pa la sogs te/ shes rab rnam gsum gyi don du gsungs pa'i phyogs/ gra yo rgyu med par bris pa dang / bAklags shing bton pa dang / mchod cing rim gro
397a3(sgra skor): bgyid pa dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi mthu dang / lha dang drang srong la sogs pa/ 'ag pa 'dzin pa thamaso cad kyi gzi brji rjid dang / bangan pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bdag cag gis mchod
397a4(sgra skor): pa bshams pa'i gnas 'di/ sngon+da bya rgod kyi phung po'i raM la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du/ yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya cher bstan cing
397a5(sgra skor): bshad pa de bzhin du/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par gyur cig/ yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang bcas pa/ pho
397a6(sgra skor): brang gi dkyil 'khor rnar dag pa'i gnas 'dir spyan drangs te/ mchod pa dang / bklags pa dang / mdo sde dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhung dang / dngos grub kyi cho ga dang / mchod
397b1(sgra skor): pa la sogs pa'i dbang dang byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad tshe rabs gar skyes gar gnas kyang / las dang nyon mongs pa'i smyig thams cad ni
397b2(sgra skor): byang / ngan song gsum dang / mi khom brgyad la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las ni yang dag par grol zhing thar te/ bde 'gro lha'i 'jig rten du skyes nus/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi zhal mngon sum
397b3(sgra skor): du mthong ste/ phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas/ bdag gi spyi bor bzhag ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 'jig rten khams 'di zhes bya bar/ sangs rgyas 'di lta bu zhes bya bar
397b4(sgra skor): 'gyu ro// zhes lung bsnun pa myur du thob nas bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su myur du grub par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas ma grub kyi bar du 'jig rten 'di dag du yang / ring / nad med/ longs spyod 'phol/
397b5(sgra skor): rigs rgyud rgyas zhing bde skyid phu na sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dgra bgogs bar du gcod pa cis kyang mi tshugs shing / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
397b6(sgra skor): pa'i bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par gyur cig/ khyad par du yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos spyod rnams pa bcu'i sgo nas tshul bzhin/ bgyis pa'i phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab na yang
398a1(sgra skor): bsdus pa bcu ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sras su dgongs shing byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ba dang / tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa bsrung ma thugs dam can rnams kyis bu bzhin du
398a2(sgra skor): skyong bar 'gyur ba dang / tshe dang dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa gnod pa thams cad kyis bsam sbyor ngan pas mi tshugs pa dang / bzla' skar dang rmi ltas
398a3(sgra skor): la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zlogs par 'gyur ba drang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan thams cad bros pa bzhin du 'du bar 'gyur
398a4(sgra skor): ba dang / tshe rab sa thams cad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don dang mi skol bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal mngon du mthong ba dang / mthar bla na med pa'i sangs rgya su grub par 'gyur
398a5(sgra skor): ba la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing rmed du byung ba rnams bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa la smin cing grub par gyur cig/ khyad par du yang bod kyi rgyal khams su sangs rgyas kyi bstan
398a6(sgra skor): pa yun ring por bzhugs par gyur cig/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhugs pa'i yul phyogs su yang / ngan sems kyi 'khrug pa mi 'byung ba dang / mi nad dang phyugs nad rgyun tshad
398b1(sgra skor): dang / lo phyugs rtag tu legs/ char chu dus su phebs/ bde kying phun sum tshogasdu ba dang ldan te/ sems can thams cad dge ba spyod pa'i bsam pa bzang po dang ldan par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
398b2(sgra skor): la zhe sdang ba'i gang zag log sred can bstan pa bzhig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ni/ chu shing gi rtsa ba bzhin du gyur cig/ na mchog gsum la dad cing / ngem pa'i chos bsrung ba'i bsam pa bzang po
398b3(sgra skor): dang / ldan pa'i gang zag rnams ni tshe rang zhing bsam pa tham sA cang yi bzhin du grub par gyur cig/ bdag dang sems can thams cad rnam pa kun tu/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin brlabyas dang / dus
398b4(sgra skor): gsum rgyu lwa ba'i yum gyi mthu byin gyis// gang dang gang nu d+hI ltar gnas pa yaM// sgrib dang sdug bsngal ma lus kun bsngal cing // 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus rab bsnyil nas// rgyud drug 'gro ba ma lus
398b5(sgra skor): kun bsgra lA te// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas bsgrubs pa'i zhing // rin chen mdzes pa rnam pa kod bede pa can// bdud rtsi mtsho dang dpag bsam shing dang ldan// der 'byung skal ldan pad+ma'i mchog las skyes/
398b6(sgra skor): yid pazhin phun sum tshogs pa 'phags pa'i sa// rnam dag khyad par can gyi gnas mchog der// thog meng brdzus te bde bar gshegs gyur nas// mtshan tsam thos pas sgrib pa rnam sel ba/
399a1(sgra skor): rin chen 'od 'bar sku mchog 'gro ba'i skyabs// tshe dang ljongs spyod dpag med sbyin pa'i gtso// snang ba mtha' yas 'gro don mngon sum ste// de las mchog thob lung bstan dbang bsku ru nus//
399a2(sgra skor): rgya la skus gnyis dang spyod pa'i blo mthun zhing // phyogs btsor 'gro la phan pa'i don mdzad nas// srid gsum yongs kyi skyabasu gyur parare shog/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyogs kyi smon la
399a3(sgra skor): rdzogs s+ho// / 'phags pa stong phrag brgya pa la sogs mdo sde chen po bklags nas/ chos kyi sbyin po'i bsngo ba/ dam chos gsung rab yid bzhin nor bu 'od 'bar ba'o// yid dang rin chen
399a4(sgra skor): mang pos sna tshogs 'byung ba'i gnas// mkhyen bzhi shes bcu gang chen mtsho dang ldan pa yi// chos rje sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang // cho sna mdzad rang rgyal nyan thos 'phags pa thams cad la//
399a5(sgra skor): lus btu de dang pa'i spyi bos phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi// chos kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa yi// thugs rje snyoms pa'i mar dang ting 'dzin snying po las// rnam par dag pa'i ye shes gsalnga
399a6(sgra skor): bi'i mar mi 'bar// 'od bzang bdud rtsis srid gsum 'jig rten thams cad khyab// sdug bsngal nad sel mi shes mun pa kun sel ba// dam chos mdo yi sde la gus pas phyag 'tshalo// dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i
399b1(sgra skor): sngo la gus pas phyag 'tshul mud// dam chos lung bstan ste lca gus pas phyag 'tshal mA chod// tshogasu bcad pa'i sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod// che du brjod pa'i sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal
399b2(sgra skor): mechod// dam chos gling bzhi'i sde la gus pas phyag 'tshalnga mchod// 'di ltor 'das pa'i sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod// skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde la gus pas phyag 'tshalnga mchod// shin tu rgyas
399b3(sgra skor): pa'i sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod// rma du byung ba'i sde la gus pas phyag 'chi lnga mchod// rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod// gtan la 'bebs pa'i sde la gus pas phyags
399b4(sgra skor): 'tshal mchod// skyes pa'i rabs kyi sbru la gus pas phyag 'tsha le mtshad// skyes bu gang gis chos la gus pas gang zhig gi ste// blo dang lho las dam chos sgron ma 'bar ba dang // mdo sde'i tshig 'bru bdud rtsi thigs
399b5(sgra skor): pA 'ga' tsam yang // su yi snying deng lce la snang ba byed pa yi// blo gsal dog bzang skye bo ji snyed bzhugs glang la// drang pa'i sems kyi rjes su yi rang phyug 'tshal nus// chos brjed seng gre'i sgra sgrogs chos
399b6(sgra skor): kyi sbyin pa 'di// 'phags pa chos la mnga' mdzad tshig la dbang sgyur dang // khyu mchog dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal tshab ji bzhin du// tshig gcig yon lag rgya mtsho'i sgra skad thams cad kyi// 'jig rten
400a1(sgra skor): so so'i yid mthun chos kyi charla 'bab shig/ 'di ltar snying po byang chub mchog tu phyin pa'i byang chub sems pa' rnamasna la chos kyi dbyings gzhi bye brag mngon sum du shes pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i
400a2(sgra skor): sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang sgyur ba thob pa rnams la/ gzhi kun du brtan pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig/
400a3(sgra skor): nga mu sems dpa'i chos chen po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bla thob pa rnams la sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur
400a4(sgra skor): rnams lnga// kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya bI'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'grub par gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams lnga snying rje chen po'i mchog shin tu brtan pu zhes bya ba'i
400a5(sgra skor): sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa rnams la/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin bye brag shes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin
400a6(sgra skor): char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa rnams la// 'gro ba yongasu bsdus pas kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char pa mngon par 'bab par
400b1(sgra skor): gyur sdig/ byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa rnams la// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du dmigs pa'i sprin zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyis char mngon par 'bab par
400b2(sgra skor): gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams la/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / gzhi rab tu sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig/ byang chub
400b3(sgra skor): sems dpa'i las dang po pa rnams la/ snying rje chen po'i tshul dang thabs kyis snying po'i bye brag gI sprin kun tu 'byu dA ba zhes bya bo'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig/ byang chub sems
400b4(sgra skor): dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la dga' bar bya ba'i mdzod shin tu brtsegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par babab par gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag po la mya sa pa
400b5(sgra skor): rnams la/ rnam par thar pa mi zad pa dang / de bzhin+da gshegs pa'i smon lam gyis dga' bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'obab par gyur cig/ gzugs la spyod pa'i
400b6(sgra skor): sems can rnams la gzhi kun tu mi zad pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la/ tshul gyi rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'brug sgra'i dbyangs zhes bya ba 'i chos
401a1(sgra skor): kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig/ dbang sgyur gyi lha rnams la/ stobs 'byung ba'i chos kyi yo byad mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig
401a2(sgra skor): bdud kyi rigs kyi lha rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs can ya nga dag par bsgrub pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'a bye bar gyur cig/ 'phrul dgra'i lha rnams la ye shes
401a3(sgra skor): rin po che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyu ra cig/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan+da zhes bya
401a4(sgra skor): ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'ab gyur cig/ 'tsho ma'i lha rnams la de bzhin ga sheg sna pA thams cad rje su dran pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi cher mngon par 'bab par gyur cig/ lha'i dbang po
401a5(sgra skor): brgya byin gyi glan su de bzhin gnyen ba mthong na dga' ba'i shugs 'byung bA zhes bya ba'i chos kyi spyan gyi char mngon par 'bab par g+har tsig+ho/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi dbyings na mkha' la de bzhin

401b1(sgra skor): 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pur gyur cig/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i grunas su ye shes tshul rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig/ mi'i

401b3(sgra skor): bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs dang / 'phags pa'i lam gyi rgyu ga gI rgyud kyis brgyanA pa~M k+She b+ha b+hI chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig/ byol song gi smyo glan sul kyi lam khA na mA tho ba med pa la
401b4(sgra skor): nan tan du bya ba'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rjesu dran pa'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor lhun zhes bya ba'i chos kyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cigo/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa
401b5(sgra skor): thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrags pas/ sems can thams cad kyi stong pa'i sems 'byung dra ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi chur mngon par 'bab par gyur cig/ sems can+da log pa ltung ba rnams la sdug
401b6(sgra skor): bsngal thams cad zhi bar rab tu thob pa'i dbugs dbyung ba'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'kho
402a1(sgra skor): du dus thams cad du mchod pa rgya mtsho'i sprin rtag par 'byung ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ byang chub sems
402a2(sgra skor): dpa' thams cad kyi glegs su gyur te/ phyogs bcu na byang chub tu sems ma skyes pa rnams ni skyes par gyur cig/ sems skyes pa rnams ni slar ldog pa'i su thob par gyuT cig/ sla ro ldog pa'i sku thob
402a3(sgra skor): bu rnams ni/ slar mi ldog pa'i sa thob por gyur cig/ slar mi ldog pa'i snga thob pa rnams ni blo na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku thob ste/ sem sna can thams cad kyi don
402a4(sgra skor): yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ nyan thos de nga rang sangs rgyus thams cad kyi grogs su gyur te/ bla na med pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed nas/ theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i sgor gzhol zhing 'bab
402a5(sgra skor): par shog cig/ 'jig rten skyong ba tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyis grogs su gyur te/ lha ma yin gyi dgra las rgyal ba dang / so so'i rno ma par thar pa'i sgo kun yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ longs
402a6(sgra skor): spyod kyis yongs su rgyas par gyur cig/ rgyal po chen po bzhi grogs su gyur te/ so so'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun yongs su rdzogs pa dang / longs spyod kyis rgyas par gyur cig/ 'jig rten skyong
402b1(sgra skor): b+hiny+tsi g+hu rtsa brgyad dang / blon blo sgyum cu rtsa gnyis kyi grogs gyur te/ sgyu so so'i rnam par thar pa'i blo kun yongasu rdzogs pa dang / longs spyod kyis rgyus par gyur cig+ha/ btsug lag khrung gi bdag po thams cad
402b2(sgra skor): kyi grogs suM mur te/ so so'i rnam thar pa'i sgro n+d+ha yongs su rmugs bya dang / longs spyod kyi mu rgyas par gyur cig/ 'byung ba tshepo bzhi drung / rtog gi b+hU dang / sman gyi lha la sogs mi dang myi ma
402b3(sgra skor): yin pa'i risA na/ 'jig rten skyong ba ji snyed ba zhugs pa'i grogasu gyur te/ so sno'i rnam par tha pA'i sgo kun yong su rdzogs pa dA / longs spyod kyis rgyas pUr gyur ci ga/ sem+ba sa can thams cad dang thun myong
402b4(sgra skor): bsgos pa'i chos kyi sbyin du 'dri lha'i bajig rten thams cad du khyab ste/ lha'i 'jig rten dge zhing skyed pa shog cig/ meT ris thams cad khyab ste/ mI'i 'jig rten dgye zhing skyid par+ya sho ka cig/ klu'i
402b5(sgra skor): suM thams cad du khyob+h+yo ste/ klu'i 'jig rten thams cad dge zhing skyid pAR+Sha shag cig/ gnod sbyin gyi ris thams ca khyab ste/ gnod sbyin gyi ris dag zhing sbrid par srog sdig/ dri za'i ris thams cad
402b6(sgra skor): khyab ste/ dri za'i 'jig rten dge zhing skyid par shog cig/ lha ma yi na gyi ris thams cadadu khyo ste/ lha ma yin gyi 'jog rten dge zhing skyed par shog cig/ gshin rje'i ris thams cad du khyab ste/ gzhan
403a1(sgra skor): rje'i 'jig rten dge zhing skyid par shog cig/ de bzhin du mI bam ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / na mkha' lding dang / grul bum dang / srin po'i ris thams cad du khyab ste/ so so'i 'jig rten+da dge
403a2(sgra skor): zhing skyed par shog cig byolnga song gi ris thams cad du khyab ste/ byol song gi 'jig rten dge zhing skyid par shog cig/ dbang po gsal bar gyur cig/ yid dwags kyi gan sna'i sna thams cad du khyab ste/ ying+ga dgas
403a3(sgra skor): kyi 'jig rten dge zhing skyid par shog cig/ dmyal ba'i ris thams cad du khyab ste/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi nas/ dmyal ba'i 'jig rten dge zhing skying bar shog cig/ snod kyi 'jig

403a6(sgra skor): yon bdag thams cad kyi ris su khyab ste/ legs pa'i yon tan thams cad rgyu shing 'phel ba dang / nyes pa'i skyon thams cad byang zhing zhi nas/ yid la bsams shing bzang po smon pa thams cad grub par shog
